  ## <a name="application-guard-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-850">Impostazioni dei criteri di Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-850">Application Guard settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-851">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-851">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="applicationguardcontainerproxy"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-852">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-852">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>

  #### <a name="application-guard-container-proxy"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-853">Proxy contenitore di Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-853">Application Guard Container Proxy</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-854">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-854">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-855">In Windows dalla versione 84 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-855">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-856">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-856">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-857">Configura le impostazioni del proxy per Application Guard di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-857">Configures the proxy settings for Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-858">Se si abilita questo criterio, Application Guard di Microsoft Edge ignora altre fonti di configurazioni proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-858">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard ignores other sources of proxy configurations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-859">Se non si configura il criterio, Application Guard di Microsoft Edge userà la configurazione proxy dell'host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-859">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard uses the proxy configuration of the host.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-860">Questo criterio non influisce sulla configurazione proxy di Microsoft Edge al di fuori di Application Guard (nell'host).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-860">This policy does not affect the proxy configuration of Microsoft Edge outside of Application Guard (on the host).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-861">Il campo ProxyMode consente di specificare il server proxy usato da Application Guard di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-861">The ProxyMode field lets you specify the proxy server used by Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-862">Il campo ProxyPacUrl è un URL a un file .pac del proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-862">The ProxyPacUrl field is a URL to a proxy .pac file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-863">Il campo ProxyServer è un URL per il server proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-863">The ProxyServer field is a URL for the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-864">Se si sceglie il valore "direct" come "ProxyMode", tutti gli altri campi vengono ignorati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-864">If you choose the 'direct' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-865">Se si sceglie il valore "auto_detect" come "ProxyMode", tutti gli altri campi vengono ignorati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-865">If you choose the 'auto_detect' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-866">Se si sceglie il valore "fixed_server" come "ProxyMode", viene usato il campo "ProxyServer".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-866">If you choose the 'fixed_servers' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyServer' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-867">Se si sceglie il valore "pac_script" come "ProxyMode", viene usato il campo "ProxyPacUrl".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-867">If you choose the 'pac_script' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyPacUrl' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-868">Per altre informazioni su come identificare il traffico di Application Guard tramite proxy doppio, visitare [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-868">For more information about identifying Application Guard traffic via dual proxy, visit [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-869">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-869">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-870">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-870">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-871">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-871">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-872">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-872">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-873">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-873">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-874">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-874">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-875">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-875">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-876">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-876">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-877">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-877">GP unique name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-878">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Proxy contenitore di Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-878">GP name: Application Guard Container Proxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-879">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-879">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-880">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-880">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-881">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-881">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-882">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-882">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-883">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-883">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-884">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-884">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-885">Nome valore: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-885">Value Name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-886">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-886">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-887">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-887">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ApplicationGuardContainerProxy = {
  "ProxyMode": "direct", 
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", 
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-888">Valore di esempio compatto:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-888">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ApplicationGuardContainerProxy = {"ProxyMode": "direct", "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"}
  ```

  ### <a name="applicationguardfavoritessyncenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-890">ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-890">ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="application-guard-favorites-sync-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-891">Sincronizzazione Preferiti di Application Guard abilitata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-891">Application Guard Favorites Sync Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-892">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-892">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-893">In Windows dalla versione 90 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-893">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-894">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-894">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-895">Questo norma consente ai computer e ai dispositivi Microsoft Edge con protezione dell'applicazione abilitata di sincronizzare i Preferiti dall'host al contenitore in modo che corrispondano ai Preferiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-895">This policy allows Microsoft Edge computers/devices that have application guard enabled to sync favorites from the host to the container so the favorites match.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-896">Se [ManagedFavorites](#managedfavorites) vengono impostati, anche questi preferiti verranno sincronizzati al contenitore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-896">If [ManagedFavorites](#managedfavorites) are configured, those favorites will also be synced to the container.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-897">Se abiliti questa norma, la modifica dei Preferiti nel contenitore è disabilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-897">If you enable this policy, editing favorites in the container is disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-898">Quindi, i pulsanti Aggiungi preferiti e Aggiungi cartella preferiti vengono sfocati nell'interfaccia utente del browser del contenitore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-898">So, the add favorites and add favorites folder buttons will be blurred out in the UI of the container browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-899">Se disabiliti o non configuri questa norma, i Preferiti nell'host non verranno condivisi con il contenitore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-899">If you disable or don't configure this policy, favorites on the host will not be shared to the container.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-900">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-900">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-901">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-901">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-902">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-902">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-903">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-903">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-904">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-904">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-905">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-905">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-906">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-906">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-907">Informazioni sui Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-907">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-908">Nome unico dei Criteri di gruppo: ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-908">GP unique name: ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-909">Nome dei criteri di gruppo: Sincronizzazione dei Preferiti di Application Guard abilitata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-909">GP name: Application Guard Favorites Sync Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-910">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-910">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-911">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-911">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-912">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-912">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-913">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-913">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-914">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-914">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-915">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-915">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-916">Nome valore: ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-916">Value Name: ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-917">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-917">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-918">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-918">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="enablemediarouter"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-922">EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-922">EnableMediaRouter</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-google-cast"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-923">Abilita Google Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-923">Enable Google Cast</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-924">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-924">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-925">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-925">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-926">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-926">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-927">Abilitare questo criterio per abilitare Google Cast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-927">Enable this policy to enable Google Cast.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-928">Gli utenti potranno avviarlo dal menu delle app, dai menu contestuali delle pagine, dai controlli multimediali nei siti Web abilitati a Cast e (se visualizzata) dall'icona della barra degli strumenti di Cast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-928">Users will be able to launch it from the app menu, page context menus, media controls on Cast-enabled websites, and (if shown) the Cast toolbar icon.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-929">Disabilitare questo criterio per disabilitare Google Cast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-929">Disable this policy to disable Google Cast.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-930">Per impostazione predefinita, Google Cast è abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-930">By default, Google Cast is enabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-931">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-931">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-932">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-932">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-933">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-933">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-934">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-934">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-935">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-935">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-936">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-936">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-937">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-937">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-938">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-938">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-939">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-939">GP unique name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-940">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita Google Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-940">GP name: Enable Google Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-941">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-941">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-942">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-942">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-943">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-943">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-944">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-944">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-945">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-945">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-946">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-946">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-947">Nome valore: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-947">Value Name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-948">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-948">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-949">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-949">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-950">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-950">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-951">Nome chiave di preferenza: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-951">Preference Key Name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>


  ### <a name="showcasticonintoolbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-954">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-954">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-the-cast-icon-in-the-toolbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-955">Mostra l'icona di cast nella barra degli strumenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-955">Show the cast icon in the toolbar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-956">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-956">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-957">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-957">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-958">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-958">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-959">Impostare questo criterio su true per mostrare l'icona della barra degli strumenti di Cast nella barra degli strumenti o nel menu sulla barra di navigazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-959">Set this policy to true to show the Cast toolbar icon on the toolbar or the overflow menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-960">Gli utenti non potranno rimuoverlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-960">Users won't be able to remove it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-961">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono aggiungere o rimuovere l'icona utilizzando il relativo menu contestuale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-961">If you don't configure this policy or if you disable it, users can pin or remove the icon by using its contextual menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-962">Se è stato impostato anche il criterio [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) su false, questo criterio viene ignorato e l'icona della barra degli strumenti non viene mostrata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-962">If you've also set the [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) policy to false, then this policy is ignored, and the toolbar icon isn't shown.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-963">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-963">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-964">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-964">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-965">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-965">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-966">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-966">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-967">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-967">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-968">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-968">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-969">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-969">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-970">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-970">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-971">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-971">GP unique name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-972">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Mostra l'icona di cast nella barra degli strumenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-972">GP name: Show the cast icon in the toolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-973">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-973">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-974">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-974">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-975">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-975">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-976">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-976">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-977">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-977">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-978">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-978">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-979">Nome valore: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-979">Value Name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-980">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-980">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-981">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-981">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-983">Nome chiave di preferenza: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-983">Preference Key Name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>

  ### <a name="autoselectcertificateforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-988">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-988">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="automatically-select-client-certificates-for-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-989">Seleziona automaticamente i certificati client per questi siti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-989">Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-990">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-990">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-991">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-991">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-992">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-992">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-993">La configurazione del criterio consente di creare un elenco di pattern URL che specificano i siti per cui Microsoft Edge può selezionare automaticamente un certificato del client.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-993">Setting the policy lets you make a list of URL patterns that specify sites for which Microsoft Edge can automatically select a client certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-994">Il valore è una matrice di dizionari JSON convertiti in stringa, ciascuno con la forma { "pattern": "$URL_PATTERN", "filter" : $FILTER }, dove $URL_PATTERN è un pattern di configurazione del contenuto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-994">The value is an array of stringified JSON dictionaries, each with the form { "pattern": "$URL_PATTERN", "filter" : $FILTER }, where $URL_PATTERN is a content setting pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-995">$FILTER limita i certificati del client che il browser seleziona automaticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-995">$FILTER restricts the client certificates the browser automatically selects from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-996">Indipendentemente dal filtro, solo i certificati che corrispondono alla richiesta di certificato del server sono selezionati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-996">Independent of the filter, only certificates that match the server's certificate request are selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-997">Esempi dell’uso della sezione $FILTER:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-997">Examples for the usage of the $FILTER section:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-998">Quando $FILTER è configurato su { "ISSUER": { "CN": "$ISSUER_CN" } }, solo i certificati rilasciati da certificati con il CommonName $ISSUER_CN sono selezionati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-998">When $FILTER is set to { "ISSUER": { "CN": "$ISSUER_CN" } }, only client certificates issued by a certificate with the CommonName $ISSUER_CN are selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-999">Quando $FILTER contiene sia la sezione "ISSUER" che la sezione "SUBJECT", sono selezionati sono i certificati del client che soddisfano entrambe le condizioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-999">When $FILTER contains both the "ISSUER" and the "SUBJECT" sections, only client certificates that satisfy both conditions are selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1000">Quando $FILTER contiene una sezione "SUBJECT" con il valore "O", il certificato deve avere almeno una organizzazione corrispondente al valore specificato per essere selezionata. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1000">When $FILTER contains a "SUBJECT" section with the "O" value, a certificate needs at least one organization matching the specified value to be selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1001">Quando $FILTER contiene una sezione "SUBJECT" con il valore "OU", il certificato ha bisogno di almeno una unità organizzativa corrispondente al valore specificato per essere selezionata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1001">When $FILTER contains a "SUBJECT" section with a "OU" value, a certificate needs at least one organizational unit matching the specified value to be selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1002">Quando $FILTER è configurato su {}, la selezione dei certificati del client non viene limitata automaticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1002">When $FILTER is set to {}, the selection of client certificates is not additionally restricted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1003">Notare che i filtri forniti dal server web continuano ad applicarsi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1003">Note that filters provided by the web server still apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1004">Se il criterio non viene configurato, non ci sarà alcuna selezione automatica per i siti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1004">If you leave the policy unset, there's no autoselection for any site.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1005">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1005">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1006">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1006">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1007">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1007">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1008">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1008">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1009">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1009">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1010">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1010">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1011">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1011">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1012">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1012">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1013">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1013">GP unique name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1014">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Seleziona automaticamente i certificati client per questi siti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1014">GP name: Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1015">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1015">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1016">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1016">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1017">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1017">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1018">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1018">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1019">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1019">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1020">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1020">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1021">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1021">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1022">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1022">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1023">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1023">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls\1 = "{\"pattern\":\"https://www.contoso.com\",\"filter\":{\"ISSUER\":{\"CN\":\"certificate issuer name\", \"L\": \"certificate issuer location\", \"O\": \"certificate issuer org\", \"OU\": \"certificate issuer org unit\"}, \"SUBJECT\":{\"CN\":\"certificate subject name\", \"L\": \"certificate subject location\", \"O\": \"certificate subject org\", \"OU\": \"certificate subject org unit\"}}}"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1024">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1024">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1025">Nome chiave di preferenza: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1025">Preference Key Name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1026">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1026">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>{"pattern":"https://www.contoso.com","filter":{"ISSUER":{"CN":"certificate issuer name", "L": "certificate issuer location", "O": "certificate issuer org", "OU": "certificate issuer org unit"}, "SUBJECT":{"CN":"certificate subject name", "L": "certificate subject location", "O": "certificate subject org", "OU": "certificate subject org unit"}}}</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="cookiesallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1028">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1028">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-cookies-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1029">Consenti i cookie in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1029">Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1030">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1030">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1031">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1031">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1032">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1032">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1033">Definisce un elenco di siti, in base ai modelli URL, che sono consentiti per impostare i cookie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1033">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1034">Se non si configura questo criterio, per tutti i siti si usa il valore predefinito globale del criterio [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) (se impostato) o la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1034">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1035">Per altre informazioni, vedere i criteri [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) e [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1035">See the [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1036">Nota: non è possibile impostare modelli URL in conflitto tra questi tre criteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1036">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1037">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1037">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1038">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1038">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1039">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1039">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1040">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1040">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1041">\* non è un valore accettato per questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1041">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1042">Per non cancellare i cookie all'uscita, configura i criteri [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1042">To exclude cookies from being deleted on exit, configure the [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1043">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1043">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1044">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1044">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1045">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1045">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1046">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1046">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1047">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1047">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1048">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1048">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1049">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1049">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1050">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1050">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1051">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1051">GP unique name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1052">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consenti i cookie in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1052">GP name: Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1053">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1053">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1054">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1054">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1055">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1055">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1056">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1056">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1057">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1057">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1058">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1058">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1059">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1059">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1060">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1060">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1061">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1061">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1062">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1062">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1063">Nome chiave di preferenza: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1063">Preference Key Name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1064">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1064">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="cookiesblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1066">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1066">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-cookies-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1067">Blocca i cookie in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1067">Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1068">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1068">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1069">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1069">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1070">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1070">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1071">Definisce un elenco di siti, in base ai modelli URL, che non sono consentiti per impostare i cookie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1071">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1072">Se non si configura questo criterio, per tutti i siti si usa il valore predefinito globale del criterio [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) (se impostato) o la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1072">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1073">Per altre informazioni, vedere i criteri [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) e [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1073">See the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1074">Nota: non è possibile impostare modelli URL in conflitto tra questi tre criteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1074">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1075">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1075">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1076">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1076">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1077">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1077">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1078">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1078">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1079">\* non è un valore accettato per questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1079">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1080">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1080">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1081">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1081">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1082">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1082">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1083">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1083">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1084">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1084">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1085">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1085">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1086">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1086">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1087">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1087">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1088">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1088">GP unique name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1089">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Blocca i cookie in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1089">GP name: Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1090">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1090">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1091">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1091">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1092">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1092">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1093">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1093">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1094">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1094">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1095">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1095">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1096">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1096">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1097">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1097">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1098">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1098">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1099">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1099">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1100">Nome chiave di preferenza: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1100">Preference Key Name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

``` xml
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="cookiessessiononlyforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1103">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1103">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="limit-cookies-from-specific-websites-to-the-current-session"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1104">Limita i cookie da siti Web specifici alla sessione corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1104">Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1105">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1105">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1106">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1106">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1107">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1107">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1108">I cookie creati dai siti Web che corrispondono a un modello URL definito dall'utente vengono eliminati al termine della sessione (quando viene chiusa la finestra).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1108">Cookies created by websites that match a URL pattern you define are deleted when the session ends (when the window closes).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1109">I cookie creati dai siti Web che non corrispondono al modello vengono controllati dal criterio [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) (se impostato) o dalla configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1109">Cookies created by websites that don't match the pattern are controlled by the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or by the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1110">Questo è il comportamento predefinito anche se non si configura questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1110">This is also the default behavior if you don't configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1111">Se Microsoft Edge è in esecuzione in background, la sessione potrebbe non terminare quando viene chiusa l'ultima finestra, il che significa che i cookie non verranno eliminati quando viene chiusa la finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1111">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the session might not close when the last window is closed, meaning the cookies won't be cleared when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1112">Per informazioni sulla configurazione di cosa accade quando Microsoft Edge è in esecuzione in background, vedere il criterio [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1112">See the [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about configuring what happens when Microsoft Edge runs in background mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1113">Per controllare quali siti Web possono creare cookie, è anche possibile utilizzare i criteri [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) e [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1113">You can also use the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) policies to control which websites can create cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1114">Nota: non è possibile impostare modelli URL in conflitto tra questi tre criteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1114">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1115">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1115">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1116">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1116">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1117">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1117">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1118">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1118">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1119">\* non è un valore accettato per questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1119">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1120">Se si imposta il criterio [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) per ripristinare gli URL di sessioni precedenti, questo criterio viene ignorato e i cookie vengono archiviati definitivamente per tali siti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1120">If you set the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy to restore URLs from previous sessions, this policy is ignored, and cookies are stored permanently for those sites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1121">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1121">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1122">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1122">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1123">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1123">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1124">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1124">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1125">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1125">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1126">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1126">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1127">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1127">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1128">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1128">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1129">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1129">GP unique name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1130">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Limita i cookie da siti Web specifici alla sessione corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1130">GP name: Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1131">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1131">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1132">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1132">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1133">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1133">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1134">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1134">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1135">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1135">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1136">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1136">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1137">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1137">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1138">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1138">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1139">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1139">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1140">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1140">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1141">Nome chiave di preferenza: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1141">Preference Key Name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1142">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1142">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="defaultcookiessetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1144">DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1144">DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-cookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1145">Configura i cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1145">Configure cookies</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1146">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1146">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1147">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1147">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1148">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1148">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1149">Controlla se i siti Web possono creare cookie nel dispositivo dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1149">Control whether websites can create cookies on the user's device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1150">Questo criterio è di tipo tutto o niente: consente di creare cookie a tutti i siti Web o a nessuno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1150">This policy is all or nothing - you can let all websites create cookies, or no websites create cookies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1151">Non è possibile utilizzare questo criterio per abilitare i cookie di siti Web specifici.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1151">You can't use this policy to enable cookies from specific websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1152">Impostare il criterio su "SessionOnly" per eliminare i cookie al termine della sessione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1152">Set the policy to 'SessionOnly' to clear cookies when the session closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1153">Se Microsoft Edge è in esecuzione in background, la sessione potrebbe non terminare quando viene chiusa l'ultima finestra, il che significa che i cookie non verranno eliminati quando viene chiusa la finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1153">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the session might not close when the last window is closed, meaning the cookies won't be cleared when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1154">Per informazioni sulla configurazione di cosa accade quando Microsoft Edge è in esecuzione in background, vedere il criterio [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1154">See [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about configuring what happens when Microsoft Edge runs in background mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1155">Se non si configura questo criterio, viene usato quello predefinito "AllowCookies" e gli utenti possono modificare questa impostazione in Impostazioni di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1155">If you don't configure this policy, the default 'AllowCookies' is used, and users can change this setting in Microsoft Edge Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1156">Per impedire agli utenti di modificare questa impostazione, impostare il criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1156">(If you don't want users to be able to change this setting, set the policy.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1157">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1157">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1158">AllowCookies (1) = Consentire a tutti i siti di creare cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1158">AllowCookies (1) = Let all sites create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1159">BlockCookies (2) = Non consentire ad alcun sito di creare cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1159">BlockCookies (2) = Don't let any site create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1160">SessionOnly (4) = Mantieni i cookie per tutta la durata della sessione, tranne quelli elencati in [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1160">SessionOnly (4) = Keep cookies for the duration of the session, except ones listed in [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1161">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1161">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1162">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1162">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1163">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1163">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1164">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1164">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1165">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1165">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1166">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1166">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1167">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1167">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1168">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1168">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1169">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1169">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1170">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1170">GP unique name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1171">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura i cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1171">GP name: Configure cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1172">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1172">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1173">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1173">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1174">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1174">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1175">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1175">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1176">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1176">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1177">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1177">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1178">Nome valore: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1178">Value Name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1179">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1179">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
