  ### <a name="defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1185">DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1185">DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-file-system-api-for-reading"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1186">Controlla l'uso dell'API file system per la lettura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1186">Control use of the File System API for reading</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1187">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1187">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1188">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1188">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1189">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1189">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1190">Se si imposta questo criterio su 3, i siti web possono richiedere l'accesso in lettura al filesystem del sistema operativo host attraverso l'API file System.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1190">If you set this policy to 3, websites can ask for read access to the host operating system's filesystem using the File System API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1191">Se si imposta questo criterio su 2, l’accesso viene negato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1191">If you set this policy to 2, access is denied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1192">Se non si imposta questo criteri, i siti web possono richiedere accesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1192">If you don't set this policy, websites can ask for access.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1193">Gli utenti possono modificare questa impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1193">Users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1194">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1194">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1195">BlockFileSystemRead (2) = Non permette ad alcun sito di richiedere l'accesso in lettura ai file e alle directory tramite l'API file System</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1195">BlockFileSystemRead (2) = Don't allow any site to request read access to files and directories via the File System API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1196">AskFileSystemRead (3) = Permette ai siti di chiedere all'utente di concedere l'accesso in lettura ai file e alle directory tramite l'API file System</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1196">AskFileSystemRead (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant read access to files and directories via the File System API</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1197">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1197">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1198">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1198">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1199">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1199">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1200">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1200">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1201">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1201">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1202">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1202">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1203">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1203">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1204">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1204">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1205">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1205">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1206">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1206">GP unique name: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1207">Nome Criteri di gruppo: controlla l'uso dell'API file system per la lettura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1207">GP name: Control use of the File System API for reading</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1208">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1208">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1209">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1209">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1210">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1210">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1211">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1211">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1212">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1212">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1213">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1213">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1214">Nome valore: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1214">Value Name: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1215">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1215">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1216">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1216">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1217">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1217">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1218">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1218">Preference Key Name: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1219">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1219">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1228">Se non si imposta questo criteri, i siti web possono richiedere accesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1228">If you don't set this policy, websites can ask for access.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1229">Gli utenti possono modificare questa impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1229">Users can change this setting.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1231">BlockFileSystemWrite (2) = Non permette ad alcun sito di richiedere l'accesso in scrittura ai file e alle directory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1231">BlockFileSystemWrite (2) = Don't allow any site to request write access to files and directories</span></span>

  ### <a name="defaultgeolocationsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1257">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1257">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-geolocation-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1258">Impostazione predefinita di georilevazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1258">Default geolocation setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1259">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1259">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1260">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1260">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1261">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1261">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1262">Stabilisce se i siti Web possono tenere traccia delle posizioni fisiche degli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1262">Set whether websites can track users' physical locations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1263">È possibile consentire il tracciamento per impostazione predefinita (“AllowGeolocation”), negarlo per impostazione predefinita (“BlockGeolocation”) o chiedere conferma all'utente ogni volta che un sito Web richiede la posizione (“AskGeolocation”).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1263">You can allow tracking by default ('AllowGeolocation'), deny it by default ('BlockGeolocation'), or ask the user each time a website requests their location ('AskGeolocation').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1264">Se non si configura questo criterio, viene usato "AskGeolocation" e l'utente può modificarlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1264">If you don't configure this policy, 'AskGeolocation' is used and the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1265">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1265">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1266">AllowGeolocation (1) = Consentire ai siti di tenere traccia della posizione fisica degli utenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1266">AllowGeolocation (1) = Allow sites to track users' physical location</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1267">BlockGeolocation (2) = Non consentire ad alcun sito di tenere traccia della posizione fisica degli utenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1267">BlockGeolocation (2) = Don't allow any site to track users' physical location</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1268">AskGeolocation (3) = Chiedere conferma ogni volta che un sito Web vuole tenere traccia della posizione fisica degli utenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1268">AskGeolocation (3) = Ask whenever a site wants to track users' physical location</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1269">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1269">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1270">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1270">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1271">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1271">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1272">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1272">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1273">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1273">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1274">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1274">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1275">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1275">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1276">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1276">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1277">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1277">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1278">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1278">GP unique name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1279">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Impostazione predefinita di georilevazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1279">GP name: Default geolocation setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1280">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1280">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1281">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1281">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1284">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1284">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1285">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1285">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

  ### <a name="defaultimagessetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1293">DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1293">DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-images-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1294">Impostazione predefinita per le immagini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1294">Default images setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1295">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1295">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1296">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1296">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1297">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1297">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1298">Stabilisce se i siti Web possono mostrare immagini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1298">Set whether websites can display images.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1299">È possibile consentire (“AllowImages”) o bloccare (“BlockImages”) le immagini in tutti i siti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1299">You can allow images on all sites ('AllowImages') or block them on all sites ('BlockImages').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1300">Se non si configura questo criterio, le immagini sono consentite per impostazione predefinita e l'utente può modificare tale impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1300">If you don't configure this policy, images are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1301">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1301">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1302">AllowImages (1) = Consentire a tutti i siti di mostrare tutte le immagini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1302">AllowImages (1) = Allow all sites to show all images</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1303">BlockImages (2) = Non consentire ad alcun sito di mostrare le immagini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1303">BlockImages (2) = Don't allow any site to show images</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1304">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1304">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1305">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1305">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1306">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1306">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1307">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1307">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1308">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1308">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1309">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1309">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1310">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1310">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1311">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1311">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1312">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1312">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1313">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1313">GP unique name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1314">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Impostazione predefinita per le immagini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1314">GP name: Default images setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1315">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1315">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1316">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1316">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1317">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1317">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1318">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1318">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1319">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1319">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1320">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1320">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1321">Nome valore: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1321">Value Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1322">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1322">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1323">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1323">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1324">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1324">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1325">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1325">Preference Key Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1326">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1326">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultinsecurecontentsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1328">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1328">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-insecure-content-exceptions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1329">Controlla l'uso di eccezioni di contenuti non sicuri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1329">Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1330">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1330">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1331">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 80 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1331">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1332">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1332">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1333">Permette di specificare se gli utenti possono aggiungere eccezioni per consentire contenuti misti per siti specifici.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1333">Allows you to set whether users can add exceptions to allow mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1334">Questo criterio può essere ignorato per modelli URL specifici con i criteri [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) e [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1334">This policy can be overridden for specific URL patterns using the [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) and [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1335">Se non viene impostato questo criterio, gli utenti potranno aggiungere eccezioni per consentire i contenuti misti bloccabili e disabilitare gli aggiornamenti automatici per i contenuti misti bloccabili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1335">If this policy isn't set, users will be allowed to add exceptions to allow blockable mixed content and disable autoupgrades for optionally blockable mixed content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1336">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1336">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1337">BlockInsecureContent (2) = Non consentire ad alcun sito di caricare contenuti misti </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1337">BlockInsecureContent (2) = Do not allow any site to load mixed content</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1338">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = Consentire agli utenti di aggiungere eccezioni per consentire i contenuti misti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1338">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = Allow users to add exceptions to allow mixed content</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1339">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1339">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1340">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1340">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1341">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1341">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1342">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1342">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1343">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1343">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1344">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1344">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1345">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1345">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1346">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1346">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1347">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1347">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1348">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1348">GP unique name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1349">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Controlla l'uso di eccezioni di contenuti non sicuri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1349">GP name: Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1350">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1350">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1351">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1351">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1352">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1352">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1353">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1353">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1354">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1354">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1355">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1355">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1356">Nome valore: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1356">Value Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1357">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1357">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1358">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1358">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1359">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1359">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1360">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1360">Preference Key Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1361">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1361">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultjavascriptsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1363">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1363">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-javascript-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1364">Impostazione predefinita di JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1364">Default JavaScript setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1365">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1365">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1366">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1366">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1367">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1367">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1368">Stabilisce se i siti Web possono eseguire JavaScript.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1368">Set whether websites can run JavaScript.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1369">È possibile consentirlo (“AllowJavaScript”) o bloccarlo (“BlockJavaScript”) per tutti i siti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1369">You can allow it for all sites ('AllowJavaScript') or block it for all sites ('BlockJavaScript').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1370">Se non si configura questo criterio, tutti i siti possono eseguire JavaScript per impostazione predefinita e l'utente può modificare tale impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1370">If you don't configure this policy, all sites can run JavaScript by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1371">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1371">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1372">AllowJavaScript (1) = Consentire a tutti i siti di eseguire JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1372">AllowJavaScript (1) = Allow all sites to run JavaScript</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1373">BlockJavaScript (2) = Non consentire ad alcun sito di eseguire JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1373">BlockJavaScript (2) = Don't allow any site to run JavaScript</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1374">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1374">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1375">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1375">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1376">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1376">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1377">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1377">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1378">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1378">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1379">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1379">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1380">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1380">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1381">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1381">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1382">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1382">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1383">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1383">GP unique name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1384">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Impostazione predefinita di JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1384">GP name: Default JavaScript setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1385">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1385">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1388">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1388">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1389">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1389">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1390">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1390">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>


  ### <a name="defaultnotificationssetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1398">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1398">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-notification-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1399">Impostazione predefinita per le notifiche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1399">Default notification setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1400">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1400">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1401">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1401">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1402">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1402">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1403">Stabilisce se i siti Web possono mostrare le notifiche sul desktop.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1403">Set whether websites can display desktop notifications.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1404">È possibile consentirle per impostazione predefinita (“AllowNotifications”), negarle per impostazione predefinita (“BlockNotifications”) o fare in modo che venga chiesta conferma all'utente ogni volta che un sito Web vuole mostrare una notifica (“AskNotifications”).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1404">You can allow them by default ('AllowNotifications'), deny them by default ('BlockNotifications'), or have the user be asked each time a website wants to show a notification ('AskNotifications').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1405">Se non si configura questo criterio, le notifiche sono consentite per impostazione predefinita e l'utente può modificare tale impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1405">If you don't configure this policy, notifications are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1406">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1406">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1407">AllowNotifications (1) = Consentire ai siti di mostrare le notifiche sul desktop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1407">AllowNotifications (1) = Allow sites to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1408">BlockNotifications (2) = Non consentire ad alcun sito di mostrare le notifiche sul desktop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1408">BlockNotifications (2) = Don't allow any site to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1409">AskNotifications (3) = Chiedere conferma ogni volta che un sito vuole mostrare notifiche sul desktop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1409">AskNotifications (3) = Ask every time a site wants to show desktop notifications</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1410">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1410">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1411">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1411">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1412">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1412">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1413">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1413">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1414">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1414">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1415">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1415">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1416">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1416">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1417">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1417">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1418">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1418">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1419">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1419">GP unique name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1420">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Impostazione predefinita per le notifiche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1420">GP name: Default notification setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1421">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1421">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1422">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1422">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1423">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1423">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1424">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1424">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1425">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1425">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1426">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1426">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1427">Nome valore: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1427">Value Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1428">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1428">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1429">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1429">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1430">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1430">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1431">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1431">Preference Key Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1432">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1432">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultpluginssetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1434">DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1434">DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-adobe-flash-setting-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1435">Impostazione predefinita di Adobe Flash (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1435">Default Adobe Flash setting (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1436">OBSOLETO: questo criterio è obsoleto e non funziona dopo Microsoft Edge 87.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1436">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1437">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1437">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1438">In Windows e macOS da 77 a 87</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1438">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1439">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1439">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1440">Questo criterio non funziona perché Flash non è più supportato da Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1440">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1441">[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) e [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) vengono verificati per primi, quindi questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1441">[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) and [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) are checked first, then this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1442">Le opzioni sono "ClickToPlay" e "BlockPlugins".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1442">The options are 'ClickToPlay' and 'BlockPlugins'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1443">Se si imposta questo criterio su "BlockPlugins", il plug-in viene negato per tutti i siti Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1443">If you set this policy to 'BlockPlugins', this plugin is denied for all websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1444">"ClickToPlay" consente di eseguire il plug-in di Flash, ma gli utenti fanno clic sul segnaposto per avviarlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1444">'ClickToPlay' lets the Flash plugin run, but users click the placeholder to start it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1445">Se non si configura questo criterio, l'utente può modificare tale impostazione manualmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1445">If you don't configure this policy, the user can change this setting manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1446">Nota: la riproduzione automatica è solo per i domini elencati in modo esplicito nel criterio [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1446">Note: Automatic playback is only for domains explicitly listed in the [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1447">Per attivare la riproduzione automatica per tutti i siti, aggiungere http://\* e https://\* all'elenco degli URL consentiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1447">To turn automatic playback on for all sites, add http://\* and https://\* to the allowed list of URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1448">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1448">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1449">BlockPlugins (2) = Bloccare il plug-in di Adobe Flash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1449">BlockPlugins (2) = Block the Adobe Flash plugin</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1450">ClickToPlay (3) = Fare clic per riprodurre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1450">ClickToPlay (3) = Click to play</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1451">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1451">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1452">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1452">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1453">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1453">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1454">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1454">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1455">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1455">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1456">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1456">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1457">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1457">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1458">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1458">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1459">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1459">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1460">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1460">GP unique name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1461">Nome GP: impostazione predefinita di Adobe Flash (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1461">GP name: Default Adobe Flash setting (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1462">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1462">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1463">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1463">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1464">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1464">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1465">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1465">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1466">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1466">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1467">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1467">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1468">Nome valore: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1468">Value Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1469">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1469">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1470">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1470">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1471">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1471">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1472">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1472">Preference Key Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1473">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1473">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultpopupssetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1475">DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1475">DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-pop-up-window-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1476">Impostazione predefinita della finestra popup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1476">Default pop-up window setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1477">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1477">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1478">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1478">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1479">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1479">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1480">Specifica se i siti Web possono mostrare finestre popup.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1480">Set whether websites can show pop-up windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1481">È possibile consentirle (“AllowPopups”) o bloccarle (“BlockPopups”) in tutti i siti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1481">You can allow them on all websites ('AllowPopups') or block them on all sites ('BlockPopups').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1482">Se non si configura questo criterio, le finestre popup sono bloccate per impostazione predefinita e gli utenti possono modificare tale impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1482">If you don't configure this policy, pop-up windows are blocked by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1483">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1483">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1484">AllowPopups (1) = Consentire a tutti i siti di mostrare i popup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1484">AllowPopups (1) = Allow all sites to show pop-ups</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1485">BlockPopups (2) = Non consentire ad alcun sito di mostrare i popup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1485">BlockPopups (2) = Do not allow any site to show popups</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1486">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1486">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1487">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1487">Supported features:</span></span>

  ### <a name="defaultwebbluetoothguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1510">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1510">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-web-bluetooth-api"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1511">Controlla l'uso dell'API Web Bluetooth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1511">Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1512">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1512">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1513">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1513">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1514">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1514">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1515">Controlla se i siti Web possono accedere a dispositivi Bluetooth nelle vicinanze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1515">Control whether websites can access nearby Bluetooth devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1516">È possibile bloccare completamente l'accesso o fare in modo che il sito chieda conferma all'utente ogni volta che vuole accedere a un dispositivo Bluetooth.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1516">You can completely block access or require the site to ask the user each time it wants to access a Bluetooth device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1517">Se non si configura questo criterio, viene usato il valore predefinito (“AskWebBluetooth”, che indica che ogni volta viene chiesta conferma agli utenti) e gli utenti possono modificarlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1517">If you don't configure this policy, the default value ('AskWebBluetooth', meaning users are asked each time) is used and users can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1518">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1518">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1519">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = Non consentire ad alcun sito di richiedere l'accesso ai dispositivi Bluetooth usando l'API Web Bluetooth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1519">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to Bluetooth devices via the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1520">AskWebBluetooth (3) = Consentire ai siti di chiedere all'utente di autorizzare l'accesso a un dispositivo Bluetooth nelle vicinanze</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1520">AskWebBluetooth (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a nearby Bluetooth device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1521">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1521">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1522">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1522">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1523">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1523">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1524">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1524">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1525">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1525">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1526">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1526">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1527">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1527">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1528">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1528">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1529">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1529">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1530">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1530">GP unique name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1531">Nome Criteri di gruppo : Controlla l'uso dell'API Web Bluetooth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1531">GP name: Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1532">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1532">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1533">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1533">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1534">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1534">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1535">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1535">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1536">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1536">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1537">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1537">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1538">Nome valore: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1538">Value Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1539">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1539">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1540">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1540">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1541">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1541">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1542">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1542">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1543">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1543">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultwebusbguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1545">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1545">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-webusb-api"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1546">Controlla l'uso dell'API WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1546">Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1547">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1547">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1548">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1548">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1549">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1549">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1550">Specifica se i siti Web possono accedere ai dispositivi USB connessi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1550">Set whether websites can access connected USB devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1551">È possibile bloccare completamente l'accesso o chiedere conferma all'utente ogni volta che un sito Web vuole accedere a dispositivi USB connessi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1551">You can completely block access or ask the user each time a website wants to get access to connected USB devices.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1552">È possibile sostituire questo criterio per modelli URL specifici usando i criteri [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) e [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1552">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) and [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1553">Se non si configura questo criterio, i siti possono chiedere agli utenti se è possibile accedere ai dispositivi USB connessi (“AskWebUsb”) per impostazione predefinita e gli utenti possono modificare questa impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1553">If you don't configure this policy, sites can ask users whether they can access the connected USB devices ('AskWebUsb') by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1554">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1554">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1555">BlockWebUsb (2) = Non consentire ad alcun sito di richiedere l'accesso ai dispositivi USB tramite l'API WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1555">BlockWebUsb (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to USB devices via the WebUSB API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1556">AskWebUsb (3) = Consentire ai siti di chiedere all'utente di autorizzare l'accesso a un dispositivo USB connesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1556">AskWebUsb (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a connected USB device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1557">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1557">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1558">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1558">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1559">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1559">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1560">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1560">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1561">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1561">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1562">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1562">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1563">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1563">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1564">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1564">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1565">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1565">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1566">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1566">GP unique name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1567">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Controlla l'uso dell'API WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1567">GP name: Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1568">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1568">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1569">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1569">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1570">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1570">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1571">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1571">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1572">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1572">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1573">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1573">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1574">Nome valore: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1574">Value Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1575">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1575">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1576">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1576">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1577">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1577">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1578">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1578">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1579">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1579">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="filesystemreadaskforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1581">FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1581">FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-read-access-via-the-file-system-api-on-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1582">Consente l'accesso in lettura con l'API file system in questi siti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1582">Allow read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1583">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1583">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1584">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1584">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1585">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1585">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1586">Impostando il criterio, è possibile elencare i modelli di URL che specificano i siti in cui è possibile chiedere agli utenti di concedere l'accesso in lettura a file o directory nel file system del sistema operativo host tramite l'API file system.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1586">Setting the policy lets you list the URL patterns that specify which sites can ask users to grant them read access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system via the File System API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1587">Se il criterio non viene disattivato, sta a significare che[DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) verrà applicato a tutti i siti, se è impostato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1587">Leaving the policy unset means [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1588">In caso contrario, si applicano le impostazioni personali degli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1588">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1589">I modelli di URL non possono entrare in conflitto con [FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls](#filesystemreadblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1589">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls](#filesystemreadblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1590">Nessuno dei criteri ha la precedenza se un URL corrisponde a entrambi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1590">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1591">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1591">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1592">\* non è un valore accettato per questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1592">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1593">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1593">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1594">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1594">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1595">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1595">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1596">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1596">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1597">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1597">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1598">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1598">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1599">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1599">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1600">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1600">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1601">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1601">GP unique name: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1602">Nome Criteri di gruppo: consente l'accesso in lettura con l'API file system in questi siti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1602">GP name: Allow read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1603">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1603">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1604">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1604">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1605">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1605">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1606">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1606">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1607">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1607">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1608">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1608">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1609">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1609">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1610">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1610">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1611">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1611">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1612">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1612">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1613">Nome chiave preferenza: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1613">Preference Key Name: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1614">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1614">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
