  ### <a name="filesystemreadblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1616">FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1616">FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-read-access-via-the-file-system-api-on-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1617">Consente l'accesso in lettura tramite l'API file system in questi siti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1617">Block read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1618">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1618">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1619">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1619">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1620">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1620">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1621">Se viene impostato questo criterio, è possibile elencare i modelli di URL che specificano i siti in cui è possibile chiedere agli utenti di concedere l'accesso in lettura a file o directory nel file system del sistema operativo host tramite l'API file system.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1621">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can't ask users to grant them read access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system via the File System API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1622">Se non viene impostato questo criterio, [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) verrà applicato a tutti i siti, se è impostato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1622">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1623">In caso contrario, si applicano le impostazioni personali degli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1623">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1624">I modelli di URL non possono entrare in conflitto con [FileSystemReadAskForUrls](#filesystemreadaskforurls)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1624">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemReadAskForUrls](#filesystemreadaskforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1625">Nessuno dei criteri ha la precedenza se un URL corrisponde a entrambi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1625">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1626">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1626">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1627">\* non è un valore accettato per questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1627">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1628">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1628">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1629">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1629">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1630">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1630">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1631">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1631">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1635">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1635">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1637">Nome Criteri di gruppo: consente l'accesso in lettura tramite l'API file system in questi siti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1637">GP name: Block read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1638">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1638">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1642">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1642">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1643">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1643">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1645">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1645">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ### <a name="filesystemwriteaskforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1651">FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1651">FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1655">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1655">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1656">Se si imposta questo criterio, è possibile elencare i modelli di URL che specificano i siti in cui è possibile chiedere agli utenti di concedere l'accesso in lettura a file o directory nel file system del sistema operativo host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1656">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can ask users to grant them write access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1657">Se non viene impostato questo criterio, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) verrà applicato a tutti i siti, se è impostato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1657">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1658">In caso contrario, si applicano le impostazioni personali degli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1658">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1659">I modelli di URL non possono entrare in conflitto con [FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls](#filesystemwriteblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1659">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls](#filesystemwriteblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1660">Nessuno dei criteri ha la precedenza se un URL corrisponde a entrambi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1660">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1661">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1661">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1662">\* non è un valore accettato per questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1662">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1665">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1665">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1666">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1666">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1678">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1678">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1679">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1679">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1680">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1680">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1681">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1681">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1682">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1682">Mac information and settings</span></span>

  ### <a name="filesystemwriteblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1686">FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1686">FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-write-access-to-files-and-directories-on-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1687">Non consente l'accesso in scrittura ai file e alle cartelle in questi siti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1687">Block write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1688">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1688">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1689">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1689">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1690">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1690">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1691">Se viene impostato questo criterio, è possibile elencare i modelli di URL che specificano i siti in cui è possibile chiedere agli utenti di concedere l'accesso in scrittura a file o directory nel file system del sistema operativo host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1691">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can't ask users to grant them write access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1692">Se non viene impostato questo criterio, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) verrà applicato a tutti i siti, se è impostato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1692">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1693">In caso contrario, si applicano le impostazioni personali degli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1693">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1694">I modelli di URL non possono entrare in conflitto con [FileSystemWriteAskForUrls](#filesystemwriteaskforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1694">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemWriteAskForUrls](#filesystemwriteaskforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1695">Nessuno dei criteri ha la precedenza se un URL corrisponde a entrambi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1695">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1696">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1696">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1697">\* non è un valore accettato per questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1697">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1698">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1698">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1699">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1699">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1700">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1700">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1701">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1701">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1702">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1702">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1703">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1703">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1704">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1704">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1705">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1705">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1706">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1706">GP unique name: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1707">Nome Criteri di gruppo: non consente l'accesso in scrittura ai file e alle cartelle in questi siti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1707">GP name: Block write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1708">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1708">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1709">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1709">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1710">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1710">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1711">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1711">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1712">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1712">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1713">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1713">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1714">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1714">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1715">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1715">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1716">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1716">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1717">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1717">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1718">Nome chiave preferenza: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1718">Preference Key Name: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1719">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1719">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="imagesallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1721">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1721">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-images-on-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1722">Consente le immagini in questi siti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1722">Allow images on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1723">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1723">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1724">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1724">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1725">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1725">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1726">Definisce un elenco di siti, in base ai modelli URL, che possono mostrare immagini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1726">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can display images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1727">Se non si configura questo criterio, per tutti i siti si usa il valore predefinito globale del criterio [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) (se impostato) o la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1727">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value is used for all sites either from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1728">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1728">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1729">\* non è un valore accettato per questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1729">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1730">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1730">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1731">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1731">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1732">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1732">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1733">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1733">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1734">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1734">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1735">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1735">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1736">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1736">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1737">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1737">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1738">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1738">GP unique name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1739">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente le immagini in questi siti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1739">GP name: Allow images on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1740">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1740">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1741">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1741">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1742">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1742">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1743">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1743">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1744">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1744">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1745">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1745">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1746">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1746">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1747">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1747">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1748">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1748">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1749">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1749">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1750">Nome chiave di preferenza: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1750">Preference Key Name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

``` xml
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1755">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1755">Supported versions:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1759">Se non si configura questo criterio, per tutti i siti si usa il valore predefinito globale del criterio [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) (se impostato) o la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1759">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1764">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1764">Can be recommended: No</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1769">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1769">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1770">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1770">GP unique name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1771">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Blocca le immagini in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1771">GP name: Block images on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1772">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1772">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1773">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1773">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1774">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1774">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1775">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1775">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1776">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1776">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1777">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1777">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1778">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1778">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1779">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1779">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1780">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1780">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1782">Nome chiave di preferenza: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1782">Preference Key Name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  ### <a name="insecurecontentallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1785">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1785">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-insecure-content-on-specified-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1786">Consente contenuti non sicuri in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1786">Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1787">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1787">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1788">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 80 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1788">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1789">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1789">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1790">Crea un elenco di modelli URL per specificare i siti che possono mostrare contenuti misti non sicuri (ovvero contenuti HTTP nei siti HTTPS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1790">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that can display insecure mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1791">Se non si configura questo criterio, i contenuti misti bloccabili verranno bloccati e i contenuti misti eventualmente bloccabili potranno essere aggiornati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1791">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1792">Tuttavia, gli utenti potranno impostare eccezioni per consentire i contenuti misti non sicuri per siti specifici.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1792">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1793">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1793">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1794">\* non è un valore accettato per questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1794">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1795">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1795">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1796">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1796">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1797">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1797">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1798">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1798">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1799">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1799">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1800">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1800">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1801">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1801">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1802">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1802">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1803">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1803">GP unique name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1804">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente contenuti non sicuri in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1804">GP name: Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1805">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1805">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1806">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1806">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1807">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1807">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1808">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1808">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1809">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1809">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1810">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1810">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1811">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1811">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1812">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1812">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1813">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1813">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1814">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1814">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1815">Nome chiave di preferenza: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1815">Preference Key Name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1816">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1816">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="insecurecontentblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1818">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1818">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-insecure-content-on-specified-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1819">Blocca contenuti non sicuri in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1819">Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1820">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1820">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1821">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 80 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1821">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1822">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1822">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1823">Crea un elenco di modelli URL per specificare i siti che non possono mostrare contenuti misti (ovvero contenuti HTTP nei siti HTTPS) bloccabili (ossia attivi) e per quali contenuti misti eventualmente bloccabili verranno disabilitati gli aggiornamenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1823">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that aren't allowed to display blockable (i.e. active) mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites) and for which optionally blockable mixed content upgrades will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1824">Se non si configura questo criterio, i contenuti misti bloccabili verranno bloccati e i contenuti misti eventualmente bloccabili potranno essere aggiornati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1824">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1825">Tuttavia, gli utenti potranno impostare eccezioni per consentire i contenuti misti non sicuri per siti specifici.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1825">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1826">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1826">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1827">\* non è un valore accettato per questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1827">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1828">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1828">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1829">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1829">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1830">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1830">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1831">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1831">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1832">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1832">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1833">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1833">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1834">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1834">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1835">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1835">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1836">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1836">GP unique name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1837">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Blocca contenuti non sicuri in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1837">GP name: Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1838">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1838">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1839">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1839">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1840">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1840">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1841">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1841">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1842">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1842">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1843">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1843">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1844">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1844">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1845">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1845">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1846">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1846">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1847">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1847">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1848">Nome chiave di preferenza: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1848">Preference Key Name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1849">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1849">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="javascriptallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1851">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1851">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-javascript-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1852">Consente JavaScript in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1852">Allow JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1853">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1853">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1854">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1854">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1855">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1855">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1856">Definisce un elenco di siti, in base ai modelli URL, che sono autorizzati a eseguire JavaScript.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1856">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to run JavaScript.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1857">Se non si configura questo criterio, per tutti i siti si usa il valore predefinito globale del criterio [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) (se impostato) o la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1857">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1858">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1858">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1859">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1859">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1860">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1860">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1861">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1861">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1862">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1862">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1863">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1863">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1864">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1864">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1865">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1865">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1866">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1866">GP unique name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1867">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente JavaScript in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1867">GP name: Allow JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1868">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1868">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1869">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1869">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1870">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1870">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1871">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1871">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1872">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1872">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1873">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1873">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1874">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1874">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1875">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1875">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1876">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1876">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1877">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1877">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1878">Nome chiave di preferenza: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1878">Preference Key Name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>

``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="javascriptblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1881">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1881">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-javascript-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1882">Blocca JavaScript in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1882">Block JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1883">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1883">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1884">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1884">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1885">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1885">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1886">Definisce un elenco di siti, in base ai modelli URL, che non sono autorizzati a eseguire JavaScript.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1886">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that aren't allowed to run JavaScript.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1887">Se non si configura questo criterio, per tutti i siti si usa il valore predefinito globale del criterio [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) (se impostato) o la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1887">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1888">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1888">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1889">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1889">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1890">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1890">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1891">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1891">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1892">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1892">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1893">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1893">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1894">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1894">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1895">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1895">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1896">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1896">GP unique name: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1897">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Blocca JavaScript in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1897">GP name: Block JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1898">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1898">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1899">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1899">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1900">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1900">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1901">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1901">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1902">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1902">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1903">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1903">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1904">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1904">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1905">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1905">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1906">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1906">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1907">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1907">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1908">Nome chiave di preferenza: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1908">Preference Key Name: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1909">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1909">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1911">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1911">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-default-legacy-samesite-cookie-behavior-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1912">Abilita l'impostazione di comportamento dei cookie SameSite legacy predefinita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1912">Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1913">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1913">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1914">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 80 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1914">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1915">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1915">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1916">Consente di ripristinare il comportamento SameSite legacy per tutti i cookie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1916">Lets you revert all cookies to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1917">Se il comportamento legacy viene ripristinato, i cookie che non specificano un attributo SameSite sono trattati come se fossero "SameSite=None", il requisito per i cookie "SameSite=None" di avere l'attributo "Secure" viene rimosso, e la valutazione dello schema viene saltata quando si verifica se due siti siano uguali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1917">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute, and skips the scheme comparison when evaluating if two sites are same-site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1918">Se il criterio non viene configurato, il comportamento SameSite predefinito dipenderà da altre origini di configurazione per la funzionalità SameSite-by-default feature, la funzionalità Cookies-without-SameSite-must-be-secure e la funzionalità Schemeful Same-Site.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1918">If you don't set this policy, the default SameSite behavior for cookies will depend on other configuration sources for the SameSite-by-default feature, the Cookies-without-SameSite-must-be-secure feature, and the Schemeful Same-Site feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1919">Queste funzionalità possono anche essere configurate con un campo di prova o con il flag same-site-by-default-cookies, il flag cookies-without-same-site-must-be-secure, o il flag cookies-without-same-site-must-be-secure in edge://flags.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1919">These features can also be configured by a field trial or the same-site-by-default-cookies flag, the cookies-without-same-site-must-be-secure flag, or the schemeful-same-site flag in edge://flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1920">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1920">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1921">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = Ripristinare il comportamento SameSite legacy per i cookie in tutti i siti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1921">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1922">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = Usare il comportamento SameSite per impostazione predefinita per i cookie in tutti i siti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1922">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = Use SameSite-by-default behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1923">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1923">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1924">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1924">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1925">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1925">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1926">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1926">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1927">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1927">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1928">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1928">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1929">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1929">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1930">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1930">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1931">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1931">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1932">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1932">GP unique name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1933">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita l'impostazione di comportamento dei cookie SameSite legacy predefinita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1933">GP name: Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1934">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1934">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1935">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1935">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1936">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1936">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1937">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1937">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1938">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1938">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1939">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1939">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1940">Nome valore: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1940">Value Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1941">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1941">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1942">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1942">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1943">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1943">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1944">Nome chiave di preferenza: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1944">Preference Key Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1945">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1945">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <a name="legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabledfordomainlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1947">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1947">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>

  #### <a name="revert-to-legacy-samesite-behavior-for-cookies-on-specified-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1948">Ripristina il comportamento SameSite legacy dei cookie in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1948">Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1949">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1949">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1950">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 80 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1950">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1951">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1951">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1952">Per i cookie impostati per i domini che corrispondono a modelli specificati verrà ripristinato il comportamento SameSite legacy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1952">Cookies set for domains match specified patterns will revert to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1953">Se il comportamento legacy viene ripristinato, i cookie che non specificano un attributo SameSite sono trattati come se fossero "SameSite=None", il requisito per i cookie "SameSite=None" di avere l'attributo "Secure" viene rimosso, e la valutazione dello schema viene saltata quando si verifica se due siti siano uguali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1953">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute, and skips the scheme comparison when evaluating if two sites are same-site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1954">Se non si imposta questo criterio, verrà usato il valore predefinito globale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1954">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1955">L'impostazione predefinita globale verrà usata anche per i cookie di domini non coperti dai modelli specificati dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1955">The global default will also be used for cookies on domains not covered by the patterns you specify.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1956">Il valore predefinito globale può essere configurato usando il criterio [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1956">The global default value can be configured using the [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1957">Se [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) non è impostato, il valore predefinito globale si basa su altre origini di configurazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1957">If [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) is unset, the global default value falls back to other configuration sources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-1958">I modelli elencati in questo criterio vengono trattati come domini, non URL, quindi non è necessario specificare uno schema o una porta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1958">Note that patterns you list in this policy are treated as domains, not URLs, so you should not specify a scheme or port.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1959">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1959">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1960">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1960">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1961">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1961">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-1962">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1962">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-1963">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-1963">Data Type:</span></span>

  ### <a name="pluginsallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2046">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2046">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-the-adobe-flash-plug-in-on-specific-sites-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2047">Consentire il plug-in Adobe Flash in siti specifici (obsoleti)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2047">Allow the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2048">OBSOLETO: questo criterio è obsoleto e non funziona dopo Microsoft Edge 87.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2048">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2049">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2049">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2050">In Windows e macOS da 77 a 87</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2050">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2051">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2051">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2052">Questo criterio non funziona perché Flash non è più supportato da Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2052">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2053">Definisce un elenco di siti, in base ai modelli URL, che possono eseguire il plug-in di Adobe Flash.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2053">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can run the Adobe Flash plug-in.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2054">Se non si configura questo criterio, per tutti i siti si usa il valore predefinito globale del criterio [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) (se impostato) o la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2054">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2055">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2055">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2056">Tuttavia, a partire da M85, i caratteri jolly "\ \*" e "[\ \*.]" nell'host non sono più supportati per questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2056">However, starting in M85, patterns with '\*' and '[\*.]' wildcards in the host are no longer supported for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2057">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2057">Supported features:</span></span>
