  ### <a name="pluginsblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2080">PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2080">PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-the-adobe-flash-plug-in-on-specific-sites-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2081">Bloccare il plug-in Adobe Flash in siti specifici (obsoleti)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2081">Block the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2082">OBSOLETO: questo criterio è obsoleto e non funziona dopo Microsoft Edge 87.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2082">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2083">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2083">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2084">In Windows e macOS da 77 a 87</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2084">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2085">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2085">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2086">Questo criterio non funziona perché Flash non è più supportato da Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2086">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2087">Definisce un elenco di siti, in base ai modelli URL, che non possono eseguire Adobe Flash.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2087">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked from running Adobe Flash.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2088">Se non si configura questo criterio, per tutti i siti si usa il valore predefinito globale del criterio [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) (se impostato) o la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2088">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2089">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2089">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2090">Tuttavia, a partire da M85, i caratteri jolly "\ \*" e "[\ \*.]" nell'host non sono più supportati per questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2090">However, starting in M85, patterns with '\*' and '[\*.]' wildcards in the host are no longer supported for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2091">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2091">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2092">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2092">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2093">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2093">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2094">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2094">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2095">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2095">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2096">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2096">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2097">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2097">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2098">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2098">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2099">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2099">GP unique name: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2100">Nome GP: bloccare il plug-in Adobe Flash in siti specifici (obsoleti)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2100">GP name: Block the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2101">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2101">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2102">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2102">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2103">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2103">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2104">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2104">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2105">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2105">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2106">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2106">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2107">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2107">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2108">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2108">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2109">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2109">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls\2 = "http://contoso.edu:8080"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2110">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2110">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2111">Nome chiave di preferenza: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2111">Preference Key Name: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  <string>http://contoso.edu:8080</string>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2129">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2129">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2138">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2138">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2139">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2139">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2147">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2147">Supported versions:</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2149">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2149">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2152">Se non si configura questo criterio, per tutti i siti si usa il valore predefinito globale del criterio [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) (se impostato) o la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2152">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2155">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2155">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2156">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2156">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2157">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2157">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2158">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2158">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2159">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2159">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2160">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2160">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2161">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2161">GP unique name: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2162">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Blocca le finestre popup in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2162">GP name: Block pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2163">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2163">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2164">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2164">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2165">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2165">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2166">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2166">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2167">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2167">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2168">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2168">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2169">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2169">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2170">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2170">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2171">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2171">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2172">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2172">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2173">Nome chiave di preferenza: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2173">Preference Key Name: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2174">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2174">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="registeredprotocolhandlers"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2176">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2176">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>

  #### <a name="register-protocol-handlers"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2177">Registra i gestori di protocollo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2177">Register protocol handlers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2178">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2178">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2179">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2179">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2180">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2180">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2181">Impostare questo criterio (solo consigliato) per registrare un elenco di gestori di protocollo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2181">Set this policy (recommended only) to register a list of protocol handlers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2182">Questo elenco viene unito a quelli registrati dall'utente ed entrambi sono disponibili per l'uso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2182">This list is merged with ones registered by the user and both are available to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2183">Per registrare un gestore di protocollo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2183">To register a protocol handler:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2184">Impostare la proprietà del protocollo sullo schema (ad esempio, come "mailto").</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2184">Set the protocol property to the scheme (for example, "mailto")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2185">Impostare la proprietà dell'URL sulla proprietà dell’URL dell'applicazione che gestisce lo schema specificato nel campo “protocollo”.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2185">Set the URL property to the URL property of the application that handlers the scheme specified in the "protocol" field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2186">Il modello può includere un segnaposto "%s", che verrà sostituito dall'URL gestito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2186">The pattern can include a "%s" placeholder, which the handled URL replaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2187">Gli utenti non possono rimuovere un gestore di protocollo registrato tramite questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2187">Users can't remove a protocol handler registered by this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2188">Tuttavia, è possibile installare un nuovo gestore di protocollo predefinito per eseguire l'override dei gestori di protocollo esistenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2188">However, they can install a new default protocol handler to override the existing protocol handlers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2189">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2189">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2190">Può essere obbligatorio: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2190">Can be mandatory: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2191">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2191">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2192">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2192">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2193">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2193">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2194">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2194">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2195">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2195">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2196">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2196">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2197">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2197">GP unique name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2198">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Registra i gestori di protocollo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2198">GP name: Register protocol handlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2199">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2199">GP path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2200">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2200">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2201">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2201">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2202">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2202">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2203">Percorso (obbligatorio): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2203">Path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2204">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2204">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2205">Nome valore: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2205">Value Name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2206">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2206">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2207">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2207">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RegisteredProtocolHandlers = [
  {
    "default": true, 
    "protocol": "mailto", 
    "url": "https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2208">Valore di esempio compatto:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2208">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RegisteredProtocolHandlers = [{"default": true, "protocol": "mailto", "url": "https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2209">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2209">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2210">Nome chiave di preferenza: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2210">Preference Key Name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2211">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2211">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>RegisteredProtocolHandlers</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>default</key>
    <true/>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>mailto</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="spotlightexperiencesandrecommendationsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2213">SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2213">SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="choose-whether-users-can-receive-customized-background-images-and-text-suggestions-notifications"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2214">Scegli se consentire agli utenti di ricevere immagini di sfondo personalizzate, testo, suggerimenti, notifiche,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2214">Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications,</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2215">e suggerimenti per i servizi Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2215">and tips for Microsoft services</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2216">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2216">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2217">In Windows dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2217">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2218">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2218">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2219">Scegli se consentire agli utenti di ricevere immagini di sfondo personalizzate, testo, suggerimenti, notifiche e consigli per i servizi Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2219">Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications, and tips for Microsoft services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2220">Se si abilita o non si configura questa impostazione, le esperienze in evidenza e i suggerimenti vengono attivati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2220">If you enable or don't configure this setting, spotlight experiences and recommendations are turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2221">Se si disabilita questa impostazione, le esperienze in evidenza e i suggerimenti vengono disattivati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2221">If you disable this setting, spotlight experiences and recommendations are turned off.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2222">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2222">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2223">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2223">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2224">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2224">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2225">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2225">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2226">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2226">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2227">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2227">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2228">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2228">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2229">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2229">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2230">Nome univoco GP: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2230">GP unique name: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2231">Nome GP: scegli se consentire agli utenti di ricevere immagini di sfondo personalizzate, testo, suggerimenti, notifiche e consigli per i servizi Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2231">GP name: Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications, and tips for Microsoft services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2232">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2232">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2233">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2233">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2234">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2234">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2235">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2235">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2236">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2236">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2237">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2237">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2238">Nome valore: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2238">Value Name: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2239">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2239">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2240">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2240">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="webusballowdevicesforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2242">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2242">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="grant-access-to-specific-sites-to-connect-to-specific-usb-devices"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2243">Concede l'accesso a siti specifici per connettersi a dispositivi USB specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2243">Grant access to specific sites to connect to specific USB devices</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2244">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2244">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2245">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2245">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2246">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2246">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2247">Consente di impostare un elenco di URL che specificano quali siti verranno automaticamente autorizzati ad accedere a un dispositivo USB con gli ID prodotto e fornitore specificati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2247">Allows you to set a list of urls that specify which sites will automatically be granted permission to access a USB device with the given vendor and product IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2248">Ogni voce dell'elenco deve contenere sia i dispositivi sia gli URL affinché il criterio sia valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2248">Each item in the list must contain both devices and urls in order for the policy to be valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2249">Ogni elemento nei dispositivi può contenere un campo per ID prodotto e ID fornitore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2249">Each item in devices can contain a vendor ID and product ID field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2250">Gli ID che vengono omessi vengono trattati come caratteri jolly con un'eccezione, e tale eccezione è che un ID prodotto non può essere specificato senza indicare anche un ID fornitore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2250">Any ID that is omitted is treated as a wildcard with one exception, and that exception is that a product ID cannot be specified without a vendor ID also being specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2251">In caso contrario, il criterio non sarà valido e verrà ignorato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2251">Otherwise, the policy will not be valid and will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2252">Il modello di autorizzazione USB sfrutta l'URL del sito richiedente ("URL di richiesta") e l'URL del sito del frame principale ("URL di incorporamento") per concedere l'autorizzazione all'URL di richiesta per accedere al dispositivo USB.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2252">The USB permission model uses the URL of the requesting site ("requesting URL") and the URL of the top-level frame site ("embedding URL") to grant permission to the requesting URL to access the USB device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2253">L'URL di richiesta potrebbe essere diverso dall'URL di incorporamento quando il sito di richiesta viene caricato in un iframe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2253">The requesting URL may be different than the embedding URL when the requesting site is loaded in an iframe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2254">Di conseguenza, il campo "urls" può contenere fino a due stringhe di URL delimitate da una virgola per specificare rispettivamente l'URL di richiesta e l'URL di incorporamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2254">Therefore, the "urls" field can contain up to two URL strings delimited by a comma to specify the requesting and embedding URL respectively.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2255">Se viene specificato un solo URL, l'accesso ai dispositivi USB corrispondenti verrà concesso quando l'URL del sito di richiesta corrisponde a tale URL indipendentemente dallo stato di incorporamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2255">If only one URL is specified, then access to the corresponding USB devices will be granted when the requesting site's URL matches this URL regardless of embedding status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2256">Gli URL nel campo "urls" devono essere URL validi; in caso contrario, il criterio verrà ignorato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2256">The URLs in "urls" must be valid URLs, otherwise the policy will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2257">Se questo criterio non viene impostato, per tutti i siti verrà usato il valore predefinito globale del criterio [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) se è stato impostato, altrimenti la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2257">If this policy is left not set, the global default value will be used for all sites either from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy if it is set, or the user's personal configuration otherwise.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2258">I modelli URL in questo criterio non devono essere in conflitto con quelli configurati tramite [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2258">URL patterns in this policy should not clash with the ones configured via [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2259">In caso di conflitto, questo criterio avrà la precedenza rispetto a [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) e [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2259">If there is a clash, this policy will take precedence over [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) and [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2260">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2260">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2261">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2261">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2262">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2262">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2263">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2263">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2264">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2264">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2265">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2265">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2266">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2266">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2267">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2267">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2268">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2268">GP unique name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2269">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Concede l'accesso a siti specifici per connettersi a dispositivi USB specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2269">GP name: Grant access to specific sites to connect to specific USB devices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2270">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2270">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2271">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2271">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2272">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2272">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2273">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2273">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2274">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2274">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2275">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2275">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2276">Nome valore: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2276">Value Name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2277">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2277">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2278">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2278">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls = [
  {
    "devices": [
      {
        "product_id": 5678, 
        "vendor_id": 1234
      }
    ], 
    "urls": [
      "https://contoso.com", 
      "https://fabrikam.com"
    ]
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2279">Valore di esempio compatto:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2279">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls = [{"devices": [{"product_id": 5678, "vendor_id": 1234}], "urls": ["https://contoso.com", "https://fabrikam.com"]}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2280">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2280">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2281">Nome chiave di preferenza: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2281">Preference Key Name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2282">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2282">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>devices</key>
    <array>
      <dict>
        <key>product_id</key>
        <integer>5678</integer>
        <key>vendor_id</key>
        <integer>1234</integer>
      </dict>
    </array>
    <key>urls</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://contoso.com</string>
      <string>https://fabrikam.com</string>
    </array>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="webusbaskforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2284">WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2284">WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-webusb-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2285">Consente WebUSB in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2285">Allow WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2286">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2286">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2287">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2287">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2288">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2288">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2289">Definisce un elenco di siti, in base ai modelli URL, che possono chiedere all'utente di accedere a un dispositivo USB.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2289">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can ask the user for access to a USB device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2290">Se non si configura questo criterio, per tutti i siti si usa il valore predefinito globale del criterio [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) (se impostato) o la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2290">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2291">I modelli URL definiti in questo criterio non possono essere in conflitto con quelli configurati nel criterio [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls): non è possibile consentire e bloccare contemporaneamente un URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2291">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) policy - you can't both allow and block a URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2292">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2292">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2293">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2293">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2294">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2294">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2295">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2295">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2296">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2296">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2297">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2297">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2298">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2298">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2299">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2299">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2300">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2300">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2301">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2301">GP unique name: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2302">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente WebUSB in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2302">GP name: Allow WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2303">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2303">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2304">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2304">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2305">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2305">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2306">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2306">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2307">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2307">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2308">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2308">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2309">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2309">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2310">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2310">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2311">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2311">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2312">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2312">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2313">Nome chiave di preferenza: WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2313">Preference Key Name: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2314">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2314">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="webusbblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2316">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2316">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-webusb-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2317">Blocca WebUSB in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2317">Block WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2318">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2318">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2319">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2319">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2320">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2320">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2321">Definisce un elenco di siti, in base ai modelli URL, che non possono chiedere all'utente di autorizzarli ad accedere a un dispositivo USB.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2321">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't ask the user to grant them access to a USB device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2322">Se non si configura questo criterio, per tutti i siti si usa il valore predefinito globale del criterio [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) (se impostato) o la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2322">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2323">I modelli URL in questo criterio non possono essere in conflitto con quelli configurati nel criterio [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2323">URL patterns in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2324">Non è possibile consentire e bloccare contemporaneamente un URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2324">You can't both allow and block a URL.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2325">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2325">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2326">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2326">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2327">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2327">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2328">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2328">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2329">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2329">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2330">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2330">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2331">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2331">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2332">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2332">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2333">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2333">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2334">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2334">GP unique name: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2335">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Blocca WebUSB in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2335">GP name: Block WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2336">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni contenuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2336">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2337">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2337">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2338">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2338">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2339">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2339">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2340">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2340">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2341">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2341">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2342">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2342">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2343">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2343">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2344">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2344">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2345">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2345">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2346">Nome chiave di preferenza: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2346">Preference Key Name: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2347">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2347">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ## <a name="default-search-provider-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2349">Criteri del provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2349">Default search provider policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2350">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2350">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2351">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2351">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-the-default-search-provider"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2352">Abilita il provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2352">Enable the default search provider</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2353">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2353">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2354">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2354">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2355">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2355">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2356">Consente di usare un provider di ricerca predefinito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2356">Enables the ability to use a default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2357">Se si abilita questo criterio, un utente può cercare un termine digitando nella barra degli indirizzi (a condizione che ciò che viene digitato non sia un URL).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2357">If you enable this policy, a user can search for a term by typing in the address bar (as long as what they type isn't a URL).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2358">È possibile specificare il provider di ricerca predefinito da usare abilitando il resto dei criteri di ricerca predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2358">You can specify the default search provider to use by enabling the rest of the default search policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2359">Se tali criteri vengono lasciati vuoti (non configurati) o non vengono configurati correttamente, l'utente può scegliere il provider predefinito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2359">If these are left empty (not configured) or configured incorrectly, the user can choose the default provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2360">Se si disabilita questo criterio, l'utente non può eseguire ricerche dalla barra degli indirizzi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2360">If you disable this policy, the user can't search from the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2361">Se si abilita o si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti non possono modificarlo o sostituirlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2361">If you enable or disable this policy, users can't change or override it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2362">Se non si configura questo criterio, il provider di ricerca predefinito è abilitato e l'utente può scegliere il provider di ricerca predefinito e impostare l'elenco di provider di ricerca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2362">If you don't configure this policy, the default search provider is enabled, and the user can choose the default search provider and set the search provider list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2363">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2363">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX..</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2364">A partire dalla versione 84 di Microsoft Edge, è possibile impostare questo criterio come consigliato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2364">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2365">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2365">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2366">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2366">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2367">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2367">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2368">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2368">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2369">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2369">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2370">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2370">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2371">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2371">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2372">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2372">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2373">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2373">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2374">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita il provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2374">GP name: Enable the default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2375">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2375">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2376">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2376">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2377">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2377">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2378">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2378">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2379">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2379">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2380">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2380">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2381">Nome valore: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2381">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2382">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2382">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2383">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2383">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2384">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2384">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2385">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2385">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2386">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2386">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderencodings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2388">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2388">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-encodings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2389">Codifiche del provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2389">Default search provider encodings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2390">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2390">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2391">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2391">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2392">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2392">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2393">Specifica le codifiche di caratteri supportate dal provider di ricerca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2393">Specify the character encodings supported by the search provider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2394">Le codifiche sono nomi di tabelle codici come UTF-8, GB2312 e ISO-8859-1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2394">Encodings are code page names like UTF-8, GB2312, and ISO-8859-1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2395">Vengono provate nell'ordine indicato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2395">They are tried in the order provided.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2396">Questo criterio è facoltativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2396">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2397">Se non configurato, viene usato quello predefinito, cioè UTF-8.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2397">If not configured, the default, UTF-8, is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2398">Questo criterio viene applicato solo se si abilitano i criteri [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) e [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2398">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2399">A partire dalla versione 84 di Microsoft Edge, è possibile impostare questo criterio come consigliato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2399">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2400">Se l'utente ha già impostato un provider di ricerca predefinito, non verrà aggiunto all'elenco dei provider di ricerca che l'utente può scegliere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2400">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2401">Se si tratta del comportamento desiderato, usare il criterio [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2401">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2402">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2402">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2403">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2403">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2404">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2404">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2405">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2405">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2406">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2406">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2407">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2407">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2408">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2408">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2409">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2409">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2410">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2410">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2411">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Codifiche del provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2411">GP name: Default search provider encodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2412">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2412">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2413">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2413">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2414">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2414">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2415">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2415">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2416">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2416">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2417">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2417">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2418">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2418">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2419">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2419">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2420">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2420">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\1 = "UTF-8"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\2 = "UTF-16"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\3 = "GB2312"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\4 = "ISO-8859-1"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2421">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2421">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2422">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2422">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2423">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2423">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>UTF-8</string>
  <string>UTF-16</string>
  <string>GB2312</string>
  <string>ISO-8859-1</string>
</array>
```
