  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderimageurl"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2425">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2425">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>

  #### <a name="specifies-the-search-by-image-feature-for-the-default-search-provider"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2426">Specifica la funzionalità di ricerca per immagini per il provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2426">Specifies the search-by-image feature for the default search provider</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2427">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2427">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2428">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2428">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2429">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2429">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2430">Specifica l'URL per il motore di ricerca utilizzato per la ricerca delle immagini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2430">Specifies the URL to the search engine used for image search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2431">Le richieste di ricerca vengono inviate tramite il metodo GET.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2431">Search requests are sent using the GET method.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2432">Questo criterio è facoltativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2432">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2433">Se non si configura, la ricerca delle immagini non è disponibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2433">If you don't configure it, image search isn't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2434">Specificare l'URL di Ricerca immagini Bing come: "{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2434">Specify Bing's Image Search URL as: '{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2435">Specificare l'URL di Ricerca immagini Google come: "{google:baseURL}searchbyimage/upload".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2435">Specify Google's Image Search URL as: '{google:baseURL}searchbyimage/upload'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2436">Per completare la configurazione della ricerca di immagini, vedere il criterio [DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2436">See [DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams) policy to finish configuring image search.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2437">Questo criterio viene applicato solo se si abilitano i criteri [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) e [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2437">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2438">A partire dalla versione 84 di Microsoft Edge, è possibile impostare questo criterio come consigliato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2438">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2439">Se l'utente ha già impostato un provider di ricerca predefinito, non verrà aggiunto all'elenco dei provider di ricerca che l'utente può scegliere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2439">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2440">Se si tratta del comportamento desiderato, usare il criterio [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2440">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2441">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2441">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2442">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2442">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2443">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2443">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2444">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2444">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2445">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2445">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2446">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2446">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2447">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2447">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2448">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2448">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2449">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2449">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2450">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Specifica la funzionalità di ricerca per immagini per il provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2450">GP name: Specifies the search-by-image feature for the default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2451">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2451">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2452">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2452">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2453">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2453">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2454">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2454">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2455">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2455">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2456">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2456">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2457">Nome valore: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2457">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2458">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2458">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2459">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2459">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2460">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2460">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2461">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2461">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2462">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2462">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload</string>
```

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2464">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2464">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>

  #### <a name="parameters-for-an-image-url-that-uses-post"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2465">Parametri per un URL immagine che usa POST</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2465">Parameters for an image URL that uses POST</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2466">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2466">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2467">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2467">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2468">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2468">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2469">Se si abilita, questo criterio specifica i parametri utilizzati durante l'esecuzione di una ricerca di immagini che usa POST.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2469">If you enable this policy, it specifies the parameters used when an image search that uses POST is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2470">Il criterio è costituito da coppie di valori/nomi separate da virgole.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2470">The policy consists of comma-separated name/value pairs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2471">Se un valore è un parametro del modello, come {imageThumbnail} nell'esempio precedente, viene sostituito con i dati dell'anteprima dell'immagine reale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2471">If a value is a template parameter, like {imageThumbnail} in the preceding example, it's replaced with real image thumbnail data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2472">Questo criterio viene applicato solo se si abilitano i criteri [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) e [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2472">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2473">Specificare i parametri Post degli URL di Ricerca immagini Bing come: "imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2473">Specify Bing's Image Search URL Post Params as: 'imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2474">Specificare i parametri Post degli URL di Ricerca immagini Google come: "encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2474">Specify Google's Image Search URL Post Params as: 'encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2475">Se non si imposta questo criterio, le richieste di ricerca delle immagini vengono inviate tramite il metodo GET.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2475">If you don't set this policy, image search requests are sent using the GET method.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2476">A partire dalla versione 84 di Microsoft Edge, è possibile impostare questo criterio come consigliato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2476">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2477">Se l'utente ha già impostato un provider di ricerca predefinito, non verrà aggiunto all'elenco dei provider di ricerca che l'utente può scegliere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2477">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2478">Se si tratta del comportamento desiderato, usare il criterio [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2478">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2479">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2479">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2480">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2480">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2481">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2481">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2482">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2482">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2483">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2483">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2484">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2484">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2485">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2485">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2486">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2486">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2487">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2487">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2488">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Parametri per un URL immagine che usa POST</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2488">GP name: Parameters for an image URL that uses POST</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2489">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2489">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2490">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2490">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2491">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2491">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2492">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2492">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2493">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2493">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2494">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2494">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2495">Nome valore: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2495">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2496">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2496">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2497">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2497">Example value:</span></span>

```
"content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2498">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2498">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2499">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2499">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2500">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2500">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}</string>
```

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderkeyword"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2502">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2502">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-keyword"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2503">Parola chiave del provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2503">Default search provider keyword</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2504">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2504">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2505">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2505">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2506">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2506">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2507">Specifica la parola chiave, che è la scelta rapida da tastiera utilizzata nella barra degli indirizzi per attivare la ricerca per questo provider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2507">Specifies the keyword, which is the shortcut used in the Address Bar to trigger the search for this provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2508">Questo criterio è facoltativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2508">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2509">Se non si configura, nessuna parola chiave attiverà il provider di ricerca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2509">If you don't configure it, no keyword activates the search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2510">Questo criterio viene applicato solo se si abilitano i criteri [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) e [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2510">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2511">A partire dalla versione 84 di Microsoft Edge, è possibile impostare questo criterio come consigliato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2511">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2512">Se l'utente ha già impostato un provider di ricerca predefinito, non verrà aggiunto all'elenco dei provider di ricerca che l'utente può scegliere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2512">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2513">Se si tratta del comportamento desiderato, usare il criterio [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2513">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2514">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2514">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2515">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2515">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2516">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2516">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2517">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2517">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2518">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2518">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2519">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2519">String</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2521">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2521">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2529">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2529">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>

  ### <a name="defaultsearchprovidername"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2537">DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2537">DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-name"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2538">Nome del provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2538">Default search provider name</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2539">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2539">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2540">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2540">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2541">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2541">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2542">Specifica il nome del provider di ricerca predefinito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2542">Specifies the name of the default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2543">Se si abilita questo criterio, si imposta il nome del provider di ricerca predefinito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2543">If you enable this policy, you set the name of the default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2544">Se non si abilita o si lascia vuoto questo criterio, verrà usato il nome host specificato dall'URL di ricerca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2544">If you don't enable this policy or if you leave it empty, the host name specified by the search URL is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2545">Il criterio "DefaultSearchProviderName" deve essere impostato su un provider di ricerca crittografato approvato dall'organizzazione che corrisponde al provider di ricerca crittografato impostato in DTBC-0008.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2545">'DefaultSearchProviderName' should be set to an organization-approved encrypted search provider that corresponds to the encrypted search provider set in DTBC-0008.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2546">Questo criterio viene applicato solo se si abilitano i criteri [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) e [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2546">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2547">A partire dalla versione 84 di Microsoft Edge, è possibile impostare questo criterio come consigliato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2547">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2548">Se l'utente ha già impostato un provider di ricerca predefinito, non verrà aggiunto all'elenco dei provider di ricerca che l'utente può scegliere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2548">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2549">Se si tratta del comportamento desiderato, usare il criterio [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2549">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2550">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2550">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2551">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2551">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2552">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2552">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2553">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2553">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2554">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2554">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2555">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2555">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2556">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2556">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2557">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2557">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2558">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2558">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2559">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Nome del provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2559">GP name: Default search provider name</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2560">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2560">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2561">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2561">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2562">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2562">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2563">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2563">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2564">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2564">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2565">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2565">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2566">Nome valore: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2566">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2567">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2567">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2568">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2568">Example value:</span></span>

```
"My Intranet Search"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2569">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2569">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2570">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2570">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2571">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2571">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>My Intranet Search</string>
```

  ### <a name="defaultsearchprovidersearchurl"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2573">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2573">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-search-url"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2574">URL del servizio di ricerca del provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2574">Default search provider search URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2575">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2575">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2576">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2576">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2577">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2577">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2578">Specifica l'URL per il motore di ricerca utilizzato per una ricerca predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2578">Specifies the URL of the search engine used for a default search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2579">L'URL contiene la stringa "{searchTerms}", che in fase di query viene sostituita dai termini di ricerca dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2579">The URL contains the string '{searchTerms}', which is replaced at query time by the terms the user is searching for.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2580">Specificare l'URL di ricerca Bing come:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2580">Specify Bing's search URL as:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2581">"{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2581">'{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2582">Specificare l'URL di ricerca Google come: "{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2582">Specify Google's search URL as: '{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2583">Questo criterio è necessario quando si abilita il criterio [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled); in caso contrario, questo criterio viene ignorato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2583">This policy is required when you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) policy; if you don't enable the latter policy, this policy is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2584">A partire dalla versione 84 di Microsoft Edge, è possibile impostare questo criterio come consigliato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2584">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2585">Se l'utente ha già impostato un provider di ricerca predefinito, non verrà aggiunto all'elenco dei provider di ricerca che l'utente può scegliere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2585">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2586">Se si tratta del comportamento desiderato, usare il criterio [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2586">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2587">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2587">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2588">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2588">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2589">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2589">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2590">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2590">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2591">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2591">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2592">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2592">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2593">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2593">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2594">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2594">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2595">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2595">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2596">Nome Criteri di gruppo: URL del servizio di ricerca del provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2596">GP name: Default search provider search URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2597">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2597">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2598">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2598">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2599">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2599">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2600">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2600">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2601">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2601">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2602">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2602">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2603">Nome valore: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2603">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2604">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2604">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2605">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2605">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/search?q={searchTerms}"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2606">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2606">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2607">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2607">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>

<string>https://search.contoso.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>

  ### <a name="defaultsearchprovidersuggesturl"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2610">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2610">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-url-for-suggestions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2611">URL del provider di ricerca predefinito per i suggerimenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2611">Default search provider URL for suggestions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2612">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2612">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2613">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2613">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2614">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2614">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2615">Specifica l'URL per il motore di ricerca utilizzato per fornire suggerimenti di ricerca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2615">Specifies the URL for the search engine used to provide search suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2616">L'URL contiene la stringa "{searchTerms}", che in fase di query viene sostituita dal testo immesso dall'utente fino a quel momento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2616">The URL contains the string '{searchTerms}', which is replaced at query time by the text the user has entered so far.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2617">Questo criterio è facoltativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2617">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2618">Se non si configura, gli utenti non vedranno i suggerimenti di ricerca; visualizzeranno suggerimenti basati sui Preferiti e sulla cronologia esplorazioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2618">If you don't configure it, users won't see search suggestions; they will see suggestions from their browsing history and favorites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2619">L'URL di suggerimento Bing può essere specificato come:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2619">Bing's suggest URL can be specified as:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2620">"{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2620">'{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2621">L'URL di suggerimento Google può essere specificato come: "{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2621">Google's suggest URL can be specified as: '{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2622">Questo criterio viene applicato solo se si abilitano i criteri [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) e [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2622">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2623">A partire dalla versione 84 di Microsoft Edge, è possibile impostare questo criterio come consigliato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2623">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2624">Se l'utente ha già impostato un provider di ricerca predefinito, non verrà aggiunto all'elenco dei provider di ricerca che l'utente può scegliere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2624">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2625">Se si tratta del comportamento desiderato, usare il criterio [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2625">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2626">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2626">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2627">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2627">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2628">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2628">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2629">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2629">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2630">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2630">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2631">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2631">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2632">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2632">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2633">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2633">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2634">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2634">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2635">Nome Criteri di gruppo: URL del provider di ricerca predefinito per i suggerimenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2635">GP name: Default search provider URL for suggestions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2636">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2636">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2637">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2637">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2638">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2638">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2639">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2639">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2640">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2640">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2641">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2641">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2642">Nome valore: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2642">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2643">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2643">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2644">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2644">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2645">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2645">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2646">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2646">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2647">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2647">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}</string>
```

  ### <a name="newtabpagesearchbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2649">NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2649">NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-new-tab-page-search-box-experience"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2650">Configura l’esperienza della nuova scheda di casella di ricerca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2650">Configure the new tab page search box experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2651">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2651">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2652">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 85 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2652">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2653">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2653">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2654">È possibile configurare la nuova scheda della casella di ricerca per utilizzare "Casella di ricerca (consigliata)" o "Barra degli indirizzi" per cercare su nuove schede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2654">You can configure the new tab page search box to use "Search box (Recommended)" or "Address bar" to search on new tabs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2655">Questo criterio funziona solo se si imposta il motore di ricerca su un valore diverso da Bing configurando i due criteri seguenti: [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) e [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2655">This policy only works if you set the search engine to a value other than Bing by setting the following two policies: [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2656">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio e:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2656">If you disable or don't configure this policy and:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2657">Se il motore di ricerca predefinito nella barra degli indirizzi è  Bing, la nuova scheda usa la casella di ricerca per cercare nelle nuove schede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2657">If the address bar default search engine is Bing, the new tab page uses the search box to search on new tabs.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2658">Se la barra degli indirizzi predefinita non è Bing, agli utenti viene offerta una scelta aggiuntiva (usare "barra degli indirizzi") per la ricerca nelle nuove schede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2658">If the address bar default search engine is not Bing, users are offered an additional choice (use "Address bar") when searching on new tabs.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2659">Se il criterio viene abilitato e impostato su:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2659">If you enable this policy and set it to:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2660">"Casella di ricerca (consigliata)" ("bing"), la nuova pagina della scheda usa la casella di ricerca per cercare nelle nuove schede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2660">"Search box (Recommended)" ('bing'), the new tab page uses the search box to search on new tabs.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2661">"Barra degli indirizzi" ("reindirizza"), nella casella di ricerca della nuova scheda viene usata la barra degli indirizzi per eseguire una ricerca nelle nuove schede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2661">"Address bar" ('redirect'), the new tab page search box uses the address bar to search on new tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2662">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2662">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2663">bing (bing) = Casella di ricerca (consigliata)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2663">bing (bing) = Search box (Recommended)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2664">reindirizza (reindirizza) = Barra degli indirizzi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2664">redirect (redirect) = Address bar</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2665">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2665">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2666">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2666">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2667">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2667">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2668">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2668">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2669">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2669">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2670">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2670">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2671">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2671">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2672">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2672">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2673">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2673">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2674">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2674">GP unique name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2675">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura l’esperienza della nuova scheda di casella di ricerca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2675">GP name: Configure the new tab page search box experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2676">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2676">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2677">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2677">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2678">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2678">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2679">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2679">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2680">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2680">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2681">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2681">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2682">Nome valore: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2682">Value Name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2683">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2683">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2684">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2684">Example value:</span></span>

```
"bing"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2685">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2685">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2686">Nome chiave di preferenza: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2686">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2687">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2687">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>bing</string>
```

  ### <a name="blockexternalextensions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2691">BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2691">BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>

  #### <a name="blocks-external-extensions-from-being-installed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2692">Blocca le estensioni esterne dall'installazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2692">Blocks external extensions from being installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2693">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2693">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2694">su Windows e macOS da 88 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2694">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2695">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2695">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2696">Controlla l'installazione di estensioni esterne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2696">Control the installation of external extensions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2697">Se si abilita questa impostazione, le estensioni esterne vengono bloccate dall'installazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2697">If you enable this setting, external extensions are blocked from being installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2698">Se si disattiva questa impostazione o non la si annulla, le estensioni esterne possono essere installate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2698">If you disable this setting or leave it unset, external extensions are allowed to be installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2699">Le estensioni esterne e la relativa installazione vengono documentate in https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/developer-guide/alternate-distribution-options.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2699">External extensions and their installation are documented at https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/developer-guide/alternate-distribution-options.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2700">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2700">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2701">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2701">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2702">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2702">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2703">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2703">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2704">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2704">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2705">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2705">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2706">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2706">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2707">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2707">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2708">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2708">GP unique name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2709">Nome Criteri di gruppo: blocca le estensioni esterne dall'installazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2709">GP name: Blocks external extensions from being installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2710">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Estensioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2710">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2711">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2711">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2712">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2712">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2713">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2713">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2714">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2714">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2715">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2715">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2716">Nome valore: BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2716">Value Name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2717">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2717">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2718">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2718">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2719">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2719">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2720">Nome chiave di preferenza: BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2720">Preference Key Name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2721">Valore di esempio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2721">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="extensionallowedtypes"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2723">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2723">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-allowed-extension-types"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2724">Configura i tipi di estensioni consentiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2724">Configure allowed extension types</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2725">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2725">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2726">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2726">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2727">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2727">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2728">L'impostazione dei criteri controlla quali app ed estensioni possono essere installate in Microsoft Edge, con quali host possono interagire e limita l'accesso durante il runtime.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2728">Setting the policy controls which apps and extensions may be installed in Microsoft Edge, which hosts they can interact with, and limits runtime access.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2729">Se non si impostano questo criterio, non ci sono restrizioni sull'estensione e i tipi di app accettabili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2729">If you don't set this policy, there aren't any restrictions on acceptable extension and app types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2730">Le estensioni e le app che hanno un tipo non presente nell'elenco non verranno installate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2730">Extensions and apps which have a type that's not on the list won't be installed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2731">Ogni valore deve essere una di queste stringhe:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2731">Each value should be one of these strings:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2732">"extension"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2732">"extension"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2733">"theme"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2733">"theme"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2734">"user_script"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2734">"user_script"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2735">"hosted_app"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2735">"hosted_app"</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2736">Per altre informazioni su questi tipi, vedere la documentazione sulle estensioni di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2736">See the Microsoft Edge extensions documentation for more information about these types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2737">Tenere presente che questo criterio influisce anche sulle estensioni e le app installate in maniera forzata usando[ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2737">Note: This policy also affects extensions and apps to be force-installed using [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2738">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2738">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2739">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2739">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2740">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2740">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2741">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2741">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2742">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2742">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2743">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2743">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2744">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2744">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2745">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2745">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2746">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2746">GP unique name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2747">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura i tipi di estensioni consentiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2747">GP name: Configure allowed extension types</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2748">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Estensioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2748">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2749">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2749">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2750">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2750">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2751">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2751">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2752">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2752">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2753">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2753">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2754">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2754">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2755">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2755">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2756">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2756">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes\1 = "hosted_app"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2757">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2757">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2758">Nome chiave di preferenza: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2758">Preference Key Name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2759">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2759">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>hosted_app</string>
</array>
```
