  ### <a name="extensioninstallallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2761">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2761">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-specific-extensions-to-be-installed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2762">Consente l'installazione di estensioni specifiche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2762">Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2763">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2763">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2764">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2764">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2765">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2765">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2766">L'impostazione di questo criterio specifica quali estensioni non sono soggette al blocco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2766">Setting this policy specifies which extensions are not subject to the blocklist.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2767">Un valore di blocco \* indica che tutte le estensioni sono bloccate e gli utenti possono installare solo le estensioni elencate nell'elenco Consenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2767">A blocklist value of \* means all extensions are blocked and users can only install extensions listed in the allow list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2768">Per impostazione predefinita, tutte le estensioni sono consentite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2768">By default, all extensions are allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2769">Tuttavia, se hai vietato le estensioni per criterio, puoi usare l'elenco delle estensioni consentite per cambiare il criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2769">However, if you prohibited extensions by policy, you can use the list of allowed extensions to change that policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2770">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2770">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2771">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2771">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2772">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2772">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2773">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2773">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2774">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2774">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2775">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2775">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2776">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2776">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2777">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2777">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2778">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2778">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2779">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente l'installazione di estensioni specifiche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2779">GP name: Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2780">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Estensioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2780">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2781">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2781">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2782">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2782">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2783">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2783">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2784">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2784">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2785">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2785">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2786">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2786">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2787">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2787">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2788">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2788">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\1 = "extension_id1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\2 = "extension_id2"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2789">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2789">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2790">Nome chiave di preferenza: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2790">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2791">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2791">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="extensioninstallblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2793">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2793">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-which-extensions-cannot-be-installed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2794">Controlla le estensioni che non è possibile installare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2794">Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2795">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2795">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2796">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2796">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2797">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2797">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2798">Consente di specificare le estensioni che gli utenti non possono installare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2798">Lets you specify which extensions the users CANNOT install.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2799">Le estensioni già installate verranno disabilitate se bloccate, senza un modo per consentire all'utente di abilitarle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2799">Extensions already installed will be disabled if blocked, without a way for the user to enable them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2800">Dopo che un'estensione disabilitata viene rimossa dall’elenco di blocco, verrà automaticamente riattivata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2800">After a disabled extension is removed from the blocklist it will automatically get re-enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2801">Un valore di blocco "\*" indica che tutte le estensioni sono bloccate, a meno che non siano elencate esplicitamente nell'elenco consentiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2801">A blocklist value of '\*' means all extensions are blocked unless they are explicitly listed in the allowlist.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2802">Se questo criterio non è impostato, l'utente può installare qualsiasi estensione in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2802">If this policy isn't set, the user can install any extension in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2803">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2803">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2804">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2804">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2805">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2805">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2806">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2806">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2807">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2807">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2808">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2808">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2809">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2809">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2810">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2810">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2811">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2811">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2812">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Controlla le estensioni che non è possibile installare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2812">GP name: Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2813">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Estensioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2813">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2814">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2814">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2815">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2815">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2816">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2816">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2817">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2817">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2818">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2818">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2819">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2819">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2820">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2820">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2821">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2821">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\1 = "extension_id1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\2 = "extension_id2"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2822">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2822">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2823">Nome chiave di preferenza: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2823">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2824">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2824">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2825">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2825">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="extensioninstallforcelist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2826">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2826">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-which-extensions-are-installed-silently"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2827">Controlla le estensioni installate automaticamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2827">Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2828">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2828">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2829">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2829">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2830">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2830">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2831">Impostare questo criterio per specificare un elenco di app ed estensioni che vengono installate in modo invisibile all'utente, senza interazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2831">Set this policy to specify a list of apps and extensions that install silently, without user interaction.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2832">Gli utenti non possono disinstallare o disattivare questa impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2832">Users can't uninstall or turn off this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2833">Le autorizzazioni vengono concesse in modo implicito, incluse le API di estensione enterprise.deviceAttributes ed enterprise.platformKeys.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2833">Permissions are granted implicitly, including the enterprise.deviceAttributes and enterprise.platformKeys extension APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2834">Nota: queste 2 API non sono disponibili per le app e le estensioni che non sono installate in maniera forzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2834">Note: These 2 APIs aren't available to apps and extensions that aren't force-installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2835">Se non si imposta tale criterio, nessuna app o estensione viene installata automaticamente e gli utenti possono disinstallare qualsiasi app in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2835">If you don't set this policy, no apps or extensions are autoinstalled and users can uninstall any app in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2836">Questo criterio sostituisce il criterio [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2836">This policy supercedes [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2837">Se un'app o un'estensione installata in maniera forzata precedenza viene rimossa dall’elenco, Microsoft Edge la disinstalla automaticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2837">If a previously force-installed app or extension is removed from this list, Microsoft Edge automatically uninstalls it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2838">Nelle istanze di Microsoft Windows, le app e le estensioni esterne al sito Web dei componenti aggiuntivi di Microsoft Edge possono essere installate in maniera forzata solo se l'istanza fa parte di un dominio Microsoft Active Directory ed esegue Windows 10 Pro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2838">On Microsoft Windows instances, apps and extensions from outside the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website can only be forced installed if the instance is joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, and running Windows 10 Pro.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2839">Nelle istanze macOS, le app e le estensioni esterne al sito Web dei componenti aggiuntivi di Microsoft Edge possono essere installate in maniera forzata solo se l'istanza viene gestita tramite MDM o unita a un dominio tramite MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2839">On macOS instances, apps and extensions from outside the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website can only be force installed if the instance is managed via MDM, or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2840">Il codice sorgente di qualsiasi estensione può essere modificato dagli utenti con strumenti di sviluppo, rendendo potenzialmente non funzionale l'estensione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2840">The source code of any extension can be altered by users with developer tools, potentially rendering the extension unfunctional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2841">Se questo è un problema, configurare i criteri DeveloperToolsDisabled.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2841">If this is a concern, configure the DeveloperToolsDisabled policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2842">Ogni elemento elenco del criterio è una stringa che contiene un ID di estensione e, facoltativamente, un URL di "aggiornamento" separato da un punto e virgola (;).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2842">Each list item of the policy is a string that contains an extension ID and, optionally, an "update" URL separated by a semicolon (;).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2843">L'ID dell'estensione è la stringa di 32 lettere che si trova, ad esempio, in edge://extensions in modalità sviluppatore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2843">The extension ID is the 32-letter string found, for example, on edge://extensions when in Developer mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2844">Se specificato, l'URL di "aggiornamento" dovrebbe indicare un documento XML di un manifesto di aggiornamento ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2844">If specified, the "update" URL should point to an Update Manifest XML document ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2845">Per impostazione predefinita, viene utilizzato l'URL di aggiornamento del sito Web dei componenti aggiuntivi di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2845">By default, the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website's update URL is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2846">L'URL di "aggiornamento" impostato in questo criterio viene usato solo per l'installazione iniziale. Gli aggiornamenti successivi dell'estensione usano l'URL di aggiornamento nel manifesto dell'estensione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2846">The "update" URL set in this policy is only used for the initial installation; subsequent updates of the extension use the update URL in the extension's manifest.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2847">Nota: questo criterio non si applica alla modalità InPrivate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2847">Note: This policy doesn't apply to InPrivate mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2848">Leggere informazioni sulle estensioni di hosting ( https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/enterprise/hosting-and-updating).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2848">Read about hosting extensions (https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/enterprise/hosting-and-updating).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2849">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2849">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2850">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2850">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2851">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2851">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2852">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2852">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2853">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2853">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2854">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2854">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2855">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2855">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2856">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2856">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2857">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2857">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2858">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Controlla le estensioni installate automaticamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2858">GP name: Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2859">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Estensioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2859">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2860">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2860">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2861">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2861">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2862">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2862">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2863">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2863">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2864">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2864">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2865">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2865">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2866">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2866">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2867">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2867">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\1 = "gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\2 = "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2868">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2868">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2869">Nome chiave di preferenza: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2869">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2870">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2870">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx</string>
  <string>abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2871">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2871">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="extensioninstallsources"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2872">ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2872">ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-extension-and-user-script-install-sources"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2873">Configura le origini di installazione di script utente ed estensione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2873">Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2874">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2874">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2875">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2875">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2876">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2876">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2877">Definisce gli URL che consentono di installare estensioni e temi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2877">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2878">Definisci gli URL che possono installare estensioni e temi direttamente senza dover trascinare i pacchetti nella pagina edge://extensions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2878">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes directly without having to drag and drop the packages to the edge://extensions page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2879">Ogni voce di questo elenco è uno schema di corrispondenza per lo stile dell'estensione (vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2879">Each item in this list is an extension-style match pattern (see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2880">Gli utenti possono installare facilmente gli elementi da qualsiasi URL che corrisponda a una voce di questo elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2880">Users can easily install items from any URL that matches an item in this list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2881">Il percorso del file \*.crx e la pagina da cui viene avviato il download (ossia, il referrer) devono essere autorizzati da questi schemi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2881">Both the location of the \*.crx file and the page where the download is started from (in other words, the referrer) must be allowed by these patterns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2882">Non ospitare i file in una posizione che richiede l'autenticazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2882">Do not host the files at a location that requires authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2883">Il criterio [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) ha la precedenza rispetto a questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2883">The [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy takes precedence over this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2884">Le estensioni che si trovano nell'elenco di elementi bloccati non verranno installate, anche se provengono da un sito indicato in questo elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2884">Any extensions that's on the block list won't be installed, even if it comes from a site on this list.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2885">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2885">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2886">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2886">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2887">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2887">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2888">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2888">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2889">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2889">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2890">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2890">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2891">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2891">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2892">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2892">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2893">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2893">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2894">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura le origini di installazione di script utente ed estensione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2894">GP name: Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2895">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Estensioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2895">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2896">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2896">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2897">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2897">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2898">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2898">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2899">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2899">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2900">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2900">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2901">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2901">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2902">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2902">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2903">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2903">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources\1 = "https://corp.contoso.com/*"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2904">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2904">Mac information and settings</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2907">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2907">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="extensionsettings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2908">ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2908">ExtensionSettings</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-extension-management-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2909">Configura le impostazioni di gestione delle estensioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2909">Configure extension management settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2910">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2910">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2911">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2911">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2912">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2912">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2913">L'impostazione di questo criterio controlla le impostazioni di gestione delle estensioni per Microsoft Edge, incluse quelle controllate da criteri correlati all'estensione esistenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2913">Setting this policy controls extension management settings for Microsoft Edge, including any controlled by existing extension-related policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2914">Questo criterio sostituisce tutti i criteri legacy che potrebbero essere impostati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2914">This policy supersedes any legacy policies that might be set.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2915">Questo criterio esegue il mapping di un ID di estensione o di un URL di aggiornamento solo alle impostazioni specifiche.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2915">This policy maps an extension ID or an update URL to its specific setting only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2916">È possibile impostare una configurazione predefinita per l'ID speciale "\*", che si applica a tutte le estensioni senza una configurazione personalizzata in questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2916">A default configuration can be set for the special ID "\*", which applies to all extensions without a custom configuration in this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2917">Con un URL di aggiornamento, la configurazione si applica alle estensioni con l'URL di aggiornamento esatto indicato nel manifesto dell'estensione ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2917">With an update URL, configuration applies to extensions with the exact update URL stated in the extension manifest ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2918">Per bloccare le estensioni di un determinato Store di terze parti, è sufficiente bloccare update_url per tale Store.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2918">To block extensions from a particular third party store, you only need to block the update_url for that store.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2919">Se ad esempio vuoi bloccare le estensioni di Chrome Web Store, è possibile usare il JSON seguente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2919">For example, if you want to block extensions from Chrome Web Store, you can use the following JSON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2920">{"update_url:https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx":{"installation_mode":"blocked"}}</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2920">{"update_url:https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx":{"installation_mode":"blocked"}}</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2921">Tieni presente che è ancora possibile usare [ ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) e [ExtensionInstallAllowlist](#extensioninstallallowlist) per consentire o forzare l'installazione di estensioni specifiche tramite JSON nell'esempio precedente, anche se lo Store è bloccato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2921">Note that you can still use [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) and [ExtensionInstallAllowlist](#extensioninstallallowlist) to allow / force install specific extensions even if the store is blocked using the JSON in the previous example.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2922">Nota: per le istanze di Windows non collegate a un dominio Microsoft Active Directory, l'installazione forzata è limitata alle app e alle estensioni elencate nel sito Web dei componenti aggiuntivi Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2922">Note: For Windows instances not joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, forced installation is limited to apps and extensions listed in the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2923">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2923">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2924">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2924">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2925">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2925">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2926">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2926">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2927">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2927">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2928">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2928">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2929">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2929">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2930">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2930">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2931">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2931">GP unique name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2932">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura le impostazioni di gestione delle estensioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2932">GP name: Configure extension management settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2933">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Estensioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2933">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2934">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2934">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2935">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2935">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2936">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2936">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2937">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2937">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2938">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2938">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2939">Nome valore: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2939">Value Name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2940">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2940">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2941">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2941">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {
  "*": {
    "allowed_types": [
      "hosted_app"
    ], 
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "downloads", 
      "bookmarks"
    ], 
    "install_sources": [
      "https://company-intranet/apps"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "blocked", 
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ]
  }, 
  "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "history"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "allowed", 
    "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"
  }, 
  "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "force_installed", 
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"
  }, 
  "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  }, 
  "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  }, 
  "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.", 
    "installation_mode": "removed"
  }, 
  "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ], 
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "wallpaper"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "allowed"
  }
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2942">Valore di esempio compatto:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2942">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {"*": {"allowed_types": ["hosted_app"], "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "blocked_permissions": ["downloads", "bookmarks"], "install_sources": ["https://company-intranet/apps"], "installation_mode": "blocked", "runtime_allowed_hosts": ["*://good.contoso.com"], "runtime_blocked_hosts": ["*://*.contoso.com"]}, "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {"blocked_permissions": ["history"], "installation_mode": "allowed", "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"}, "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {"allowed_permissions": ["downloads"], "installation_mode": "force_installed", "runtime_allowed_hosts": ["*://good.contoso.com"], "runtime_blocked_hosts": ["*://*.contoso.com"], "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"}, "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "installation_mode": "blocked"}, "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "installation_mode": "blocked"}, "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.", "installation_mode": "removed"}, "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {"allowed_permissions": ["downloads"], "blocked_permissions": ["wallpaper"], "installation_mode": "allowed"}}
  ```

  ### <a name="allowcrossoriginauthprompt"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2949">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2949">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-cross-origin-http-authentication-prompts"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2950">Consentire gli avvisi di autenticazione HTTP con origini multiple</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2950">Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2951">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2951">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2952">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2952">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2953">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2953">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2954">Controls whether third-party images on a page can show an authentication prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2954">Controls whether third-party images on a page can show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2955">In genere, questo criterio è disabilitato come protezione da phishing.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2955">Typically, this is disabled as a phishing defense.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2956">Se il criterio non viene configurato, sarà disabilitato e le immagini di terza parte non potranno mostrare gli avvisi di autenticazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2956">If you don't configure this policy, it's disabled and third-party images can't show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2957">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2957">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2958">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2958">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2959">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2959">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2960">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2960">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2961">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2961">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2962">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2962">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2963">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2963">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2964">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2964">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2965">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2965">GP unique name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2966">Nome GP: Consentire gli avvisi di autenticazione HTTP con origine multipla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2966">GP name: Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2967">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Autenticazione HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2967">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2968">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2968">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2969">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2969">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2970">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2970">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2971">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2971">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2972">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2972">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2973">Nome valore: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2973">Value Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2974">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2974">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2975">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2975">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2976">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2976">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2977">Nome chiave di preferenza: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2977">Preference Key Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>

  ### <a name="authnegotiatedelegateallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2980">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2980">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="specifies-a-list-of-servers-that-microsoft-edge-can-delegate-user-credentials-to"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2981">Specifica un elenco di server ai quali Microsoft Edge può delegare le credenziali utente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2981">Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2982">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2982">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2983">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2983">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2984">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2984">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2985">Configura l'elenco di server ai quali Microsoft Edge può delegare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2985">Configure the list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2986">Separare più nomi di server con virgole.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2986">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2987">I caratteri jolly (\*) sono consentiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2987">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-2988">Se non si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge non delegherà le credenziali utente anche se un server viene rilevato come Intranet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2988">If you don't configure this policy Microsoft Edge won't delegate user credentials even if a server is detected as Intranet.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2989">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2989">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2990">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2990">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2991">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2991">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2992">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2992">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2993">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2993">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2994">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2994">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2995">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2995">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-2996">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2996">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2997">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2997">GP unique name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2998">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Specifica un elenco di server ai quali Microsoft Edge può delegare le credenziali utente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2998">GP name: Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-2999">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Autenticazione HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-2999">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3000">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3000">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3001">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3001">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3002">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3002">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3003">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3003">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3004">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3004">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3005">Nome valore: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3005">Value Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3006">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3006">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3007">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3007">Example value:</span></span>

```
"contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3008">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3008">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3009">Nome chiave di preferenza: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3009">Preference Key Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3010">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3010">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>contoso.com</string>
```

  ### <a name="authschemes"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3012">AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3012">AuthSchemes</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-authentication-schemes"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3013">Schemi di autenticazione supportati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3013">Supported authentication schemes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3014">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3014">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3015">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3015">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3016">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3016">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3017">Specifica gli schemi di autenticazione HTTP supportati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3017">Specifies which HTTP authentication schemes are supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3018">È possibile configurare il criterio usando questi valori: "basic", "digest", "ntlm" e "negotiate".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3018">You can configure the policy by using these values: 'basic', 'digest', 'ntlm', and 'negotiate'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3019">Separare più valori con virgole.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3019">Separate multiple values with commas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3020">Se non si configura questo criterio, vengono usati i quattro schemi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3020">If you don't configure this policy, all four schemes are used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3021">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3021">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3022">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3022">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3023">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3023">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3024">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3024">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3025">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3025">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3026">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3026">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3027">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3027">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3028">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3028">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3029">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3029">GP unique name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3030">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Schemi di autenticazione supportati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3030">GP name: Supported authentication schemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3031">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Autenticazione HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3031">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3032">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3032">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3033">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3033">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3034">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3034">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3035">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3035">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3036">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3036">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3037">Nome valore: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3037">Value Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3038">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3038">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3039">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3039">Example value:</span></span>

```
"basic,digest,ntlm,negotiate"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3040">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3040">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3041">Nome chiave di preferenza: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3041">Preference Key Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3042">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3042">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>basic,digest,ntlm,negotiate</string>
```

  ### <a name="authserverallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3044">AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3044">AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-list-of-allowed-authentication-servers"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3045">Configura l'elenco di server di autenticazione consentiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3045">Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3046">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3046">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3047">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3047">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3048">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3048">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3049">Specifica i server da abilitare per l'autenticazione integrata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3049">Specifies which servers to enable for integrated authentication.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3050">L'autenticazione integrata è abilitata solo quando Microsoft Edge riceve un test di autenticazione da un proxy o da un server in questo elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3050">Integrated authentication is only enabled when Microsoft Edge receives an authentication challenge from a proxy or from a server in this list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3051">Separare più nomi di server con virgole.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3051">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3052">I caratteri jolly (\*) sono consentiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3052">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3053">Se non si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge prova a rilevare se un server si trova nella Intranet: solo dopo risponderà alle richieste IWA.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3053">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge tries to detect if a server is on the intranet - only then will it respond to IWA requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3054">Se il server si trova su Internet, le richieste IWA da tale server vengono ignorate da Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3054">If the server is on the internet, IWA requests from it are ignored by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3055">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3055">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3056">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3056">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3057">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3057">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3058">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3058">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3059">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3059">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3060">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3060">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3061">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3061">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3062">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3062">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3063">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3063">GP unique name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3064">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura l'elenco di server di autenticazione consentiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3064">GP name: Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3065">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Autenticazione HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3065">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3066">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3066">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3067">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3067">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3068">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3068">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3069">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3069">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3070">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3070">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3071">Nome valore: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3071">Value Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3072">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3072">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3073">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3073">Example value:</span></span>

```
"*contoso.com,contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3074">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3074">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3075">Nome chiave di preferenza: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3075">Preference Key Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3076">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3076">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>*contoso.com,contoso.com</string>
```

  ### <a name="basicauthoverhttpenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3078">BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3078">BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-basic-authentication-for-http"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3079">Consenti autenticazione di base per HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3079">Allow Basic authentication for HTTP</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3080">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3080">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3081">su Windows e macOS da 88 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3081">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3082">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3082">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3083">Se abiliti questo criterio o non lo configuri, saranno consentite le richieste di autenticazione di base per HTTP non protetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3083">If you enable this policy or leave it unset, Basic authentication challenges received over non-secure HTTP will be allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3084">Se disabiliti i criteri, le richieste HTTP non protette dallo schema di autenticazione di base vengono bloccate e sono consentite solo le richieste HTTPS protette.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3084">If you disable this policy,  non-secure HTTP requests from the Basic authentication scheme are blocked, and only secure HTTPS is allowed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3085">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3085">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3087">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3087">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3088">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3088">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3091">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3091">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3092">Informazioni sui Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3092">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3093">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3093">GP unique name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3094">Nome Criteri di gruppo: consente l'autenticazione di base per HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3094">GP name: Allow Basic authentication for HTTP</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3095">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Autenticazione HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3095">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3096">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3096">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3097">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3097">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3098">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3098">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3099">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3099">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3100">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3100">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3102">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3102">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
