  ### <a name="disableauthnegotiatecnamelookup"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3108">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3108">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-cname-lookup-when-negotiating-kerberos-authentication"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3109">Disabilita la ricerca di CNAME durante la negoziazione dell'autenticazione Kerberos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3109">Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3110">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3110">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3111">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3111">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3112">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3112">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3113">Determina se il nome SPN Kerberos generato è basato sul nome DNS canonico (CNAME) o sul nome originale immesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3113">Determines whether the generated Kerberos SPN is based on the canonical DNS name (CNAME) or on the original name entered.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3114">Se si abilita questo criterio, la ricerca di CNAME viene ignorata e viene usato il nome del server (come immesso).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3114">If you enable this policy, CNAME lookup is skipped and the server name (as entered) is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3115">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, viene usato il nome canonico del server.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3115">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, the canonical name of the server is used.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3116">Ciò viene determinato attraverso la ricerca di CNAME.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3116">This is determined through CNAME lookup.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3117">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3117">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3118">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3118">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3119">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3119">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3120">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3120">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3121">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3121">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3122">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3122">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3123">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3123">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3124">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3124">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3125">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3125">GP unique name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3126">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Disabilita la ricerca di CNAME durante la negoziazione dell'autenticazione Kerberos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3126">GP name: Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3127">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Autenticazione HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3127">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3128">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3128">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3129">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3129">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3130">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3130">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3131">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3131">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3132">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3132">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3133">Nome valore: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3133">Value Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3134">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3134">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3135">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3135">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3136">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3136">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3137">Nome chiave di preferenza: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3137">Preference Key Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3138">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3138">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="enableauthnegotiateport"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3140">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3140">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>

  #### <a name="include-non-standard-port-in-kerberos-spn"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3141">Include una porta non-standard nell'SPN di Kerberos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3141">Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3142">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3142">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3143">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3143">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3144">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3144">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3145">Specifica se il nome SPN Kerberos generato deve includere una porta non standard.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3145">Specifies whether the generated Kerberos SPN should include a non-standard port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3146">Se si abilita questo criterio e un utente include una porta non standard (una porta diversa da 80 o 443) in un URL, tale porta è inclusa nel nome SPN Kerberos generato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3146">If you enable this policy, and a user includes a non-standard port (a port other than 80 or 443) in a URL, that port is included in the generated Kerberos SPN.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3147">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, il nome SPN Kerberos generato non includerà una porta in nessun caso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3147">If you don't configure or disable this policy, the generated Kerberos SPN won't include a port in any case.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3148">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3148">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3149">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3149">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3150">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3150">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3151">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3151">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3152">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3152">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3153">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3153">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3154">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3154">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3155">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3155">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3156">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3156">GP unique name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3157">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Include una porta non-standard nell'SPN di Kerberos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3157">GP name: Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3158">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Autenticazione HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3158">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3159">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3159">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3160">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3160">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3161">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3161">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3162">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3162">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3163">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3163">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3164">Nome valore: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3164">Value Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3165">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3165">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3166">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3166">Example value:</span></span>


  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3168">Nome chiave di preferenza: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3168">Preference Key Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>

  ### <a name="ntlmv2enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3171">NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3171">NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-whether-ntlmv2-authentication-is-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3172">Controlla se è abilitata l'autenticazione NTLMv2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3172">Control whether NTLMv2 authentication is enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3173">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3173">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3174">In macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3174">On macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3175">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3175">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3176">Controlla se NTLMv2 è abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3176">Controls whether NTLMv2 is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3177">Tutte le versioni recenti di server Samba e Windows supportano NTLMv2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3177">All recent versions of Samba and Windows servers support NTLMv2.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3178">È consigliabile disabilitare NTLMv2 solo per risolvere i problemi relativi alla compatibilità con le versioni precedenti poiché riduce la sicurezza dell'autenticazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3178">You should only disable NTLMv2 to address issues with backwards compatibility as it reduces the security of authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3179">Se non si configura questo criterio, NTLMv2 è abilitato per impostazione predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3179">If you don't configure this policy, NTLMv2 is enabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3180">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3180">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3181">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3181">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3182">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3182">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3183">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3183">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3184">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3184">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3187">Nome chiave di preferenza: NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3187">Preference Key Name: NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>

  ### <a name="windowshelloforhttpauthenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3190">WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3190">WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-hello-for-http-auth-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3191">Windows Hello per autenticazione HTTP abilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3191">Windows Hello For HTTP Auth Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3192">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3192">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3193">In Windows dalla versione 90 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3193">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3194">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3194">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3195">Indica se è necessario usare l'interfaccia utente di Windows Credential per rispondere ai problemi di autenticazione di NTLM e Negotiate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3195">Indicates if Windows Credential UI should be used to respond to NTLM and Negotiate authentication challenges.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3196">Se disabiliti questo criterio, per rispondere alle sfide di NTLM e Negotiate verrà usata una richiesta di base di nome utente e password.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3196">If you disable this policy, a basic username and password prompt will be used to respond to NTLM and Negotiate challenges.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3197">Se abiliti o non configuri questo criterio, verrà usata l'interfaccia utente di Windows Credential.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3197">If you enable or don't configure this policy, Windows Credential UI will be used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3198">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3198">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3199">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3199">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3200">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3200">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3201">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3201">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3203">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3203">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3204">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3204">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3205">Informazioni sui Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3205">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3206">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3206">GP unique name: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3207">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Windows Hello per autenticazione HTTP abilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3207">GP name: Windows Hello For HTTP Auth Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3208">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Autenticazione HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3208">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3209">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Autenticazione HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3209">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3210">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3210">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3211">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3211">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3212">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3212">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3213">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Consigliati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3213">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3214">Nome valore: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3214">Value Name: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3215">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3215">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3216">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3216">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="kioskaddressbareditingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3220">KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3220">KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-address-bar-editing-for-kiosk-mode-public-browsing-experience"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3221">Configura la modifica della barra degli indirizzi per l'esperienza di navigazione pubblica in modalità tutto schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3221">Configure address bar editing for kiosk mode public browsing experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3222">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3222">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3223">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3223">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3224">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3224">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3225">Questo criterio si applica solo alla modalità tutto schermo di Microsoft Edge quando si utilizza l'esperienza di navigazione pubblica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3225">This policy only applies to Microsoft Edge kiosk mode while using the public browsing experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3226">Se la norma viene abilitata o non viene configurata, gli utenti possono cambiare l'URL nella barra degli indirizzi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3226">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can change the URL in the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3227">Se il criterio viene disabilitato, gli utenti non potranno modificare l'URL nella barra degli indirizzi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3227">If you disable this policy, it prevents users from changing the URL in the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3228">Per i dettagli della configurazione della modalità tutto schermo, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3228">For detailed information on configuring kiosk Mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3229">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3229">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3230">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3230">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3231">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3231">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3232">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3232">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3233">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3233">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3234">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3234">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3235">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3235">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3236">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3236">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3237">Nome univoco GP: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3237">GP unique name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3238">Nome GP: configura la modifica della barra degli indirizzi per l'esperienza di navigazione pubblica in modalità tutto schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3238">GP name: Configure address bar editing for kiosk mode public browsing experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3239">Percorso GP (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni modalità tutto schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3239">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3240">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3240">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3241">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3241">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3242">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3242">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3243">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3243">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3244">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3244">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3245">Nome valore: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3245">Value Name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3246">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3246">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3247">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3247">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3248">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3248">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3249">Nome chiave preferenza: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3249">Preference Key Name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3250">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3250">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="kioskdeletedownloadsonexit"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3252">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3252">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>

  #### <a name="delete-files-downloaded-as-part-of-kiosk-session-when-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3253">Elimina i file scaricati durante la sessione a tutto schermo quando Microsoft Edge si chiude</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3253">Delete files downloaded as part of kiosk session when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3254">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3254">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3255">In Windows dalla versione 87 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3255">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3256">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3256">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3257">Questo criterio viene applicato alla modalità tutto schermo di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3257">This policy only applies to Microsoft Edge kiosk mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3258">Se il criterio viene abilitato, i file scaricati durante le sessioni a tutto schermo sono cancellati ogni volta che Microsoft Edge viene chiuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3258">If you enable this policy, files downloaded as part of the kiosk session are deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3259">Se il criterio viene disabilitato o non viene configurato, i file scaricati durante le sessioni a tutto schermo non sono cancellati ogni volta che Microsoft Edge viene chiuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3259">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, files downloaded as part of the kiosk session are not deleted when Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3260">Per i dettagli della configurazione della modalità tutto schermo, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3260">For detailed information on configuring kiosk Mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3261">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3261">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3262">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3262">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3263">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3263">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3264">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3264">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3265">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3265">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3266">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3266">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3267">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3267">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3268">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3268">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3269">Nome univoco GP: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3269">GP unique name: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3270">Nome GP: Eliminare i file scaricati durante le sessioni a tutto schermo quando Microsoft Edge si chiude</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3270">GP name: Delete files downloaded as part of kiosk session when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3271">Percorso GP (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni modalità tutto schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3271">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3272">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3272">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3273">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3273">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3274">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3274">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3275">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3275">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3276">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3276">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3277">Nome valore: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3277">Value Name: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3278">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3278">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3279">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3279">Example value:</span></span>


  ### <a name="mamenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3283">MAMAbilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3283">MAMEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="mobile-app-management-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3284">Gestione delle app per dispositivi mobili abilitata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3284">Mobile App Management Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3285">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3285">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3286">In Windows e macOS da 89 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3286">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3287">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3287">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3288">Consente al browser Microsoft Edge di recuperare i criteri dai servizi di gestione delle applicazioni di Intune e applicarli ai profili degli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3288">Allows the Microsoft Edge browser to retrieve policies from the Intune application management services and apply them to users' profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3289">Se abiliti questa criterio o non li configuri, potrebbero essere applicati i criteri di gestione di app per dispositivi mobili (MAM).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3289">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Mobile App Management (MAM) Policies can be applied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3290">Se disabiliti questo criterio, Microsoft Edge non comunicherà con Intune per richiedere i criteri di gestione di app per dispositivi mobili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3290">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will not communicate with Intune to request MAM Policies.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3291">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3291">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3292">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3292">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3293">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3293">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3294">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3294">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3295">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3295">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3296">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3296">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3297">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3297">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3298">Informazioni sui Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3298">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3299">Nome unico di Criteri di gruppo: MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3299">GP unique name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3300">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Gestione app per dispositivi mobili abilitata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3300">GP name: Mobile App Management Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3301">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Gestabilità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3301">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Manageability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3302">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3302">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3303">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3303">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3304">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3304">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3305">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3305">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3306">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3306">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3307">Nome valore: MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3307">Value Name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3308">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3308">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3309">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3309">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3310">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3310">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3311">Nome chiave di preferenza: MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3311">Preference Key Name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3312">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3312">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ## <a name="native-messaging-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3314">Criteri di messaggistica nativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3314">Native Messaging policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3315">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3315">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="nativemessagingallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3316">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3316">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-which-native-messaging-hosts-users-can-use"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3317">Controlla quali host di messaggistica nativa possono usare gli utenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3317">Control which native messaging hosts users can use</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3318">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3318">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3319">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3319">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3320">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3320">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3321">L'impostazione del criterio specifica gli host di messaggistica nativi non soggetti all'elenco degli indirizzi non consentiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3321">Setting the policy specifies which native messaging hosts aren't subject to the deny list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3322">Un valore di elenco di negazione \* indica che tutti gli host di messaggistica nativi vengono rifiutati, a meno che non siano esplicitamente consentiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3322">A deny list value of \* means all native messaging hosts are denied unless they're explicitly allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3323">Tutti gli host di messaggistica nativi sono consentiti per impostazione predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3323">All native messaging hosts are allowed by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3324">Tuttavia, se un host di messaggistica nativo viene negato dai criteri, l'amministratore può usare l'elenco Consenti per modificare il criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3324">However, if a native messaging host is denied by policy, the admin can use the allow list to change that policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3325">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3325">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3326">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3326">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3327">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3327">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3328">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3328">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3329">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3329">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3330">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3330">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3331">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3331">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3332">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3332">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3333">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3333">GP unique name: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3334">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Controlla quali host di messaggistica nativa possono usare gli utenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3334">GP name: Control which native messaging hosts users can use</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3335">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Messaggistica nativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3335">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3336">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3336">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3337">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3337">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3338">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3338">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3339">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3339">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3340">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3340">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3341">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3341">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3342">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3342">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3343">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3343">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\1 = "com.native.messaging.host.name1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\2 = "com.native.messaging.host.name2"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3344">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3344">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3345">Nome chiave di preferenza: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3345">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3346">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3346">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name1</string>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name2</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="nativemessagingblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3348">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3348">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-native-messaging-block-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3349">Configura l'elenco di indirizzi bloccati per la messaggistica nativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3349">Configure native messaging block list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3350">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3350">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3351">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3351">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3352">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3352">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3353">L'impostazione di questo criterio specifica gli host di messaggistica nativi che non devono essere caricati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3353">Setting this policy specifies which native messaging hosts shouldn't be loaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3354">Un valore di elenco di negazione \* indica che tutti gli host di messaggistica nativi vengono rifiutati, a meno che non siano esplicitamente consentiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3354">A deny list value of \* means all native messaging hosts are denied unless they're explicitly allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3355">Se si lascia questo criterio non impostato, Microsoft Edge carica tutti gli host di messaggistica nativa installati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3355">If you leave this policy unset , Microsoft Edge loads all installed native messaging hosts.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3356">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3356">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3357">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3357">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3358">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3358">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3359">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3359">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3360">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3360">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3361">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3361">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3362">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3362">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3363">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3363">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3364">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3364">GP unique name: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3365">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura l'elenco di indirizzi bloccati per la messaggistica nativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3365">GP name: Configure native messaging block list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3366">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Messaggistica nativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3366">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3367">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3367">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3368">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3368">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3369">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3369">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3370">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3370">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3371">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3371">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3372">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3372">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3373">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3373">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3374">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3374">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\1 = "com.native.messaging.host.name1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\2 = "com.native.messaging.host.name2"

```

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3376">Nome chiave di preferenza: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3376">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>

``` xml
</array>
```

  ### <a name="nativemessaginguserlevelhosts"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3379">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3379">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-user-level-native-messaging-hosts-installed-without-admin-permissions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3380">Consente gli host di messaggistica nativa a livello di utente (installati senza autorizzazioni di amministrazione)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3380">Allow user-level native messaging hosts (installed without admin permissions)</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3381">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3381">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3382">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3382">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3383">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3383">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3384">Se si imposta questo criterio su abilitato o non si annulla, Microsoft Edge può usare gli host di messaggistica nativi installati a livello di utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3384">If you set this policy to Enabled or leave it unset, Microsoft Edge can use native messaging hosts installed at the user level.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3385">Se si imposta questo criterio su disattivato, Microsoft Edge può usare questi host solo se installati a livello di sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3385">If you set this policy to Disabled, Microsoft Edge can only use these hosts if they're installed at the system level.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3386">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3386">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3387">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3387">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3388">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3388">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3389">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3389">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3390">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3390">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3391">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3391">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3392">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3392">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3393">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3393">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3394">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3394">GP unique name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3395">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente gli host di messaggistica nativa a livello di utente (installati senza autorizzazioni di amministrazione)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3395">GP name: Allow user-level native messaging hosts (installed without admin permissions)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3396">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Messaggistica nativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3396">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3397">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3397">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3398">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3398">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3399">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3399">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3400">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3400">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3401">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3401">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3402">Nome valore: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3402">Value Name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3403">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3403">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3404">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3404">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3405">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3405">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3406">Nome chiave di preferenza: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3406">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3407">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3407">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ## <a name="password-manager-and-protection-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3409">Criteri di gestione e protezione delle password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3409">Password manager and protection policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3410">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3410">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="passwordmanagerenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3411">PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3411">PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-saving-passwords-to-the-password-manager"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3412">Abilita il salvataggio delle password con lo strumento di gestione delle password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3412">Enable saving passwords to the password manager</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3413">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3413">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3414">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3414">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3415">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3415">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3416">Consente a Microsoft Edge di salvare le password utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3416">Enable Microsoft Edge to save user passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3417">Se si abilita questo criterio, gli utenti possono salvare le password in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3417">If you enable this policy, users can save their passwords in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3418">La volta successiva che visitano un sito, Microsoft Edge immetterà la password automaticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3418">The next time they visit the site, Microsoft Edge will enter the password automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3419">Se si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti non possono salvare le nuove password, ma possono continuare a usare quelle salvate in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3419">If you disable this policy, users can't save new passwords, but they can still use previously saved passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3420">Se si abilita o si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti non possono modificarlo o sostituirlo in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3420">If you enable or disable this policy, users can't change or override it in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3421">Se non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono salvare le password, oltre a disattivare questa funzionalità.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3421">If you don't configure it, users can save passwords, as well as turn this feature off.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3422">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3422">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3423">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3423">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3424">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3424">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3425">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3425">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3426">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3426">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3427">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3427">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3428">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3428">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3429">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3429">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3430">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3430">GP unique name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3431">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita il salvataggio delle password con lo strumento di gestione delle password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3431">GP name: Enable saving passwords to the password manager</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3432">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Gestione e protezione delle password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3432">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3433">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Gestione e protezione delle password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3433">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3434">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3434">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3435">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3435">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3436">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3436">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3437">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3437">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3438">Nome valore: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3438">Value Name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3439">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3439">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3440">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3440">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3441">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3441">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3442">Nome chiave di preferenza: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3442">Preference Key Name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3443">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3443">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
