  ### <a name="passwordmonitorallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3445">PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3445">PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-be-alerted-if-their-passwords-are-found-to-be-unsafe"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3446">Consenti agli utenti di ricevere avvisi se le loro password non sono sicure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3446">Allow users to be alerted if their passwords are found to be unsafe</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3447">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3447">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3448">In Windows dalla versione 85 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3448">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3449">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3449">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3450">Consenti a Microsoft Edge di monitorare le password utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3450">Allow Microsoft Edge to monitor user passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3451">Se si abilita questo criterio e si acconsente l’abilitazione, l'utente riceverà un avviso se una o più password archiviate in Microsoft Edge risultano non sicure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3451">If you enable this policy and a user consents to enabling the policy, the user will get alerted if any of their passwords stored in Microsoft Edge are found to be unsafe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3452">Microsoft Edge mostrerà un avviso e le informazioni saranno disponibili anche in Impostazioni > Password > Monitoraggio password.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3452">Microsoft Edge will show an alert and this information will also be available in Settings > Passwords > Password Monitor.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3453">Se si disabilita questo criterio, agli utenti non verrà chiesta l'autorizzazione per abilitare questa funzionalità.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3453">If you disable this policy, users will not be asked for permission to enable this feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3454">Le loro password non verranno digitalizzate e non riceveranno nessun avviso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3454">Their passwords will not be scanned and they will not be alerted either.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3455">Se i criteri sono abilitati o non vengono configurati, gli utenti possono attivare o disattivare questa funzionalità.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3455">If you enable or don't configure the policy, users can turn this feature on or off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3456">Per altre informazioni sul modo in cui Microsoft Edge trova password poco sicure, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3456">To learn more about how Microsoft Edge finds unsafe passwords see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3457">Istruzioni aggiuntive:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3457">Additional guidance:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3458">Questo criterio può essere impostato sia come consigliato sia come obbligatorio, ma con un callout importante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3458">This policy can be set as both Recommended as well as Mandatory, however with an important callout.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3459">Obbligatorio abilitato: dato che il consenso di un utente è una condizione preliminare per l'abilitazione di questa funzionalità per un determinato utente, questo criterio non dispone di un'impostazione obbligatoria abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3459">Mandatory enabled: Given that individual user consent is a pre-condition to enabling this feature for a given user, this policy does not have a Mandatory enabled setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3460">Se il criterio è impostato su obbligatorio abilitato, l'interfaccia utente in impostazioni non viene modificata e il messaggio di errore seguente viene visualizzato in edge://policy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3460">If the policy is set to Mandatory enabled, the UI in Settings will not change and the following error message will be displayed in edge://policy</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3461">Messaggio di errore di esempio: "Questo valore dei criteri viene ignorato perché il Monitoraggio password richiede il consenso del singolo utente affinché venga attivato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3461">Example Error state message: "This policy value is ignored because Password Monitor requires the consent of the individual user for it to be turned on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3462">È possibile chiedere agli utenti dell'organizzazione di accedere a Impostazioni > Profilo > Password e attivare la funzionalità".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3462">You can ask users in your Organization to go to Settings > Profile > Password and turn on the feature."</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3463">Consigliato abilitato: se il criterio è impostato su consigliato abilitato, l'interfaccia utente in impostazioni resterà in "disattivato". Tuttavia, accanto all'immagine verrà visualizzata un'icona a forma di valigetta, con la seguente descrizione visualizzata al passaggio del mouse: "l'organizzazione consiglia un valore specifico per questa impostazione ed è stato scelto un valore diverso".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3463">Recommended enabled: If the policy is set to Recommended enabled, the UI in Settings will remain in 'Off' state, but a briefcase icon will be made visible next to it with this description displayed on hover - "Your organization recommends a specific value for this setting and you have chosen a different value"</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3464">Disabilitato e consigliato disabilitati: entrambe gli stati funzioneranno normalmente, con la consueta didascalia mostrata agli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3464">Mandatory and Recommended disabled: Both these states will work the normal way, with the usual captions being shown to users.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3465">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3465">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3466">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3466">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3467">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3467">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3468">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3468">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3469">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3469">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3470">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3470">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3471">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3471">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3472">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3472">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3473">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3473">GP unique name: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3474">Nome Criteri di gruppo: consenti agli utenti di ricevere avvisi se le loro password non sono sicure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3474">GP name: Allow users to be alerted if their passwords are found to be unsafe</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3475">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Gestione e protezione delle password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3475">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3476">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Gestione e protezione delle password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3476">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3477">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3477">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3478">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3478">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3479">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3479">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3480">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3480">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3481">Nome valore: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3481">Value Name: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3482">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3482">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3483">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3483">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3485">PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3485">PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-change-password-url"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3486">Configura l'URL di modifica della password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3486">Configure the change password URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3487">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3487">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3488">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3488">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3489">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3489">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3490">Configura l'URL di modifica della password (solo schemi HTTP e HTTPS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3490">Configures the change password URL (HTTP and HTTPS schemes only).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3491">Il servizio della password di protezione reindirizza gli utenti a questo URL per modificare la password dopo aver visualizzato un avviso nel browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3491">Password protection service will send users to this URL to change their password after seeing a warning in the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3492">Se si abilita questo criterio, il servizio della password di protezione reindirizza gli utenti a questo URL per modificare la password.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3492">If you enable this policy, then password protection service sends users to this URL to change their password.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3493">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, il servizio della password di protezione non reindirizza gli utenti a un URL per la modifica della password.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3493">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, then password protection service will not redirect users to a change password URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3494">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3494">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3495">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3495">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3496">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3496">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3497">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3497">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3498">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3498">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3499">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3499">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3500">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3500">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3501">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3501">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3502">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3502">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3503">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3503">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3504">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura l'URL di modifica della password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3504">GP name: Configure the change password URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3505">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Gestione e protezione delle password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3505">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3506">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3506">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3507">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3507">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3508">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3508">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3509">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3509">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3510">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3510">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3511">Nome valore: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3511">Value Name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3512">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3512">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3513">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3513">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://contoso.com/change_password.html"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3514">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3514">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3515">Nome chiave di preferenza: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3515">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3516">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3516">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://contoso.com/change_password.html</string>
```

  ### <a name="passwordprotectionloginurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3518">PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3518">PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-enterprise-login-urls-where-the-password-protection-service-should-capture-salted-hashes-of-a-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3519">Configura l'elenco di URL di accesso aziendale dove il servizio della password di protezione dovrebbe acquisire hash salati di una password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3519">Configure the list of enterprise login URLs where the password protection service should capture salted hashes of a password</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3520">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3520">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3521">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3521">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3522">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3522">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3523">Configura l'elenco di URL di accesso aziendali (solo schemi HTTP e HTTPS) dove Microsoft Edge deve acquisire gli hash salati delle password e usarli per il rilevamento del riutilizzo delle password.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3523">Configure the list of enterprise login URLs (HTTP and HTTPS schemes only) where Microsoft Edge should capture the salted hashes of passwords and use it for password reuse detection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3524">Se si abilita questo criterio, il servizio della password di protezione acquisisce le impronte digitali delle password negli URL definiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3524">If you enable this policy, the password protection service captures fingerprints of passwords on the defined URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3525">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, non vengono acquisite le impronte digitali della password.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3525">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, no password fingerprints are captured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3526">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3526">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3527">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3527">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3528">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3528">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3529">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3529">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3530">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3530">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3531">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3531">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3532">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3532">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3533">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3533">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3534">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3534">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3535">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3535">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3536">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura l'elenco di URL di accesso aziendale dove il servizio della password di protezione dovrebbe acquisire gli hash salati di una password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3536">GP name: Configure the list of enterprise login URLs where the password protection service should capture salted hashes of a password</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3537">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Gestione e protezione delle password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3537">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3538">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3538">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3539">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3539">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3540">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3540">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3541">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3541">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3542">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3542">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3543">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3543">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3544">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3544">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3545">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3545">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs\1 = "https://contoso.com/login.html"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs\2 = "https://login.contoso.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3546">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3546">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3547">Nome chiave di preferenza: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3547">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3548">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3548">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com/login.html</string>
  <string>https://login.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3549">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3549">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="passwordprotectionwarningtrigger"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3550">PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3550">PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-password-protection-warning-trigger"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3551">Configura il trigger di avviso per la password di protezione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3551">Configure password protection warning trigger</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3552">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3552">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3553">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3553">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3554">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3554">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3555">Consente di controllare quando attivare l'avviso della password di protezione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3555">Allows you to control when to trigger password protection warning.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3556">La password di protezione avvisa gli utenti quando riutilizzano la password protetta in siti potenzialmente sospetti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3556">Password protection alerts users when they reuse their protected password on potentially suspicious sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3557">È possibile usare i criteri [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) e [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) per configurare le password da proteggere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3557">You can use the [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) and [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) policies to configure which passwords to protect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3558">Eccezioni: le password per i siti indicati in [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) e [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl), oltre ai siti indicati in [SmartScreenAllowListDomains](#smartscreenallowlistdomains), non attiveranno un avviso della password di protezione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3558">Exemptions: Passwords for the sites listed in [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) and [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl), as well as for the sites listed in [SmartScreenAllowListDomains](#smartscreenallowlistdomains), will not trigger a password-protection warning.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3559">Impostare su "PasswordProtectionWarningOff" per non mostrare gli avvisi della password di protezione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3559">Set to 'PasswordProtectionWarningOff' to not show password protection warningss.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3560">Impostare su "PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse" per mostrare gli avvisi della password di protezione quando l'utente riutilizza la password protetta in un sito indicato nell'elenco di quelli non consentiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3560">Set to 'PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse' to show password protection warnings when the user reuses their protected password on a non-allowlisted site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3561">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, il trigger di avviso non viene mostrato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3561">If you disable or don't configure this policy, then the warning trigger is not shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3562">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3562">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3563">PasswordProtectionWarningOff (0) = Avviso della password di protezione disattivato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3563">PasswordProtectionWarningOff (0) = Password protection warning is off</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3564">PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse (1) = Avviso della password di protezione attivato dal riutilizzo della password </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3564">PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse (1) = Password protection warning is triggered by password reuse</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3565">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3565">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3566">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3566">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3567">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3567">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3568">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3568">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3569">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3569">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3570">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3570">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3571">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3571">Integer</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3573">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3573">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3574">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3574">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3575">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura il trigger di avviso per la password di protezione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3575">GP name: Configure password protection warning trigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3576">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Gestione e protezione delle password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3576">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3577">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3577">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3578">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3578">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3579">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3579">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3580">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3580">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3581">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3581">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3582">Nome valore: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3582">Value Name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3583">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3583">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3584">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3584">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="passwordrevealenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3589">PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3589">PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-password-reveal-button"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3590">Abilita il pulsante per rilevare la password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3590">Enable Password reveal button</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3591">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3591">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3592">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3592">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3593">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3593">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3594">Consente di configurare la visualizzazione predefinita del pulsante per rivelare la password del browser per i campi di immissione delle password nei siti Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3594">Lets you configure the default display of the browser password reveal button for password input fields on websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3595">Se questo criterio non viene abilitato o configurato, l'impostazione predefinita dell'utente del browser sarà la visualizzazione del pulsante per rivelare la password.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3595">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the browser user setting defaults to displaying the password reveal button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3596">Se questo criterio viene disabilitato, l'impostazione dell’utente del browser non visualizza il pulsante per rivelare la password.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3596">If you disable this policy, the browser user setting won't display the password reveal button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3597">Per l'accessibilità, gli utenti possono cambiare l'impostazione del browser dai criteri predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3597">For accessibility, users can change the browser setting from the default policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3598">Questo criterio influisce solo sul pulsante per rivelare la password del browser, non influisce sui pulsanti di rivelazione personalizzati dei siti Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3598">This policy only affects the browser password reveal button, it doesn't affect websites' custom reveal buttons.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3599">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3599">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3600">Può essere obbligatorio: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3600">Can be mandatory: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3601">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3601">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3602">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3602">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3603">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3603">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3604">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3604">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3605">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3605">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3606">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3606">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3607">Nome univoco GP: PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3607">GP unique name: PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3608">Nome GP: abilita il pulsante per rilevare la password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3608">GP name: Enable Password reveal button</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3609">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3609">GP path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3610">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Gestione e protezione delle password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3610">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3611">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3611">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3612">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3612">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3613">Percorso (obbligatorio): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3613">Path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3614">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3614">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3615">Nome valore: PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3615">Value Name: PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3616">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3616">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3617">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3617">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3618">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3618">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3619">Nome chiave di preferenza: PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3619">Preference Key Name: PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3620">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3620">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3623">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3623">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="startupboostenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3624">StartupBoostEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3624">StartupBoostEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-startup-boost"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3625">Abilita il potenziamento di avvio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3625">Enable startup boost</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3626">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3626">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3627">In Windows dalla versione 88 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3627">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3628">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3628">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3629">Consente l'avvio dei processi di Microsoft Edge all'accesso al sistema operativo e il riavvio in background dopo la chiusura dell'ultima finestra del browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3629">Allows Microsoft Edge processes to start at OS sign-in and restart in background after the last browser window is closed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3630">Se Microsoft Edge è in esecuzione in background, il browser potrebbe non terminare quando viene chiusa l'ultima finestra e quindi il browser non verrà riavviato in background quando viene chiusa la finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3630">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the browser might not close when the last window is closed and the browser won't be restarted in background when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3631">Per informazioni su cosa accade dopo aver configurato il comportamento della modalità in background di Microsoft Edge, vedere il criterio [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3631">See the [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about what happens after configuring Microsoft Edge background mode behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3632">Se si abilita questo criterio, la modalità potenziamento di avvio viene attivata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3632">If you enable this policy, startup boost is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3633">Se si disabilita questo criterio, la modalità potenziamento di avvio viene attivata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3633">If you disable this policy, startup boost is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3634">Se non si configura questo criterio, è possibile che il potenziamento di avvio potrebbe essere inizialmente disattivato o attivato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3634">If you don't configure this policy, startup boost may initially be off or on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3635">L'utente può configurare il suo comportamento in  edge://settings/system.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3635">The user can configure its behavior in edge://settings/system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3636">Ulteriori informazioni sul potenziamento di avvio: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3636">Learn more about startup boost: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3637">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3637">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3638">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3638">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3639">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3639">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3640">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3640">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3641">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3641">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3642">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3642">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3643">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3643">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3644">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3644">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3645">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: StartupBoostEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3645">GP unique name: StartupBoostEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3646">Nome Criteri di gruppo: abilita il potenziamento di avvio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3646">GP name: Enable startup boost</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3647">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Prestazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3647">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Performance</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3648">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Prestazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3648">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Performance</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3649">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3649">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3650">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3650">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3651">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3651">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3652">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3652">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3653">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: StartupBoostEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3653">Value Name: StartupBoostEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3654">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3654">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3655">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3655">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ## <a name="printing-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3657">Criteri di stampa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3657">Printing policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3658">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3658">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultprinterselection"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3659">DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3659">DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-printer-selection-rules"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3660">Regole di selezione della stampante predefinita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3660">Default printer selection rules</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3661">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3661">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3662">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3662">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3663">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3663">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3664">Sostituisce le regole di selezione della stampare predefinita di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3664">Overrides Microsoft Edge default printer selection rules.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3665">Questo criterio determina le regole di selezione della stampante predefinita in Microsoft Edge, che si verifica la prima volta che un utente prova a stampare una pagina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3665">This policy determines the rules for selecting the default printer in Microsoft Edge, which happens the first time a user tries to print a page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3666">Quando questo criterio è impostato, Microsoft Edge tenta di trovare una stampante che corrisponda a tutti gli attributi specificati e la usa come stampante predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3666">When this policy is set, Microsoft Edge tries to find a printer that matches all of the specified attributes and uses it as default printer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3667">Se sono presenti più stampanti che soddisfano i criteri specificati, viene usata la prima stampante corrispondente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3667">If there are multiple printers that meet the criteria, the first printer that matches is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3668">Se non si configura questo criterio o non vengono trovate stampanti corrispondenti entro l'intervallo di timeout, per impostazione predefinita viene impostata la stampante PDF integrata o non viene impostata alcuna stampante (se la stampante PDF non è disponibile).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3668">If you don't configure this policy or no matching printers are found within the timeout, the printer defaults to the built-in PDF printer or no printer, if the PDF printer isn't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3669">Il valore viene analizzato come oggetto JSON, conforme allo schema seguente: { "type": "object", "properties": { "idPattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer id.", "type": "string" }, "namePattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer display name.", "type": "string" } } }</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3669">The value is parsed as a JSON object, conforming to the following schema: { "type": "object", "properties": { "idPattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer id.", "type": "string" }, "namePattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer display name.", "type": "string" } } }</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3670">Se si omette un campo significa che tutti i valori corrispondono; ad esempio, se non si specifica la connettività, l'anteprima di stampa inizia a individuare tutti i tipi di stampanti locali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3670">Omitting a field means all values match; for example, if you don't specify connectivity Print Preview starts discovering all kinds of local printers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3671">Gli schemi di espressioni regolari devono seguire la sintassi JavaScript RegExp e per le corrispondenze viene fatta distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3671">Regular expression patterns must follow the JavaScript RegExp syntax and matches are case sensitive.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3672">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3672">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3673">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3673">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3674">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3674">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3675">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3675">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3676">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3676">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3677">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3677">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3678">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3678">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3679">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3679">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3680">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3680">GP unique name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3681">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Regole di selezione della stampante predefinita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3681">GP name: Default printer selection rules</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3682">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Stampa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3682">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3683">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3683">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3684">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3684">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3685">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3685">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3686">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3686">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3687">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3687">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3688">Nome valore: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3688">Value Name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3689">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3689">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3690">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3690">Example value:</span></span>

```
"{ \"idPattern\": \".*public\", \"namePattern\": \".*Color\" }"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3691">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3691">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3692">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3692">Preference Key Name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3693">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3693">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>{ "idPattern": ".*public", "namePattern": ".*Color" }</string>
```

  ### <a name="printheaderfooter"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3695">PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3695">PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>

  #### <a name="print-headers-and-footers"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3696">Stampa intestazioni e piè di pagina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3696">Print headers and footers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3697">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3697">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3698">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3698">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3699">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3699">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3700">Forza l'attivazione o la disattivazione di "intestazioni e piè di pagina" nella finestra di dialogo di stampa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3700">Force 'headers and footers' to be on or off in the printing dialog.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3701">Se non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono decidere se stampare intestazioni e piè di pagina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3701">If you don't configure this policy, users can decide whether to print headers and footers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3702">Se si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti non possono stampare intestazioni e piè di pagina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3702">If you disable this policy, users can't print headers and footers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3703">Se si abilita questo criterio, gli utenti stampano sempre intestazioni e piè di pagina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3703">If you enable this policy, users always print headers and footers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3704">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3704">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3705">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3705">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3706">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3706">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3707">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3707">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3708">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3708">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3709">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3709">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3710">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3710">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3711">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3711">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3712">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3712">GP unique name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3713">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Stampa intestazioni e piè di pagina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3713">GP name: Print headers and footers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3714">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Stampa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3714">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3715">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Stampa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3715">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3716">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3716">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3717">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3717">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3718">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3718">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3719">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3719">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3720">Nome valore: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3720">Value Name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3721">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3721">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3722">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3722">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3723">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3723">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3724">Nome chiave di preferenza: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3724">Preference Key Name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3725">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3725">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="printpreviewusesystemdefaultprinter"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3727">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3727">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-system-default-printer-as-the-default-printer"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3728">Imposta la stampante predefinita del sistema come stampante predefinita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3728">Set the system default printer as the default printer</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3729">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3729">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3730">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3730">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3731">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3731">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3732">Indica a Microsoft Edge di usare la stampante predefinita di sistema come scelta predefinita nell'anteprima di stampa, anziché la stampante usata di recente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3732">Tells Microsoft Edge to use the system default printer as the default choice in Print Preview instead of the most recently used printer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3733">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, l'anteprima di stampa utilizza la stampante usata di recente come scelta di destinazione predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3733">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, Print Preview uses the most recently used printer as the default destination choice.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3734">Se si abilita questo criterio, l'anteprima di stampa utilizza la stampante predefinita del sistema operativo come scelta di destinazione predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3734">If you enable this policy, Print Preview uses the OS system default printer as the default destination choice.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3735">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3735">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3736">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3736">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3737">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3737">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3738">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3738">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3739">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3739">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3740">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3740">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3741">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3741">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3742">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3742">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3743">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3743">GP unique name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3744">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Imposta la stampante predefinita del sistema come stampante predefinita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3744">GP name: Set the system default printer as the default printer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3745">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Stampa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3745">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3746">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Stampa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3746">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3747">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3747">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3748">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3748">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3749">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3749">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3750">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3750">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3751">Nome valore: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3751">Value Name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3752">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3752">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3753">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3753">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3754">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3754">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3755">Nome chiave di preferenza: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3755">Preference Key Name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3756">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3756">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
