  ### <a name="printrasterizationmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3758">PrintRasterizationMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3758">PrintRasterizationMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="print-rasterization-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3759">Modalità di rasterizzazione di stampa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3759">Print Rasterization Mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3760">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3760">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3761">In Windows dalla versione 90 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3761">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3762">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3762">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3763">Controlla la modalità di stampa di Microsoft Edge in Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3763">Controls how Microsoft Edge prints on Windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3764">A volte i processi di stampa devono essere rasterizzati per la stampa corretta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3764">When printing to a non-PostScript printer on Windows, sometimes print jobs need to be rasterized to print correctly.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3765">Se si imposta questo criterio su "Completo" o non lo si configura, Microsoft Edge farà la rasterizzazione a pagina intera, se necessario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3765">If you set this policy to 'Full' or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will do full page rasterization if necessary.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3766">Se si imposta questo criterio su "Veloce", Microsoft Edge ridurrà la quantità di rasterizzazione che può contribuire a ridurre le dimensioni dei processi di stampa e ad aumentare la velocità di stampa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3766">If you set this policy to 'Fast', Microsoft Edge will reduce the amount of rasterization which can help reduce print job sizes and increase printing speed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3767">Mappatura delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3767">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3768">Full (0) = Rasterizzazione a pagina intera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3768">Full (0) = Full page rasterization</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3769">Veloce (1) = Evitare la rasterizzazione, se possibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3769">Fast (1) = Avoid rasterization if possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3770">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3770">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3771">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3771">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3772">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3772">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3773">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3773">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3774">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3774">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3775">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3775">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3776">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3776">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3777">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3777">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3778">Informazioni sui Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3778">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3779">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PrintRasterizationMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3779">GP unique name: PrintRasterizationMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3780">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Print Rasterization Mode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3780">GP name: Print Rasterization Mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3781">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Stampa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3781">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3782">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3782">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3783">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3783">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3784">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3784">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3785">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3785">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3786">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3786">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3787">Nome valore: PrintRasterizationMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3787">Value Name: PrintRasterizationMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3788">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3788">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3789">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3789">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3790">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3790">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="printertypedenylist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3791">PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3791">PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-printer-types-on-the-deny-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3792">Disabilitare i tipi di stampante nell'elenco degli indirizzi non consentiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3792">Disable printer types on the deny list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3793">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3793">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3794">su Windows e macOS da 88 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3794">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3795">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3795">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3796">I tipi di stampante nell'elenco degli indirizzi non consentiti non verranno individuati o le relative funzionalità vengono recuperate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3796">The printer types on the deny list won't be discovered or have their capabilities fetched.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3797">L'inserimento di tutti i tipi di stampante nell'elenco degli indirizzi non consentiti disabilita efficacemente la stampa, perché non è disponibile alcuna destinazione di stampa per i documenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3797">Placing all printer types on the deny list effectively disables printing, because there's no print destination for documents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3798">Se non si configura questo criterio o se l'elenco della stampante è vuoto, tutti i tipi di stampante saranno individuabili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3798">If you don't configure this policy, or the printer list is empty, all printer types are discoverable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3799">Le destinazioni della stampante includono stampanti di estensione e stampanti locali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3799">Printer destinations include extension printers and local printers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3800">Le stampanti di estensione sono note anche come destinazioni del provider di stampa e includono qualsiasi destinazione che appartiene a un'estensione Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3800">Extension printers are also known as print provider destinations, and include any destination that belongs to a Microsoft Edge extension.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3801">Le stampanti locali sono anche note come destinazioni di stampa native e includono le destinazioni disponibili per il computer locale e le stampanti di rete condivise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3801">Local printers are also known as native printing destinations, and include destinations available to the local machine and shared network printers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3802">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3802">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3803">privt (privt) = destinazioni di protocollo basate su ZeroConf (MDN + DNS-SD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3803">privet (privet) = Zeroconf-based (mDNS + DNS-SD) protocol destinations</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3804">Extension (Extension) = destinazioni basate su estensioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3804">extension (extension) = Extension-based destinations</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3805">PDF (PDF) = la destinazione "Salva come PDF"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3805">pdf (pdf) = The 'Save as PDF' destination</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3806">local (local) = destinazioni della stampante locale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3806">local (local) = Local printer destinations</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3807">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3807">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3808">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3808">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3809">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3809">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3810">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3810">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3811">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3811">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3812">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3812">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3813">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3813">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3814">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3814">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3815">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3815">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3816">Nome univoco GP: PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3816">GP unique name: PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3817">Nome GP: disabilitare i tipi di stampante nell'elenco degli indirizzi non consentiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3817">GP name: Disable printer types on the deny list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3818">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Stampa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3818">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3819">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3819">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3820">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3820">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3821">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3821">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3822">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3822">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3823">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3823">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3824">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3824">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3825">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3825">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3826">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3826">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList\1 = "local"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList\2 = "privet"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3827">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3827">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3828">Nome chiave di preferenza: PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3828">Preference Key Name: PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3829">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3829">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>local</string>
  <string>privet</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="printingallowedbackgroundgraphicsmodes"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3831">PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3831">PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>

  #### <a name="restrict-background-graphics-printing-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3832">Limitare la modalità di stampa grafica in background</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3832">Restrict background graphics printing mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3833">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3833">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3834">In Windows e macOS da 89 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3834">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3835">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3835">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3836">Limita la modalità di stampa della grafica in background.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3836">Restricts background graphics printing mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3837">Se questo criterio non è impostato, non è disponibile alcuna restrizione per la stampa della grafica di sfondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3837">If this policy isn't set there's no restriction on printing background graphics.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3838">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3838">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3839">Qualsiasi (qualsiasi) = Consenti la stampa con e senza elementi grafici di sfondo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3839">any (any) = Allow printing with and without background graphics</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3840">Abilitato (abilitato) = Consenti la stampa solo con la grafica di sfondo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3840">enabled (enabled) = Allow printing only with background graphics</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3841">Disattivato (disattivato) = Consenti la stampa solo senza elementi grafici di sfondo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3841">disabled (disabled) = Allow printing only without background graphics</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3842">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3842">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3843">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3843">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3844">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3844">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3845">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3845">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3846">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3846">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3847">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3847">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3848">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3848">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3849">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3849">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3850">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3850">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3851">Nome univoco GP: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3851">GP unique name: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3852">Nome GP: limitare la modalità di stampa grafica in background</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3852">GP name: Restrict background graphics printing mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3853">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Stampa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3853">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3854">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3854">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3855">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3855">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3856">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3856">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3857">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3857">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3858">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3858">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3859">Nome valore: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3859">Value Name: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3860">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3860">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3861">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3861">Example value:</span></span>

```
"enabled"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3862">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3862">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3863">Nome chiave di preferenza: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3863">Preference Key Name: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3864">Valore di esempio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3864">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>enabled</string>
```

  ### <a name="printingbackgroundgraphicsdefault"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3866">PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3866">PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-background-graphics-printing-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3867">Modalità di stampa grafica in background predefinita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3867">Default background graphics printing mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3868">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3868">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3869">In Windows e macOS da 89 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3869">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3870">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3870">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3871">Sovrascrive l'ultima impostazione usata per la stampa di elementi grafici in background.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3871">Overrides the last used setting for printing background graphics.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3872">Se si abilita questa impostazione, la stampa grafica in background è abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3872">If you enable this setting, background graphics printing is enabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3873">Se si disattiva questa impostazione, la stampa grafica in background è disabilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3873">If you disable this setting, background graphics printing is disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3874">Mappatura delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3874">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3875">Abilitato (abilitato) = Abilita la modalità di stampa grafica in background per impostazione predefinita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3875">enabled (enabled) = Enable background graphics printing mode by default</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3876">Disattivato(disattivato) = Disabilita la modalità di stampa della grafica di sfondo per impostazione predefinita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3876">disabled (disabled) = Disable background graphics printing mode by default</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3877">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3877">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3878">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3878">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3879">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3879">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3880">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3880">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3881">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3881">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3882">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3882">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3883">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3883">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3884">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3884">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3885">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3885">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3886">Nome univoco GP: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3886">GP unique name: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3887">Nome GP: modalità di stampa grafica in background predefinita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3887">GP name: Default background graphics printing mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3888">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Stampa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3888">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3889">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3889">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3890">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3890">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3891">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3891">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3892">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3892">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3893">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3893">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3894">Nome valore: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3894">Value Name: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3895">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3895">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3896">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3896">Example value:</span></span>

```
"enabled"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3897">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3897">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3898">Nome chiave di preferenza: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3898">Preference Key Name: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3899">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3899">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>enabled</string>
```

  ### <a name="printingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3901">PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3901">PrintingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-printing"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3902">Abilita la stampa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3902">Enable printing</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3903">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3903">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3904">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3904">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3905">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3905">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3906">Consente la stampa in Microsoft Edge e impedisce agli utenti di modificare questa impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3906">Enables printing in Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3907">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono stampare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3907">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3908">Se si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti non possono stampare da Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3908">If you disable this policy, users can't print from Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3909">La stampa viene disabilitata nel menu con la chiave inglese, nelle estensioni, nelle applicazioni JavaScript e così via.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3909">Printing is disabled in the wrench menu, extensions, JavaScript applications, and so on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3910">Gli utenti possono comunque stampare dai plug-in che ignorano Microsoft Edge durante la stampa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3910">Users can still print from plug-ins that bypass Microsoft Edge while printing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3911">Ad esempio, alcune applicazioni di Adobe Flash hanno l'opzione di stampa nel menu di scelta rapida, che non è interessato da questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3911">For example, certain Adobe Flash applications have the print option in their context menu, which isn't covered by this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3912">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3912">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3913">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3913">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3914">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3914">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3915">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3915">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3916">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3916">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3917">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3917">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3918">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3918">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3919">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3919">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3920">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3920">GP unique name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3921">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita la stampa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3921">GP name: Enable printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3922">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Stampa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3922">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3923">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3923">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3924">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3924">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3925">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3925">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3926">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3926">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3927">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3927">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3928">Nome valore: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3928">Value Name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3929">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3929">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3930">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3930">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3931">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3931">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3932">Nome chiave di preferenza: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3932">Preference Key Name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3933">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3933">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="printingpapersizedefault"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3935">PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3935">PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-printing-page-size"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3936">Dimensioni della pagina di stampa predefinite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3936">Default printing page size</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3937">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3937">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3938">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3938">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3939">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3939">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3940">Sostituisce le dimensioni della pagina di stampa predefinite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3940">Overrides default printing page size.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3941">il nome deve contenere uno dei formati elencati o “personalizzato” se necessario, se non è presente nell'elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3941">name should contain one of the listed formats or 'custom' if required paper size is not in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3942">Se viene fornito il valore “personalizzato”, la proprietà custom_size deve essere specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3942">If 'custom' value is provided custom_size property should be specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3943">Descrive l'altezza e la larghezza desiderate nei micrometri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3943">It describes the desired height and width in micrometers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3944">In caso contrario, la proprietà custom_size non deve essere specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3944">Otherwise custom_size property shouldn't be specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3945">Il criterio che viola queste regole verrà ignorato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3945">Policy that violates these rules is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3946">Se le dimensioni della pagina non sono disponibili nella stampante scelta dall'utente, questi criterio verrà ignorato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3946">If the page size is unavailable on the printer chosen by the user this policy is ignored.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3947">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3947">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3948">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3948">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3949">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3949">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3950">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3950">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3951">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3951">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3952">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3952">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3953">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3953">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3954">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3954">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3955">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3955">GP unique name: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3956">Nome Criteri di gruppo: dimensioni della pagina di stampa predefinite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3956">GP name: Default printing page size</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3957">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Stampa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3957">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3958">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3958">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3959">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3959">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3960">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3960">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3961">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3961">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3962">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3962">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3963">Nome valore: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3963">Value Name: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3964">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3964">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3965">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3965">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrintingPaperSizeDefault = {
  "custom_size": {
    "height": 297000, 
    "width": 210000
  }, 
  "name": "custom"
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3966">Valore di esempio compatto:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3966">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrintingPaperSizeDefault = {"custom_size": {"height": 297000, "width": 210000}, "name": "custom"}
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3967">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3967">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3968">Nome chiave preferenza: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3968">Preference Key Name: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3969">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3969">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>PrintingPaperSizeDefault</key>
<dict>
  <key>custom_size</key>
  <dict>
    <key>height</key>
    <integer>297000</integer>
    <key>width</key>
    <integer>210000</integer>
  </dict>
  <key>name</key>
  <string>custom</string>
</dict>
```

  ### <a name="usesystemprintdialog"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3971">UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3971">UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>

  #### <a name="print-using-system-print-dialog"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3972">Stampa usando la finestra di dialogo della stampante di sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3972">Print using system print dialog</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3973">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3973">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3974">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3974">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3975">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3975">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3976">Mostra la finestra di dialogo di stampa del sistema, anziché l'anteprima di stampa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3976">Shows the system print dialog instead of print preview.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3977">Se si abilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge apre la finestra di dialogo di stampa del sistema, anziché l'anteprima di stampa integrata, quando un utente stampa una pagina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3977">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge opens the system print dialog instead of the built-in print preview when a user prints a page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-3978">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, i comandi di stampa attivano la schermata dell'anteprima di stampa di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3978">If you don't configure or disable this policy, print commands trigger the Microsoft Edge print preview screen.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3979">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3979">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3980">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3980">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3981">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3981">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3982">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3982">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3983">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3983">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3984">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3984">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3985">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3985">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3986">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3986">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3987">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3987">GP unique name: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3988">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Stampa usando la finestra di dialogo della stampante di sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3988">GP name: Print using system print dialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3989">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Stampa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3989">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3990">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3990">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3991">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3991">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-3992">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3992">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3993">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3993">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3994">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3994">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3995">Nome valore: UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3995">Value Name: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3996">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3996">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-3999">Nome chiave di preferenza: UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-3999">Preference Key Name: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>

  ### <a name="proxybypasslist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4004">ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4004">ProxyBypassList</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-proxy-bypass-rules-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4005">Configura le regole di esclusione di proxy (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4005">Configure proxy bypass rules (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4006">DEPRECATO: questo criterio è deprecato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4006">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4007">È attualmente supportato, ma diventerà obsoleto in una versione futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4007">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4008">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4008">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4009">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4009">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4010">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4010">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4011">Questo criterio è deprecato, è possibile usare [ProxySettings](#proxysettings).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4011">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4012">Non funzionerà in Microsoft Edge versione 91.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4012">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4013">Definisce un elenco di host per i quali Microsoft Edge ignora qualsiasi proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4013">Defines a list of hosts for which Microsoft Edge bypasses any proxy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4014">Questo criterio viene applicato solo se non è stato specificato il criterio [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) ed è stato selezionato fixed_servers nel criterio [ProxyMode](#proxymode).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4014">This policy is applied only if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified and you have selected fixed_servers in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4015">Se è stata selezionata un'altra modalità di configurazione dei criteri proxy, non abilitare o configurare questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4015">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4016">Se si abilita questo criterio, è possibile creare un elenco di host per i quali Microsoft Edge non usa un proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4016">If you enable this policy, you can create a list of hosts for which Microsoft Edge doesn't use a proxy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4017">Se non si configura questo criterio, non viene creato alcun elenco di host per i quali Microsoft Edge ignora un proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4017">If you don't configure this policy, no list of hosts is created for which Microsoft Edge bypasses a proxy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4018">Se è stato specificato un altro metodo per l'impostazione dei criteri proxy, non configurare questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4018">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4019">Per esempi più dettagliati, passare a [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4019">For more detailed examples go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4020">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4020">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4021">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4021">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4022">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4022">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4023">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4023">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4024">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4024">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4025">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4025">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4026">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4026">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4027">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4027">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4028">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4028">GP unique name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4029">Nome Criteri di gruppo: configura le regole di esclusione di proxy (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4029">GP name: Configure proxy bypass rules (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4030">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Server proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4030">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4031">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4031">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4032">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4032">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4033">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4033">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4034">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4034">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4035">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4035">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4036">Nome valore: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4036">Value Name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4037">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4037">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4038">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4038">Example value:</span></span>

```

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4039">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4039">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4040">Nome chiave di preferenza: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4040">Preference Key Name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>

  ### <a name="proxymode"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4043">ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4043">ProxyMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-proxy-server-settings-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4044">Configura le impostazioni del server proxy (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4044">Configure proxy server settings (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4045">DEPRECATO: questo criterio è deprecato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4045">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4046">È attualmente supportato, ma diventerà obsoleto in una versione futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4046">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4047">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4047">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4048">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4048">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4049">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4049">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4050">Questo criterio è deprecato, è possibile usare [ProxySettings](#proxysettings).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4050">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4051">Non funzionerà in Microsoft Edge versione 91.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4051">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4052">Se il criterio è stato impostato su abilitato, è possibile specificare il server proxy usato da Microsoft Edge per impedire agli utenti di cambiare le impostazioni del proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4052">If you set this policy to Enabled you can specify the proxy server Microsoft Edge uses and prevents users from changing proxy settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4053">Microsoft Edge ignora tutte le opzioni correlate al proxy specificate nella riga di comando.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4053">Microsoft Edge ignores all proxy-related options specified from the command line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4054">Il criterio viene applicato solo se non viene specificato il criterio [ProxySettings](#proxysettings).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4054">The policy is only applied if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4055">Altre opzioni vengono ignorate se si sceglie una delle seguenti opzioni:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4055">Other options are ignored if you choose one of the following options:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4056">direct = non usare mai un server proxy e connettersi sempre direttamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4056">direct = Never use a proxy server and always connect directly</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4057">system = usare impostazioni proxy di sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4057">system = Use system proxy settings</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4058">auto_detect = rilevare automaticamente le impostazioni proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4058">auto_detect = Auto detect the proxy server</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4059">Se si sceglie di usare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4059">If you choose to use:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4060">fixed_servers = usare server proxy fissi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4060">fixed_servers = Fixed proxy servers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4061">È possibile specificare altre opzioni con [ProxyServer ](#proxyserver) e [ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4061">You can specify further options with [ProxyServer](#proxyserver) and [ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist).</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4062">pac_script = uno script del proxy con estensione pac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4062">pac_script =  A .pac proxy script.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4063">Per impostare l'URL di un file proxy .pac, usare [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4063">Use [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) to set the URL to a proxy .pac file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4064">Per esempi dettagliati, passare a [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4064">For detailed examples, go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4065">Se non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono scegliere impostazioni del proxy personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4065">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4066">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4066">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4067">ProxyDisabled (direct) = Non usare mai un proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4067">ProxyDisabled (direct) = Never use a proxy</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4068">ProxyAutoDetect (auto_detect) = Rilevare automaticamente le impostazioni proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4068">ProxyAutoDetect (auto_detect) = Auto detect proxy settings</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4069">ProxyPacScript (pac_script) = Usare uno script proxy PAC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4069">ProxyPacScript (pac_script) = Use a .pac proxy script</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4070">ProxyFixedServers (fixed_servers) = Usare server proxy fissi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4070">ProxyFixedServers (fixed_servers) = Use fixed proxy servers</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4071">ProxyUseSystem (system) = Usare le impostazioni del proxy di sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4071">ProxyUseSystem (system) = Use system proxy settings</span></span>

  ### <a name="proxypacurl"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4096">ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4096">ProxyPacUrl</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-proxy-pac-file-url-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4097">Imposta l'URL del file .pac del proxy (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4097">Set the proxy .pac file URL (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4098">DEPRECATO: questo criterio è deprecato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4098">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4099">È attualmente supportato, ma diventerà obsoleto in una versione futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4099">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4100">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4100">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4101">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4101">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4102">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4102">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4103">Questo criterio è deprecato, è possibile usare [ProxySettings](#proxysettings).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4103">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4104">Non funzionerà in Microsoft Edge versione 91.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4104">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4105">Specifica l'URL di un file di configurazione automatica del proxy (PAC).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4105">Specifies the URL for a proxy auto-config (PAC) file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4106">Questo criterio viene applicato solo se non è stato specificato il criterio [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) ed è stato selezionato pac_script nel criterio [ProxyMode](#proxymode).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4106">This policy is applied only if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified and you have selected pac_script in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4107">Se è stata selezionata un'altra modalità di configurazione dei criteri proxy, non abilitare o configurare questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4107">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4108">Se si abilita questo criterio, è possibile specificare l'URL per un file PAC, che definisce in che modo il browser sceglie automaticamente il server proxy appropriato per il recupero di un particolare sito Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4108">If you enable this policy, you can specify the URL for a PAC file, which defines how the browser automatically chooses the appropriate proxy server for fetching a particular website.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4109">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, non viene specificato alcun file PAC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4109">If you disable or don't configure this policy, no PAC file is specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4110">Se è stato specificato un altro metodo per l'impostazione dei criteri proxy, non configurare questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4110">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4111">Per esempi dettagliati, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4111">For detailed examples, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4112">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4112">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4113">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4113">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4114">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4114">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4115">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4115">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4120">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4120">GP unique name: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4121">Nome Criteri di gruppo: imposta l'URL del file .pac del proxy (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4121">GP name: Set the proxy .pac file URL (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4122">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Server proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4122">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4123">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4123">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4126">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4126">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4127">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4127">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4137">DEPRECATO: questo criterio è deprecato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4137">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4138">È attualmente supportato, ma diventerà obsoleto in una versione futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4138">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4140">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4140">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4141">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4141">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4142">Questo criterio è deprecato, è possibile usare [ProxySettings](#proxysettings).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4142">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4143">Non funzionerà in Microsoft Edge versione 91.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4143">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4144">Specifica l'URL del server proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4144">Specifies the URL of the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4145">Questo criterio viene applicato solo se non è stato specificato il criterio [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) ed è stato selezionato fixed_servers nel criterio [ProxyMode](#proxymode).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4145">This policy is applied only if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified and you have selected fixed_servers in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4146">Se è stata selezionata un'altra modalità di configurazione dei criteri proxy, non abilitare o configurare questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4146">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4147">Se si abilita questo criterio, il server proxy configurato con questo criterio verrà usato per tutti gli URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4147">If you enable this policy, the proxy server configured by this policy will be used for all URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4148">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono scegliere impostazioni del proxy personalizzate in questa modalità di proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4148">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings while in this proxy mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4149">Se è stato specificato un altro metodo per l'impostazione dei criteri proxy, non configurare questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4149">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4150">Per altre opzioni ed esempi dettagliati, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4150">For more options and detailed examples, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4151">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4151">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4153">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4153">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4154">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4154">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4159">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4159">GP unique name: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4160">Nome Criteri di gruppo: configura l'indirizzo o l'URL del server proxy (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4160">GP name: Configure address or URL of proxy server (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4161">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Server proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4161">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4162">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4162">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

``` xml
<string>123.123.123.123:8080</string>
```
