  ### <a name="proxysettings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4174">ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4174">ProxySettings</span></span>

  #### <a name="proxy-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4175">Impostazioni proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4175">Proxy settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4176">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4176">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4177">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4177">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4178">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4178">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4179">Configura le impostazioni del proxy per Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4179">Configures the proxy settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4180">Se si abilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge ignora tutte le opzioni correlate al proxy specificate nella riga di comando.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4180">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge ignores all proxy-related options specified from the command line.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4181">Se non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono scegliere impostazioni del proxy personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4181">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4182">Questo criterio sostituisce i singoli criteri seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4182">This policy overrides the following individual policies:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4183">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4183">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4184">L'impostazione del criterio [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) accetta i seguenti campi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4184">Setting the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy accepts the following fields:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4185">ProxyMode, che consente di specificare il server proxy utilizzato da Microsoft Edge e impedisce agli utenti di modificare le impostazioni proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4185">ProxyMode, which lets you specify the proxy server used by Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing proxy settings</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4186">ProxyPacUrl, un URL di un file PAC del proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4186">ProxyPacUrl, a URL to a proxy .pac file</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4187">ProxyServer, un URL per il server proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4187">ProxyServer, a URL for the proxy server</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4188">ProxyBypassList, un elenco di host proxy ignorati da Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4188">ProxyBypassList, a list of proxy hosts that Microsoft Edge bypasses</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4189">Per ProxyMode, se si sceglie il valore:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4189">For ProxyMode, if you choose the value:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4190">direct, non viene mai usato un proxy e tutti gli altri campi vengono ignorati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4190">direct, a proxy is never used and all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4191">direct, viene usato un proxy di sistema e tutti gli altri campi vengono ignorati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4191">system, the systems's proxy is used and all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4192">auto_detect, tutti gli altri campi vengono ignorati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4192">auto_detect, all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4193">fixed_servers, vengono usati i campi ProxyServer e ProxyBypassList.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4193">fixed_servers, the ProxyServer and ProxyBypassList fields are used.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4194">pac_script, vengono usati i campi ProxyPacUrl e ProxyBypassList.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4194">pac_script, the ProxyPacUrl and ProxyBypassList fields are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4195">Per esempi più dettagliati, passare a [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4195">For more detailed examples go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4196">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4196">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4197">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4197">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4198">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4198">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4199">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4199">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4200">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4200">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4201">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4201">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4202">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4202">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4203">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4203">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4204">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4204">GP unique name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4205">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configurare Impostazioni proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4205">GP name: Proxy settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4206">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Server proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4206">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4207">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4207">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4208">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4208">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4209">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4209">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4210">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4210">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4211">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4211">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4212">Nome valore: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4212">Value Name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4213">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4213">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4214">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4214">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ProxySettings = {
  "ProxyBypassList": "https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/", 
  "ProxyMode": "pac_script", 
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", 
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4215">Valore di esempio compatto:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4215">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ProxySettings = {"ProxyBypassList": "https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/", "ProxyMode": "pac_script", "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"}
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4216">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4216">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4217">Nome chiave di preferenza: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4217">Preference Key Name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4218">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4218">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ProxySettings</key>
<dict>
  <key>ProxyBypassList</key>
  <string>https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/</string>
  <key>ProxyMode</key>
  <string>pac_script</string>
  <key>ProxyPacUrl</key>
  <string>https://internal.site/example.pac</string>
  <key>ProxyServer</key>
  <string>123.123.123.123:8080</string>
</dict>
```

  ## <a name="sleeping-tabs-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4220">Criteri impostazioni delle schede di sospensione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4220">Sleeping tabs settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4221">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4221">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sleepingtabsblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4222">SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4222">SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-sleeping-tabs-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4223">Blocca le schede di sospensione nei siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4223">Block sleeping tabs on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4224">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4224">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4225">su Windows e macOS da 88 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4225">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4226">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4226">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4227">Definisci un elenco di siti, in base ai modelli di URL, che non possono essere messi in stato di sospensione tramite le schede di sospensione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4227">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are not allowed to be put to sleep by sleeping tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4228">Se il criterio [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) è disabilitato, questo elenco non viene usato e nessun sito verrà messo automaticamente in stato di sospensione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4228">If the policy [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) is disabled, this list is not used and no sites will be put to sleep automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4229">Se non si configura questo criterio, tutti i siti potranno essere messi in stato di sospensione, a meno che la configurazione personale dell'utente non li blocchi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4229">If you don't configure this policy, all sites will be eligible to be put to sleep unless the user's personal configuration blocks them.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4230">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4230">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4231">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4231">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4232">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4232">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4233">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4233">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4234">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4234">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4235">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4235">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4236">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4236">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4237">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4237">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4238">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4238">GP unique name: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4239">Nome Criteri di gruppo: blocca le schede di sospensione in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4239">GP name: Block sleeping tabs on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4240">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni schede di sospensione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4240">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4241">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Impostazioni schede di sospensione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4241">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4242">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4242">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4243">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4243">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4244">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4244">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4245">Percorso (scelta consigliata): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4245">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4246">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4246">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4247">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4247">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4248">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4248">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4249">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4249">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4250">Nome chiave di preferenza: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4250">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4251">Valore di esempio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4251">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4252">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4252">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sleepingtabsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4253">SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4253">SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-sleeping-tabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4254">Configura le schede di sospensione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4254">Configure sleeping tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4255">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4255">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4256">su Windows e macOS da 88 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4256">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4257">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4257">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4258">Questa impostazione dei criteri consente di scegliere se attivare le schede di sospensione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4258">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on sleeping tabs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4259">Le schede di sospensione consentono di ridurre la CPU, la batteria e l'utilizzo della memoria sospendendo le schede inattive in background.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4259">Sleeping tabs reduces CPU, battery, and memory usage by putting idle background tabs to sleep.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4260">Microsoft Edge usa funzionalità euristiche per evitare di sospendere le schede utili in background, come la visualizzazione delle notifiche, la riproduzione di contenuti audio e lo streaming di contenuti video.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4260">Microsoft Edge uses heuristics to avoid putting tabs to sleep that do useful work in the background, such as display notifications, play sound, and stream video.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4261">Per impostazione predefinita, le schede di sospensione sono attivate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4261">By default, sleeping tabs is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4262">È possibile bloccare la modalità di sospensione dei singoli siti configurando il criterio [SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls](#sleepingtabsblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4262">Individual sites may be blocked from being put to sleep by configuring the policy [SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls](#sleepingtabsblockedforurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4263">Se abiliti questa impostazione, le schede di sospensione sono attivate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4263">If you enable this setting, sleeping tabs is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4264">Se disabiliti questa impostazione, le schede di sospensione sono disattivate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4264">If you disable this setting, sleeping tabs is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4265">Se non configuri questa impostazione, gli utenti possono scegliere se usare le schede di sospensione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4265">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use sleeping tabs.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4266">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4266">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4267">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4267">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4268">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4268">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4269">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4269">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4270">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4270">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4271">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4271">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4272">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4272">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4273">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4273">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4274">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4274">GP unique name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4275">Nome Criteri di gruppo: configura le schede di sospensione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4275">GP name: Configure sleeping tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4276">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni schede di sospensione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4276">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4277">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Impostazioni schede di sospensione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4277">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4278">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4278">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4279">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4279">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4280">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4280">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4281">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Consigliati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4281">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4282">Nome valore: SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4282">Value Name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4283">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4283">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4286">Nome chiave di preferenza: SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4286">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>

  ### <a name="sleepingtabstimeout"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4289">SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4289">SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-background-tab-inactivity-timeout-for-sleeping-tabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4290">Imposta il timeout di inattività della scheda in background per le schede di sospensione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4290">Set the background tab inactivity timeout for sleeping tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4291">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4291">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4292">su Windows e macOS da 88 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4292">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4293">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4293">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4294">Questa impostazione consente di configurare il timeout, calcolato in secondi, dopo il quale le schede in background inattive verranno automaticamente sospese se sono abilitate le schede di sospensione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4294">This policy setting lets you configure the timeout, in seconds, after which inactive background tabs will be automatically put to sleep if sleeping tabs is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4295">Per impostazione predefinita, questo timeout è pari a 7.200 secondi (2 ore).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4295">By default, this timeout is 7,200 seconds (2 hours).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4296">Le schede vengono messe automaticamente in modalità di sospensione quando il criterio [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) è abilitato o non è configurato e l'utente ha abilitato l'impostazione delle schede di sospensione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4296">Tabs are only put to sleep automatically when the policy [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) is enabled or is not configured and the user has enabled the sleeping tabs setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4297">Se non configuri questo criterio, gli utenti possono scegliere il valore di timeout.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4297">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose the timeout value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4298">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4298">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4299">5Minutes (300) = 5 minuti di inattività</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4299">5Minutes (300) = 5 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4300">15Minutes (900) = 15 minuti di inattività</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4300">15Minutes (900) = 15 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4301">30Minutes (1800) = 30 minuti di inattività</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4301">30Minutes (1800) = 30 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4302">1 ora (3600) = 1 ora di inattività</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4302">1Hour (3600) = 1 hour of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4303">2Hours (7200) = 2 ore di inattività</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4303">2Hours (7200) = 2 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4304">3 ore (10800) = 3 ore di inattività</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4304">3Hours (10800) = 3 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4305">6Hours (21600) = 6 ore di inattività</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4305">6Hours (21600) = 6 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4306">12Hours (43200) = 12 ore di inattività</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4306">12Hours (43200) = 12 hours of inactivity</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4307">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4307">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4308">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4308">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4309">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4309">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4310">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4310">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4311">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4311">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4312">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4312">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4313">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4313">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4314">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4314">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4315">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4315">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4316">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4316">GP unique name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4317">Nome Criteri di gruppo: imposta il timeout della scheda in background per le schede di sospensione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4317">GP name: Set the background tab inactivity timeout for sleeping tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4318">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni schede di sospensione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4318">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4319">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Impostazioni schede di sospensione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4319">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4320">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4320">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4321">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4321">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4322">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4322">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4323">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Consigliati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4323">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4324">Nome valore: SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4324">Value Name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4325">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4325">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4326">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4326">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000384
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4327">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4327">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4328">Nome chiave di preferenza: SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4328">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4329">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4329">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>900</integer>
```

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4332">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4332">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="preventsmartscreenpromptoverride"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4333">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4333">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>

  #### <a name="prevent-bypassing-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-prompts-for-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4334">Impedisce di ignorare i prompt di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen per i siti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4334">Prevent bypassing Microsoft Defender SmartScreen prompts for sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4335">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4335">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4336">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4336">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4337">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4337">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4338">L'impostazione di questo criterio consente di decidere se gli utenti possono ignorare gli avvisi di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen sui siti Web potenzialmente dannosi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4338">This policy setting lets you decide whether users can override the Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about potentially malicious websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4339">Se si abilita questa impostazione, gli utenti non possono ignorare gli avvisi di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen e viene loro impedito di accedere al sito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4339">If you enable this setting, users can't ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and they are blocked from continuing to the site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4340">Se si disabilita o non si configura questa impostazione, gli utenti possono ignorare gli avvisi di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen e accedere al sito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4340">If you disable or don't configure this setting, users can ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and continue to the site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4341">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4341">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4342">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4342">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4343">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4343">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4344">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4344">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4345">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4345">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4346">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4346">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4347">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4347">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4348">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4348">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4349">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4349">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4350">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4350">GP unique name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4351">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Impedisce di ignorare i prompt di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen per i siti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4351">GP name: Prevent bypassing Microsoft Defender SmartScreen prompts for sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4352">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4352">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4353">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4353">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4354">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4354">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4355">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4355">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4356">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4356">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4357">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4357">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4358">Nome valore: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4358">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4359">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4359">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4360">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4360">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4361">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4361">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4362">Nome chiave di preferenza: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4362">Preference Key Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4363">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4363">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4364">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4364">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="preventsmartscreenpromptoverrideforfiles"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4365">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4365">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>

  #### <a name="prevent-bypassing-of-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-warnings-about-downloads"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4366">Impedisce di ignorare gli avvisi di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen sui download</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4366">Prevent bypassing of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about downloads</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4367">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4367">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4368">In Windows dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4368">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4369">In macOS dalla versione 79 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4369">On macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4370">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4370">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4371">Questo criterio consente di determinare se gli utenti possono ignorare gli avvisi di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen relativi ai download non verificati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4371">This policy lets you determine whether users can override Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4372">Se si abilita questo criterio, gli utenti dell'organizzazione non possono ignorare gli avvisi di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen e non possono completare i download non verificati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4372">If you enable this policy, users in your organization can't ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings, and they're prevented from completing the unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4373">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono ignorare gli avvisi di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen e completare i download non verificati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4373">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and complete unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4374">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4374">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4375">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4375">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4376">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4376">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4377">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4377">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4378">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4378">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4379">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4379">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4380">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4380">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4381">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4381">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4382">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4382">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4383">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4383">GP unique name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4384">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Impedisce di ignorare gli avvisi di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen sui download</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4384">GP name: Prevent bypassing of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about downloads</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4385">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4385">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4386">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4386">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4387">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4387">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4388">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4388">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4389">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4389">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4390">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4390">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4391">Nome valore: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4391">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4392">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4392">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4393">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4393">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4394">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4394">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4395">Nome chiave di preferenza: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4395">Preference Key Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4396">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4396">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="smartscreenallowlistdomains"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4398">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4398">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-domains-for-which-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-wont-trigger-warnings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4399">Configura l'elenco di domini per i quali Microsoft Defender SmartScreen non attiva gli avvisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4399">Configure the list of domains for which Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't trigger warnings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4400">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4400">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4401">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4401">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4402">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4402">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4403">Configura l'elenco di domini attendibili di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4403">Configure the list of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen trusted domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4404">Ciò significa che Microsoft Defender SmartScreen non controlla l'eventuale presenza di risorse potenzialmente dannose, come software di phishing e altri malware, se gli URL di origine corrispondono a questi domini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4404">This means: Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't check for potentially malicious resources like phishing software and other malware if the source URLs match these domains.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4405">Il servizio di protezione di download Microsoft Defender SmartScreen non controllerà i download ospitati in questi domini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4405">The Microsoft Defender SmartScreen download protection service won't check downloads hosted on these domains.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4406">Se si abilita questo criterio, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen considera attendibili questi domini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4406">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen trusts these domains.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4407">Se si disabilita o non si imposta questo criterio, la protezione di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen predefinita viene applicata a tutte le risorse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4407">If you disable or don't set this policy, default Microsoft Defender SmartScreen protection is applied to all resources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4408">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4408">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4409">Si noti inoltre che questo criterio non viene applicato se l'organizzazione ha abilitato Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4409">Also note that this policy does not apply if your organization has enabled Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4410">È necessario configurare gli elenchi di indirizzi consentiti e bloccati in Microsoft Defender Security Center.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4410">You must configure your allow and block lists in Microsoft Defender Security Center instead.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4411">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4411">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4412">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4412">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4413">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4413">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4414">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4414">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4415">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4415">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4416">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4416">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4417">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4417">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4418">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4418">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4419">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4419">GP unique name: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4420">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura l'elenco di domini per i quali Microsoft Defender SmartScreen non attiva gli avvisi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4420">GP name: Configure the list of domains for which Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't trigger warnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4421">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4421">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4422">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4422">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4423">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4423">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4424">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4424">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4425">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4425">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4426">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4426">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4427">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4427">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4428">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4428">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4429">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4429">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\1 = "mydomain.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\2 = "myuniversity.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4430">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4430">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4431">Nome chiave di preferenza: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4431">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4432">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4432">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>mydomain.com</string>
  <string>myuniversity.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="smartscreenenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4434">SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4434">SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-microsoft-defender-smartscreen"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4435">Configura Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4435">Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4436">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4436">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4437">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4437">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4438">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4438">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4439">L'impostazione di questo criterio consente di configurare se attivare Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4439">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4440">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen genera messaggi di avviso per proteggere gli utenti da potenziali tentativi di phishing e software dannoso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4440">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen provides warning messages to help protect your users from potential phishing scams and malicious software.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4441">Per impostazione predefinita, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen è attivato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4441">By default, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4442">Se si abilita questa impostazione, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen è attivato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4442">If you enable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4443">Se si disabilita questa impostazione, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen è disattivato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4443">If you disable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4444">Se non si configura questa impostazione, gli utenti possono scegliere se usare Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4444">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4445">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4445">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4446">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4446">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4447">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4447">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4448">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4448">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4449">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4449">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4450">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4450">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4451">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4451">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4452">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4452">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4453">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4453">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4454">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4454">GP unique name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4455">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4455">GP name: Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4456">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4456">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4457">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Impostazioni SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4457">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4458">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4458">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4459">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4459">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4460">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4460">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4461">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4461">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4462">Nome valore: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4462">Value Name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4463">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4463">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4464">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4464">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4465">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4465">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4466">Nome chiave di preferenza: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4466">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4467">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4467">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="smartscreenfortrusteddownloadsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4469">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4469">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-checks-on-downloads-from-trusted-sources"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4470">Forza i controlli di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen sui download da origini attendibili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4470">Force Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks on downloads from trusted sources</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4471">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4471">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4472">In Windows dalla versione 78 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4472">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4473">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4473">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4474">Questo criterio consente di configurare se Microsoft Defender SmartScreen controlla la reputazione dei download da un'origine attendibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4474">This policy setting lets you configure whether Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks download reputation from a trusted source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4475">Se si abilita o non si configura questa impostazione, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen controlla la reputazione del download indipendentemente dall'origine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4475">If you enable or don't configure this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks the download's reputation regardless of source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4476">Se si disabilita questa impostazione, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen non controlla la reputazione del download quando si scaricano contenuti da un'origine attendibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4476">If you disable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen doesn't check the download's reputation when downloading from a trusted source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4477">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft, alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4477">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4478">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4478">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4479">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4479">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4480">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4480">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4481">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4481">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4482">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4482">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4483">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4483">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4484">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4484">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4485">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4485">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4486">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4486">GP unique name: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4487">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Forza i controlli di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen sui download da origini attendibili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4487">GP name: Force Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks on downloads from trusted sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4488">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4488">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4489">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Impostazioni SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4489">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4490">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4490">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4491">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4491">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4492">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4492">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4493">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4493">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4494">Nome valore: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4494">Value Name: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4495">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4495">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4496">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4496">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```
