  ### <a name="smartscreenpuaenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4498">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4498">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-to-block-potentially-unwanted-apps"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4499">Configura Microsoft Defender SmartScreen per bloccare le applicazioni potenzialmente indesiderate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4499">Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen to block potentially unwanted apps</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4500">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4500">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4501">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 80 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4501">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4502">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4502">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4503">L'impostazione di questo criterio consente di configurare se attivare il blocco di app potenzialmente indesiderate con Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4503">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on blocking for potentially unwanted apps with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4504">Il blocco di app potenzialmente indesiderate con Microsoft Defender SmartScreen fornisce messaggi di avviso per proteggere gli utenti da adware, coin miner, bundleware e altre app di scarsa reputazione ospitate dai siti Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4504">Potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen provides warning messages to help protect users from adware, coin miners, bundleware, and other low-reputation apps that are hosted by websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4505">Il blocco di app potenzialmente indesiderate con Microsoft Defender SmartScreen è disattivato per impostazione predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4505">Potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4506">Se si abilita questa impostazione, il blocco di app potenzialmente indesiderate con Microsoft Defender SmartScreen è attivato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4506">If you enable this setting, potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4507">Se si disabilita questa impostazione, il blocco di app potenzialmente indesiderate con Microsoft Defender SmartScreen è disattivato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4507">If you disable this setting, potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4508">Se non si configura questa impostazione, gli utenti possono scegliere se usare il blocco di app potenzialmente indesiderate con Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4508">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4509">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4509">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4510">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4510">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4511">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4511">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4512">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4512">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4513">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4513">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4514">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4514">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4515">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4515">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4516">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4516">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4517">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4517">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4518">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4518">GP unique name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4519">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura Microsoft Defender SmartScreen per bloccare le applicazioni potenzialmente indesiderate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4519">GP name: Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen to block potentially unwanted apps</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4520">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Impostazioni SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4520">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4521">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Impostazioni SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4521">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4522">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4522">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4523">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4523">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4524">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4524">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4525">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4525">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4526">Nome valore: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4526">Value Name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4527">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4527">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4528">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4528">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4529">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4529">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4530">Nome chiave di preferenza: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4530">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4531">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4531">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ## <a name="startupcomma-home-page-and-new-tab-page-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4533">Criteri per avvio&comma; home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4533">Startup&comma; home page and new tab page policies</span></span>

  ### <a name="homepageisnewtabpage"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4535">HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4535">HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-new-tab-page-as-the-home-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4536">Imposta la pagina Nuova scheda come home page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4536">Set the new tab page as the home page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4537">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4537">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4538">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4538">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4539">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4539">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4540">Configura la home page predefinita in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4540">Configures the default home page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4541">È possibile impostare la home page su un URL specificato dall'utente o sulla pagina Nuova scheda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4541">You can set the home page to a URL you specify or to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4542">Se si abilita questo criterio, la pagina Nuova scheda viene sempre usata per la home page e il percorso dell'URL della home page viene ignorato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4542">If you enable this policy, the new tab page is always used for the home page, and the home page URL location is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4543">Se si disabilita questo criterio, la home page dell'utente non può essere la pagina Nuova scheda, a meno che l'URL non sia impostato su "edge://newtab".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4543">If you disable this policy, the user's home page can't be the new tab page, unless the URL is set to 'edge://newtab'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4544">Se non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono scegliere se la pagina Nuova scheda è la home page.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4544">If not configured users can choose whether the new tab page is their home page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4545">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4545">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4546">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4546">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4547">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4547">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4548">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4548">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4549">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4549">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4550">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4550">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4551">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4551">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4552">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4552">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4553">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4553">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4554">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4554">GP unique name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4555">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Imposta la pagina Nuova scheda come home page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4555">GP name: Set the new tab page as the home page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4556">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4556">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4557">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4557">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4558">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4558">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4559">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4559">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4560">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4560">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4561">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4561">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4562">Nome valore: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4562">Value Name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4563">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4563">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4564">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4564">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4565">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4565">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4566">Nome chiave di preferenza: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4566">Preference Key Name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4567">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4567">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="homepagelocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4569">HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4569">HomepageLocation</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-home-page-url"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4570">Configura l'URL della home page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4570">Configure the home page URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4571">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4571">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4572">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4572">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4573">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4573">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4574">Configura l'URL della home page predefinita in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4574">Configures the default home page URL in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4575">La home page è la pagina aperta dal pulsante Home.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4575">The home page is the page opened by the Home button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4576">Le pagine che si aprono all'avvio sono controllate dai criteri [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4576">The pages that open on startup are controlled by the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4577">È possibile impostare un URL qui o impostare la home page per aprire la pagina Nuova scheda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4577">You can either set a URL here or set the home page to open the new tab page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4578">Se si sceglie di aprire la pagina Nuova scheda, questo criterio non avrà effetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4578">If you select to open the new tab page, then this policy doesn't take effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4579">Se si abilita questo criterio, gli utenti non possono cambiare l'URL della home page, ma possono scegliere di usare la pagina Nuova scheda come home page.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4579">If you enable this policy, users can't change their home page URL, but they can choose to use the new tab page as their home page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4580">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono scegliere la propria home page, a condizione che il criterio [HomepageIsNewTabPage](#homepageisnewtabpage) non sia abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4580">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can choose their own home page, as long as the [HomepageIsNewTabPage](#homepageisnewtabpage) policy isn't enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4581">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4581">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4582">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4582">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4583">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4583">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4584">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4584">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4585">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4585">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4586">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4586">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4587">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4587">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4588">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4588">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4589">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4589">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4590">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4590">GP unique name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4591">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura l'URL della home page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4591">GP name: Configure the home page URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4592">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4592">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4593">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4593">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4594">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4594">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4595">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4595">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4596">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4596">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4597">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4597">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4598">Nome valore: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4598">Value Name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4599">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4599">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4600">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4600">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://www.contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4601">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4601">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4602">Nome chiave di preferenza: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4602">Preference Key Name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4603">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4603">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
```

  ### <a name="newtabpageallowedbackgroundtypes"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4605">NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4605">NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-background-types-allowed-for-the-new-tab-page-layout"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4606">Configura i tipi di sfondo consentiti per il layout della pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4606">Configure the background types allowed for the new tab page layout</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4607">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4607">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4608">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4608">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4609">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4609">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4610">È possibile configurare i tipi di immagine di sfondo consentiti per il layout della pagina Nuova scheda in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4610">You can configure which types of background image that are allowed on the new tab page layout in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4611">Se non si configura questo criterio, vengono abilitati tutti i tipi di immagine di sfondo della pagina Nuova scheda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4611">If you don't configure this policy, all background image types on the new tab page are enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4612">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4612">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4613">DisableImageOfTheDay (1) = Disabilitare il tipo di immagine di sfondo giornaliero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4613">DisableImageOfTheDay (1) = Disable daily background image type</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4614">DisableCustomImage (2) = Disabilitare il tipo di immagine di sfondo personalizzato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4614">DisableCustomImage (2) = Disable custom background image type</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4615">DisableAll (3) = Disabilitare tutti i tipi di immagine di sfondo </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4615">DisableAll (3) = Disable all background image types</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4616">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4616">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4617">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4617">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4618">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4618">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4619">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4619">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4620">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4620">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4621">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4621">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4622">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4622">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4623">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4623">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4624">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4624">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4625">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4625">GP unique name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4626">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura i tipi di sfondo consentiti per il layout della pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4626">GP name: Configure the background types allowed for the new tab page layout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4627">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4627">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4628">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4628">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4629">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4629">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4630">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4630">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4631">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4631">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4632">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4632">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4633">Nome valore: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4633">Value Name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4634">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4634">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4635">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4635">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4636">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4636">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4637">Nome chiave di preferenza: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4637">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4638">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4638">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="newtabpagecompanylogo"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4640">NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4640">NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-new-tab-page-company-logo-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4641">Imposta il logo aziendale della pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4641">Set new tab page company logo (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4642">OBSOLETO: questo criterio è obsoleto e non funziona dopo Microsoft Edge 85.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4642">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 85.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4643">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4643">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4644">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 79, fino alla versione 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4644">On Windows and macOS since 79, until 85</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4645">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4645">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4646">Questa politica non ha funzionato come previsto a causa di cambiamenti nei requisiti operativi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4646">This policy didn't work as expected due to changes in operational requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4647">Di conseguenza, è obsoleto e non deve essere usato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4647">Therefore it's obsolete and should not be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4648">Specifica il logo aziendale da usare nella pagina Nuova scheda in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4648">Specifies the company logo to use on the new tab page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4649">Il criterio deve essere configurato come una stringa che esprime il o i logo in formato JSON.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4649">The policy should be configured as a string that expresses the logo(s) in JSON format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4650">Ad esempio: { "default_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png", "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29" }, "light_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png", "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737" } }</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4650">For example: { "default_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png", "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29" }, "light_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png", "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737" } }</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4651">Questo criterio si configura specificando l'URL dal quale Microsoft Edge può scaricare il logo e il suo hash crittografico (SHA-256), che viene usato per verificare l'integrità del download.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4651">You configure this policy by specifying the URL from which Microsoft Edge can download the logo and its cryptographic hash (SHA-256), which is used to verify the integrity of the download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4652">Il logo deve essere in formato PNG o SVG e le dimensioni del relativo file non devono superare i 16 MB.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4652">The logo must be in PNG or SVG format, and its file size must not exceed 16 MB.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4653">Il logo viene scaricato e memorizzato nella cache e verrà riscaricato ogni volta che l'URL o l'hash cambia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4653">The logo is downloaded and cached, and it will be redownloaded whenever the URL or the hash changes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4654">L'URL deve essere accessibile senza l'autenticazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4654">The URL must be accessible without any authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4655">È necessario usare l'elemento "default_logo", che verrà utilizzato quando non è presente un'immagine di sfondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4655">The 'default_logo' is required and will be used when there's no background image.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4656">Se viene fornito l'elemento "light_logo", verrà usato quando la pagina Nuova scheda dell'utente avrà un'immagine di sfondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4656">If 'light_logo' is provided, it will be used when the user's new tab page has a background image.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4657">È consigliabile usare un logo orizzontale con uno sfondo trasparente allineato a sinistra e centrato verticalmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4657">We recommend a horizontal logo with a transparent background that is left-aligned and vertically centered.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4658">Il logo deve avere un'altezza minima di 32 pixel e proporzioni da 1:1 a 4:1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4658">The logo should have a minimum height of 32 pixels and an aspect ratio from 1:1 to 4:1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4659">L'elemento "default_logo" deve avere un contrasto corretto su uno sfondo bianco/nero, mentre l'elemento "light_logo" deve avere un contrasto corretto su un'immagine di sfondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4659">The 'default_logo' should have proper contrast against a white/black background while the 'light_logo' should have proper contrast against a background image.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4660">Se si abilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge scarica e mostra il logo specificato nella pagina Nuova scheda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4660">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge downloads and shows the specified logo(s) on the new tab page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4661">Gli utenti non possono ignorare o nascondere il logo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4661">Users can't override or hide the logo(s).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4662">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge non mostrerà alcun logo aziendale né un logo Microsoft nella pagina Nuova scheda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4662">If you disable or don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will show no company logo or a Microsoft logo on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4663">Per informazioni sulla determinazione dell'hash SHA-256, vedere https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/get-filehash.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4663">For help with determining the SHA-256 hash, see https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/get-filehash.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4664">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4664">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4665">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4665">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4666">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4666">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4667">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4667">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4671">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4671">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4672">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4672">GP unique name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4673">Nome Criteri di gruppo: imposta il logo aziendale della pagina Nuova scheda (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4673">GP name: Set new tab page company logo (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4674">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4674">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4676">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4676">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4677">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4677">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4678">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4678">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4679">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4679">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4680">Nome valore: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4680">Value Name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4681">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4681">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4682">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4682">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageCompanyLogo = {
  "default_logo": {
    "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png"
  }, 
  "light_logo": {

    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png"
  }
}
```

  ### <a name="newtabpagehidedefaulttopsites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4688">NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4688">NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>

  #### <a name="hide-the-default-top-sites-from-the-new-tab-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4689">Nasconde i siti principali predefiniti dalla pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4689">Hide the default top sites from the new tab page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4690">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4690">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4691">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4691">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4692">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4692">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4693">Nasconde i siti principali predefiniti dalla pagina Nuova scheda in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4693">Hides the default top sites from the new tab page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4694">Se si imposta questo criterio su true, i riquadri dei siti principali predefiniti vengono nascosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4694">If you set this policy to true, the default top site tiles are hidden.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4695">Se si imposta questo criterio su false o non lo si configura, i riquadri dei siti principali predefiniti rimangono visibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4695">If you set this policy to false or don't configure it, the default top site tiles remain visible.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4696">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4696">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4697">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4697">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4698">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4698">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4699">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4699">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4701">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4701">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4702">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4702">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4703">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4703">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4704">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4704">GP unique name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4705">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Nasconde i siti principali predefiniti dalla pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4705">GP name: Hide the default top sites from the new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4706">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4706">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4707">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4707">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4708">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4708">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4710">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4710">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4711">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4711">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4712">Nome valore: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4712">Value Name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>

  ### <a name="newtabpagelocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4719">NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4719">NewTabPageLocation</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-new-tab-page-url"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4720">Configura l'URL della pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4720">Configure the new tab page URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4721">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4721">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4722">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4722">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4723">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4723">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4724">Configura l'URL predefinito della pagina Nuova scheda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4724">Configures the default URL for the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4725">La versione consigliata di questo criterio attualmente non funziona e funziona esattamente come la versione obbligatoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4725">The recommended version of this policy does not currently work and functions exactly like the mandatory version.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4726">Questo criterio determina la pagina che viene aperta quando vengono create nuove schede (incluso quando vengono aperte nuove finestre).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4726">This policy determines the page that's opened when new tabs are created (including when new windows are opened).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4727">Influisce anche sulla pagina di avvio se è impostata per aprire la pagina Nuova scheda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4727">It also affects the startup page if that's set to open to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4728">Questo criterio non determina quale pagina viene aperta all'avvio; ciò è controllato dal criterio [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4728">This policy doesn't determine which page opens on startup; that's controlled by the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4729">Inoltre, non influisce sulla home page se è impostata per aprire la pagina Nuova scheda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4729">It also doesn't affect the home page if that's set to open to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4730">Se non si configura questo criterio, viene utilizzata la pagina Nuova scheda predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4730">If you don't configure this policy, the default new tab page is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4731">Se si configura questo criterio *e* il criterio [NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype), questo criterio ha la precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4731">If you configure this policy *and* the [NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype) policy, this policy has precedence.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4732">Se si preferisce una scheda vuota, "about:blank" è l'URL corretto da usare, non "about://blank".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4732">If a blank tab is preferred, "about:blank" is the correct URL to use, not "about://blank".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4733">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4733">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4734">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4734">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4735">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4735">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4736">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4736">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4737">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4737">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4738">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4738">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4739">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4739">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4740">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4740">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4741">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4741">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4742">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4742">GP unique name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4743">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura l'URL della pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4743">GP name: Configure the new tab page URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4744">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4744">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4745">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4745">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4746">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4746">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4747">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4747">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4748">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4748">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4749">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4749">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4750">Nome valore: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4750">Value Name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4751">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4751">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4752">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4752">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://www.fabrikam.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4753">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4753">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4754">Nome chiave di preferenza: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4754">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4755">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4755">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
```

  ### <a name="newtabpagemanagedquicklinks"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4757">NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4757">NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-new-tab-page-quick-links"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4758">Imposta i collegamenti rapidi della pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4758">Set new tab page quick links</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4759">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4759">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4760">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 79 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4760">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4761">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4761">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4762">Per impostazione predefinita, Microsoft Edge mostra collegamenti rapidi nella pagina Nuova scheda dalle scelte rapide da tastiera aggiunte dall'utente e i siti principali in base alla cronologia esplorazioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4762">By default, Microsoft Edge displays quick links on the new tab page from user-added shortcuts and top sites based on browsing history.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4763">Con questo criterio, è possibile configurare fino a tre riquadri per collegamenti rapidi nella pagina Nuova scheda, espressi come oggetto JSON:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4763">With this policy, you can configure up to three quick link tiles on the new tab page, expressed as a JSON object:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4764">[ { "url": "https://www.contoso.com", "title": "Contoso Portal", "pinned": true/false }, ... ]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4764">[ { "url": "https://www.contoso.com", "title": "Contoso Portal", "pinned": true/false }, ... ]</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4765">Il campo "url" è obbligatorio; "title" e "pinned" sono facoltativi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4765">The 'url' field is required; 'title' and 'pinned' are optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4766">Se non viene fornito il campo "title", l'URL verrà usato come titolo predefinito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4766">If 'title' is not provided, the URL is used as the default title.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4767">Se non viene fornito il campo "pinned", il valore predefinito è false.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4767">If 'pinned' is not provided, the default value is false.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4768">Microsoft Edge presenta questi campi nell'ordine indicato, da sinistra a destra, con tutti i riquadri aggiunti visualizzati prima di quelli non aggiunti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4768">Microsoft Edge presents these in the order listed, from left to right, with all pinned tiles displayed ahead of non-pinned tiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4769">Se il criterio è impostato come obbligatorio, il campo "pinned" verrà ignorato e verranno aggiunti tutti i riquadri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4769">If the policy is set as mandatory, the 'pinned' field will be ignored and all tiles will be pinned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4770">I riquadri non possono essere eliminati dall'utente e verranno sempre visualizzati all'inizio dell'elenco dei collegamenti rapidi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4770">The tiles can't be deleted by the user and will always appear at the front of the quick links list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4771">Se il criterio è impostato come consigliato, i riquadri aggiunti rimarranno nell'elenco, ma l'utente può modificarli ed eliminarli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4771">If the policy is set as recommended, pinned tiles will remain in the list but the user has the ability to edit and delete them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4772">I riquadri dei collegamenti rapidi non aggiunti si comportano come i siti principali predefiniti e vengono rimossi dall'elenco se altri siti Web vengono visitati più di frequente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4772">Quick link tiles that aren't pinned behave like default top sites and are pushed off the list if other websites are visited more frequently.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4773">Quando si applicano collegamenti non aggiunti a un profilo di browser esistente tramite questo criterio, i collegamenti potrebbero non essere visualizzati, a seconda di come sono classificati rispetto alla cronologia esplorazioni dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4773">When applying non-pinned links via this policy to an existing browser profile, the links may not appear at all, depending on how they rank compared to the user's browsing history.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4774">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4774">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4775">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4775">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4776">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4776">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4777">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4777">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4778">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4778">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4779">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4779">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4780">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4780">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4781">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4781">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4782">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4782">GP unique name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4783">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Imposta i collegamenti rapidi della pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4783">GP name: Set new tab page quick links</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4784">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4784">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4785">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4785">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4786">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4786">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4787">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4787">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4788">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4788">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4789">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4789">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4790">Nome valore: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4790">Value Name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4791">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4791">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4792">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4792">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks = [
  {
    "pinned": true, 
    "title": "Contoso Portal", 
    "url": "https://contoso.com"
  }, 
  {
    "title": "Fabrikam", 
    "url": "https://fabrikam.com"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4793">Valore di esempio compatto:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4793">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks = [{"pinned": true, "title": "Contoso Portal", "url": "https://contoso.com"}, {"title": "Fabrikam", "url": "https://fabrikam.com"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4794">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4794">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4795">Nome chiave di preferenza: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4795">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4796">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4796">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>pinned</key>
    <true/>
    <key>title</key>
    <string>Contoso Portal</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://contoso.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>title</key>
    <string>Fabrikam</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://fabrikam.com</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="newtabpageprerenderenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4798">NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4798">NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-preload-of-the-new-tab-page-for-faster-rendering"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4799">Attiva il precaricamento della nuova scheda per il rendering più rapido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4799">Enable preload of the new tab page for faster rendering</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4800">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4800">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4801">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 85 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4801">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4802">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4802">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4803">Se si configurano questi criteri, è possibile precaricare la pagina Nuova scheda e per gli utenti non sarà possibile cambiare questa impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4803">If you configure this policy, preloading the New tab page is enabled, and users can't change this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4804">Se non si configura questo criterio, il precaricamento è abilitato e l'utente sarà in grado di modificare tale impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4804">If you don't configure this policy, preloading is enabled and a user can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4805">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4805">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4806">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4806">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4807">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4807">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4808">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4808">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4809">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4809">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4810">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4810">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4811">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4811">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4812">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4812">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4813">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4813">GP unique name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4814">Nome Criteri di gruppo: attiva il precaricamento della nuova scheda per il rendering più rapido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4814">GP name: Enable preload of the new tab page for faster rendering</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4815">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4815">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4816">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4816">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4817">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4817">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4818">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4818">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4819">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4819">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4820">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4820">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4821">Nome valore: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4821">Value Name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4822">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4822">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4823">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4823">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4824">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4824">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4825">Nome chiave preferenza: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4825">Preference Key Name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4826">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4826">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
