  ### <a name="newtabpagesetfeedtype"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4828">NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4828">NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-microsoft-edge-new-tab-page-experience-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4829">Configura l'esperienza della pagina Nuova scheda di Microsoft Edge (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4829">Configure the Microsoft Edge new tab page experience (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4830">DEPRECATO: questo criterio è deprecato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4830">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4831">È attualmente supportato, ma diventerà obsoleto in una versione futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4831">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4832">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4832">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4833">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 79 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4833">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4834">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4834">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4835">Il criterio è deprecato perché la nuova versione della pagina Nuova scheda Enterprise non richiede più la scelta tra diversi tipi di contenuto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4835">We are deprecating this policy because the new version of the enterprise new tab page no longer requires choosing between different content types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4836">Al contrario, il contenuto presentato all'utente può essere controllato tramite l'interfaccia di amministrazione di Microsoft 365.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4836">Instead, the content that is presented to the user can be controlled via the Microsoft 365 admin center.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4837">Per accedere all'interfaccia di amministrazione di Microsoft 365, esegui l'accesso a https://admin.microsoft.com con l'account di amministratore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4837">To get to the Microsoft 365 admin center, sign in at https://admin.microsoft.com with your admin account.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4838">Questo criterio diventerà obsoleto dopo la versione 90 di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4838">The policy will be made obsolete after Microsoft Edge version 90.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4839">Consente di scegliere l'esperienza del feed di Microsoft News o Office 365 per la pagina Nuova scheda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4839">Lets you choose either the Microsoft News or Office 365 feed experience for the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4840">Se si imposta questo criterio su “News”, gli utenti vedranno l'esperienza del feed di Microsoft News nella pagina Nuova scheda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4840">When you set this policy to 'News', users will see the Microsoft News feed experience on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4841">Se si imposta questo criterio su “Office”, gli utenti con accesso al browser di Azure Active Directory vedranno l'esperienza del feed di Office 365 nella pagina Nuova scheda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4841">When you set this policy to 'Office', users with an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in will see the Office 365 feed experience on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4842">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4842">If you disable or don't configure this policy:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4843">Gli utenti con accesso al browser di Azure Active Directory ottengono l'esperienza del feed della pagina Nuova scheda di Office 365, oltre all'esperienza del feed della pagina Nuova scheda standard.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4843">Users with an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in are offered the Office 365 new tab page feed experience, as well as the standard new tab page feed experience.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4844">Gli utenti che non hanno accesso al browser di Azure Active Directory vedranno l'esperienza della pagina Nuova scheda standard.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4844">Users without an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in will see the standard new tab page experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4845">Se si configura questo criterio *e* il criterio [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation), il criterio [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) ha la precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4845">If you configure this policy *and* the [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) policy, [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) has precedence.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4846">Impostazione predefinita: disabilitato o non configurato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4846">Default setting:  Disabled or not configured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4847">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4847">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4848">News (0) = Esperienza del feed di Microsoft News</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4848">News (0) = Microsoft News feed experience</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4849">Office (1) = Esperienza del feed di Office 365</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4849">Office (1) = Office 365 feed experience</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4850">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4850">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4851">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4851">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4852">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4852">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4853">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4853">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4854">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4854">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4855">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4855">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4856">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4856">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4857">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4857">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4858">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4858">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4859">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4859">GP unique name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4860">Nome GP: configura l'esperienza della pagina Nuova scheda di Microsoft Edge (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4860">GP name: Configure the Microsoft Edge new tab page experience (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4861">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4861">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4862">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4862">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4863">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4863">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4864">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4864">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4865">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4865">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4866">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4866">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4867">Nome valore: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4867">Value Name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4868">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4868">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4869">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4869">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4870">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4870">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4871">Nome chiave di preferenza: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4871">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>

  ### <a name="restoreonstartup"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4874">RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4874">RestoreOnStartup</span></span>

  #### <a name="action-to-take-on-startup"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4875">Azione da eseguire all'avvio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4875">Action to take on startup</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4876">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4876">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4877">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4877">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4878">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4878">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4879">Specifica il comportamento di Microsoft Edge all'avvio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4879">Specify how Microsoft Edge behaves when it starts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4880">Se si desidera che all'avvio si apra sempre una nuova scheda, scegliere "RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage”.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4880">If you want a new tab to always open on startup, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4881">Se si desidera riaprire gli URL che erano stati aperti l'ultima volta che è stato chiuso Microsoft Edge, scegliere "RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession”.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4881">If you want to reopen URLs that were open the last time Microsoft Edge closed, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4882">L'ultima sessione di esplorazione verrà ripristinata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4882">The browsing session will be restored as it was.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4883">Questa opzione disabilita alcune impostazioni che si basano sulle sessioni o che eseguono azioni all'uscita (ad esempio, Cancella i dati di esplorazione all'uscita o i cookie di sessione).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4883">Note that this option disables some settings that rely on sessions or that perform actions on exit (such as Clear browsing data on exit or session-only cookies).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4884">Se si desidera aprire un set specifico di URL, scegliere "RestoreOnStartupIsURLs".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4884">If you want to open a specific set of URLs, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsURLs'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4885">La disabilitazione di questa impostazione equivale a non configurarla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4885">Disabling this setting is equivalent to leaving it not configured.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4886">Gli utenti potranno modificarla in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4886">Users will be able to change it in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4887">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4887">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4888">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4888">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4889">RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage (5) = Aprire una nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4889">RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage (5) = Open a new tab</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4890">RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession (1) = Ripristinare l'ultima sessione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4890">RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession (1) = Restore the last session</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4891">RestoreOnStartupIsURLs (4) = Aprire un elenco di URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4891">RestoreOnStartupIsURLs (4) = Open a list of URLs</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4892">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4892">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4893">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4893">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4894">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4894">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4895">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4895">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4896">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4896">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4897">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4897">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4898">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4898">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4899">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4899">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4900">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4900">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4901">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4901">GP unique name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4902">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Azione da eseguire all'avvio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4902">GP name: Action to take on startup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4903">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4903">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4904">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4904">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4905">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4905">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4906">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4906">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4907">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4907">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4908">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4908">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4909">Nome valore: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4909">Value Name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4910">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4910">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4911">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4911">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000004
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4912">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4912">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4913">Nome chiave di preferenza: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4913">Preference Key Name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4914">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4914">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>4</integer>
```

  ### <a name="restoreonstartupurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4916">RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4916">RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>

  #### <a name="sites-to-open-when-the-browser-starts"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4917">Siti da aprire all'avvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4917">Sites to open when the browser starts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4918">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4918">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4919">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4919">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4920">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4920">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4921">Specifica un elenco di siti Web da aprire automaticamente all'avvio del browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4921">Specify a list of websites to open automatically when the browser starts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4922">Se non si configura questo criterio, non viene aperto alcun sito all'avvio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4922">If you don't configure this policy, no site is opened on startup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4923">Questo criterio funziona solo se si imposta anche il criterio [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) su "Apri un elenco di URL" (4).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4923">This policy only works if you also set the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy to 'Open a list of URLs' (4).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4924">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4924">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4925">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4925">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4926">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4926">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4927">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4927">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4928">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4928">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4929">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4929">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4930">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4930">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4931">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4931">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4932">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4932">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4933">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4933">GP unique name: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4934">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Siti da aprire all'avvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4934">GP name: Sites to open when the browser starts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4935">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4935">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4936">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4936">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4937">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4937">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4938">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4938">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4939">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4939">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4940">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Consigliato\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4940">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4941">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4941">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4942">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4942">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4943">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4943">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs\1 = "https://contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs\2 = "https://www.fabrikam.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4944">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4944">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4945">Nome chiave di preferenza: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4945">Preference Key Name: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4946">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4946">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="showhomebutton"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4948">ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4948">ShowHomeButton</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-home-button-on-toolbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4949">Mostra il pulsante Home nella barra degli strumenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4949">Show Home button on toolbar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4950">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4950">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4951">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4951">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4952">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4952">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4953">Mostra il pulsante Home nella barra degli strumenti di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4953">Shows the Home button on Microsoft Edge's toolbar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4954">Abilitare questo criterio per mostrare sempre il pulsante Home.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4954">Enable this policy to always show the Home button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4955">Disabilitarlo per non mostrare mai il pulsante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4955">Disable it to never show the button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4956">Se non si configura il criterio, gli utenti possono scegliere se mostrare il pulsante Home.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4956">If you don't configure the policy, users can choose whether to show the home button.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4957">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4957">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4958">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4958">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4959">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4959">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4960">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4960">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4961">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4961">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4962">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4962">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4963">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4963">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4964">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4964">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4965">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4965">GP unique name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4966">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Mostra il pulsante Home nella barra degli strumenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4966">GP name: Show Home button on toolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4967">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4967">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4968">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/Avvio, home page e pagina Nuova scheda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4968">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4969">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4969">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4970">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4970">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4971">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4971">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4972">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4972">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4973">Nome valore: ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4973">Value Name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4974">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4974">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4975">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4975">Example value:</span></span>

```

```

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4977">Nome chiave di preferenza: ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4977">Preference Key Name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>

  ### <a name="addressbarmicrosoftsearchinbingproviderenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4982">AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4982">AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-microsoft-search-in-bing-suggestions-in-the-address-bar"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4983">Abilita Microsoft Search nei suggerimenti di Bing nella barra degli indirizzi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4983">Enable Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4984">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4984">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4985">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 81 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4985">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4986">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4986">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4987">Consente la visualizzazione dei suggerimenti rilevanti di Bing per Microsoft Search nell'elenco di suggerimenti della barra degli indirizzi quando l'utente digita una stringa di ricerca nella barra degli indirizzi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4987">Enables the display of relevant Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar's suggestion list when the user types a search string in the address bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4988">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono visualizzare i risultati interni forniti da Microsoft Search in Bing nell'elenco di suggerimenti della barra degli indirizzi di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4988">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can see internal results powered by Microsoft Search in Bing in the Microsoft Edge address bar suggestion list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4989">Per vedere i risultati di Microsoft Search in Bing, l'utente deve accedere a Microsoft Edge con il proprio account di Azure AD per l'organizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4989">To see the Microsoft Search in Bing results, the user must be signed into Microsoft Edge with their Azure AD account for that organization.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4990">Se si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti non possono visualizzare i risultati interni nell'elenco di suggerimenti della barra degli indirizzi di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4990">If you disable this policy, users can't see internal results in the Microsoft Edge address bar suggestion list.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-4991">A partire da Microsoft Edge versione 89, Microsoft Search in Bing suggerimenti sarà disponibile anche se Bing non è il provider di ricerca predefinito dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4991">Starting with Microsoft Edge version 89, Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions will be available even if Bing isn't the user's default search provider.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4992">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4992">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4993">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4993">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4994">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4994">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4995">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4995">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4996">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4996">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-4997">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4997">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4998">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4998">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-4999">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-4999">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5000">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5000">GP unique name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5001">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita Microsoft Search nei suggerimenti di Bing nella barra degli indirizzi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5001">GP name: Enable Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5002">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5002">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5003">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5003">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5004">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5004">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5005">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5005">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5006">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5006">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5007">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5007">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5008">Nome valore: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5008">Value Name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5009">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5009">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5010">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5010">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5011">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5011">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5012">Nome chiave di preferenza: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5012">Preference Key Name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5013">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5013">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="adssettingforintrusiveadssites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5015">AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5015">AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>

  #### <a name="ads-setting-for-sites-with-intrusive-ads"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5016">Impostazione degli annunci per i siti con annunci intrusivi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5016">Ads setting for sites with intrusive ads</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5017">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5017">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5018">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 78 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5018">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5019">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5019">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5020">Controlla se gli annunci sono bloccati nei siti con annunci intrusivi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5020">Controls whether ads are blocked on sites with intrusive ads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5021">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5021">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5022">AllowAds (1) = Consentire gli annunci in tutti i siti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5022">AllowAds (1) = Allow ads on all sites</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5023">BlockAds (2) = Bloccare gli annunci nei siti con annunci intrusivi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5023">BlockAds (2) = Block ads on sites with intrusive ads.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5024">(Valore predefinito)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5024">(Default value)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5025">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5025">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5026">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5026">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5027">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5027">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5028">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5028">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5029">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5029">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5030">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5030">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5031">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5031">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5032">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5032">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5033">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5033">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5034">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5034">GP unique name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5035">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Impostazione degli annunci per i siti con annunci intrusivi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5035">GP name: Ads setting for sites with intrusive ads</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5036">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5036">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5037">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5037">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5038">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5038">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5039">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5039">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5040">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5040">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5041">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5041">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5042">Nome valore: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5042">Value Name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5043">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5043">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5044">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5044">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5045">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5045">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5046">Nome chiave di preferenza: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5046">Preference Key Name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5047">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5047">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <a name="allowdeletingbrowserhistory"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5049">AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5049">AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-deleting-browser-and-download-history"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5050">Abilita l'eliminazione della cronologia di download e browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5050">Enable deleting browser and download history</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5051">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5051">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5052">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5052">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5053">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5053">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5054">Consente di eliminare la cronologia del browser e la cronologia dei download, oltre a impedire agli utenti di modificare questa impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5054">Enables deleting browser history and download history and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5055">Anche con questo criterio disabilitato, non è garantita la conservazione della cronologia di esplorazione e dei download: gli utenti possono modificare o eliminare direttamente i file del database della cronologia e il browser stesso potrebbe rimuovere (in base al periodo di scadenza) o archiviare alcuni o tutti gli elementi della cronologia in qualsiasi momento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5055">Note that even with this policy is disabled, the browsing and download history aren't guaranteed to be retained: users can edit or delete the history database files directly, and the browser itself may remove (based on expiration period) or archive any or all history items at any time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5056">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono eliminare la cronologia di esplorazione e dei download.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5056">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can delete the browsing and download history.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5057">Se si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti non possono eliminare la cronologia di esplorazione e dei download e la sincronizzazione della cronologia verrà disabilitata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5057">If you disable this policy, users can't delete browsing and download history, and history sync will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5058">Se si abilita questo criterio, non abilitare il criterio [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) poiché entrambi sono associati all'eliminazione dei dati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5058">If you enable this policy, don't enable the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy, because they both deal with deleting data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5059">Se si abilitano entrambi, il criterio [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) ha la precedenza ed elimina tutti i dati quando si chiude Microsoft Edge, indipendentemente da come è configurato tale criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5059">If you enable both, the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy takes precedence and deletes all data when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how this policy is configured.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5060">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5060">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5061">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5061">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5062">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5062">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5063">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5063">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5064">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5064">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5065">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5065">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5066">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5066">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5067">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5067">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5068">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5068">GP unique name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5069">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita l'eliminazione della cronologia di download e browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5069">GP name: Enable deleting browser and download history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5070">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5070">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5071">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5071">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5072">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5072">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5073">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5073">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5074">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5074">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5075">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5075">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5076">Nome valore: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5076">Value Name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5077">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5077">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5078">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5078">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5079">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5079">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5080">Nome chiave di preferenza: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5080">Preference Key Name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5081">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5081">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="allowfileselectiondialogs"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5083">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5083">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-file-selection-dialogs"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5084">Consente le finestre di dialogo per la selezione dei file</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5084">Allow file selection dialogs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5085">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5085">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5086">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5086">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5087">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5087">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5088">Consente l'accesso ai file locali facendo in modo che Microsoft Edge mostri finestre di dialogo per la selezione dei file.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5088">Allow access to local files by letting Microsoft Edge display file selection dialogs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5089">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono aprire le finestre di dialogo per la selezione dei file come di consueto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5089">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can open file selection dialogs as normal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5090">Se si disabilita questo criterio, ogni volta che l'utente esegue un'azione che attiva una finestra di dialogo per la selezione dei file (come l'importazione dei preferiti, il caricamento dei file o il salvataggio dei collegamenti), viene invece visualizzato un messaggio e si presume che l'utente abbia selezionato Annulla nella finestra di dialogo per la selezione dei file.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5090">If you disable this policy, whenever the user performs an action that triggers a file selection dialog (like importing favorites, uploading files, or saving links), a message is displayed instead, and the user is assumed to have clicked Cancel on the file selection dialog.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5091">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5091">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5092">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5092">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5093">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5093">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5094">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5094">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5095">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5095">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5096">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5096">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5097">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5097">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5098">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5098">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5099">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5099">GP unique name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5100">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente le finestre di dialogo per la selezione dei file</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5100">GP name: Allow file selection dialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5101">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5101">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5102">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5102">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5103">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5103">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5104">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5104">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5105">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5105">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5106">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5106">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5107">Nome valore: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5107">Value Name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5108">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5108">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5109">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5109">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5110">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5110">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5111">Nome chiave di preferenza: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5111">Preference Key Name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5112">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5112">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="allowpopupsduringpageunload"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5114">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5114">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>

  #### <a name="allows-a-page-to-show-popups-during-its-unloading-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5115">Consente la visualizzazione di popup durante il caricamento di una pagina (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5115">Allows a page to show popups during its unloading (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5116">OBSOLETO: questo criterio è obsoleto e non funziona dopo Microsoft Edge 87.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5116">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5117">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5117">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5118">In Windows e macOS da 78 a 87</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5118">On Windows and macOS since 78, until 87</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5119">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5119">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5120">Questo criterio consente a un amministratore di specificare che una pagina può mostrare popup durante il suo scaricamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5120">This policy allows an admin to specify that a page can show popups during its unloading.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5121">Se il criterio è abilitato, le pagine possono mostrare popup mentre vengono scaricate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5121">When the policy is set to enabled, pages are allowed to show popups while they're being unloaded.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5122">Se il criterio è disabilitato o non configurato, le pagine non possono mostrare popup mentre vengono scaricate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5122">When the policy is set to disabled or unset, pages aren't allowed to show popups while they're being unloaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5123">Ciò è definito dalle specifiche: https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5123">This is as per the spec: (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5124">Questo criterio è stato rimosso in Microsoft Edge 88 e viene ignorato se impostato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5124">This policy was removed in Microsoft Edge 88 and is ignored if set.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5125">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5125">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5126">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5126">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5127">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5127">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5128">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5128">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5129">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5129">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5130">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5130">Boolean</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5133">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5133">GP unique name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5134">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente la visualizzazione di popup durante il caricamento di una pagina (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5134">GP name: Allows a page to show popups during its unloading (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5135">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5135">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5138">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5138">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5139">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5139">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5140">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5140">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

  ### <a name="allowsyncxhrinpagedismissal"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5178">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5178">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-pages-to-send-synchronous-xhr-requests-during-page-dismissal-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5179">Consente alle pagine di inviare richieste XHR sincrone durante la chiusura della pagina (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5179">Allow pages to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5180">DEPRECATO: questo criterio è deprecato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5180">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5181">È attualmente supportato, ma diventerà obsoleto in una versione futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5181">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5182">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5182">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5183">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 79 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5183">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5184">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5184">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5185">Questo criterio è deprecato perché è solo un meccanismo a breve termine che offre alle aziende più tempo per aggiornare i contenuti Web se e quando viene rilevata incompatibilità con la modifica per impedire le richieste XHR sincrone durante la chiusura della pagina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5185">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the change to disallow synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5186">Non funzionerà in Microsoft Edge versione 93.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5186">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 93.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5187">Questo criterio consente di specificare che una pagina può inviare richieste XHR sincrone durante la chiusura della pagina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5187">This policy lets you specify that a page can send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5188">Se si abilita questo criterio, le pagine possono inviare richieste XHR sincrone durante la chiusura della pagina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5188">If you enable this policy, pages can send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5189">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, le pagine non possono inviare richieste XHR sincrone durante la chiusura della pagina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5189">If you disable this policy or don't configure this policy, pages aren't allowed to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5190">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5190">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5191">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5191">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5192">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5192">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5193">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5193">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5194">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5194">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5195">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5195">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5196">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5196">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5197">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5197">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5198">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5198">GP unique name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5199">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente alle pagine di inviare richieste XHR sincrone durante la chiusura della pagina (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5199">GP name: Allow pages to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5200">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5200">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5201">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5201">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5202">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5202">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5203">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5203">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5204">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5204">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5205">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5205">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5206">Nome valore: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5206">Value Name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5207">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5207">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5208">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5208">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5209">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5209">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5210">Nome chiave di preferenza: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5210">Preference Key Name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
