  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5215">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5215">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5216">In Windows dalla versione 83 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5216">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5217">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5217">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5218">Configura l'elenco di modelli URL per i siti in cui il browser tenterà di eseguire il protocollo di binding di token.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5218">Configure the list of URL patterns for sites that the browser will attempt to perform the Token Binding protocol with.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5219">Per i domini in questo elenco, il browser invierà il messaggio ClientHello di binding di token nell'handshake TLS (vedere https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5219">For the domains on this list, the browser will send the Token Binding ClientHello in the TLS handshake (See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472).</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5220">Se il server risponde con una risposta ServerHello valida, il browser creerà e invierà messaggi di binding di token nelle successive richieste HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5220">If the server responds with a valid ServerHello response, the browser will create and send Token Binding messages on subsequent https requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5221">Per altre informazioni, vedere https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5221">See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471 for more info.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5222">Se questo elenco è vuoto, il binding di token verrà disabilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5222">If this list is empty, Token Binding will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5223">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nei dispositivi Windows 10 con la funzionalità Modalità protetta virtuale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5223">This policy is only available on Windows 10 devices with Virtual Secure Mode capability.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5224">A partire da Microsoft Edge 86, questo criterio non supporta più l'aggiornamento dinamico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5224">Starting in Microsoft Edge 86, this policy no longer supports dynamic refresh.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5225">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5225">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5226">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5226">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5227">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5227">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5228">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5228">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5229">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5229">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5230">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5230">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5231">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5231">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5232">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5232">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5233">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5233">GP unique name: AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5234">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura l'elenco dei siti con cui Microsoft Edge proverà a stabilire un binding di token.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5234">GP name: Configure the list of sites for which Microsoft Edge will attempt to establish a Token Binding with</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5235">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5235">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5236">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5236">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5237">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5237">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5238">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5238">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5239">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5239">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5240">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5240">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5241">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5241">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5242">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5242">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5243">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5243">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\1 = "mydomain.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\2 = "[*.]mydomain2.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\3 = "[*.].mydomain2.com"

```

  ### <a name="allowtrackingforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5245">AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5245">AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-tracking-prevention-exceptions-for-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5246">Configura il monitoraggio delle eccezioni di protezione per siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5246">Configure tracking prevention exceptions for specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5247">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5247">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5248">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 78 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5248">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5249">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5249">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5250">Configura l'elenco di modelli URL esclusi dalla prevenzione del rilevamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5250">Configure the list of URL patterns that are excluded from tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5251">Se si configura questo criterio, l'elenco dei modelli URL configurati è escluso dalla prevenzione del rilevamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5251">If you configure this policy, the list of configured URL patterns is excluded from tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5252">Se non si configura questo criterio, per tutti i siti si usa il valore predefinito globale del criterio "Blocca il monitoraggio dell'attività di esplorazione sul Web degli utenti" (se impostato) o la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5252">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the "Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity" policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5253">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5253">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5254">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5254">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5255">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5255">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5256">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5256">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5257">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5257">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5258">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5258">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5259">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5259">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5260">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5260">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5261">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5261">GP unique name: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5262">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura il monitoraggio delle eccezioni di protezione per siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5262">GP name: Configure tracking prevention exceptions for specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5263">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5263">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5264">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5264">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5265">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5265">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5266">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5266">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5267">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5267">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5268">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5268">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5269">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5269">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5270">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5270">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5271">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5271">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5272">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5272">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5273">Nome chiave di preferenza: AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5273">Preference Key Name: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5274">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5274">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="alternateerrorpagesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5276">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5276">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="suggest-similar-pages-when-a-webpage-cant-be-found"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5277">Suggerisce pagine simili quando non è possibile trovare una pagina web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5277">Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5278">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5278">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5279">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 80 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5279">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5280">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5280">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5281">Consente a Microsoft Edge di rilasciare una connessione a un servizio Web per generare suggerimenti di ricerca e URL per problemi di connettività come gli errori DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5281">Allow Microsoft Edge to issue a connection to a web service to generate URL and search suggestions for connectivity issues such as DNS errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5282">Se si abilita questo criterio, un servizio Web viene usato per generare suggerimenti di ricerca e URL per errori di rete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5282">If you enable this policy, a web service is used to generate url and search suggestions for network errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5283">Se si disabilita questo criterio, non vengono effettuate chiamate al servizio Web e viene visualizzata una pagina di errore standard.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5283">If you disable this policy, no calls to the web service are made and a standard error page is shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5284">Se non si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge rispetta le preferenze degli utenti impostate in Servizi in edge://settings/privacy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5284">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge respects the user preference that's set under Services at edge://settings/privacy.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5285">In particolare, è presente l'opzione **Suggerisci pagine simili quando non è possibile trovare una pagina Web**, che può essere attivata o disattivata dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5285">Specifically, there's a **Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found** toggle, which the user can switch on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5286">Se viene abilitato questo criterio (AlternateErrorPagesEnabled), l'impostazione Suggerisci pagine simili quando non è possibile trovare una pagina Web è attivata, ma l'utente non potrà modificarla tramite l’interruttore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5286">Note that if you have enable this policy (AlternateErrorPagesEnabled), the Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found setting is turned on, but the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5287">Se si disabilita questo criterio, l'impostazione Suggerisci pagine simili quando non è possibile trovare una pagina Web è disattivata e l'utente non potrà modificarla tramite l’interruttore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5287">If you disable this policy, the Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found setting is turned off, and the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5288">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5288">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5289">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5289">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5290">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5290">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5291">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5291">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5292">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5292">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5293">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5293">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5294">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5294">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5295">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5295">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5296">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5296">GP unique name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5297">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Suggerisce pagine simili quando non è possibile trovare una pagina Web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5297">GP name: Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5298">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5298">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5299">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5299">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5300">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5300">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5301">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5301">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5302">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5302">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5303">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5303">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5304">Nome valore: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5304">Value Name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5305">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5305">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5306">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5306">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5307">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5307">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5308">Nome chiave di preferenza: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5308">Preference Key Name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5309">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5309">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="alwaysopenpdfexternally"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5311">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5311">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>

  #### <a name="always-open-pdf-files-externally"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5312">Apre sempre i file PDF esternamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5312">Always open PDF files externally</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5313">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5313">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5314">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5314">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5315">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5315">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5316">Disabilita il visualizzatore PDF interno in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5316">Disables the internal PDF viewer in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5317">Se si abilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge considera i file PDF come download e consente agli utenti di aprirli con l'applicazione predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5317">If you enable this policy Microsoft Edge treats PDF files as downloads and lets users open them with the default application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5318">Se Microsoft Edge è il lettore PDF predefinito, i file PDF non vengono scaricati e continueranno ad aprirsi in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5318">If Microsoft Edge is the default PDF reader, PDF files aren't downloaded and will continue to open in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5319">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge aprirà i file PDF (a meno che l'utente non lo impedisca).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5319">If you don't configure this policy or disable it, Microsoft Edge will open PDF files (unless the user disables it).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5320">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5320">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5321">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5321">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5322">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5322">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5323">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5323">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5324">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5324">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5325">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5325">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5326">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5326">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5327">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5327">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5328">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5328">GP unique name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5329">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Apre sempre i file PDF esternamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5329">GP name: Always open PDF files externally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5330">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5330">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5331">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5331">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5332">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5332">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5333">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5333">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5334">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5334">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5335">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5335">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5336">Nome valore: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5336">Value Name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5337">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5337">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5338">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5338">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5339">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5339">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5340">Nome chiave di preferenza: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5340">Preference Key Name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5341">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5341">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="ambientauthenticationinprivatemodesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5343">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5343">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-ambient-authentication-for-inprivate-and-guest-profiles"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5344">Abilita l'autenticazione ambientale per i profili InPrivate e Guest</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5344">Enable Ambient Authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5345">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5345">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5346">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 81 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5346">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5347">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5347">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5348">Configurare questo criterio per consentire/impedire l'autenticazione ambientale per i profili InPrivate e Guest in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5348">Configure this policy to allow/disallow ambient authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5349">L'autenticazione ambientale è l'autenticazione HTTP con le credenziali predefinite quando non vengono fornite le credenziali esplicite tramite gli schemi NTLM/Kerberos/Test Negotiate/risposta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5349">Ambient Authentication is http authentication with default credentials when explicit credentials aren't provided via NTLM/Kerberos/Negotiate challenge/response schemes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5350">Se si imposta il criterio su “RegularOnly”, consente l'autenticazione ambientale solo per le sessioni regolari.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5350">If you set the policy to 'RegularOnly', it allows ambient authentication for Regular sessions only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5351">L'autenticazione ambientale per le sessioni InPrivate e Guest non sarà consentita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5351">InPrivate and Guest sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5352">Se si imposta il criterio su” InPrivateAndRegular”, consente l'autenticazione ambientale per le sessioni InPrivate e regolari.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5352">If you set the policy to 'InPrivateAndRegular', it allows ambient authentication for InPrivate and Regular sessions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5353">L'autenticazione ambientale per le sessioni Guest non sarà consentita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5353">Guest sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5354">Se si imposta il criterio su “GuestAndRegular”, consente l'autenticazione ambientale per le sessioni Guest e regolari.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5354">If you set the policy to 'GuestAndRegular', it allows ambient authentication for Guest and Regular sessions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5355">L'autenticazione ambientale per le sessioni InPrivate non sarà consentita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5355">InPrivate sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5356">Se si imposta il criterio su “All”, consente l'autenticazione ambientale per tutte le sessioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5356">If you set the policy to 'All', it allows ambient authentication for all sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5357">Nota: l'autenticazione ambientale è sempre consentita sui profili regolari.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5357">Note that ambient authentication is always allowed on regular profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5358">In Microsoft Edge versione 81 e successive, se il criterio non viene impostato, l'autenticazione ambientale sarà abilitata solo per le sessioni regolari.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5358">In Microsoft Edge version 81 and later, if the policy is left not set, ambient authentication will be enabled in regular sessions only.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5359">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5359">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5360">RegularOnly (0) = Abilitare l'autenticazione ambientale solo nelle sessioni regolari</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5360">RegularOnly (0) = Enable ambient authentication in regular sessions only</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5361">InPrivateAndRegular (1) = Abilitare l'autenticazione ambientale nelle sessioni InPrivate e regolari</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5361">InPrivateAndRegular (1) = Enable ambient authentication in InPrivate and regular sessions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5362">GuestAndRegular (2) = Abilitare l'autenticazione ambientale nelle sessioni Guest e regolari</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5362">GuestAndRegular (2) = Enable ambient authentication in guest and regular sessions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5363">All (3) = Abilitare l'autenticazione ambientale nelle sessioni regolari, InPrivate e Guest</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5363">All (3) = Enable ambient authentication in regular, InPrivate and guest sessions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5364">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5364">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5365">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5365">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5366">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5366">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5367">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5367">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5368">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5368">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5369">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5369">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5370">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5370">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5371">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5371">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5372">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5372">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5373">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5373">GP unique name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5374">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita l'autenticazione ambientale per i profili InPrivate e Guest</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5374">GP name: Enable Ambient Authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5375">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5375">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5376">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5376">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5377">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5377">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5378">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5378">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5379">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5379">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5380">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5380">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5381">Nome valore: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5381">Value Name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5382">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5382">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5383">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5383">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5384">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5384">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5385">Nome chiave di preferenza: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5385">Preference Key Name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5386">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5386">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```

  ### <a name="appcacheforceenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5388">AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5388">AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allows-the-appcache-feature-to-be-re-enabled-even-if-its-turned-off-by-default"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5389">Consente la riabilitazione della funzionalità AppCache, anche se disabilitata per impostazione predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5389">Allows the AppCache feature to be re-enabled, even if it's turned off by default</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5390">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5390">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5391">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 84 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5391">On Windows and macOS since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5392">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5392">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5393">Se si imposta questo criterio su true, AppCache è abilitato, anche se AppCache in Microsoft Edge non è disponibile per impostazione predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5393">If you set this policy to true, the AppCache is enabled, even when AppCache in Microsoft Edge is not available by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5394">Se si imposta questo criterio su false o non lo si imposta, AppCache seguirà le impostazioni predefinite di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5394">If you set this policy to false, or don't set it, AppCache will follow Microsoft Edge's defaults.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5395">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5395">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5396">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5396">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5397">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5397">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5398">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5398">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5399">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5399">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5400">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5400">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5401">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5401">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5402">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5402">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5403">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5403">GP unique name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5404">Nome Criteri di gruppo: consente la riabilitazione della funzionalità AppCache, anche se disabilitata per impostazione predefinita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5404">GP name: Allows the AppCache feature to be re-enabled, even if it's turned off by default</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5405">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5405">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5406">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5406">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5407">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5407">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5408">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5408">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5409">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5409">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5410">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5410">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5411">Nome valore: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5411">Value Name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5412">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5412">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5413">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5413">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5414">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5414">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5415">Nome chiave preferenza: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5415">Preference Key Name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5416">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5416">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5417">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5417">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="applicationlocalevalue"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5418">ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5418">ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-application-locale"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5419">Configura le impostazioni locali delle applicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5419">Set application locale</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5420">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5420">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5421">In Windows dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5421">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5422">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5422">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5423">Configura le impostazioni locali delle applicazioni in Microsoft Edge e impedisce agli utenti di modificarle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5423">Configures the application locale in Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing the locale.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5424">Se si abilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge usa le impostazioni locali specificate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5424">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the specified locale.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5425">Se le impostazioni locali configurate non sono supportate, verrà usato "en-US".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5425">If the configured locale isn't supported, 'en-US' is used instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5426">Se si disabilita o non si configura questa impostazione, Microsoft Edge usa le impostazioni locali preferite specificate dall'utente (se configurate) o le impostazioni locali di fallback "en-US".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5426">If you disable or don't configure this setting, Microsoft Edge uses either the user-specified preferred locale (if configured) or the fallback locale 'en-US'.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5427">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5427">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5428">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5428">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5429">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5429">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5430">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5430">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5431">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5431">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5432">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5432">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5433">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5433">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5434">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5434">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5435">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5435">GP unique name: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5436">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura le impostazioni locali delle applicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5436">GP name: Set application locale</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5437">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5437">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5438">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5438">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5439">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5439">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5440">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5440">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5441">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5441">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5442">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5442">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5443">Nome valore: ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5443">Value Name: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5444">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5444">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5445">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5445">Example value:</span></span>

```
"en"
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5446">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5446">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="audiocaptureallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5447">AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5447">AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-or-block-audio-capture"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5448">Consente o blocca l'acquisizione audio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5448">Allow or block audio capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5449">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5449">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5450">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5450">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5451">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5451">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5452">Consente di specificare se un utente deve concedere l'accesso a un sito Web al proprio dispositivo di acquisizione audio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5452">Allows you to set whether a user is prompted to grant a website access to their audio capture device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5453">Questo criterio si applica a tutti gli URL, ad eccezione di quelli configurati nell'elenco [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5453">This policy applies to all URLs except for those configured in the [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5454">Se si abilita o non si configura (impostazione predefinita) questo criterio, all'utente viene chiesto l'accesso all'acquisizione audio, ad eccezione degli URL nell'elenco [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5454">If you enable this policy or don't configure it (the default setting), the user is prompted for audio capture access except from the URLs in the [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5455">Questi URL elencati sono autorizzati ad accedere senza richiedere la conferma dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5455">These listed URLs are granted access without prompting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5456">Se si disabilita questo criterio, all'utente non viene inviata alcuna richiesta e l'acquisizione audio è accessibile solo per gli URL configurati in [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5456">If you disable this policy, the user is not prompted, and audio capture is accessible only to the URLs configured in [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5457">Questo criterio influisce su tutti i tipi di input audio, non solo sul microfono predefinito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5457">This policy affects all types of audio inputs, not only the built-in microphone.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5458">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5458">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5459">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5459">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5460">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5460">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5461">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5461">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5462">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5462">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5463">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5463">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5464">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5464">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5465">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5465">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5466">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5466">GP unique name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5467">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente o blocca l'acquisizione audio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5467">GP name: Allow or block audio capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5468">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5468">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5469">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5469">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5470">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5470">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5471">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5471">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5472">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5472">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5473">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5473">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5474">Nome valore: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5474">Value Name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5475">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5475">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5476">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5476">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5477">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5477">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5478">Nome chiave di preferenza: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5478">Preference Key Name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5479">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5479">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
