  ### <a name="audiocaptureallowedurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5481">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5481">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="sites-that-can-access-audio-capture-devices-without-requesting-permission"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5482">Siti che possono accedere ai dispositivi di acquisizione audio senza richiedere l'autorizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5482">Sites that can access audio capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5483">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5483">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5484">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5484">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5485">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5485">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5486">Specifica i siti Web, in base ai modelli URL, che possono usare i dispositivi di acquisizione audio senza chiedere l'autorizzazione all'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5486">Specify websites, based on URL patterns, that can use audio capture devices without asking the user for permission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5487">I modelli in questo elenco vengono confrontati con l'origine di sicurezza dell'URL di richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5487">Patterns in this list are matched against the security origin of the requesting URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5488">In caso di corrispondenza, al sito viene automaticamente concesso l'accesso ai dispositivi di acquisizione audio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5488">If they match, the site is automatically granted access to audio capture devices.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5489">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5489">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5490">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5490">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5491">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5491">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5492">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5492">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5493">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5493">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5494">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5494">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5495">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5495">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5496">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5496">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5497">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5497">GP unique name: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5498">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Siti che possono accedere ai dispositivi di acquisizione audio senza richiedere l'autorizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5498">GP name: Sites that can access audio capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5499">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5499">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5500">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5500">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5501">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5501">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5502">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5502">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5503">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5503">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5504">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5504">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5505">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5505">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5506">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5506">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5507">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5507">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls\2 = "https://[*.]contoso.edu/"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5508">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5508">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5509">Nome chiave di preferenza: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5509">Preference Key Name: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5510">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5510">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>https://[*.]contoso.edu/</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5511">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5511">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="audiosandboxenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5512">AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5512">AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-the-audio-sandbox-to-run"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5513">Consente l'esecuzione della sandbox audio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5513">Allow the audio sandbox to run</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5514">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5514">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5515">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 81 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5515">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5516">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5516">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5517">Questo criterio controlla la sandbox del processo audio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5517">This policy controls the audio process sandbox.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5518">Se si abilita questo criterio, il processo audio verrà eseguito in modalità sandbox.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5518">If you enable this policy, the audio process will run sandboxed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5519">Se si disabilita questo criterio, il processo audio non verrà eseguito in modalità sandbox e il modulo di elaborazione audio WebRTC verrà eseguito nel processo del renderer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5519">If you disable this policy, the audio process will run unsandboxed and the WebRTC audio-processing module will run in the renderer process.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5520">Questo lascia gli utenti esposti ai rischi per la sicurezza correlati all'esecuzione del sottosistema audio non in modalità sandbox.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5520">This leaves users open to security risks related to running the audio subsystem unsandboxed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5521">Se non si configura questo criterio, per la sandbox audio verrà usata la configurazione predefinita, che potrebbe variare a seconda della piattaforma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5521">If you don't configure this policy, the default configuration for the audio sandbox will be used, which might differ based on the platform.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5522">Questo criterio è pensato per offrire alle aziende la possibilità di disabilitare la sandbox audio se usano configurazioni di software per la sicurezza che interferiscono con la sandbox.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5522">This policy is intended to give enterprises flexibility to disable the audio sandbox if they use security software setups that interfere with the sandbox.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5523">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5523">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5524">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5524">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5525">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5525">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5526">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5526">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5527">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5527">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5528">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5528">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5529">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5529">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5530">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5530">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5531">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5531">GP unique name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5532">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente l'esecuzione della sandbox audio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5532">GP name: Allow the audio sandbox to run</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5533">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5533">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5534">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5534">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5535">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5535">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5536">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5536">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5537">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5537">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5538">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5538">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5539">Nome valore: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5539">Value Name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5540">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5540">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5541">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5541">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5542">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5542">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5543">Nome chiave di preferenza: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5543">Preference Key Name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5544">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5544">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5545">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5545">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autoimportatfirstrun"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5546">AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5546">AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>

  #### <a name="automatically-import-another-browsers-data-and-settings-at-first-run"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5547">Importa automaticamente le impostazioni e i dati di un altro browser alla prima esecuzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5547">Automatically import another browser's data and settings at first run</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5548">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5548">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5549">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5549">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5550">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5550">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5551">Se si abilita questo criterio, tutti i tipi di dati e le impostazioni supportati del browser specificato verranno importati automaticamente alla prima esecuzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5551">If you enable this policy, all supported datatypes and settings from the specified browser will be silently and automatically imported at first run.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5552">Durante la first-run experience, la sezione di importazione verrà ignorata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5552">During the First Run Experience, the import section will also be skipped.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5553">I dati del browser della Versione legacy di Microsoft Edge saranno sempre migrati automaticamente nella first-run experience, indipendentemente dal valore di questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5553">The browser data from Microsoft Edge Legacy will always be silently migrated at the first run, irrespective of the value of this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5554">Se questo criterio è impostato su “FromDefaultBrowser”, i tipi di dati corrispondenti al browser predefinito nel dispositivo gestito verranno importati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5554">If this policy is set to 'FromDefaultBrowser', then the datatypes corresponding to the default browser on the managed device will be imported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5555">Se il browser specificato come valore di questo criterio non è presente nel dispositivo gestito, Microsoft Edge ignorerà l'importazione senza inviare alcuna notifica all'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5555">If the browser specified as the value of this policy is not present in the managed device, Microsoft Edge will simply skip the import without any notification to the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5556">Se si imposta questo criterio su "DisabledAutoImport", la sezione di importazione della first-run experience viene interamente ignorata e Microsoft Edge non importa i dati e le impostazioni del browser automaticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5556">If you set this policy to 'DisabledAutoImport', the import section of the first-run experience is skipped entirely and Microsoft Edge doesn't import browser data and settings automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5557">Se questo criterio è impostato sul valore di “FromInternetExplorer”, i seguenti tipi di dati verranno importati da Internet Explorer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5557">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromInternetExplorer', the following datatypes will be imported from Internet Explorer:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5558">Preferiti o segnalibri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5558">Favorites or bookmarks</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5559">Password salvate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5559">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5560">Motori di ricerca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5560">Search engines</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5561">Cronologia esplorazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5561">Browsing history</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5562">Home page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5562">Home page</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5563">Se questo criterio è impostato sul valore di “FromGoogleChrome”, i seguenti tipi di dati verranno importati da Google Chrome:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5563">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromGoogleChrome', the following datatypes will be imported from Google Chrome:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5564">Preferiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5564">Favorites</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5565">Password salvate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5565">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5566">Indirizzi e altro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5566">Addresses and more</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5567">Informazioni di pagamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5567">Payment info</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5568">Cronologia esplorazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5568">Browsing history</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5569">Impostazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5569">Settings</span></span>
7. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5570">Schede aggiunte e aperte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5570">Pinned and Open tabs</span></span>
8. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5571">Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5571">Extensions</span></span>
9. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5572">Cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5572">Cookies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5573">Nota: per altri dettagli su cosa viene importato da Google Chrome, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5573">Note: For more details on what is imported from Google Chrome, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5574">Se questo criterio è impostato sul valore di “FromSafari”, i dati degli utenti non vengono più importati in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5574">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromSafari', user data is no longer imported into Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5575">Ciò è dovuto al modo in cui l'accesso completo al disco funziona sul Mac.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5575">This is due to the way Full Disk Access works on Mac.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5576">In macOS Mojave e versioni successive, non è più possibile avere l'importazione automatica dei dati di Safari in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5576">On macOS Mojave and above, it's no longer possible to have automated and unattended import of Safari data into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5577">A partire da Microsoft Edge versione 83, se questo criterio è impostato sul valore di “FromMozillaFirefox”, i seguenti tipi di dati verranno importati da Mozilla Firefox:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5577">Starting with Microsoft Edge version 83, if this policy is set to the value of 'FromMozillaFirefox', the following datatypes will be imported from Mozilla Firefox:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5578">Preferiti o segnalibri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5578">Favorites or bookmarks</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5579">Password salvate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5579">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5580">Indirizzi e altro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5580">Addresses and more</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5581">Cronologia esplorazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5581">Browsing History</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5582">Se si desidera limitare l'importazione di tipi di dati specifici nei dispositivi gestiti, è possibile utilizzare questo criterio con altri criteri come [ImportAutofillFormData](#importautofillformdata), [ImportBrowserSettings](#importbrowsersettings), [ImportFavorites](#importfavorites) e così via.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5582">If you want to restrict specific datatypes from getting imported on the managed devices, you can use this policy with other policies such as [ImportAutofillFormData](#importautofillformdata), [ImportBrowserSettings](#importbrowsersettings), [ImportFavorites](#importfavorites), and etc.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5583">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5583">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5584">FromDefaultBrowser (0) = Importa automaticamente tutti i tipi di dati e le impostazioni supportati dal browser predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5584">FromDefaultBrowser (0) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from the default browser</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5585">FromInternetExplorer (1) = Importa automaticamente tutti i tipi di dati e le impostazioni supportati da Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5585">FromInternetExplorer (1) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Internet Explorer</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5586">FromGoogleChrome (2) = Importa automaticamente tutti i tipi di dati e le impostazioni supportati da Google Chrome</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5586">FromGoogleChrome (2) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Google Chrome</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5587">FromSafari (3) = Importa automaticamente tutti i tipi di dati e le impostazioni supportati da Safari</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5587">FromSafari (3) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Safari</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5588">DisabledAutoImport (4) = Disabilita l'importazione automatica e la sezione di importazione della first-run experience viene ignorata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5588">DisabledAutoImport (4) = Disables automatic import, and the import section of the first-run experience is skipped</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5589">FromMozillaFirefox (5) = Importa automaticamente tutti i tipi di dati e le impostazioni supportati da Mozilla Firefox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5589">FromMozillaFirefox (5) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Mozilla Firefox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5590">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5590">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5591">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5591">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5592">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5592">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5593">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5593">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5594">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5594">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5595">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5595">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5596">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5596">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5597">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5597">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5598">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5598">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5599">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5599">GP unique name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5600">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Importa automaticamente le impostazioni e i dati di un altro browser alla prima esecuzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5600">GP name: Automatically import another browser's data and settings at first run</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5601">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5601">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5602">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5602">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5603">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5603">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5604">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5604">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5605">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5605">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5606">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5606">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5607">Nome valore: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5607">Value Name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5608">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5608">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5609">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5609">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5611">Nome chiave di preferenza: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5611">Preference Key Name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5612">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5612">Example value:</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5613">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5613">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autolaunchprotocolsfromorigins"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5614">AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5614">AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>

  #### <a name="define-a-list-of-protocols-that-can-launch-an-external-application-from-listed-origins-without-prompting-the-user"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5615">Definisci un elenco di protocolli che possono avviare un'applicazione esterna da origini elencate senza chiedere conferma all'utente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5615">Define a list of protocols that can launch an external application from listed origins without prompting the user</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5616">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5616">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5617">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 85 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5617">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5618">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5618">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5619">Consente di impostare un elenco di protocolli e, per ciascun protocollo, un elenco associato di modelli di origine consentiti, che può avviare un'applicazione esterna senza richiedere all'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5619">Allows you to set a list of protocols, and for each protocol an associated list of allowed origin patterns, that can launch an external application without prompting the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5620">Il separatore finale non deve essere incluso nell'elenco del protocollo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5620">The trailing separator should not be included when listing the protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5621">Ad esempio, inserisci “skype” invece di “skype:” o “skype://”.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5621">For example, list "skype" instead of "skype:" or "skype://".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5622">Se si configura questo criterio, è possibile usare un protocollo solo per avviare un'applicazione esterna senza richiedere consenso in base al criterio se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5622">If you configure this policy, a protocol will only be permitted to launch an external application without prompting by policy if:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5623">il protocollo è elencato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5623">the protocol is listed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5624">l'origine del sito che tenta di avviare il protocollo corrisponde a uno dei modelli di origine nell'elenco allowed_origins di tale protocollo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5624">the origin of the site trying to launch the protocol matches one of the origin patterns in that protocol's allowed_origins list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5625">Se una delle due condizioni è falsa, il prompt di avvio del protocollo esterno non verrà omesso in base al criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5625">If either condition is false, the external protocol launch prompt will not be omitted by policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5626">Se non si configura questo criterio, non è possibile avviare alcun protocollo senza un prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5626">If you don't configure this policy, no protocols can launch without a prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5627">Gli utenti possono rifiutare esplicitamente i prompt in base al protocollo/sito a meno che il criterio [ ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox](#externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox) sia impostato su disabilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5627">Users can opt out of prompts on a per-protocol/per-site basis unless the [ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox](#externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox) policy is set to Disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5628">Questo criterio non ha alcun impatto sulle esenzioni di prompt per protocollo/sito impostate dagli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5628">This policy has no impact on per-protocol/per-site prompt exemptions set by users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5629">I modelli di corrispondenza di origine usano un formato simile a quelli per il criterio [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist), documentati su [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5629">The origin matching patterns use a similar format to those for the [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) policy, which are documented at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5630">Tuttavia, i modelli di corrispondenza di origine per questo criterio non possono contenere elementi come “/path” o “@query”.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5630">However, origin matching patterns for this policy cannot contain "/path" or "@query" elements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5631">Qualsiasi modello che contiene un elemento “/path” o “@query” verrà ignorato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5631">Any pattern that does contain a "/path" or "@query" element will be ignored.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5632">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5632">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5633">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5633">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5634">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5634">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5635">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5635">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5636">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5636">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5637">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5637">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5638">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5638">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5639">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5639">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5640">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5640">GP unique name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5641">Nome Criteri di gruppo: definisci un elenco di protocolli che possono avviare un'applicazione esterna da origini elencate senza chiedere conferma all'utente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5641">GP name: Define a list of protocols that can launch an external application from listed origins without prompting the user</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5642">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5642">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5643">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5643">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5644">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5644">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5645">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5645">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5646">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5646">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5647">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5647">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5648">Nome valore: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5648">Value Name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5649">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5649">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5650">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5650">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins = [
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "example.com", 
      "http://www.example.com:8080"
    ], 
    "protocol": "spotify"
  }, 
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "https://example.com", 
      "https://.mail.example.com"
    ], 
    "protocol": "teams"
  }, 
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "*"
    ], 
    "protocol": "outlook"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5651">Valore di esempio compatto:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5651">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins = [{"allowed_origins": ["example.com", "http://www.example.com:8080"], "protocol": "spotify"}, {"allowed_origins": ["https://example.com", "https://.mail.example.com"], "protocol": "teams"}, {"allowed_origins": ["*"], "protocol": "outlook"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5652">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5652">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5653">Nome chiave preferenza: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5653">Preference Key Name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5654">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5654">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>example.com</string>
      <string>http://www.example.com:8080</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>spotify</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://example.com</string>
      <string>https://.mail.example.com</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>teams</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>*</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>outlook</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="autoopenallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5656">AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5656">AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>

  #### <a name="urls-where-autoopenfiletypes-can-apply"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5657">URL in cui è possibile applicare AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5657">URLs where AutoOpenFileTypes can apply</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5658">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5658">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5659">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 85 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5659">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5660">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5660">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5661">Un elenco di URL a cui [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) verrà applicato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5661">A list of URLs to which [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) will apply to.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5662">Questo criterio non ha alcun effetto sul modo in cui i valori aperti automaticamente impostati dagli utenti tramite la barra di download ... > Voce del menu “Apri sempre file di questo tipo”.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5662">This policy has no impact on automatically open values set by users via the download shelf ... > "Always open files of this type" menu entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5663">Se si impostano gli URL in questo criterio, i file verranno aperti automaticamente in base al criterio, se l'URL fa parte del set e il tipo di file è elencato in [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5663">If you set URLs in this policy, files will only automatically open by policy if the URL is part of this set and the file type is listed in [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5664">Se una delle due condizioni è falsa, il download non si aprirà automaticamente in base ai criteri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5664">If either condition is false, the download won't automatically open by policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5665">Se non si impostano questo criterio, tutti i download in cui il tipo di file è presente in [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) si aprirà automaticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5665">If you don't set this policy, all downloads where the file type is in [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) will automatically open.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5666">Un modello di URL deve essere formattato in base a [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5666">A URL pattern has to be formatted according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5667">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5667">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5668">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5668">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5669">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5669">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5670">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5670">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5671">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5671">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5672">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5672">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5673">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5673">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5674">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5674">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5675">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5675">GP unique name: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5676">Nome Criteri di gruppo: URL in cui è possibile applicare AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5676">GP name: URLs where AutoOpenFileTypes can apply</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5677">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5677">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5678">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5678">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5679">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5679">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5680">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5680">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5681">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5681">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5682">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5682">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5683">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5683">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5684">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5684">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5685">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5685">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\1 = "example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\3 = "hosting.com/good_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5686">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5686">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5687">Nome chiave preferenza: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5687">Preference Key Name: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5688">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5688">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>example.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/good_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="autoopenfiletypes"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5690">AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5690">AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>

  #### <a name="list-of-file-types-that-should-be-automatically-opened-on-download"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5691">Elenco dei tipi di file che devono essere aperti automaticamente al download</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5691">List of file types that should be automatically opened on download</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5692">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5692">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5693">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 85 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5693">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5694">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5694">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5695">Questo criterio imposta un elenco dei tipi di file che devono essere aperti automaticamente al download.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5695">This policy sets a list of file types that should be automatically opened on download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5696">Nota: quando si elenca il tipo di file, non è necessario includere il separatore iniziale, quindi inserisci “txt” al posto di “.txt”.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5696">Note: The leading separator should not be included when listing the file type, so list "txt" instead of ".txt".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5697">Per impostazione predefinita, questi tipi di file verranno aperti automaticamente in tutti gli URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5697">By default, these file types will be automatically opened on all URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5698">È possibile usare il criterio [AutoOpenAllowedForURLs](#autoopenallowedforurls) per limitare gli URL di cui questi tipi di file verranno aperti automaticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5698">You can use the [AutoOpenAllowedForURLs](#autoopenallowedforurls) policy to restrict the URLs for which these file types will be automatically opened on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5699">I file con tipi che devono essere aperti automaticamente continueranno a essere soggetti ai controlli abilitati di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen e non verranno aperti se non superano tali controlli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5699">Files with types that should be automatically opened will still be subject to the enabled Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks and won't be opened if they fail those checks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5700">I tipi di file che un utente ha già specificato per l'apertura automatica continueranno a essere scaricati automaticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5700">File types that a user has already specified to automatically be opened will continue to do so when downloaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5701">L'utente continuerà a essere in grado di specificare altri tipi di file da aprire automaticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5701">The user will continue to be able to specify other file types to be automatically opened.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5702">Se non si imposta questo criterio, solo i tipi di file che un utente ha già specificato per l'apertura automatica verranno aperto al download.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5702">If you don't set this policy, only file types that a user has already specified to automatically be opened will do so when downloaded.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5703">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5703">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5704">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5704">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5705">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5705">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5706">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5706">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5707">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5707">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5708">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5708">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5709">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5709">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5710">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5710">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5711">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5711">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5712">Nome univoco Criteri del gruppo: AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5712">GP unique name: AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5713">Nome Criteri di gruppo: elenco dei tipi di file che devono essere aperti automaticamente al download</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5713">GP name: List of file types that should be automatically opened on download</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5714">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5714">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5715">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5715">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5716">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5716">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5717">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5717">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5718">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5718">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5719">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5719">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5720">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5720">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5721">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5721">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5722">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5722">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes\1 = "exe"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes\2 = "txt"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5723">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5723">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5724">Nome chiave di preferenza: AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5724">Preference Key Name: AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5725">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5725">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>exe</string>
  <string>txt</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5726">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5726">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autofilladdressenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5727">AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5727">AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-autofill-for-addresses"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5728">Abilita il riempimento automatico per gli indirizzi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5728">Enable AutoFill for addresses</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5729">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5729">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5730">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5730">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5731">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5731">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5732">Abilita la funzionalità di riempimento automatico e consente agli utenti di completare automaticamente le informazioni relative all'indirizzo nei moduli Web usando le informazioni archiviate in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5732">Enables the AutoFill feature and allows users to auto-complete address information in web forms using previously stored information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5733">Se si disabilita questo criterio, la funzionalità di riempimento automatico non suggerisce o compila mai le informazioni sull'indirizzo, né salva informazioni sull'indirizzo aggiuntive che l'utente potrebbe aver inviato durante l'esplorazione del Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5733">If you disable this policy, AutoFill never suggests or fills in address information, nor does it save additional address information that the user might submit while browsing the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5734">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono controllare la funzionalità di riempimento automatico per gli indirizzi nell'interfaccia utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5734">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can control AutoFill for addresses in the user interface.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5735">Se si disabilita questo criterio, si interrompe anche tutta l'attività per tutti i moduli Web, ad eccezione dei moduli relativi a password e pagamenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5735">Note that if you disable this policy you also stop all activity for all web forms, except payment and password forms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5736">Non vengono salvate altre voci e Microsoft Edge non suggerisce o compila automaticamente eventuali voci precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5736">No further entries are saved, and Microsoft Edge won't suggest or AutoFill any previous entries.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5737">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5737">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5738">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5738">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5739">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5739">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5740">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5740">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5741">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5741">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5742">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5742">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5743">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5743">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5744">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5744">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5745">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5745">GP unique name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5746">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita il riempimento automatico per gli indirizzi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5746">GP name: Enable AutoFill for addresses</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5747">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5747">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5748">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5748">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5749">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5749">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5750">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5750">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5751">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5751">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5752">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5752">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5753">Nome valore: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5753">Value Name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5754">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5754">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5755">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5755">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5756">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5756">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5757">Nome chiave di preferenza: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5757">Preference Key Name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5758">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5758">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
