  ### <a name="autofillcreditcardenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5760">AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5760">AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-autofill-for-credit-cards"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5761">Abilita il riempimento automatico per le carte di credito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5761">Enable AutoFill for credit cards</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5762">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5762">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5763">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5763">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5764">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5764">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5765">Abilita la funzionalità di riempimento automatico di Microsoft Edge e consente agli utenti di completare automaticamente le informazioni relative alla carta di credito nei moduli Web usando le informazioni archiviate in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5765">Enables Microsoft Edge's AutoFill feature and lets users auto complete credit card information in web forms using previously stored information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5766">Se si disabilita questo criterio, la funzionalità di riempimento automatico non suggerisce o compila mai le informazioni sulla carta di credito, né salva informazioni sulla carta di credito aggiuntive che gli utenti potrebbero aver inviato durante l'esplorazione del Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5766">If you disable this policy, AutoFill never suggests or fills credit card information, nor will it save additional credit card information that users might submit while browsing the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5767">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono controllare la funzionalità di riempimento automatico per le carte di credito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5767">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can control AutoFill for credit cards.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5768">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5768">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5769">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5769">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5770">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5770">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5771">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5771">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5772">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5772">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5773">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5773">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5774">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5774">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5775">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5775">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5776">Nome Criteri di gruppo: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5776">GP unique name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5777">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita il riempimento automatico per le carte di credito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5777">GP name: Enable AutoFill for credit cards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5778">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5778">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5779">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5779">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5780">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5780">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5781">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5781">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5782">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5782">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5783">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5783">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5784">Nome valore: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5784">Value Name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5785">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5785">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5786">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5786">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5787">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5787">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5788">Nome chiave di preferenza: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5788">Preference Key Name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5789">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5789">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5790">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5790">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autoplayallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5791">AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5791">AutoplayAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-media-autoplay-for-websites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5792">Consente la riproduzione automatica dei contenuti multimediali per i siti Web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5792">Allow media autoplay for websites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5793">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5793">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5794">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 78 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5794">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5795">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5795">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5796">Questo criterio imposta i criteri di riproduzione automatica di contenuti multimediali per i siti Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5796">This policy sets the media autoplay policy for websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5797">L'impostazione predefinita, "Non configurato", rispetta le impostazioni di riproduzione automatica di contenuti multimediali correnti e consente agli utenti di configurare le proprie impostazioni di riproduzione automatica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5797">The default setting, "Not configured" respects the current media autoplay settings and lets users configure their autoplay settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5798">Se si abilita questo criterio, la riproduzione automatica di contenuti multimediali è consentita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5798">Setting to "Enabled" sets media autoplay to "Allow".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5799">Tutti i siti Web possono riprodurre contenuti multimediali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5799">All websites are allowed to autoplay media.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5800">Gli utenti non possono eseguire l'override del criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5800">Users can't override this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5801">Se si disabilita questo criterio, la riproduzione automatica di contenuti multimediali è bloccata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5801">Setting to "Disabled" sets media autoplay to "Block".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5802">Nessun sito Web può riprodurre contenuti multimediali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5802">No websites are allowed to autoplay media.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5803">Gli utenti non possono eseguire l'override del criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5803">Users can't override this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5804">Per applicare il criterio, è necessario chiudere e riaprire una scheda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5804">A tab will need to be closed and re-opened for this policy to take effect.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5805">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5805">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5806">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5806">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5807">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5807">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5808">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5808">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5809">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5809">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5810">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5810">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5811">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5811">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5812">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5812">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5813">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5813">GP unique name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5814">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente la riproduzione automatica dei contenuti multimediali per i siti Web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5814">GP name: Allow media autoplay for websites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5815">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5815">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5816">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5816">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5817">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5817">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5818">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5818">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5819">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5819">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5820">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5820">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5821">Nome valore: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5821">Value Name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5822">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5822">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5823">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5823">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5824">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5824">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5825">Nome chiave di preferenza: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5825">Preference Key Name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5826">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5826">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="backgroundmodeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5828">BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5828">BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="continue-running-background-apps-after-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5829">App in esecuzione in background dopo la chiusura di Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5829">Continue running background apps after Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5830">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5830">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5831">In Windows dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5831">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5832">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5832">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5833">Consente l'avvio dei processi di Microsoft Edge all'accesso al sistema operativo e li mantiene in esecuzione dopo la chiusura dell'ultima finestra del browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5833">Allows Microsoft Edge processes to start at OS sign-in and keep running after the last browser window is closed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5834">In questo scenario, le app in background e la sessione di esplorazione corrente rimangono attive, inclusi i cookie di sessione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5834">In this scenario, background apps and the current browsing session remain active, including any session cookies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5835">Un processo in background aperto visualizza un'icona nell'area di notifica e può sempre essere chiuso da lì.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5835">An open background process displays an icon in the system tray and can always be closed from there.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5836">Se si abilita questo criterio, la modalità in background è attivata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5836">If you enable this policy, background mode is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5837">Se si disabilita questo criterio, la modalità in background è disattivata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5837">If you disable this policy, background mode is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5838">Se non si configura questo criterio, inizialmente la modalità in background è disattivata, ma può essere configurata dall'utente in edge://settings/system.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5838">If you don't configure this policy, background mode is initially turned off, and the user can configure its behavior in edge://settings/system.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5839">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5839">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5840">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5840">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5841">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5841">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5842">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5842">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5843">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5843">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5844">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5844">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5845">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5845">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5846">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5846">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5847">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5847">GP unique name: BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5848">Nome Criteri di gruppo: App in esecuzione in background dopo la chiusura di Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5848">GP name: Continue running background apps after Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5849">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5849">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5850">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5850">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5851">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5851">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5852">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5852">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5853">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5853">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5854">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5854">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5855">Nome valore: BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5855">Value Name: BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5856">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5856">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5857">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5857">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="backgroundtemplatelistupdatesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5859">BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5859">BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enables-background-updates-to-the-list-of-available-templates-for-collections-and-other-features-that-use-templates"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5860">Abilita gli aggiornamenti in background all'elenco di modelli disponibili per Raccolte e altre funzionalità che sfruttano i modelli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5860">Enables background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5861">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5861">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5862">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 79 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5862">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5863">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5863">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5864">Consente di abilitare o disabilitare gli aggiornamenti in background all'elenco di modelli disponibili per Raccolte e altre funzionalità che sfruttano i modelli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5864">Lets you enable or disable background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5865">I modelli vengono usati per estrarre metadati complessi da una pagina Web quando la pagina viene salvata come raccolta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5865">Templates are used to extract rich metadata from a webpage when the page is saved to a collection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5866">Se si abilita o non si configura questa impostazione, l'elenco di modelli disponibili verrà scaricato in background da un servizio Microsoft ogni 24 ore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5866">If you enable this setting or the setting is unconfigured, the list of available templates will be downloaded in the background from a Microsoft service every 24 hours.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5867">Se si disabilita questa impostazione, l'elenco di modelli disponibili verrà scaricato su richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5867">If you disable this setting the list of available templates will be downloaded on demand.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5868">Questo tipo di download può influire leggermente sulle prestazioni di Raccolte e altre funzionalità.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5868">This type of download might result in small performance penalties for Collections and other features.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5869">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5869">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5870">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5870">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5871">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5871">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5872">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5872">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5873">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5873">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5874">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5874">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5875">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5875">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5876">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5876">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5877">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5877">GP unique name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5878">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita gli aggiornamenti in background all'elenco di modelli disponibili per Raccolte e altre funzionalità che sfruttano i modelli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5878">GP name: Enables background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5879">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5879">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5880">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5880">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5881">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5881">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5882">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5882">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5883">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5883">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5884">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5884">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5885">Nome valore: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5885">Value Name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5886">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5886">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5887">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5887">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5888">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5888">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5889">Nome chiave di preferenza: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5889">Preference Key Name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5890">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5890">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="bingadssuppression"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5892">BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5892">BingAdsSuppression</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-all-ads-on-bing-search-results"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5893">Blocca tutti gli annunci sui risultati della ricerca di Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5893">Block all ads on Bing search results</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5894">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5894">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5895">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 83 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5895">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5896">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5896">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5897">Fornisce un'esperienza di ricerca senza pubblicità su Bing.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5897">Enables an ad-free search experience on Bing.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5898">Se si abilita questo criterio, un utente può eseguire ricerche su bing.com senza pubblicità.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5898">If you enable this policy, then a user can search on bing.com and have an ad-free search experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5899">Contemporaneamente, l'impostazione Ricerca sicura verrà impostata su "Strict" e non potrà essere modificata dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5899">At the same time, the SafeSearch setting will be set to 'Strict' and can't be changed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5900">Se non si configura questo criterio, l'esperienza predefinita mostrerà pubblicità nei risultati della ricerca su bing.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5900">If you don't configure this policy, then the default experience will have ads in the search results on bing.com.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5901">Ricerca sicura sarà impostata su "Moderate" per impostazione predefinita e potrà essere modificata dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5901">SafeSearch will be set to 'Moderate' by default and can be changed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5902">Questo criterio è disponibile solo per le SKU K-12 identificate come tenant EDU da Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5902">This policy is only available for K-12 SKUs that are identified as EDU tenants by Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5903">Consultare [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711) per altre informazioni su questo criterio o se si verificano gli scenari seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5903">Please refer to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711) to learn more about this policy or if the following scenarios apply to you:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5904">Si dispone di un tenant EDU, ma il criterio non funziona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5904">You have an EDU tenant, but the policy doesn't work.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5905">Il tuo IP è stato inserito nella lista dei permessi per avere un'esperienza di ricerca senza pubblicità.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5905">You had your IP allowlisted for having an ad free search experience.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5906">Si è verificata un'esperienza di ricerca senza pubblicità nella Versione legacy di Microsoft Edge e si desidera eseguire l'aggiornamento alla nuova versione di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5906">You were experiencing an ad-free search experience on Microsoft Edge Legacy and want to upgrade to the new version of Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5907">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5907">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5908">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5908">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5909">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5909">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5910">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5910">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5911">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5911">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5912">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5912">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5913">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5913">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5914">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5914">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5915">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5915">GP unique name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5916">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Blocca tutti gli annunci sui risultati della ricerca di Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5916">GP name: Block all ads on Bing search results</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5917">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5917">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5918">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5918">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5919">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5919">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5920">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5920">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5921">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5921">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5922">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5922">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5923">Nome valore: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5923">Value Name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5924">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5924">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5925">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5925">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5926">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5926">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5927">Nome chiave di preferenza: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5927">Preference Key Name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5928">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5928">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="blockthirdpartycookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5930">BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5930">BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-third-party-cookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5931">Blocca i cookie di terze parti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5931">Block third party cookies</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5932">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5932">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5933">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5933">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5934">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5934">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5935">Impedisce agli elementi di una pagina Web che non fanno parte del dominio che si trova nella barra degli indirizzi di impostare i cookie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5935">Block web page elements that aren't from the domain that's in the address bar from setting cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5936">Se si abilita questo criterio, gli elementi della pagina Web che non fanno parte del dominio che si trova nella barra degli indirizzi non possono impostare cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5936">If you enable this policy, web page elements that are not from the domain that is in the address bar can't set cookies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5937">Se si disabilita questo criterio, gli elementi della pagina Web di un dominio diverso da quello nella barra degli indirizzi possono impostare cookie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5937">If you disable this policy, web page elements from domains other than in the address bar can set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5938">Se non si configura questo criterio, i cookie di terze parti sono abilitati, ma gli utenti possono modificare questa impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5938">If you don't configure this policy, third-party cookies are enabled but users can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5939">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5939">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5940">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5940">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5941">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5941">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5942">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5942">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5943">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5943">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5944">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5944">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5945">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5945">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5946">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5946">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5947">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5947">GP unique name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5948">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Blocca i cookie di terze parti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5948">GP name: Block third party cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5949">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5949">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5950">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5950">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5951">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5951">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5952">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5952">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5953">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5953">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5954">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5954">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5955">Nome valore: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5955">Value Name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5956">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5956">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5957">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5957">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5958">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5958">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5959">Nome chiave di preferenza: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5959">Preference Key Name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5960">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5960">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="browseraddprofileenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5962">BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5962">BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-profile-creation-from-the-identity-flyout-menu-or-the-settings-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5963">Abilita la creazione del profilo dal menu a comparsa Identità o dalla pagina Impostazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5963">Enable profile creation from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5964">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5964">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5965">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5965">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5966">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5966">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5967">Consente agli utenti di creare nuovi profili, usando l'opzione **Aggiungi profilo**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5967">Allows users to create new profiles, using the **Add profile** option.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5968">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge consente agli utenti di usare **Aggiungi profilo** nel menu a comparsa Identità o nella pagina Impostazioni per creare nuovi profili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5968">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge allows users to use **Add profile** on the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page to create new profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-5969">Se si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti non potranno aggiungere nuovi profili dal menu a comparsa Identità o dalla pagina Impostazioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5969">If you disable this policy, users cannot add new profiles from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5970">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5970">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5971">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5971">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5972">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5972">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5973">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5973">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5974">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5974">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5975">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5975">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5976">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5976">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5977">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5977">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5978">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5978">GP unique name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5979">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita la creazione del profilo dal menu a comparsa Identità o dalla pagina Impostazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5979">GP name: Enable profile creation from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5980">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5980">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5981">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5981">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5982">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5982">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5983">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5983">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5984">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5984">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5985">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5985">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5986">Nome valore: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5986">Value Name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5987">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5987">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5988">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5988">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5989">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5989">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5990">Nome chiave di preferenza: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5990">Preference Key Name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5991">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5991">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="browserguestmodeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5993">BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5993">BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-guest-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5994">Abilita la modalità Guest</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5994">Enable guest mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5995">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5995">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5996">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5996">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-5997">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5997">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5998">Abilita l'opzione per consentire l'utilizzo di profili guest in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5998">Enable the option to allow the use of guest profiles in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-5999">In un profilo guest, il browser non importa i dati di esplorazione da profili esistenti ed elimina i dati di esplorazione quando tutti i profili guest sono chiusi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-5999">In a guest profile, the browser doesn't import browsing data from existing profiles, and it deletes browsing data when all guest profiles are closed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6000">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge consente agli utenti di esplorare nei profili guest.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6000">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge lets users browse in guest profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6001">Se si disabilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge non consente agli utenti di esplorare nei profili guest.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6001">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge doesn't let users browse in guest profiles.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6002">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6002">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6003">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6003">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6004">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6004">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6005">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6005">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6006">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6006">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6007">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6007">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6008">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6008">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6009">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6009">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6010">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6010">GP unique name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6011">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita la modalità Guest</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6011">GP name: Enable guest mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6012">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6012">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6013">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6013">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6014">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6014">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6015">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6015">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6016">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6016">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6017">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6017">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6018">Nome valore: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6018">Value Name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6019">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6019">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6020">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6020">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6021">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6021">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6022">Nome chiave di preferenza: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6022">Preference Key Name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6023">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6023">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="browsernetworktimequeriesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6025">BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6025">BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-queries-to-a-browser-network-time-service"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6026">Consente le query a un servizio Browser Network Time</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6026">Allow queries to a Browser Network Time service</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6027">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6027">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6028">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6028">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6029">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6029">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6030">Impedisce a Microsoft Edge di inviare occasionalmente query a un servizio Browser Network Time per recuperare un timestamp preciso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6030">Prevents Microsoft Edge from occasionally sending queries to a browser network time service to retrieve an accurate timestamp.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6031">Se si disabilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge interromperà l'invio di query a un servizio Browser Network Time.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6031">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will stop sending queries to a browser network time service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6032">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge invierà occasionalmente query a un servizio Browser Network Time.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6032">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will occasionally send queries to a browser network time service.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6033">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6033">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6034">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6034">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6035">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6035">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6036">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6036">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6037">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6037">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6038">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6038">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6039">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6039">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6040">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6040">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6041">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6041">GP unique name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6042">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente le query a un servizio Browser Network Time</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6042">GP name: Allow queries to a Browser Network Time service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6043">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6043">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6044">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6044">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6045">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6045">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6046">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6046">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6047">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6047">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6048">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6048">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6049">Nome valore: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6049">Value Name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6050">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6050">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6051">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6051">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6052">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6052">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6053">Nome chiave di preferenza: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6053">Preference Key Name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6054">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6054">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6055">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6055">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="browsersignin"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6056">BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6056">BrowserSignin</span></span>

  #### <a name="browser-sign-in-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6057">Impostazioni di accesso al browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6057">Browser sign-in settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6058">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6058">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6059">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6059">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6060">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6060">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6061">Specifica se un utente può accedere a Microsoft Edge con il proprio account e usare i servizi correlati all'account come la sincronizzazione e Single Sign-On.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6061">Specify whether a user can sign into Microsoft Edge with their account and use account-related services like sync and single sign on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6062">Per controllare la disponibilità della sincronizzazione, usare invece il criterio [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6062">To control the availability of sync, use the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6063">Se si imposta questo criterio su "Disabilita", assicurarsi di disabilitare anche il criterio [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) poiché [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) disabilita la creazione di un profilo di accesso automatico al browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6063">If you set this policy to 'Disable', make sure that you also set the [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) policy to disabled because [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) disables the creation of an automatically signed in browser profile.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6064">Se entrambi i criteri sono impostati, Microsoft Edge userà il criterio "Disabilita l'accesso al browser" e si comporterà come se [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) fosse disabilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6064">If both policies are set, Microsoft Edge will use the 'Disable browser sign-in' policy and behave as if [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) is set to disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6065">Se si imposta questo criterio su "Abilita", gli utenti possono accedere al browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6065">If you set this policy to 'Enable', users can sign into the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6066">L'accesso al browser non implica che la sincronizzazione sia attivata per impostazione predefinita; per usare questa funzionalità, l'utente deve acconsentire esplicitamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6066">Signing into the browser doesn't mean that sync is turned on by default; the user must separately opt-in to use this feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6067">Se si imposta questo criterio su "Forza", gli utenti devono accedere a un profilo per usare il browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6067">If you set this policy to 'Force', users must sign into a profile to use the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6068">Per impostazione predefinita, questo consentirà all'utente di scegliere se sincronizzare il proprio account, a meno che la sincronizzazione non sia disabilitata dall'amministratore di dominio o con il criterio [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6068">By default, this will allow the user to choose whether they want to sync to their account, unless sync is disabled by the domain admin or with the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6069">Il valore predefinito del criterio [BrowserGuestModeEnabled](#browserguestmodeenabled) è impostato su false.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6069">The default value of [BrowserGuestModeEnabled](#browserguestmodeenabled) policy is set to false.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6070">Se non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono decidere se abilitare l'opzione di accesso al browser e usarla secondo necessità.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6070">If you don't configure this policy users can decide if they want to enable the browser sign-in option and use it as they see fit.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6071">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6071">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6072">Disabilita (0) = Disabilita l'accesso al browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6072">Disable (0) = Disable browser sign-in</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6073">Abilita (1) = Abilita l'accesso al browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6073">Enable (1) = Enable browser sign-in</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6074">Forza (2) = Forza gli utenti ad accedere per usare il browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6074">Force (2) = Force users to sign-in to use the browser</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6075">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6075">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6076">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6076">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6077">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6077">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6078">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6078">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6079">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6079">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6080">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6080">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6081">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6081">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6082">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6082">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6083">Informazioni sui Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6083">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6084">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6084">GP unique name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6085">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Impostazioni di accesso al browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6085">GP name: Browser sign-in settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6086">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6086">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6087">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6087">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6088">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6088">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6089">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6089">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6090">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6090">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6091">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6091">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6092">Nome valore: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6092">Value Name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6093">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6093">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6094">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6094">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6095">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6095">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6096">Nome chiave di preferenza: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6096">Preference Key Name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6097">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6097">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
