  ### <a name="browsingdatalifetime"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6099">BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6099">BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>

  #### <a name="browsing-data-lifetime-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6100">Impostazioni vita utile dati di esplorazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6100">Browsing Data Lifetime Settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6101">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6101">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6102">In Windows e macOS da 89 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6102">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6103">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6103">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6104">Configura le impostazioni della vita utile dei dati di esplorazione per Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6104">Configures browsing data lifetime settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6105">Questo criterio Controlla la vita utile dei dati di esplorazione selezionati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6105">This policy controls the lifetime of selected browsing data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6106">Questo criterio non ha alcun effetto se la sincronizzazione è abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6106">This policy has no effect if Sync is enabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6107">I tipi di dati disponibili sono "browsing_history", "download_history", "cookies_and_other_site_data", "cached_images_and_files", "password_signin", "riempimento automatico", "site_settings" e "hosted_app_data".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6107">The available data types are the 'browsing_history', 'download_history', 'cookies_and_other_site_data', 'cached_images_and_files', 'password_signin', 'autofill', 'site_settings' and 'hosted_app_data'.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6108">Microsoft Edge rimuoverà periodicamente i dati dei tipi selezionati meno recenti di "time_to_live_in_hours".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6108">Microsoft Edge will regularly remove data of selected types that is older than 'time_to_live_in_hours'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6109">Dato che l'eliminazione dei dati avviene solo a determinati intervalli, alcuni dati potrebbero essere mantenuti leggermente più a lungo, ma mai più del doppio del tempo "time_to_live_in_hours" previsto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6109">Because data deletion only happens at certain intervals, some data might be kept slightly longer but never more than twice its expected 'time_to_live_in_hours'.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6110">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6110">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6111">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6111">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6112">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6112">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6113">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6113">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6114">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6114">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6115">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6115">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6116">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6116">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6117">Informazioni sui Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6117">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6118">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6118">GP unique name: BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6119">Nome Criteri di gruppo: impostazioni della vita utile dei dati di esplorazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6119">GP name: Browsing Data Lifetime Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6120">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6120">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6121">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6121">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6122">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6122">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6123">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6123">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6124">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6124">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6125">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6125">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6126">Nome valore: BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6126">Value Name: BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6127">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6127">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6128">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6128">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\BrowsingDataLifetime = [
  {
    "data_types": [
      "browsing_history"
    ], 
    "time_to_live_in_hours": 24
  }, 
  {
    "data_types": [
      "password_signin", 
      "autofill"
    ], 
    "time_to_live_in_hours": 12
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6129">Valore di esempio compatto:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6129">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\BrowsingDataLifetime = [{"data_types": ["browsing_history"], "time_to_live_in_hours": 24}, {"data_types": ["password_signin", "autofill"], "time_to_live_in_hours": 12}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6130">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6130">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6131">Nome chiave di preferenza: BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6131">Preference Key Name: BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6132">Valore di esempio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6132">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>BrowsingDataLifetime</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>data_types</key>
    <array>
      <string>browsing_history</string>
    </array>
    <key>time_to_live_in_hours</key>
    <integer>24</integer>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>data_types</key>
    <array>
      <string>password_signin</string>
      <string>autofill</string>
    </array>
    <key>time_to_live_in_hours</key>
    <integer>12</integer>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="builtindnsclientenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6134">BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6134">BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="use-built-in-dns-client"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6135">Usa il client DNS predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6135">Use built-in DNS client</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6136">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6136">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6137">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6137">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6138">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6138">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6139">Controlla se usare il client DNS predefinito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6139">Controls whether to use the built-in DNS client.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6140">Questo criterio Controlla lo stack software usato per comunicare con il server DNS: il client DNS del sistema operativo o il client DNS integrato in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6140">This policy controls which software stack is used to communicate with the DNS server: the operating system DNS client, or Microsoft Edge's built-in DNS client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6141">Questo criterio non interessa i server DNS usati: ad esempio, se il sistema operativo è configurato per l'uso di un server DNS aziendale, lo stesso server verrebbe usato dal client DNS integrato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6141">This policy does not affect which DNS servers are used: if, for example, the operating system is configured to use an enterprise DNS server, that same server would be used by the built-in DNS client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6142">Inoltre, non controlla se viene usato DNS-over-HTTPS; Microsoft Edge usa sempre il resolver predefinito per le richieste DNS-over-HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6142">It also does not control if DNS-over-HTTPS is used; Microsoft Edge always uses the built-in resolver for DNS-over-HTTPS requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6143">Vedere il criterio [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) per informazioni sul controllo di DNS-over-HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6143">Please see the [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) policy for information on controlling DNS-over-HTTPS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6144">Se si abilita questo criterio, viene usato il client DNS predefinito, se disponibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6144">If you enable this policy, the built-in DNS client is used, if it's available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6145">Se si disabilita questo criterio, il client DNS incorporato viene usato solo quando è in uso DNS-over-HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6145">If you disable this policy, the built-in DNS client is only used when DNS-over-HTTPS is in use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6146">Se non si configura questo criterio, il client DNS predefinito è abilitato per impostazione predefinita in macOS e Android (quando non sono abilitati né DNS privati né VPN).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6146">If you don't configure this policy, the built-in DNS client is enabled by default on macOS and Android (when neither Private DNS nor VPN are enabled).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6147">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6147">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6148">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6148">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6149">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6149">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6150">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6150">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6151">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6151">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6152">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6152">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6153">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6153">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6154">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6154">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6155">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6155">GP unique name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6156">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Usa il client DNS predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6156">GP name: Use built-in DNS client</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6157">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6157">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6158">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6158">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6159">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6159">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6160">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6160">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6161">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6161">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6162">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6162">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6163">Nome valore: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6163">Value Name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6164">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6164">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6165">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6165">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6166">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6166">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6167">Nome chiave di preferenza: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6167">Preference Key Name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6168">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6168">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="builtincertificateverifierenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6170">BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6170">BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="determines-whether-the-built-in-certificate-verifier-will-be-used-to-verify-server-certificates-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6171">Determina se lo strumento di verifica del certificato predefinito verrà usato per la verifica dei certificati server (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6171">Determines whether the built-in certificate verifier will be used to verify server certificates (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6172">DEPRECATO: questo criterio è deprecato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6172">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6173">È attualmente supportato, ma diventerà obsoleto in una versione futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6173">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6174">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6174">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6175">In macOS dalla versione 83 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6175">On macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6176">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6176">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6177">Questo criterio è deprecato perché serve solo come meccanismo a breve termine per offrire alle aziende più tempo per aggiornare i propri ambienti e segnalare problemi se risultano incompatibili con lo strumento di verifica predefinito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6177">This policy is deprecated because it's intended to serve only as a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their environments and report issues if they are found to be incompatible with the built-in certificate verifier.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6178">Non funzionerà in Microsoft Edge versione 92, quando è prevista la rimozione del supporto per la verifica dei certificati legacy in Mac OS X.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6178">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 92, when support for the legacy certificate verifier on Mac OS X is planned to be removed.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6179">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6179">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6180">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6180">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6181">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6181">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6182">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6182">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6183">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6183">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6184">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6184">Boolean</span></span>

  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6185">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6185">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6186">Nome chiave di preferenza: BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6186">Preference Key Name: BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6187">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6187">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="certificatetransparencyenforcementdisabledforcas"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6189">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6189">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-certificate-transparency-enforcement-for-a-list-of-subjectpublickeyinfo-hashes"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6190">Disabilita l'applicazione della trasparenza dei certificati per un elenco di hash subjectPublicKeyInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6190">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6191">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6191">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6192">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6192">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6193">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6193">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6194">Disabilita l'applicazione dei requisiti di trasparenza dei certificati per un elenco di hash subjectPublicKeyInfo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6194">Disables enforcement of Certificate Transparency requirements for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6195">Questo criterio consente di disabilitare i requisiti di divulgazione della trasparenza dei certificati per le catene di certificati che contengono certificati con uno degli hash subjectPublicKeyInfo specificati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6195">This policy lets you disable Certificate Transparency disclosure requirements for certificate chains that contain certificates with one of the specified subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6196">In questo modo, è possibile continuare a usare per gli host aziendali i certificati che altrimenti potrebbero non essere considerati attendibili perché non divulgati in modo adeguato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6196">This allows certificates that would otherwise be untrusted because they were not properly publicly disclosed to still be used for Enterprise hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6197">Per disabilitare l'applicazione della trasparenza dei certificati quando è impostato questo criterio, è necessario soddisfare uno dei seguenti set di condizioni:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6197">To disable Certificate Transparency enforcement when this policy is set, one of the following sets of conditions must be met:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6198">L'hash è di un subjectPublicKeyInfo del certificato del server.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6198">The hash is of the server certificate's subjectPublicKeyInfo.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6199">L'hash è di un subjectPublicKeyInfo che compare in un certificato di firma nella catena di certificati, tale certificato di firma è vincolato tramite l'estensione X.509v3 nameConstraints, uno o più directoryName nameConstraints sono presenti in permittedSubtrees e directoryName contiene un attributo organizationName.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6199">The hash is of a subjectPublicKeyInfo that appears in a CA certificate in the certificate chain, that CA certificate is constrained via the X.509v3 nameConstraints extension, one or more directoryName nameConstraints are present in the permittedSubtrees, and the directoryName contains an organizationName attribute.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6200">L'hash è di un subjectPublicKeyInfo che compare in un certificato di firma nella catena di certificati, il certificato di firma ha uno o più attributi organizationName nell'oggetto del certificato e il certificato del server contiene lo stesso numero di attributi organizationName, nello stesso ordine e con valori identici byte per byte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6200">The hash is of a subjectPublicKeyInfo that appears in a CA certificate in the certificate chain, the CA certificate has one or more organizationName attributes in the certificate Subject, and the server's certificate contains the same number of organizationName attributes, in the same order, and with byte-for-byte identical values.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6201">Un hash subjectPublicKeyInfo viene specificato concatenando il nome dell'algoritmo hash, il carattere "/" e la codifica Base64 di tale algoritmo hash applicata al subjectPublicKeyInfo con codifica DER del certificato specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6201">A subjectPublicKeyInfo hash is specified by concatenating the hash algorithm name, the "/" character, and the Base64 encoding of that hash algorithm applied to the DER-encoded subjectPublicKeyInfo of the specified certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6202">La codifica Base64 è nello stesso formato di un SPKI Fingerprint, come definito in RFC 7469, Sezione 2.4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6202">This Base64 encoding is the same format as an SPKI Fingerprint, as defined in RFC 7469, Section 2.4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6203">Gli algoritmi hash non riconosciuti vengono ignorati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6203">Unrecognized hash algorithms are ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6204">L'unico algoritmo hash supportato al momento è "sha256".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6204">The only supported hash algorithm at this time is "sha256".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6205">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, i certificati che devono essere divulgati con la trasparenza dei certificati verranno considerati non attendibili se la loro divulgazione non è conforme al criterio di trasparenza dei certificati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6205">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, any certificate that's required to be disclosed via Certificate Transparency will be treated as untrusted if it's not disclosed according to the Certificate Transparency policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6206">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6206">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6207">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6207">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6208">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6208">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6209">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6209">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6210">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6210">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6211">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6211">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6212">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6212">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6213">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6213">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6214">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6214">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6215">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Disabilita l'applicazione della trasparenza dei certificati per un elenco di hash subjectPublicKeyInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6215">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6216">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6216">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6217">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6217">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6218">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6218">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6219">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6219">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6220">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6220">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6221">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6221">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6222">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6222">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6223">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6223">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6224">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6224">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas\1 = "sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas\2 = "sha256//////////////////////w=="

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6225">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6225">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6226">Nome chiave di preferenza: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6226">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6227">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6227">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==</string>
  <string>sha256//////////////////////w==</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="certificatetransparencyenforcementdisabledforlegacycas"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6229">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6229">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-certificate-transparency-enforcement-for-a-list-of-legacy-certificate-authorities"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6230">Disabilita l'applicazione della trasparenza dei certificati per un elenco di autorità di certificazione legacy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6230">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of legacy certificate authorities</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6231">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6231">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6232">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6232">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6233">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6233">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6234">Disabilita l'applicazione dei requisiti di trasparenza dei certificati per un elenco di autorità di certificazione legacy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6234">Disables enforcing Certificate Transparency requirements for a list of legacy certificate authorities (Cas).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6235">Questo criterio consente di disabilitare i requisiti di divulgazione della trasparenza dei certificati per le catene di certificati che contengono certificati con uno degli hash subjectPublicKeyInfo specificati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6235">This policy lets you disable Certificate Transparency disclosure requirements for certificate chains that contain certificates with one of the specified subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6236">In questo modo, è possibile continuare a usare per gli host aziendali i certificati che altrimenti potrebbero non essere considerati attendibili perché non divulgati in modo adeguato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6236">This allows certificates that would otherwise be untrusted because they were not properly publicly disclosed, continue to be used for enterprise hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6237">Per disabilitare l'applicazione della trasparenza dei certificati, è necessario impostare l'hash su un subjectPublicKeyInfo che compare in un certificato di firma riconosciuto come autorità di certificazione legacy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6237">In order for Certificate Transparency enforcement to be disabled, you must set the hash to a subjectPublicKeyInfo appearing in a CA certificate that is recognized as a legacy certificate authority (CA).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6238">Un'autorità di certificazione legacy è un'autorità di certificazione considerata pubblicamente attendibile per impostazione predefinita da uno o più sistemi operativi supportati da Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6238">A legacy CA is a CA that has been publicly trusted by default by one or more operating systems supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6239">Un hash subjectPublicKeyInfo viene specificato concatenando il nome dell'algoritmo hash, il carattere "/" e la codifica Base64 di tale algoritmo hash applicata al subjectPublicKeyInfo con codifica DER del certificato specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6239">You specify a subjectPublicKeyInfo hash by concatenating the hash algorithm name, the "/" character, and the Base64 encoding of that hash algorithm applied to the DER-encoded subjectPublicKeyInfo of the specified certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6240">La codifica Base64 è nello stesso formato di un SPKI Fingerprint, come definito in RFC 7469, Sezione 2.4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6240">This Base64 encoding is the same format as an SPKI Fingerprint, as defined in RFC 7469, Section 2.4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6241">Gli algoritmi hash non riconosciuti vengono ignorati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6241">Unrecognized hash algorithms are ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6242">L'unico algoritmo hash supportato al momento è "sha256".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6242">The only supported hash algorithm at this time is "sha256".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6243">Se non si configura questo criterio, i certificati che devono essere divulgati con la trasparenza dei certificati verranno considerati non attendibili se la loro divulgazione non è conforme al criterio di trasparenza dei certificati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6243">If you don't configure this policy, any certificate that's required to be disclosed via Certificate Transparency will be treated as untrusted if it isn't disclosed according to the Certificate Transparency policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6244">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6244">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6245">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6245">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6246">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6246">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6247">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6247">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6248">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6248">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6249">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6249">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6250">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6250">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6251">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6251">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6252">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6252">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6253">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Disabilita l'applicazione della trasparenza dei certificati per un elenco di autorità di certificazione legacy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6253">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of legacy certificate authorities</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6254">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6254">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6255">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6255">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6256">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6256">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6257">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6257">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6258">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6258">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6259">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6259">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6260">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6260">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6261">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6261">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6262">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6262">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas\1 = "sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas\2 = "sha256//////////////////////w=="

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6263">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6263">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6264">Nome chiave di preferenza: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6264">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6265">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6265">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==</string>
  <string>sha256//////////////////////w==</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="certificatetransparencyenforcementdisabledforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6267">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6267">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-certificate-transparency-enforcement-for-specific-urls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6268">Disabilita l'applicazione della trasparenza dei certificati per URL specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6268">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for specific URLs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6269">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6269">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6270">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6270">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6271">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6271">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6272">Disabilita l'applicazione dei requisiti di trasparenza dei certificati per gli URL elencati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6272">Disables enforcing Certificate Transparency requirements for the listed URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6273">Questo criterio consente di non divulgare i certificati per i nomi host negli URL specificati tramite la trasparenza dei certificati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6273">This policy lets you not disclose certificates for the hostnames in the specified URLs via Certificate Transparency.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6274">In questo modo, è possibile usare i certificati che altrimenti verrebbero considerati non attendibili, perché non sono stati divulgati in modo adeguato, ma è più difficile rilevare i certificati emessi in modo errato per tali host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6274">This lets you use certificates that would otherwise be untrusted, because they weren't properly publicly disclosed, but it makes it harder to detect mis-issued certificates for those hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6275">Creare il modello URL in base a [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6275">Form your URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6276">Poiché i certificati sono validi per un determinato nome host, indipendentemente dallo schema, dalla porta o dal percorso, solo la parte del nome host dell'URL viene considerata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6276">Because certificates are valid for a given hostname, independent of the scheme, port, or path, only the hostname part of the URL is considered.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6277">Gli host con caratteri jolly non sono supportati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6277">Wildcard hosts are not supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6278">Se non si configura questo criterio, i certificati che dovrebbero essere divulgati con la trasparenza dei certificati vengono considerati non attendibili se non vengono divulgati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6278">If you don't configure this policy, any certificate that should be disclosed via Certificate Transparency is treated as untrusted if it's not disclosed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6279">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6279">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6280">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6280">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6281">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6281">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6282">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6282">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6283">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6283">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6284">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6284">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6285">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6285">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6286">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6286">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6287">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6287">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6288">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Disabilita l'applicazione della trasparenza dei certificati per URL specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6288">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for specific URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6289">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6289">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6290">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6290">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6291">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6291">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6292">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6292">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6293">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6293">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6294">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6294">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6295">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6295">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6296">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6296">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6297">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6297">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls\2 = ".contoso.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6298">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6298">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6299">Nome chiave di preferenza: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6299">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6300">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6300">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="clearbrowsingdataonexit"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6302">ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6302">ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>

  #### <a name="clear-browsing-data-when-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6303">Cancella i dati di esplorazione alla chiusura di Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6303">Clear browsing data when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6304">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6304">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6305">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 78 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6305">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6306">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6306">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6307">Microsoft Edge non cancella i dati di esplorazione per impostazione predefinita quando viene chiuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6307">Microsoft Edge doesn't clear the browsing data by default when it closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6308">I dati di esplorazione includono le informazioni inserite nei moduli, le password e persino i siti Web visitati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6308">Browsing data includes information entered in forms, passwords, and even the websites visited.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6309">Se si abilita questo criterio, tutti i dati di esplorazione vengono eliminati ogni volta che Microsoft Edge viene chiuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6309">If you enable this policy, all browsing data is deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6310">Tenere presente che, se si abilita questo criterio, ha la precedenza rispetto a come è stato configurato [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6310">Note that if you enable this policy, it takes precedence over how you configured [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6311">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono configurare l'opzione Cancella dati delle esplorazioni in Impostazioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6311">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can configure the Clear browsing data option in Settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6312">Se si abilita questo criterio, non configurare il criterio [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) o [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) perché gestiscono tutti l'eliminazione dei dati di esplorazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6312">If you enable this policy, don't configure the [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) or the [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) policy, because they all deal with deleting browsing data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6313">Se si configurano i criteri precedenti e questo criterio, tutti i dati di esplorazione vengono eliminati quando Microsoft Edge viene chiuso, indipendentemente da come è stato configurato [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) o [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6313">If you configure the preceding policies and this policy, all browsing data is deleted when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how you configured [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) or [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6314">Per non cancellare i cookie all'uscita, configura i criteri [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6314">To exclude cookies from being deleted on exit, configure the [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6315">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6315">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6316">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6316">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6317">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6317">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6318">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6318">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6319">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6319">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6320">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6320">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6321">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6321">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6322">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6322">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6323">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6323">GP unique name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6324">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Cancella i dati di esplorazione alla chiusura di Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6324">GP name: Clear browsing data when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6325">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6325">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6326">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6326">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6327">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6327">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6328">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6328">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6329">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6329">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6330">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6330">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6331">Nome valore: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6331">Value Name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6332">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6332">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6333">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6333">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6334">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6334">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6335">Nome chiave di preferenza: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6335">Preference Key Name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6336">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6336">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6338">ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6338">ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>

  #### <a name="clear-cached-images-and-files-when-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6339">Cancella le immagini e i file memorizzati nella cache alla chiusura di Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6339">Clear cached images and files when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6340">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6340">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6341">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 83 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6341">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6342">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6342">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6343">Microsoft Edge non cancella i file e le immagini memorizzati nella cache per impostazione predefinita quando viene chiuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6343">Microsoft Edge doesn't clear cached images and files by default when it closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6344">Se si abilita questo criterio, i file e le immagini memorizzati nella cache vengono eliminati ogni volta che Microsoft Edge viene chiuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6344">If you enable this policy, cached images and files will be deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6345">Se si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti non possono configurare l'opzione dei file e delle immagini memorizzati nella cache in edge://settings/clearBrowsingDataOnClose.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6345">If you disable this policy, users cannot configure the cached images and files option in edge://settings/clearBrowsingDataOnClose.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6346">Se non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono scegliere se cancellare i file e le immagini memorizzati nella cache all'uscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6346">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose whether cached images and files are cleared on exit.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6347">Se si disabilita questo criterio, non abilitare il criterio [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) poiché entrambi sono associati all'eliminazione dei dati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6347">If you disable this policy, don't enable the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy, because they both deal with deleting data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6348">Se si configurano entrambi, il criterio [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) ha la precedenza ed elimina tutti i dati quando si chiude Microsoft Edge, indipendentemente da come è configurato [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6348">If you configure both, the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy takes precedence and deletes all data when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how you configured [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6349">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6349">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6350">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6350">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6351">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6351">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6352">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6352">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6353">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6353">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6354">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6354">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6355">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6355">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6356">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6356">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6357">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6357">GP unique name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6358">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Cancella le immagini e i file memorizzati nella cache alla chiusura di Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6358">GP name: Clear cached images and files when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6359">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6359">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6360">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6360">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6361">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6361">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6362">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6362">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6363">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6363">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6364">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6364">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6365">Nome valore: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6365">Value Name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6366">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6366">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6367">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6367">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6368">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6368">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6369">Nome chiave di preferenza: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6369">Preference Key Name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6370">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6370">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="clickonceenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6372">ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6372">ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-open-files-using-the-clickonce-protocol"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6373">Consente agli utenti di aprire i file con il protocollo ClickOnce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6373">Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6374">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6374">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6375">In Windows dalla versione 78 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6375">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6376">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6376">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6377">Consente agli utenti di aprire i file con il protocollo ClickOnce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6377">Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6378">Il protocollo ClickOnce consente ai siti Web di richiedere che il browser apra i file da un URL specifico usando il gestore di file ClickOnce nel dispositivo o nel computer dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6378">The ClickOnce protocol allows websites to request that the browser open files from a specific URL using the ClickOnce file handler on the user's computer or device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6379">Se si abilita questo criterio, gli utenti possono aprire i file usando il protocollo ClickOnce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6379">If you enable this policy, users can open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6380">Questo criterio sostituisce l'impostazione ClickOnce dell'utente nella pagina edge://flags/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6380">This policy overrides the user's ClickOnce setting in the edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6381">Se si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti non possono aprire i file usando il protocollo ClickOnce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6381">If you disable this policy, users can't open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6382">Al contrario, il file verrà salvato nel file system tramite il browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6382">Instead, the file will be saved to the file system using the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6383">Questo criterio sostituisce l'impostazione ClickOnce dell'utente nella pagina edge://flags/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6383">This policy overrides the user's ClickOnce setting in the edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6384">Se non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti con versioni di Microsoft Edge precedenti a Microsoft Edge 87 non possono aprire i file usando il protocollo ClickOnce per impostazione predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6384">If you don't configure this policy, users with Microsoft Edge versions before Microsoft Edge 87 can't open files using the ClickOnce protocol by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6385">Tuttavia, essi hanno la possibilità di abilitare l'uso del protocollo ClickOnce con la pagina edge://flags/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6385">However, they have the option to enable the use of the ClickOnce protocol with the edge://flags/ page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6386">Gli utenti con versioni di Microsoft Edge dalla 87 e successive possono aprire i file usando il protocollo ClickOnce, ma hanno la possibilità di disabilitare il protocollo ClickOnce con la pagina edge://flags/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6386">Users with Microsoft Edge versions 87 and later can open files using the ClickOnce protocol by default but have the option to disable the ClickOnce protocol with edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6387">La disabilitazione di ClickOnce potrebbe impedire l'avvio corretto delle applicazioni ClickOnce (file con estensione .application).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6387">Disabling ClickOnce may prevent ClickOnce applications (.application files) from launching properly.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6388">Per altre informazioni su ClickOnce, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) e [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6388">For more information about ClickOnce, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) and [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6389">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6389">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6390">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6390">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6391">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6391">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6392">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6392">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6393">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6393">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6394">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6394">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6395">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6395">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6396">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6396">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6397">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6397">GP unique name: ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6398">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente agli utenti di aprire i file con il protocollo ClickOnce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6398">GP name: Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6399">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6399">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6400">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6400">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6401">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6401">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6402">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6402">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6403">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6403">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6404">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6404">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6405">Nome valore: ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6405">Value Name: ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6406">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6406">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6407">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6407">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```
