  ### <a name="collectionsservicesandexportsblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6409">CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6409">CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-access-to-a-specified-list-of-services-and-export-targets-in-collections"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6410">Blocca l'accesso a un elenco specificato di servizi e di destinazioni di esportazione in Raccolte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6410">Block access to a specified list of services and export targets in Collections</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6411">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6411">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6412">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6412">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6413">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6413">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6414">Elenca servizi specifici e destinazioni di esportazione a cui gli utenti non possono accedere nella funzionalità Raccolte in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6414">List specific services and export targets that users can't access in the Collections feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6415">Include anche la visualizzazione di dati aggiuntivi da Bing e l’esportazione di raccolte verso prodotti Microsoft o partner esterni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6415">This includes displaying additional data from Bing and exporting collections to Microsoft products or external partners.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6416">Se si abilita questo criterio, i servizi e le destinazioni di esportazione corrispondenti all'elenco specificato vengono bloccati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6416">If you enable this policy, services and export targets that match the given list are blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6417">Se non si configura questo criterio, non vengono applicate restrizioni ai servizi e destinazioni di esportazione accettabili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6417">If you don't configure this policy, no restrictions on the acceptable services and export targets are enforced.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6418">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6418">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6419">pinterest_suggestions (pinterest_suggestions) = Suggerimenti di Pinterest</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6419">pinterest_suggestions (pinterest_suggestions) = Pinterest suggestions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6420">collections_share (collections_share) = condivisione di raccolte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6420">collections_share (collections_share) = Sharing of Collections</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6421">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6421">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6422">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6422">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6423">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6423">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6424">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6424">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6425">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6425">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6426">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6426">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6427">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6427">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6428">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6428">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6429">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6429">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6430">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6430">GP unique name: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6431">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Blocca l'accesso a un elenco specificato di servizi e destinazioni di esportazione in Raccolte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6431">GP name: Block access to a specified list of services and export targets in Collections</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6432">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6432">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6433">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6433">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6434">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6434">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6435">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6435">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6436">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6436">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6437">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6437">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6438">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6438">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6439">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6439">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6440">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6440">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList\1 = "pinterest_suggestions"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList\2 = "collections_share"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6441">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6441">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6442">Nome chiave di preferenza: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6442">Preference Key Name: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6443">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6443">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>pinterest_suggestions</string>
  <string>collections_share</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="commandlineflagsecuritywarningsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6445">CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6445">CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-security-warnings-for-command-line-flags"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6446">Abilita gli avvisi di sicurezza per i contrassegni della riga di comando</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6446">Enable security warnings for command-line flags</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6447">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6447">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6448">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 78 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6448">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6449">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6449">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6450">Se disabilitato, questo criterio impedisce la visualizzazione degli avvisi di sicurezza all'avvio di Microsoft Edge con contrassegni della riga di comando potenzialmente pericolosi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6450">If disabled, this policy prevents security warnings from appearing when Microsoft Edge is launched with potentially dangerous command-line flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6451">Se abilitato o non configurato, gli avvisi di sicurezza vengono visualizzati quando tali contrassegni della riga di comando vengono usati per avviare Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6451">If enabled or unset, security warnings are displayed when these command-line flags are used to launch Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6452">Ad esempio, il contrassegno --disable-gpu-sandbox genera un avviso che informa che è in uso un contrassegno della riga di comando non supportato: --disable-gpu-sandbox.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6452">For example, the --disable-gpu-sandbox flag generates this warning:  You're using an unsupported command-line flag: --disable-gpu-sandbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6453">Questo comporta rischi di stabilità e sicurezza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6453">This poses stability and security risks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6454">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6454">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6455">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6455">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6456">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6456">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6457">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6457">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6458">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6458">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6459">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6459">Data Type:</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6462">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6462">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6463">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6463">GP unique name: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6464">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita gli avvisi di sicurezza per i contrassegni della riga di comando</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6464">GP name: Enable security warnings for command-line flags</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6465">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6465">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6466">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6466">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6467">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6467">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6468">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6468">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6469">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6469">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6470">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6470">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6471">Nome valore: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6471">Value Name: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6472">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6472">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6473">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6473">Example value:</span></span>


  ### <a name="componentupdatesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6478">ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6478">ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-component-updates-in-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6479">Abilita gli aggiornamenti dei componenti in Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6479">Enable component updates in Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6480">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6480">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6481">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6481">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6482">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6482">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6483">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli aggiornamenti dei componenti sono abilitati in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6483">If you enable or don't configure this policy, component updates are enabled in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6484">Se si disabilita o si imposta su false questo criterio, gli aggiornamenti dei componenti sono disabilitati per tutti i componenti in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6484">If you disable this policy or set it to false, component updates are disabled for all components in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6485">Tuttavia, alcuni componenti sono esclusi da questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6485">However, some components are exempt from this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6486">Sono inclusi i componenti che non contengono codice eseguibile, che non alterano in modo significativo il comportamento del browser o che sono fondamentali per la sicurezza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6486">This includes any component that doesn't contain executable code, that doesn't significantly alter the behavior of the browser, or that's critical for security.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6487">In altri termini, gli aggiornamenti che sono considerati "critici per la sicurezza" vengono comunque applicati anche se si disabilita questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6487">That is, updates that are deemed "critical for security" are still applied even if you disable this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6488">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6488">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6489">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6489">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6490">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6490">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6491">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6491">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6492">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6492">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6493">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6493">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6494">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6494">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6495">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6495">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6496">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6496">GP unique name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6497">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita gli aggiornamenti dei componenti in Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6497">GP name: Enable component updates in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6498">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6498">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6499">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6499">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6500">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6500">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6501">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6501">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6502">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6502">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6503">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6503">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6504">Nome valore: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6504">Value Name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6505">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6505">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6506">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6506">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6507">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6507">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6508">Nome chiave di preferenza: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6508">Preference Key Name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6509">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6509">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="configuredonottrack"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6511">ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6511">ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-do-not-track"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6512">Configura Do Not Track</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6512">Configure Do Not Track</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6513">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6513">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6514">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6514">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6515">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6515">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6516">Specifica se inviare richieste Do Not Track ai siti Web che richiedono informazioni di monitoraggio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6516">Specify whether to send Do Not Track requests to websites that ask for tracking info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6517">Le richieste Do Not Track consentono ai siti Web visitati di sapere che l'utente non vuole tenere traccia dell'attività di esplorazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6517">Do Not Track requests let the websites you visit know that you don't want your browsing activity to be tracked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6518">Per impostazione predefinita, Microsoft Edge non invia richieste Do Not Track, ma gli utenti possono attivare questa funzionalità per inviarle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6518">By default, Microsoft Edge doesn't send Do Not Track requests, but users can turn on this feature to send them.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6519">Se si abilita questo criterio, vengono sempre inviate richieste Do Not Track ai siti Web che richiedono informazioni di monitoraggio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6519">If you enable this policy, Do Not Track requests are always sent to websites asking for tracking info.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6520">Se si disabilita questo criterio, le richieste non vengono mai inviate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6520">If you disable this policy, requests are never sent.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6521">Se non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono scegliere se inviare tali richieste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6521">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose whether to send these requests.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6522">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6522">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6523">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6523">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6524">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6524">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6525">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6525">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6526">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6526">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6527">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6527">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6528">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6528">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6529">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6529">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6530">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6530">GP unique name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6531">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura Do Not Track</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6531">GP name: Configure Do Not Track</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6532">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6532">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6533">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6533">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6534">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6534">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6535">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6535">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6536">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6536">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6537">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6537">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6538">Nome valore: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6538">Value Name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6539">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6539">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6540">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6540">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6541">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6541">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6542">Nome chiave di preferenza: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6542">Preference Key Name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6543">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6543">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="configurefriendlyurlformat"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6545">ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6545">ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-default-paste-format-of-urls-copied-from-microsoft-edge-and-determine-if-additional-formats-will-be-available-to-users"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6546">Configura il formato incolla predefinito degli URL copiati da Microsoft Edge e determina se saranno disponibili formati aggiuntivi per gli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6546">Configure the default paste format of URLs copied from Microsoft Edge, and determine if additional formats will be available to users</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6547">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6547">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6548">In Windows dalla versione 87 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6548">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6549">In macOS dalla versione 88 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6549">On macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6550">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6550">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6551">Se i Friendly URL sono abilitati, Microsoft Edge calcolerà altre rappresentazioni dell'URL e le inserirà negli Appunti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6551">If FriendlyURLs are enabled, Microsoft Edge will compute additional representations of the URL and place them on the clipboard.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6552">Questo criterio configura il formato che verrà incollato durante l'incollamento in applicazioni esterne o all'interno di Microsoft Edge senza la voce di menu di scelta rapida "Incolla come".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6552">This policy configures what format will be pasted when the user pastes in external applications, or inside Microsoft Edge without the 'Paste as' context menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6553">Se configurato, questo criterio fa una scelta per conto dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6553">If configured, this policy makes a choice on behalf of the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6554">Le opzioni di edge://settings/shareCopyPaste sono disattivate e le opzioni del menu di scelta rapida "Incolla come" non saranno disponibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6554">The options in edge://settings/shareCopyPaste will be grayed out, and the options in the 'Paste As' context menu will not be available.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6555">Se non è configurato, l'utente potrà scegliere il formato di incollamento preferito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6555">Not configured = The user will be able to choose their preferred paste format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6556">Per impostazione predefinita, questa opzione è impostata sul formato del friendly URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6556">By default, this is set to the friendly URL format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6557">Il menu "Incolla come" sarà disponibile in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6557">The 'Paste As' menu will be available in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6558">1 = Non verranno archiviati altri formati negli Appunti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6558">1 = No additional formats will be stored on the clipboard.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6559">La voce di menu di scelta rapida "Incolla come" non sarà disponibile in Microsoft Edge e l'unico formato disponibile per la funzione Incolla sarà il formato URL testo non crittografato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6559">There will be no 'Paste as' context menu item in Microsoft Edge and the only format available to paste will be the plain text URL format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6560">Effettivamente, la caratteristica friendly URL verrà disabilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6560">Effectively, the friendly URL feature will be disabled.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6561">3 = L'utente riceverà un friendly URL ogni volta che incolla nelle superfici che accettano testo RTF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6561">3 = The user will get a friendly URL whenever they paste into surfaces that accept rich text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6562">L'URL normale sarà ancora disponibile per le superfici non formattate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6562">The plain URL will still be available for non-rich surfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6563">Il menu "Incolla come" non sarà disponibile in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6563">There will be no 'Paste As' menu in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6564">4 = (Non in uso attualmente)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6564">4 = (Not currently used)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6565">I formati più avanzati potrebbero non essere ben supportati in alcune destinazioni e/o siti Web di incollamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6565">The richer formats may not be well-supported in some paste destinations and/or websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6566">Di conseguenza, se questo criterio deve essere configurato, è consigliabile usare l'opzione URL non crittografato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6566">As such, if this policy is to be configured, then the plain URL option is recommended.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6567">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6567">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6568">Testo non crittografato (1) = URL non crittografato senza informazioni aggiuntive, ad esempio il titolo della pagina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6568">PlainText (1) = The plain URL without any extra information, such as the page's title.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6569">Opzione consigliata per la configurazione di questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6569">This is the recommended option when this policy is configured.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6570">Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere le pagine seguenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6570">For more information, see the description.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6571">TitledHyperlink (3) = collegamento ipertestuale intitolato: collegamento ipertestuale che indica l'URL copiato, ma il cui testo visibile è il titolo della pagina di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6571">TitledHyperlink (3) = Titled Hyperlink: A hyperlink that points to the copied URL, but whose visible text is the title of the destination page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6572">Questo è il formato del friendly UR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6572">This is the Friendly URL format.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6573">Webpreview (4) = presto disponibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6573">WebPreview (4) = Coming soon.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6574">Se impostato, si comporterà come "URL non crittografato".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6574">If set, behaves the same as 'Plain URL'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6575">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6575">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6576">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6576">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6577">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6577">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6578">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6578">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6579">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6579">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6580">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6580">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6581">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6581">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6582">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6582">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6583">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6583">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6584">Nome univoco GP: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6584">GP unique name: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6585">Nome GP: Configura il formato incolla predefinito degli URL copiati da Microsoft Edge e determina se saranno disponibili formati aggiuntivi per gli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6585">GP name: Configure the default paste format of URLs copied from Microsoft Edge, and determine if additional formats will be available to users</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6586">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6586">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6587">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6587">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6588">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6588">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6589">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6589">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6590">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6590">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6591">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6591">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6592">Nome valore: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6592">Value Name: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6593">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6593">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6594">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6594">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000003
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6595">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6595">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6596">Nome chiave di preferenza: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6596">Preference Key Name: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6597">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6597">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>3</integer>
```

  ### <a name="configureonpremisesaccountautosignin"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6599">ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6599">ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-automatic-sign-in-with-an-active-directory-domain-account-when-there-is-no-azure-ad-domain-account"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6600">Configura l'accesso automatico con un account di dominio Active Directory quando non esiste un account di dominio Azure AD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6600">Configure automatic sign in with an Active Directory domain account when there is no Azure AD domain account</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6601">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6601">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6602">In Windows dalla versione 81 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6602">On Windows since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6603">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6603">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6604">Abilita l'uso degli account Active Directory per l'accesso automatico se i computer degli utenti sono aggiunti a un dominio e se l'ambiente non è aggiunto ad Azure AD ibrido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6604">Enable the use of Active Directory accounts for automatic sign in if your users' machines are Domain Joined and your environment is not hybrid joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6605">Se invece si desidera che gli utenti accedano automaticamente con l'account Azure Active Directory, aggiungere l'ambiente ad Azure AD (vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197) per altre informazioni) o ad Azure AD ibrido (vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365) per altre informazioni).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6605">If you want users automatically signed in with their Azure Active Directory accounts instead, please Azure AD join (See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197) for more information) or hybrid join (See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365) for more information) your environment.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6606">A ogni avvio, Microsoft Edge proverà a eseguire l'accesso tramite questo criterio, purché il primo profilo avviato non sia connesso o prima non sia stato eseguito l'accesso automatico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6606">On every launch, Microsoft Edge will try to sign-in using this policy, as long as the first profile being launched isn't signed-in or an auto sign-in hasn't happened before.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6607">Se il criterio [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) è disabilitato, questo criterio non avrà alcun effetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6607">If you have configured the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy to disabled, this policy will not take any effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6608">Se si abilita questo criterio e lo si imposta su "SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable”, Microsoft Edge eseguirà automaticamente l’accesso degli utenti che usano computer aggiunti al dominio tramite gli account Active Directory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6608">If you enable this policy and set it to 'SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable', Microsoft Edge will automatically sign in users that are on domain joined machines using their Active Directory accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6609">Se si imposta questo criterio su “Disabilitato” o non lo si imposta, Microsoft Edge non eseguirà automaticamente l’accesso degli utenti che usano computer aggiunti al dominio con account Active Directory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6609">If you set this policy to 'Disabled' or don't set it, Microsoft Edge will not automatically sign in users that are on domain joined machines with Active Directory accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6610">Da Microsoft Edge 89 in poi, se è presente un profilo locale esistente con sincronizzazione disabilitata e il computer è connesso in modalità ibrida, ossia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6610">From Microsoft Edge 89 onwards, if there is an existing on-premises profile with sync disabled and machine is now hybrid joined i.e</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6611">dispone di un account di Azure Active Directory, questo eseguirà l'aggiornamento automatico del profilo locale al profilo di Azure AD per ottenere funzionalità complete di sincronizzazione di Azure Active Directory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6611">it has an Azure AD account, it will auto-upgrade the on-premises profile to Azure AD profile to get full Azure AD sync facilities.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6612">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6612">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6613">Disabilitato (0) = Disabilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6613">Disabled (0) = Disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6614">SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable (1) = Accede e rende l’account di dominio non rimovibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6614">SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable (1) = Sign in and make domain account non-removable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6615">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6615">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6616">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6616">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6617">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6617">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6618">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6618">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6619">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6619">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6620">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6620">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6621">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6621">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6622">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6622">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6623">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6623">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6624">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6624">GP unique name: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6625">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura l'accesso automatico con un account di dominio Active Directory quando non esiste un account di dominio Azure AD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6625">GP name: Configure automatic sign in with an Active Directory domain account when there is no Azure AD domain account</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6626">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6626">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6627">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6627">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6628">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6628">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6629">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6629">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6630">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6630">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6631">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6631">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6632">Nome valore: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6632">Value Name: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6633">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6633">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6634">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6634">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="configureonlinetexttospeech"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6636">ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6636">ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-online-text-to-speech"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6637">Configura la sintesi vocale online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6637">Configure Online Text To Speech</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6638">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6638">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6639">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6639">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6640">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6640">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6641">Indica se il browser può sfruttare i caratteri voce della sintesi vocale online, parte dei Servizi cognitivi Azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6641">Set whether the browser can leverage Online Text to Speech voice fonts, part of Azure Cognitive Services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6642">Questi caratteri voce sono di qualità superiore rispetto ai caratteri voce di sistema predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6642">These voice fonts are higher quality than the pre-installed system voice fonts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6643">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, le applicazioni basate sul Web che usano l'API SpeechSynthesis possono utilizzare i caratteri voce della sintesi vocale online.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6643">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web-based applications that use the SpeechSynthesis API can use Online Text to Speech voice fonts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6644">Se si disabilita questo criterio, i caratteri voce non sono disponibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6644">If you disable this policy, the voice fonts aren't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6645">Sono disponibili altre informazioni su questa funzionalità qui: API SpeechSynthesis: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038) Servizi cognitivi: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6645">Read more about this feature here: SpeechSynthesis API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6648">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6648">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6649">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6649">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6653">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6653">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6654">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6654">GP unique name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6655">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura la sintesi vocale online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6655">GP name: Configure Online Text To Speech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6656">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6656">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6657">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6657">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6658">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6658">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6659">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6659">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6661">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6661">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="configureshare"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6669">ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6669">ConfigureShare</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-share-experience"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6670">Configura l'esperienza di condivisione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6670">Configure the Share experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6671">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6671">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6672">In Windows dalla versione 83 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6672">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6673">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6673">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6674">Se si imposta questo criterio su "ShareAllowed" (impostazione predefinita), gli utenti potranno accedere all'esperienza di condivisione di Windows 10 da Impostazioni e dal menu Altro in Microsoft Edge per condividere contenuti con altre app nel sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6674">If you set this policy to 'ShareAllowed' (the default), users will be able to access the Windows 10 Share experience from the Settings and More Menu in Microsoft Edge to share with other apps on the system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6675">Se si imposta questo criterio su "ShareDisallowed", gli utenti non potranno accedere all'esperienza di condivisione di Windows 10.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6675">If you set this policy to 'ShareDisallowed', users won't be able to access the Windows 10 Share experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6676">Se il pulsante Condividi è nella barra degli strumenti, verrà nascosto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6676">If the Share button is on the toolbar, it will also be hidden.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6677">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6677">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6678">ShareAllowed (0) = Consentire di usare l'esperienza di condivisione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6678">ShareAllowed (0) = Allow using the Share experience</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6679">ShareDisallowed (1) = Non consentire di usare l'esperienza di condivisione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6679">ShareDisallowed (1) = Don't allow using the Share experience</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6680">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6680">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6681">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6681">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6682">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6682">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6683">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6683">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6684">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6684">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6685">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6685">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6686">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6686">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6687">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6687">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6688">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6688">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6689">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6689">GP unique name: ConfigureShare</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6690">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura l'esperienza di condivisione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6690">GP name: Configure the Share experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6691">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6691">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6692">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6692">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6693">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6693">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6694">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6694">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6695">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6695">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6696">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6696">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6697">Nome valore: ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6697">Value Name: ConfigureShare</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6698">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6698">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6699">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6699">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="customhelplink"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6701">CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6701">CustomHelpLink</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-custom-help-link"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6702">Specifica il collegamento alla guida personalizzato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6702">Specify custom help link</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6703">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6703">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6704">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 79 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6704">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6705">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6705">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6706">Specifica un collegamento per il menu ? o il tasto F1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6706">Specify a link for the Help menu or the F1 key.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6707">Se si abilita questo criterio, un amministratore può specificare un collegamento per il menu ? o il tasto F1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6707">If you enable this policy, an admin can specify a link for the Help menu or the F1 key.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6708">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, viene usato il collegamento predefinito per il menu ? o il tasto F1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6708">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default link for the Help menu or the F1 key is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6709">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6709">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6710">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6710">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6711">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6711">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6712">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6712">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6713">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6713">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6714">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6714">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6715">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6715">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6716">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6716">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6717">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6717">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6718">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6718">GP unique name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6719">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Specifica il collegamento alla guida personalizzato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6719">GP name: Specify custom help link</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6720">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6720">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6721">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6721">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6722">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6722">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6723">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6723">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6724">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6724">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6725">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6725">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6726">Nome valore: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6726">Value Name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6727">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6727">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6728">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6728">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080734"
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6730">Nome chiave di preferenza: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6730">Preference Key Name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>

  ### <a name="dnsinterceptionchecksenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6733">DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6733">DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="dns-interception-checks-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6734">Controlli dell'intercettazione DNS abilitati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6734">DNS interception checks enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6735">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6735">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6736">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 80 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6736">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6737">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6737">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6738">Questo criterio configura un interruttore locale che consente di disabilitare i controlli di intercettazione DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6738">This policy configures a local switch that can be used to disable DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6739">Questi controlli tentano di individuare se il browser si trova dietro un proxy che reindirizza nomi host sconosciuti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6739">These checks attempt to discover whether the browser is behind a proxy that redirects unknown host names.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6740">Questo rilevamento potrebbe non essere necessario in un ambiente aziendale in cui la configurazione di rete è nota.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6740">This detection might not be necessary in an enterprise environment where the network configuration is known.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6741">Può essere disabilitato per evitare ulteriore traffico DNS e HTTP all'avvio e a ogni modifica della configurazione del DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6741">It can be disabled to avoid additional DNS and HTTP traffic on start-up and each DNS configuration change.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6742">Se si abilita o non si imposta questo criterio, i controlli di intercettazione DNS vengono eseguiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6742">If you enable or don't set this policy, the DNS interception checks are performed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6743">Se si disabilita questo criterio, i controlli di intercettazione DNS non vengono eseguiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6743">If you disable this policy, DNS interception checks aren't performed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6750">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6750">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6751">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6751">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6752">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6752">GP unique name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6753">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Controlli dell'intercettazione DNS abilitati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6753">GP name: DNS interception checks enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6754">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6754">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6755">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6755">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6756">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6756">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6757">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6757">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6758">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6758">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6759">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6759">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6760">Nome valore: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6760">Value Name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6761">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6761">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

