  ### <a name="defaultbrowsersettingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6767">DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6767">DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-microsoft-edge-as-default-browser"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6768">Imposta Microsoft Edge come browser predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6768">Set Microsoft Edge as default browser</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6769">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6769">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6770">In Windows 7 e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6770">On Windows 7 and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6771">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6771">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6772">Se si abilita questo criterio su true, Microsoft Edge controlla sempre se si tratta del browser predefinito all’avvio e, se possibile, lo registra automaticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6772">If you set this policy to True, Microsoft Edge always checks whether it's the default browser on startup and, if possible, automatically registers itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6773">Se si imposta questo criterio su falso, Microsoft Edge non controlla se si tratta dell'impostazione predefinita e disattiva i controlli utente per questa opzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6773">If you set this policy to False, Microsoft Edge is stopped from ever checking if it's the default and turns user controls off for this option.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6774">Se non si imposta questo criterio, Microsoft Edge consente agli utenti di controllare se si tratta dell'impostazione predefinita e, in caso contrario, se devono essere visualizzate le notifiche degli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6774">If you don't set this policy, Microsoft Edge lets users control whether it's the default and, if not, whether user notifications should appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6775">Nota per gli amministratori di Windows: questo criterio funziona solo per i PC che eseguono Windows 7.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6775">Note for Windows administrators: This policy only works for PCs running Windows 7.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6776">Per le versioni più recenti di Windows, è necessario distribuire un file di "associazioni delle applicazioni predefinite" che rende Microsoft Edge il gestore per i protocolli HTTPS e HTTP (e, facoltativamente, il protocollo ftp e i formati di file come .html, .htm, .pdf, .svg, .webp).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6776">For later versions of Windows, you have to deploy a "default application associations" file that makes Microsoft Edge the handler for the https and http protocols (and, optionally, the ftp protocol and file formats such as .html, .htm, .pdf, .svg, .webp).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6777">Per altre informazioni, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6777">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932) for more information.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6778">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6778">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6779">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6779">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6780">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6780">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6781">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6781">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6782">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6782">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6783">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6783">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6784">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6784">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6785">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6785">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6786">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6786">GP unique name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6787">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Imposta Microsoft Edge come browser predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6787">GP name: Set Microsoft Edge as default browser</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6788">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6788">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6789">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6789">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6790">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6790">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6791">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6791">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6792">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6792">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6793">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6793">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6794">Nome valore: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6794">Value Name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6795">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6795">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6796">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6796">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6797">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6797">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6798">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6798">Preference Key Name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6799">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6799">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="defaultsearchprovidercontextmenuaccessallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6801">DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6801">DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-default-search-provider-context-menu-search-access"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6802">Consente l’accesso al menu di scelta rapida del provider di ricerca predefinito </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6802">Allow default search provider context menu search access</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6803">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6803">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6804">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 85 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6804">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6805">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6805">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6806">Consente di usare un provider di ricerca predefinito nel menu di scelta rapida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6806">Enables the use of a default search provider on the context menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6807">Se si imposta questo criterio su disabilitato, la voce del menu di scelta rapida che si basa sul provider di ricerca predefinito e sulla ricerca della barra laterale non sarà disponibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6807">If you set this policy to disabled the search context menu item that relies on your default search provider and sidebar search will not be available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6808">Se questo criterio è impostato su abilitato o non impostato, la voce del menu di scelta rapida per il provider di ricerca predefinito e per la ricerca della barra laterale sarà disponibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6808">If this policy is set to enabled or not set, the context menu item for your default search provider and sidebar search will be available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6809">Il valore del criterio viene applicato solo quando il criterio [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) è abilitato; in caso contrario, non è applicabile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6809">The policy value is only appled when the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) policy is enabled, and is not applicable otherwise.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6810">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6810">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6811">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6811">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6812">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6812">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6813">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6813">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6814">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6814">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6815">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6815">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6816">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6816">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6817">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6817">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6818">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6818">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6819">Nome Criteri di gruppo: consente l’accesso al menu di scelta rapida del provider di ricerca predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6819">GP name: Allow default search provider context menu search access</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6820">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6820">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6821">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6821">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6822">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6822">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6823">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6823">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6824">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6824">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6825">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6825">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6826">Nome valore: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6826">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6827">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6827">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6828">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6828">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6829">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6829">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6830">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6830">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6831">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6831">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="defaultsensorssetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6833">DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6833">DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-sensors-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6834">Impostazione predefinita per i sensori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6834">Default sensors setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6835">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6835">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6836">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6836">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6837">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6837">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6838">Specificare se i siti Web possono accedere e usare sensori come i sensori di movimento e di luce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6838">Set whether websites can access and use sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6839">È possibile bloccare o consentire completamente l'accesso dei siti Web ai sensori.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6839">You can completely block or allow websites to get access to sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6840">Impostando il criterio su 1 si consente ai siti Web di accedere ai sensori e usarli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6840">Setting the policy to 1 lets websites access and use sensors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6841">Impostando il criterio su 2 si nega l'accesso ai sensori.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6841">Setting the policy to 2 denies acess to sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6842">È possibile sostituire questo criterio per modelli URL specifici usando i criteri [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) e [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6842">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) and [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6843">Se non si configura questo criterio, i siti Web possono accedere ai sensori e usarli e gli utenti possono modificare tale impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6843">If you don't configure this policy, websites can access and use sensors, and users can change this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6844">Questo è il valore globale predefinito per [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) e [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6844">This is the global default for [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) and [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6845">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6845">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6846">AllowSensors (1) = consenti ai siti di accedere ai sensori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6846">AllowSensors (1) = Allow sites to access sensors</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6847">BlockSensors (2) = non consentire ad alcun sito di accedere ai sensori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6847">BlockSensors (2) = Do not allow any site to access sensors</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6848">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6848">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6850">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6850">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6851">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6851">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6852">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6852">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6856">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6856">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6857">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6857">GP unique name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6858">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Impostazione predefinita per i sensori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6858">GP name: Default sensors setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6859">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6859">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6860">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6860">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6861">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6861">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6862">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6862">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6863">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6863">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6864">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6864">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6865">Nome valore: DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6865">Value Name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6866">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6866">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6867">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6867">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6869">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6869">Preference Key Name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>

  ### <a name="defaultserialguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6872">DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6872">DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-serial-api"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6873">Controlla l'uso di Serial API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6873">Control use of the Serial API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6874">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6874">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6875">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6875">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6876">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6876">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6877">Specificare se i siti Web possono accedere alle porte seriali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6877">Set whether websites can access serial ports.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6878">È possibile bloccare completamente l'accesso o chiedere conferma all'utente ogni volta che un sito Web vuole accedere a una porta seriale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6878">You can completely block access or ask the user each time a website wants to get access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6879">L'impostazione del criterio su 3 consente ai siti Web di richiedere l'accesso alle porte seriali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6879">Setting the policy to 3 lets websites ask for access to serial ports.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6880">Impostando il criterio su 2 si nega l'accesso alle porte seriali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6880">Setting the policy to 2 denies access to serial ports.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6881">È possibile sostituire questo criterio per modelli URL specifici usando i criteri [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) and [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6881">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) and [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6882">Se non si configura questo criterio, per impostazione predefinita i siti possono chiedere agli utenti se è possibile accedere a una porta seriale e gli utenti possono modificare questa impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6882">If you don't configure this policy, by default, websites can ask users whether they can access a serial port, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6883">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6883">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6884">BlockSerial (2) = non consentire ad alcun sito di richiedere l'accesso alle porte seriali tramite Serial API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6884">BlockSerial (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to serial ports via the Serial API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6885">AskSerial (3) = consenti ai siti di richiedere l'autorizzazione dell'utente per accedere a una porta seriale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6885">AskSerial (3) = Allow sites to ask for user permission to access a serial port</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6886">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6886">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6887">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6887">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6888">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6888">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6889">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6889">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6890">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6890">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6891">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6891">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6892">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6892">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6893">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6893">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6894">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6894">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6895">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6895">GP unique name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6896">Nome Criteri di gruppo: controlla l'uso di Serial API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6896">GP name: Control use of the Serial API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6897">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6897">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6898">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6898">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6899">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6899">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6900">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6900">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6901">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6901">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6902">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6902">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6903">Nome valore: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6903">Value Name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6904">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6904">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6905">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6905">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6906">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6906">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6907">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6907">Preference Key Name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6908">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6908">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="definepreferredlanguages"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6910">DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6910">DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>

  #### <a name="define-an-ordered-list-of-preferred-languages-that-websites-should-display-in-if-the-site-supports-the-language"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6911">Definisce un elenco ordinato di lingue preferite in cui i siti internet dovrebbero essere visualizzati, se supportate dai siti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6911">Define an ordered list of preferred languages that websites should display in if the site supports the language</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6912">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6912">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6913">In Windows e macOS da 89 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6913">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6914">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6914">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6915">Configura le varianti della lingua inviate da Microsoft Edge ai siti internet nell'intestazione HTTP di Accept-Language Request, e impedisce agli utenti di aggiungere, rimuovere o modificare l'ordine delle lingue preferite nelle impostazioni di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6915">Configures the language variants that Microsoft Edge sends to websites as part of the Accept-Language request HTTP header and prevents users from adding, removing, or changing the order of preferred languages in Microsoft Edge settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6916">Gli utenti che vogliono cambiare le lingue in cui Microsof Edge mostra le pagine o offre di tradurle saranno limitati alle lingue configurate in questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6916">Users who want to change the languages Microsoft Edge displays in or offers to translate pages to will be limited to the languages configured in this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6917">Se si abilita questo criterio, i siti internet verranno visualizzati nella prima lingua dell'elenco supportato, a meno che non venga usata un'altra logica specifica del sito per determinare la lingua di visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6917">If you enable this policy, websites will appear in the first language in the list that they support unless other site-specific logic is used to determine the display language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6918">Le varianti della lingua definite in questo criterio eseguono la sovrascrittura delle lingue configurate nel criterio [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6918">The language variants defined in this policy override the languages configured as part of the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6919">Se il criterio non viene configurato o disabilitato, Microsoft Edge invia ai siti le lingue preferite specificate dall'utente nell'intestazione HTTP della richiesta Accept-Language.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6919">If you don't configure or disable this policy, Microsoft Edge sends websites the user-specified preferred languages as part of the Accept-Language request HTTP header.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6920">Per informazioni dettagliate sulle varianti della lingua valide, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854) .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6920">For detailed information on valid language variants, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6921">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6921">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6922">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6922">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6923">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6923">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6924">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6924">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6925">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6925">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6926">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6926">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6927">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6927">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6928">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6928">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6929">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6929">GP unique name: DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6930">Nome Criteri di gruppo: definisce un elenco ordinato di lingue preferite in cui i siti internet dovrebbero essere visualizzati, se sono supportate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6930">GP name: Define an ordered list of preferred languages that websites should display in if the site supports the language</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6931">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6931">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6932">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6932">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6933">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6933">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6934">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6934">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6935">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6935">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6936">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6936">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6937">Nome valore: DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6937">Value Name: DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6938">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6938">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6939">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6939">Example value:</span></span>

```
"en-US,fr,es"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6940">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6940">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6941">Nome chiave di preferenza: DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6941">Preference Key Name: DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6942">Valore di esempio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6942">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>en-US,fr,es</string>
```

  ### <a name="delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6944">DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6944">DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>

  #### <a name="require-that-the-enterprise-mode-site-list-is-available-before-tab-navigation"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6945">Richiede che l'elenco siti in modalità Enterprise sia disponibile prima dello spostamento tramite schede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6945">Require that the Enterprise Mode Site List is available before tab navigation</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6946">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6946">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6947">In Windows dalla versione 84 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6947">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6948">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6948">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6949">Consente di specificare se le schede Microsoft Edge attendono lo spostamento finché il browser non avrà scaricato l'elenco iniziale dei siti in modalità Enterprise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6949">Lets you specify whether Microsoft Edge tabs wait to navigate until the browser has downloaded the initial Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6950">Questa opzione viene usata in scenari in cui la Home page del browser deve essere caricata in modalità Internet Explorer ed è importante che venga prima eseguita nel browser dopo l'abilitazione della modalità Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6950">This setting is intended for the scenario where the browser home page should load in Internet Explorer mode, and it is important that is does so on browser first run after IE mode is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6951">Se questo scenario non esiste, è consigliabile non abilitare questa opzione perché può influire negativamente sulle prestazioni del caricamento della Home page.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6951">If this scenario does not exist, we recommend not enabling this setting because it can negatively impact the performance of loading the home page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6952">L'impostazione viene applicata solo se Microsoft Edge non dispone di un elenco dei siti in modalità aziendale memorizzato nella cache, ad esempio quando si esegue il primo browser dopo l'abilitazione della modalità Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6952">The setting only applies when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached Enterprise Mode Site List, such as on browser first run after IE mode is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6953">Questa impostazione funziona in combinazione con i criteri: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) impostato su "IEMode e [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist), in cui l'elenco ha almeno una voce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6953">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6954">Il comportamento di timeout di questo criterio può essere configurato con il criterio [NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout](#navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6954">The timeout behavior of this policy can be configured with the [NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout](#navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6955">Se si imposta questo criterio su “All”, quando Microsoft Edge non dispone di una versione memorizzata nella cache dell'elenco dei siti in modalità Enterprise, le tabulazioni ritarderanno lo spostamento finché il browser non avrà scaricato l'elenco dei siti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6955">If you set this policy to 'All', when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached version of the Enterprise Mode Site List, tabs delay navigating until the browser has downloaded the site list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6956">I siti configurati per l'apertura in modalità Internet Explorer dall'elenco dei siti vengono caricati in modalità di Internet Explorer, anche durante la navigazione iniziale del browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6956">Sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode by the site list will load in Internet Explorer mode, even during the initial navigation of the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6957">Siti che non possono essere configurati per l'apertura in Internet Explorer, come siti con uno schema diverso da http:, https:, file:, or ftp: non ritardare l'esplorazione e il caricamento immediato in modalità Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6957">Sites that cannot possibly be configured to open in Internet Explorer, such as any site with a scheme other than http:, https:, file:, or ftp: do not delay navigating and load immediately in Edge mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6958">Se si imposta questo criterio su “None” o non lo si configura, quando Microsoft Edge non dispone di una versione memorizzata nella cache dell'elenco dei siti in modalità Enterprise, le tabulazioni verranno spostate immediatamente e non attenderanno che il browser scarichi l'elenco dei siti in modalità Enterprise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6958">If you set this policy to 'None' or don't configure it, when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached version of the Enterprise Mode Site List, tabs will navigate immediately, and not wait for the browser to download the Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6959">I siti configurati per l'apertura in modalità di Internet Explorer dall'elenco sito verranno aperti in modalità Microsoft Edge finché il browser non avrà terminato il download dell'elenco dei siti in modalità Enterprise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6959">Sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode by the site list will open in Microsoft Edge mode until the browser has finished downloading the Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6960">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6960">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6961">None (0) = Nessuno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6961">None (0) = None</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6962">All (1) = Tutti gli spostamenti idonei</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6962">All (1) = All eligible navigations</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6963">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6963">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6964">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6964">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6965">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6965">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6966">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6966">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6967">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6967">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6968">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6968">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6969">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6969">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6970">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6970">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6971">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6971">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6972">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6972">GP unique name: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6973">Nome Criteri di gruppo: richiede che l'elenco siti in modalità Enterprise sia disponibile prima dello spostamento tramite schede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6973">GP name: Require that the Enterprise Mode Site List is available before tab navigation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6974">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6974">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6975">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6975">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6976">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6976">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6977">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6977">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6978">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6978">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6979">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6979">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6980">Nome valore: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6980">Value Name: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6981">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6981">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6982">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6982">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6983">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6983">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="deletedataonmigration"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6984">DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6984">DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>

  #### <a name="delete-old-browser-data-on-migration"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6985">Elimina i dati del browser obsoleti alla migrazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6985">Delete old browser data on migration</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6986">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6986">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6987">In Windows dalla versione 83 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6987">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6988">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6988">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6989">Questo criterio determina se i dati di esplorazione dell'utente della Versione legacy di Microsoft Edge verranno eliminati dopo la migrazione a Microsoft Edge versione 81 o successiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6989">This policy determines whether user browsing data from Microsoft Edge Legacy will be deleted after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6990">Se si imposta questo criterio su "Abilitato", tutti i dati di esplorazione della Versione legacy di Microsoft Edge dopo la migrazione a Microsoft Edge versione 81 o successiva verranno eliminati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6990">If you set this policy to "Enabled", all browsing data from Microsoft Edge Legacy after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later will be deleted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6991">Questo criterio deve essere impostato prima della migrazione a Microsoft Edge versione 81 o successiva per avere effetti sui dati di esplorazione esistenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6991">This policy must be set before migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later to have any effect on existing browsing data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-6992">Se si imposta questo criterio su "Disabilitato" o se il criterio non viene configurato, i dati di esplorazione dell'utente non vengono eliminati dopo la migrazione a Microsoft Edge versione 83 o successiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6992">If you set this policy to "Disabled", or the policy is not configured, user browsing data isn't deleted after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 83 or later.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6993">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6993">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6994">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6994">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6995">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6995">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6996">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6996">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6997">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6997">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-6998">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6998">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-6999">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-6999">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7000">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7000">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7001">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7001">GP unique name: DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7002">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Elimina i dati del browser obsoleti alla migrazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7002">GP name: Delete old browser data on migration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7003">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7003">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7004">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7004">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7005">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7005">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7006">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7006">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7007">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7007">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7008">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7008">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7009">Nome valore: DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7009">Value Name: DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7010">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7010">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7011">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7011">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7012">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7012">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="developertoolsavailability"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7013">DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7013">DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-where-developer-tools-can-be-used"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7014">Controlla dove si possono usare gli strumenti di sviluppo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7014">Control where developer tools can be used</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7015">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7015">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7016">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7016">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7017">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7017">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7018">Controlla dove si possono usare gli strumenti di sviluppo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7018">Control where developer tools can be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7019">Se si imposta questo criterio su "DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions" (impostazione predefinita), gli utenti possono accedere agli strumenti di sviluppo e alla console di JavaScript in generale, ma non nel contesto delle estensioni installate dai criteri aziendali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7019">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions' (the default), users can access the developer tools and the JavaScript console in general, but not in the context of extensions installed by enterprise policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7020">Se si imposta questo criterio su "DeveloperToolsAllowed", gli utenti possono accedere agli strumenti di sviluppo e alla console di JavaScript in qualsiasi contesto, comprese le estensioni installate dai criteri aziendali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7020">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsAllowed', users can access the developer tools and the JavaScript console in all contexts, including extensions installed by enterprise policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7021">Se si imposta questo criterio su "DeveloperToolsDisallowed", gli utenti non possono accedere agli strumenti di sviluppo o esaminare gli elementi del sito Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7021">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsDisallowed', users can't access the developer tools or inspect website elements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7022">I menu e i tasti di scelta rapida o le voci di menu a comparsa che aprono gli strumenti di sviluppo o la console di JavaScript sono disabilitati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7022">Keyboard shortcuts and menu or context menu entries that open the developer tools or the JavaScript Console are disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7023">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7023">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7024">DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions (0) = Bloccare gli strumenti di sviluppo nelle estensioni installate da criteri aziendali, consentirli in altri contesti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7024">DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions (0) = Block the developer tools on extensions installed by enterprise policy, allow in other contexts</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7025">DeveloperToolsAllowed (1) = Consentire di usare gli strumenti di sviluppo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7025">DeveloperToolsAllowed (1) = Allow using the developer tools</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7026">DeveloperToolsDisallowed (2) = Non consentire di usare gli strumenti di sviluppo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7026">DeveloperToolsDisallowed (2) = Don't allow using the developer tools</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7027">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7027">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7028">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7028">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7036">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7036">GP unique name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>

  ### <a name="diagnosticdata"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7051">DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7051">DiagnosticData</span></span>

  #### <a name="send-required-and-optional-diagnostic-data-about-browser-usage"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7052">Invia dati di diagnostica necessari e facoltativi sull'uso del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7052">Send required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7053">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7053">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7054">In Windows 7 e macOS dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7054">On Windows 7 and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7055">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7055">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7056">Questo criterio controlla l'invio a Microsoft dei dati di diagnostica necessari e facoltativi relativi all'utilizzo del browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7056">This policy controls sending required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7057">I dati di diagnostica necessari raccolti fanno in modo che Microsoft Edge rimanga sicuro, aggiornato e funzioni come previsto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7057">Required diagnostic data is collected keep Microsoft Edge secure, up to date and performing as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7058">I dati di diagnostica facoltativi includono i dati sull'uso del browser, i siti Web visitati e i report di arresto anomalo di Microsoft in modo da migliorare il prodotto e il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7058">Optional diagnostic data includes data about how you use the browser, websites you visit and crash reports to Microsoft for product and service improvement.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7059">Questo criterio non è supportato nei dispositivi Windows 10.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7059">This policy is not supported on Windows 10 devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7060">Per controllare la raccolta di dati in Windows 10, gli amministratori IT devono usare i criteri di gruppo dati di diagnostica Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7060">To control this data collection on Windows 10, IT admins must use the Windows diagnostic data group policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7061">Questo criterio può essere sia "Consenti telemetria" o "Consenti dati di diagnostica", a seconda della versione di Windows in uso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7061">This policy will either be 'Allow Telemetry' or 'Allow Diagnostic Data', depending on the version of Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7062">Ulteriori informazioni sulla raccolta dei dati di diagnostica Windows 10: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7062">Learn more about Windows 10 diagnostic data collection: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7063">Per configurare il criterio, usa una delle opzioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7063">Use one of the following settings to configure this policy:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7064">“Disattivato” disattiva la raccolta di dati diagnostica obbligatoria e facoltativa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7064">'Off' turns off required and optional diagnostic data collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7065">Questa opzione non è consigliata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7065">This option is not recommended.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7066">"RequiredData" invia i dati di diagnostica necessari, ma disattiva la raccolta di dati diagnostica facoltativa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7066">'RequiredData' sends required diagnostic data but turns off optional diagnostic data collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7067">Microsoft Edge invia i dati di diagnostica necessari in modo che Microsoft Edge rimanga sicuro, aggiornato e funzioni come previsto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7067">Microsoft Edge will send required diagnostic data to keep Microsoft Edge secure, up to date and performing as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7068">"OptionalData" invia i dati di diagnostica facoltativi includendo i dati sull'utilizzo del browser, i siti Web visitati, i report di arresto anomalo inviati a Microsoft per migliorare il prodotto e il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7068">'OptionalData' sends optional diagnostic data includes data about browser usage, websites that are visited, crash reports sent to Microsoft for product and service improvement.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7069">In Windows 7/macOS questo criterio controlla l'invio di dati obbligatori e facoltativi a Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7069">On Windows 7/macOS, this policy controls sending required and optional data to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7070">Se non configuri o disattivi questo criterio, Microsoft Edge lo applicherà come impostazione predefinita per le preferenze degli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7070">If you don't configure this policy or disable it, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7071">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7071">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7072">Disattivato (0) = disattivato (non consigliato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7072">Off (0) = Off (Not recommended)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7073">RequiredData (1) = dati obbligatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7073">RequiredData (1) = Required data</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7074">OptionalData (2) = dati facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7074">OptionalData (2) = Optional data</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7075">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7075">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7076">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7076">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7077">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7077">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7078">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7078">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7079">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7079">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7080">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7080">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7081">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7081">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7082">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7082">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7083">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7083">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7084">Nome univoco GP: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7084">GP unique name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7085">Nome criteri di gruppo: Invia dati di diagnostica necessari e facoltativi sull'uso del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7085">GP name: Send required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7086">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7086">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7087">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7087">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7088">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7088">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7089">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7089">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7090">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7090">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7091">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7091">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7092">Nome valore: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7092">Value Name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7093">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7093">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7094">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7094">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7095">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7095">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7096">Nome chiave preferenza: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7096">Preference Key Name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7097">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7097">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
