  ### <a name="directinvokeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7099">DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7099">DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-open-files-using-the-directinvoke-protocol"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7100">Consente agli utenti di aprire i file con il protocollo DirectInvoke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7100">Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7101">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7101">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7102">In Windows dalla versione 78 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7102">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7103">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7103">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7104">Consente agli utenti di aprire i file con il protocollo DirectInvoke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7104">Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7105">Il protocollo DirectInvoke consente ai siti Web di richiedere che il browser apra i file da un URL specifico usando un gestore di file specifico nel dispositivo o nel computer dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7105">The DirectInvoke protocol allows websites to request that the browser open files from a specific URL using a specific file handler on the user's computer or device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7106">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono aprire i file usando il protocollo DirectInvoke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7106">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7107">Se si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti non possono aprire i file usando il protocollo DirectInvoke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7107">If you disable this policy, users can't open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7108">Al contrario, il file verrà salvato nel file system.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7108">Instead, the file will be saved to the file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7109">Nota: la disabilitazione di DirectInvoke potrebbe impedire il corretto funzionamento di alcune funzionalità di Microsoft SharePoint Online.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7109">Note: Disabling DirectInvoke may prevent certain Microsoft SharePoint Online features from working as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7110">Per altre informazioni su DirectInvoke, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) e [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7110">For more information about DirectInvoke, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) and [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7111">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7111">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7112">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7112">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7113">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7113">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7114">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7114">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7115">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7115">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7116">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7116">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7117">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7117">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7118">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7118">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7119">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7119">GP unique name: DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7120">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente agli utenti di aprire i file con il protocollo DirectInvoke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7120">GP name: Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7121">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7121">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7122">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7122">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7123">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7123">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7124">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7124">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7125">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7125">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7126">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7126">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7127">Nome valore: DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7127">Value Name: DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7128">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7128">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7129">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7129">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="disable3dapis"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7131">Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7131">Disable3DAPIs</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-support-for-3d-graphics-apis"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7132">Disabilita il supporto per le API di grafica 3D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7132">Disable support for 3D graphics APIs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7133">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7133">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7134">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7134">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7135">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7135">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7136">Impedisce alle pagine Web di accedere all'unità di elaborazione grafica (GPU).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7136">Prevent web pages from accessing the graphics processing unit (GPU).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7137">In particolare, le pagine Web non possono accedere all'API WebGL e i plug-in non possono usare l'API Pepper 3D.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7137">Specifically, web pages can't access the WebGL API and plug-ins can't use the Pepper 3D API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7138">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, è possibile che le pagine Web utilizzino l'API WebGL e che i plug-in utilizzino l'API Pepper 3D.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7138">If you don't configure or disable this policy, it potentially allows web pages to use the WebGL API and plug-ins to use the Pepper 3D API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7139">Per impostazione predefinita, Microsoft Edge potrebbe continuare a richiedere argomenti della riga di comando per utilizzare queste API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7139">Microsoft Edge might, by default, still require command line arguments to be passed in order to use these APIs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7140">Se il criterio [HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled](#hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled) è impostato su false, l'impostazione per il criterio "Disable3DAPIs" viene ignorata (equivale all'impostazione del criterio "Disable3DAPIs" su true).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7140">If [HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled](#hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled) policy is set to false, the setting for 'Disable3DAPIs' policy is ignored - it's the equivalent of setting 'Disable3DAPIs' policy to true.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7141">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7141">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7142">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7142">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7143">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7143">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7144">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7144">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7145">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7145">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7146">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7146">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7147">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7147">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7148">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7148">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7149">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7149">GP unique name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7150">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Disabilita il supporto per le API di grafica 3D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7150">GP name: Disable support for 3D graphics APIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7151">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7151">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7152">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7152">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7153">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7153">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7154">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7154">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7155">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7155">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7156">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7156">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7157">Nome valore: Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7157">Value Name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7158">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7158">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7159">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7159">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7160">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7160">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7161">Nome chiave di preferenza: Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7161">Preference Key Name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7162">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7162">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="disablescreenshots"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7164">DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7164">DisableScreenshots</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-taking-screenshots"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7165">Disabilita l'acquisizione di screenshot</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7165">Disable taking screenshots</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7166">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7166">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7167">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7167">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7168">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7168">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7169">Controlla se l'utente può acquisire screenshot della pagina del browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7169">Controls if users can take screenshots of the browser page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7170">Se abilitato, l'utente non può acquisire screenshot tramite i tasti di scelta rapida o le API delle estensioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7170">If enabled, user can't take screenshots by using keyboard shortcuts or extension APIs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7171">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono acquisire screenshot.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7171">If disabled or don't configure this policy, users can take screenshots.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7172">Tenere presente che questo criterio controlla gli screenshot acquisiti all'interno del browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7172">Please note this policy controls screenshots taken from within the browser itself.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7173">Anche se si abilita questo criterio, gli utenti potrebbero comunque acquisire screenshot attraverso dei metodi esterni al browser (come l'uso di una funzionalità del sistema operativo o di un'altra applicazione).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7173">Even if you enable this policy, users might still be able to take screenshots using some method outside of the browser (like using an operating system feature or another application).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7174">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7174">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7175">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7175">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7176">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7176">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7177">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7177">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7178">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7178">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7179">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7179">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7180">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7180">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7181">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7181">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7182">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7182">GP unique name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7183">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Disabilita l'acquisizione di screenshot</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7183">GP name: Disable taking screenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7184">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7184">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7185">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7185">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7186">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7186">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7187">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7187">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7188">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7188">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7189">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7189">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7190">Nome valore: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7190">Value Name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7191">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7191">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7192">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7192">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7193">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7193">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7194">Nome chiave di preferenza: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7194">Preference Key Name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7195">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7195">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7196">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7196">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="diskcachedir"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7197">DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7197">DiskCacheDir</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-disk-cache-directory"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7198">Imposta la directory della cache del disco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7198">Set disk cache directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7199">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7199">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7200">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7200">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7201">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7201">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7202">Configura la directory da usare per archiviare i file memorizzati nella cache.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7202">Configures the directory to use to store cached files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7203">Se si abilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge usa la directory fornita indipendentemente dal fatto che l'utente abbia specificato il contrassegno "--disk-cache-dir".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7203">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory regardless of whether the user has specified the '--disk-cache-dir' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7204">Per evitare perdite di dati o altri errori imprevisti, non configurare questo criterio su una directory radice di un volume o su una directory utilizzata per altri scopi, perché Microsoft Edge ne gestisce il contenuto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7204">To avoid data loss or other unexpected errors, don't configure this policy to a volume's root directory or to a directory used for other purposes, because Microsoft Edge manages its contents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7205">Per un elenco delle variabili che è possibile usare quando si specificano directory e percorsi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7205">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables you can use when specifying directories and paths.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7206">Se non si configura questo criterio, viene usata la directory della cache predefinita e gli utenti possono ignorare tale impostazione predefinita con il contrassegno della riga di comando "--disk-cache-dir".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7206">If you don't configure this policy, the default cache directory is used, and users can override that default with the '--disk-cache-dir' command line flag.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7207">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7207">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7208">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7208">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7209">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7209">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7210">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7210">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7211">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7211">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7212">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7212">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7213">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7213">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7214">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7214">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7215">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7215">GP unique name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7216">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Imposta la directory della cache del disco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7216">GP name: Set disk cache directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7217">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7217">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7218">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7218">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7219">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7219">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7220">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7220">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7221">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7221">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7222">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7222">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7223">Nome valore: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7223">Value Name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7224">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7224">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7225">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7225">Example value:</span></span>

```
"${user_home}/Edge_cache"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7226">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7226">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7227">Nome chiave di preferenza: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7227">Preference Key Name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7228">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7228">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>${user_home}/Edge_cache</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7229">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7229">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="diskcachesize"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7230">DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7230">DiskCacheSize</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-disk-cache-size-in-bytes"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7231">Imposta le dimensioni della cache del disco, in byte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7231">Set disk cache size, in bytes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7232">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7232">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7233">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7233">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7234">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7234">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7235">Configura le dimensioni della cache, in byte, utilizzata per archiviare i file nel disco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7235">Configures the size of the cache, in bytes, used to store files on the disk.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7236">Se si abilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge usa le dimensioni della cache fornite indipendentemente dal fatto che l'utente abbia specificato il contrassegno "--disk-cache-size".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7236">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided cache size regardless of whether the user has specified the '--disk-cache-size' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7237">Il valore specificato in questo criterio non è un limite rigido, ma piuttosto un suggerimento per il sistema di memorizzazione nella cache; qualsiasi valore inferiore ad alcuni megabyte è troppo basso e verrà arrotondato per eccesso a un minimo ragionevole.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7237">The value specified in this policy isn't a hard boundary but rather a suggestion to the caching system; any value below a few megabytes is too small and will be rounded up to a reasonable minimum.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7238">Se si imposta il valore di questo criterio su 0, vengono usate le dimensioni della cache predefinite e gli utenti non possono modificarle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7238">If you set the value of this policy to 0, the default cache size is used, and users can't change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7239">Se non si configura questo criterio, vengono usate le dimensioni predefinite, ma gli utenti possono ignorarle con il contrassegno "--disk-cache-size".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7239">If you don't configure this policy, the default size is used, but users can override it with the '--disk-cache-size' flag.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7240">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7240">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7241">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7241">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7242">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7242">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7243">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7243">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7244">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7244">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7245">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7245">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7246">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7246">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7247">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7247">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7248">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7248">GP unique name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7249">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Imposta le dimensioni della cache del disco, in byte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7249">GP name: Set disk cache size, in bytes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7250">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7250">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7251">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7251">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7252">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7252">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7253">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7253">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7254">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7254">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7255">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7255">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7256">Nome valore: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7256">Value Name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7257">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7257">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7258">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7258">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x06400000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7259">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7259">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7260">Nome chiave di preferenza: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7260">Preference Key Name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7261">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7261">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>104857600</integer>
```

  ### <a name="dnsoverhttpsmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7263">DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7263">DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-the-mode-of-dns-over-https"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7264">Controlla la modalità del protocollo DNS-over-HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7264">Control the mode of DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7265">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7265">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7266">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 83 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7266">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7267">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7267">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7268">Controlla la modalità del resolver DNS-over-HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7268">Control the mode of the DNS-over-HTTPS resolver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7269">Questo criterio imposta la modalità predefinita solo per ogni query.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7269">Note that this policy will only set the default mode for each query.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7270">La modalità può essere ignorata per tipi di query speciali, ad esempio richieste di risolvere un nome host del server DNS-over-HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7270">The mode can be overridden for special types of queries such as requests to resolve a DNS-over-HTTPS server hostname.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7271">La modalità "off" disabilita DNS-over-HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7271">The "off" mode will disable DNS-over-HTTPS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7272">La modalità "automatic" invia prima query DNS-over-HTTPS se un server DNS-over-HTTPS è disponibile e potrebbe eseguire il fallback per l'invio di query non protette in caso di errore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7272">The "automatic" mode will send DNS-over-HTTPS queries first if a DNS-over-HTTPS server is available and may fallback to sending insecure queries on error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7273">La modalità "secure" invia solo query DNS-over-HTTPS e non risolve in caso di errore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7273">The "secure" mode will only send DNS-over-HTTPS queries and will fail to resolve on error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7274">Se non si configura questo criterio, il browser potrebbe inviare richieste DNS-over-HTTPS a un resolver associato al resolver di sistema configurato dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7274">If you don't configure this policy, the browser might send DNS-over-HTTPS requests to a resolver associated with the user's configured system resolver.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7275">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7275">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7276">off (off) = Disabilita DNS-over-HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7276">off (off) = Disable DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7277">automatic (automatic) = Abilita DNS-over-HTTPS con fallback insicuro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7277">automatic (automatic) = Enable DNS-over-HTTPS with insecure fallback</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7278">secure (secure) = Abilita DNS-over-HTTPS senza fallback insicuro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7278">secure (secure) = Enable DNS-over-HTTPS without insecure fallback</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7279">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7279">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7280">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7280">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7281">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7281">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7282">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7282">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7283">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7283">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7284">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7284">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7285">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7285">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7286">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7286">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7287">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7287">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7288">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7288">GP unique name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7289">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Controlla la modalità del protocollo DNS-over-HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7289">GP name: Control the mode of DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7290">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7290">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7291">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7291">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7292">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7292">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7293">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7293">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7294">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7294">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7295">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7295">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7296">Nome valore: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7296">Value Name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7297">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7297">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7298">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7298">Example value:</span></span>

```
"off"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7299">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7299">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7300">Nome chiave di preferenza: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7300">Preference Key Name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7301">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7301">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>off</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7302">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7302">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="dnsoverhttpstemplates"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7303">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7303">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-uri-template-of-desired-dns-over-https-resolver"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7304">Specifica il modello URI del resolver DNS-over-HTTPS desiderato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7304">Specify URI template of desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7305">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7305">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7306">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 83 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7306">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7307">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7307">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7308">Specifica il modello URI del resolver DNS-over-HTTPS desiderato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7308">The URI template of the desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7309">Per specificare più resolver DNS-over-HTTPS, separare i modelli URI corrispondenti con spazi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7309">To specify multiple DNS-over-HTTPS resolvers, separate the corresponding URI templates with spaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7310">Se si imposta [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) su "secure", questo criterio deve essere impostato e non può rimanere vuoto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7310">If you set [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) to "secure" then this policy must be set and cannot be empty.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7311">Se si imposta [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) su "automatic" e questo criterio è impostato, verranno usati i modelli URI specificati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7311">If you set [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) to "automatic" and this policy is set then the URI templates specified will be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7312">Se non si imposta questo criterio, i mapping hardcoded verranno usati per tentare di aggiornare il resolver DNS corrente dell'utente su un resolver DoH gestito dallo stesso provider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7312">If you don't set this policy, then hardcoded mappings will be used to attempt to upgrade the user's current DNS resolver to a DoH resolver operated by the same provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7313">Se il modello URI contiene una variabile dns, le richieste al resolver useranno GET; in caso contrario, le richieste useranno POST.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7313">If the URI template contains a dns variable, requests to the resolver will use GET; otherwise requests will use POST.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7314">I modelli formattati in modo non corretto verranno ignorati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7314">Incorrectly formatted templates will be ignored.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7315">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7315">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7316">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7316">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7317">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7317">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7318">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7318">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7319">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7319">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7320">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7320">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7321">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7321">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7322">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7322">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7323">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7323">GP unique name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7324">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Specifica il modello URI del resolver DNS-over-HTTPS desiderato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7324">GP name: Specify URI template of desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7325">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7325">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7326">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7326">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7327">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7327">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7328">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7328">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7329">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7329">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7330">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7330">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7331">Nome valore: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7331">Value Name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7332">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7332">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7333">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7333">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7334">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7334">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7335">Nome chiave di preferenza: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7335">Preference Key Name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7336">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7336">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7337">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7337">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="downloaddirectory"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7338">DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7338">DownloadDirectory</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-download-directory"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7339">Imposta la directory di download</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7339">Set download directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7340">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7340">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7341">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7341">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7342">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7342">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7343">Configura la directory da usare quando si scaricano i file.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7343">Configures the directory to use when downloading files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7344">Se si abilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge usa la directory fornita indipendentemente dal fatto che l'utente ne abbia specificata una o abbia scelto di dover specificare ogni volta il percorso di download.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7344">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory regardless of whether the user has specified one or chosen to be prompted for download location every time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7345">Per un elenco delle variabili che è possibile usare, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7345">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables that can be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7346">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, viene usata la directory di download predefinita e l'utente può modificarla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7346">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default download directory is used, and the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7347">Se si imposta un percorso non valido, per impostazione predefinita Microsoft Edge userà la directory di download predefinita dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7347">If you set an invalid path, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's default download directory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7348">Se la cartella specificata dal percorso non esiste, il download attiverà una richiesta che chiede all'utente dove desidera salvare il download.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7348">If the folder specified by the path doesn't exist, the download will trigger a prompt that asks the user where they want to save their download.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7349">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7349">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7350">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7350">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7351">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7351">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7352">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7352">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7353">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7353">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7354">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7354">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7355">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7355">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7356">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7356">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7357">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7357">GP unique name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7358">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Imposta la directory di download</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7358">GP name: Set download directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7359">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7359">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7360">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7360">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7361">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7361">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7362">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7362">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7363">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7363">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7364">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7364">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7365">Nome valore: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7365">Value Name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7366">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7366">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7367">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7367">Example value:</span></span>

```
"\n      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads\n      Windows: C:\\Users\\${user_name}\\Downloads"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7368">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7368">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7369">Nome chiave di preferenza: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7369">Preference Key Name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7370">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7370">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>
      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads
      Windows: C:\Users\${user_name}\Downloads</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7371">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7371">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="downloadrestrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7372">DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7372">DownloadRestrictions</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-download-restrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7373">Consente le restrizioni per il download</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7373">Allow download restrictions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7374">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7374">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7375">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7375">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7376">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7376">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7377">Configura il tipo di download che Microsoft Edge blocca completamente, senza consentire agli utenti di ignorare la decisione relativa alla sicurezza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7377">Configures the type of downloads that Microsoft Edge completely blocks, without letting users override the security decision.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7378">Impostare "BlockDangerousDownloads" per consentire tutti i download tranne quelli che attivano avvisi di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7378">Set 'BlockDangerousDownloads' to allow all downloads except for those that carry Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7379">Impostare "BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads” per consentire tutti i download tranne quelli che attivano avvisi di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen per download potenzialmente pericolosi o indesiderati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7379">Set 'BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads' to allow all downloads except for those that carry Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings of potentially dangerous or unwanted downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7380">Impostare "BlockAllDownloads" per bloccare tutti i download.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7380">Set 'BlockAllDownloads' to block all downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7381">Se non si configura questo criterio o si imposta l'opzione "DefaultDownloadSecurity”, i download vengono sottoposti alle solite restrizioni di sicurezza in base ai risultati dell'analisi di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7381">If you don't configure this policy or set the 'DefaultDownloadSecurity' option, the downloads go through the usual security restrictions based on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen analysis results.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7382">Queste restrizioni si applicano ai download dal contenuto delle pagine Web, oltre all'opzione di menu a comparsa "Collegamento di download...".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7382">Note that these restrictions apply to downloads from web page content, as well as the 'download link...' context menu option.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7383">Queste restrizioni non si applicano al salvataggio o al download della pagina attualmente visualizzata, né si applicano all'opzione Salva come PDF dalle opzioni di stampa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7383">These restrictions don't apply to saving or downloading the currently displayed page, nor do they apply to the Save as PDF option from the printing options.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7384">Per altre informazioni su Microsoft Defender SmartScreen, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7384">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934) for more info on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7385">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7385">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7386">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = Nessuna speciale restrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7386">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = No special restrictions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7387">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = Bloccare download pericolosi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7387">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = Block dangerous downloads</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7388">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = Bloccare download potenzialmente pericolosi o indesiderati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7388">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = Block potentially dangerous or unwanted downloads</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7389">BlockAllDownloads (3) = Bloccare tutti i download</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7389">BlockAllDownloads (3) = Block all downloads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7390">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7390">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7391">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7391">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7392">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7392">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7393">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7393">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7394">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7394">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7395">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7395">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7396">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7396">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7397">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7397">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7398">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7398">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7399">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7399">GP unique name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7400">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente le restrizioni per il download</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7400">GP name: Allow download restrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7401">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7401">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7402">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7402">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7403">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7403">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7404">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7404">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7405">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7405">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7406">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7406">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7407">Nome valore: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7407">Value Name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7408">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7408">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7409">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7409">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7410">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7410">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7411">Nome chiave di preferenza: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7411">Preference Key Name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7412">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7412">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7413">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7413">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="edgecollectionsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7414">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7414">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-the-collections-feature"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7415">Abilita la funzionalità Raccolte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7415">Enable the Collections feature</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7416">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7416">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7417">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 78 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7417">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7418">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7418">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7419">Permette di consentire agli utenti di accedere alla funzionalità Raccolte, dove è possibile raccogliere, organizzare, condividere ed esportare contenuti in modo più efficiente e con l'integrazione di Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7419">Lets you allow users to access the Collections feature, where they can collect, organize, share, and export content more efficiently and with Office integration.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7420">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono accedere alla funzionalità Raccolte in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7420">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can access and use the Collections feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7421">Se si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti non possono accedere a Raccolte in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7421">If you disable this policy, users can't access and use Collections in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7422">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7422">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7423">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7423">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7424">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7424">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7425">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7425">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7426">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7426">Data Type:</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7428">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7428">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7429">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7429">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7430">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7430">GP unique name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7431">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita la funzionalità Raccolte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7431">GP name: Enable the Collections feature</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7432">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7432">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7433">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7433">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7434">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7434">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7435">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7435">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7436">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7436">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7437">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7437">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7439">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7439">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7440">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7440">Example value:</span></span>
