  ### <a name="edgeshoppingassistantenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7445">EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7445">EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="shopping-in-microsoft-edge-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7446">Shopping in Microsoft Edge abilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7446">Shopping in Microsoft Edge Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7447">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7447">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7448">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7448">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7449">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7449">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7450">Questo criterio consente agli utenti di confrontare i prezzi di un prodotto che stanno esaminando, ottenere tagliandi o buoni sconto dal sito in cui si trovano, oppure riscattare automaticamente i tagliandi durante l'estrazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7450">This policy lets users compare the prices of a product they are looking at, get coupons or rebates from the website they're on, or auto-apply coupons during checkout.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7451">Se il criterio non viene abilitato o configurato le caratteristiche di shopping, come il confronto dei prezzi, i tagliandi e i buoni sconto, saranno applicati automaticamente ai domini commerciali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7451">If you enable or don't configure this policy, shopping features such as price comparison, coupons and rebates will be automatically applied for retail domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7452">I coupon per il rivenditore corrente e i prezzi di altri rivenditori verranno recuperati da un server.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7452">Coupons for the current retailer and prices from other retailers will be fetched from a server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7453">Se questo criterio viene disabilitato le funzionalità di shopping, come il confronto dei prezzi, i tagliandi e i buoni sconto, non saranno disponibili automaticamente per i domini di rivendita. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7453">If you disable this policy shopping features such as price comparison, coupons and rebates will not be automatically found for retail domains.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7454">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7454">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7455">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7455">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7456">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7456">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7457">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7457">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7458">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7458">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7459">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7459">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7460">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7460">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7461">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7461">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7462">Nome univoco GP: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7462">GP unique name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7463">Nome GP: shopping in Microsoft Edge abilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7463">GP name: Shopping in Microsoft Edge Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7464">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7464">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7465">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7465">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7466">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7466">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7467">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7467">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7468">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7468">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7469">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7469">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7470">Nome valore: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7470">Value Name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7471">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7471">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7472">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7472">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7473">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7473">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7474">Nome chiave preferenza: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7474">Preference Key Name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7475">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7475">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="editfavoritesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7477">EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7477">EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allows-users-to-edit-favorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7478">Consente agli utenti di modificare i Preferiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7478">Allows users to edit favorites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7479">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7479">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7480">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7480">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7481">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7481">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7482">Abilitare questo criterio per consentire agli utenti di aggiungere, rimuovere e modificare i Preferiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7482">Enable this policy to let users add, remove, and modify favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7483">Questo è il comportamento predefinito se non si configura questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7483">This is the default behavior if you don't configure the policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7484">Disabilitare questo criterio per impedire agli utenti di aggiungere, rimuovere o modificare i Preferiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7484">Disable this policy to stop users from adding, removing, or modifying favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7485">Possono continuare a usare i Preferiti esistenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7485">They can still use existing favorites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7486">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7486">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7487">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7487">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7488">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7488">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7489">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7489">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7490">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7490">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7491">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7491">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7492">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7492">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7493">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7493">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7494">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7494">GP unique name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7495">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente agli utenti di modificare i Preferiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7495">GP name: Allows users to edit favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7496">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7496">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7497">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7497">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7498">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7498">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7499">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7499">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7500">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7500">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7501">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7501">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7502">Nome valore: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7502">Value Name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7503">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7503">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7504">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7504">Example value:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7506">Nome chiave di preferenza: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7506">Preference Key Name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>

  ### <a name="enabledeprecatedwebplatformfeatures"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7509">EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7509">EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>

  #### <a name="re-enable-deprecated-web-platform-features-for-a-limited-time-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7510">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Nome Criteri di gruppo: Riabilita le funzionalità della piattaforma Web deprecate per un periodo di tempo limitato (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7510">Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7511">OBSOLETO: questo criterio è obsoleto e non funziona dopo Microsoft Edge 86.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7511">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 86.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7512">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7512">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7513">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7513">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 86</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7514">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7514">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7515">Questi criteri sono obsoleti, perché i criteri dedicati per la piattaforma Web sono ora usati per gestire la deprecazione delle singole caratteristiche della piattaforma Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7515">This policy is obsolete because dedicated web platform policies are now used to manage individual web platform feature deprecations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7516">Specifica un elenco di funzionalità della piattaforma Web deprecate da riabilitare temporaneamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7516">Specify a list of deprecated web platform features to temporarily re-enable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7517">Questo criterio consente di riabilitare le funzionalità della piattaforma Web deprecate per un periodo di tempo limitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7517">This policy lets you re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7518">Le funzionalità sono identificate da un contrassegno stringa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7518">Features are identified by a string tag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7519">Se non si configura questo criterio, se l'elenco è vuoto o se una funzionalità non corrisponde a uno dei contrassegni stringa supportati, tutte le funzionalità della piattaforma Web deprecate rimangono disabilitate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7519">If you don't configure this policy, if the list is empty, or if a feature doesn't match one of the supported string tags, all deprecated web platform features remain disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7520">Il criterio è supportato nelle piattaforme di cui sopra, ma la funzionalità da abilitare potrebbe non essere disponibile in tutte quelle piattaforme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7520">While the policy itself is supported on the above platforms, the feature it's enabling might not be available on all of those platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7521">Non tutte le funzionalità della piattaforma Web deprecate possono essere riabilitate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7521">Not all deprecated Web Platform features can be re-enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7522">Solo quelle indicate in modo esplicito di seguito possono essere riabilitate e solo per un periodo di tempo limitato, che varia a seconda della funzionalità.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7522">Only those explicitly listed below can be re-enabled, and only for a limited period of time, which differs per feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7523">È possibile rivedere l'intento alla base delle modifiche alle funzionalità della piattaforma Web qui: https://bit.ly/blinkintents.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7523">You can review the intent behind the Web Platform feature changes at https://bit.ly/blinkintents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7524">Il formato generale del contrassegno stringa è [DeprecatedFeatureName]_EffectiveUntil[yyyymmdd].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7524">The general format of the string tag is [DeprecatedFeatureName]_EffectiveUntil[yyyymmdd].</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7525">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7525">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7526">ExampleDeprecatedFeature (ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902) = Abilitare l'API ExampleDeprecatedFeature fino al 02/09/2008</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7526">ExampleDeprecatedFeature (ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902) = Enable ExampleDeprecatedFeature API through 2008/09/02</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7527">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7527">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7528">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7528">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7529">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7529">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7530">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7530">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7531">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7531">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7532">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7532">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7533">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7533">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7534">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7534">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7535">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7535">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7536">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7536">GP unique name: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7537">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Riabilita le funzionalità della piattaforma Web deprecate per un periodo di tempo limitato (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7537">GP name: Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7538">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7538">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7539">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7539">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7540">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7540">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7541">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7541">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7542">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7542">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7543">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7543">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7544">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7544">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7545">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7545">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7546">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7546">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures\1 = "ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7547">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7547">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7548">Nome chiave di preferenza: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7548">Preference Key Name: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7549">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7549">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="enabledomainactionsdownload"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7551">EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7551">EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-domain-actions-download-from-microsoft-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7552">Abilita il download delle azioni di dominio da Microsoft (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7552">Enable Domain Actions Download from Microsoft (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7553">OBSOLETO: questo criterio è obsoleto e non funziona dopo Microsoft Edge 84.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7553">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7554">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7554">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7555">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77, fino alla versione 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7555">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 84</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7556">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7556">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7557">Questo criterio non funziona perché è consigliabile evitare stati conflittuali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7557">This policy doesn't work because conflicting states should be avoided.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7558">Questo criterio è usato per abilitare/disabilitare il download dell'elenco di azioni del dominio, ma non sempre consentiva di ottenere lo stato desiderato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7558">This policy was used to enable/disable download of the domain actions list, but it didn't always achieve the desired state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7559">Il servizio di sperimentazione e configurazione, che gestisce il download, ha il proprio criterio per configurare cosa viene scaricato dal servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7559">The Experimentation and Configuration Service, which handles the download, has its own policy to configure what is downloaded from the service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7560">Usare invece il criterio [ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl](#experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7560">Use the [ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl](#experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol) policy instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7561">In Microsoft Edge, le azioni del dominio rappresentano una serie di funzionalità di compatibilità che consentono al browser di funzionare correttamente sul Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7561">In Microsoft Edge, Domain Actions represent a series of compatibility features that help the browser work correctly on the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7562">Microsoft conserva un elenco di azioni da eseguire in determinati domini per motivi di compatibilità.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7562">Microsoft keeps a list of actions to take on certain domains for compatibility reasons.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7563">Ad esempio, il browser potrebbe ignorare la stringa agente utente in un sito Web se tale sito Web è interrotto a causa della nuova stringa agente utente in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7563">For example, the browser may override the User Agent string on a website if that website is broken due to the new User Agent string on Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7564">Ognuna di queste azioni deve essere temporanea mentre Microsoft tenta di risolvere il problema con il proprietario del sito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7564">Each of these actions is intended to be temporary while Microsoft tries to resolve the issue with the site owner.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7565">Quando il browser viene avviato e poi periodicamente, il browser contatterà il servizio di sperimentazione e configurazione che contiene l'elenco più aggiornato delle azioni di compatibilità da eseguire.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7565">When the browser starts up and then periodically afterwards, the browser will contact the Experimentation and Configuration Service that contains the most up to date list of compatibility actions to perform.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7566">Questo elenco viene salvato in locale dopo che viene recuperato in modo che le richieste successive aggiornino l'elenco solo se la copia del server è cambiata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7566">This list is saved locally after it is first retrieved so that subsequent requests will only update the list if the server's copy has changed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7567">Se si abilita questo criterio, l'elenco delle azioni del dominio continuerà a essere scaricato dal servizio di sperimentazione e configurazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7567">If you enable this policy, the list of Domain Actions will continue to be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7568">Se si disabilita questo criterio, l'elenco delle azioni del dominio non verrà più scaricato dal servizio di sperimentazione e configurazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7568">If you disable this policy, the list of Domain Actions will no longer be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7569">Se non si configura questo criterio, l'elenco delle azioni del dominio continuerà a essere scaricato dal servizio di sperimentazione e configurazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7569">If you don't configure this policy, the list of Domain Actions will continue to be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7570">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7570">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7571">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7571">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7572">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7572">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7573">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7573">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7574">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7574">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7575">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7575">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7576">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7576">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7577">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7577">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7578">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7578">GP unique name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7579">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita il download delle azioni di dominio da Microsoft (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7579">GP name: Enable Domain Actions Download from Microsoft (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7580">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7580">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7581">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7581">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7582">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7582">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7583">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7583">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7584">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7584">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7585">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7585">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7586">Nome valore: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7586">Value Name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7587">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7587">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7588">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7588">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7589">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7589">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7590">Nome chiave di preferenza: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7590">Preference Key Name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7591">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7591">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="enableonlinerevocationchecks"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7593">EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7593">EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-online-ocspcrl-checks"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7594">Abilita i controlli OCSP/CRL online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7594">Enable online OCSP/CRL checks</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7595">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7595">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7596">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7596">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7597">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7597">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7598">I controlli di revoca online non forniscono vantaggi significativi per la sicurezza e sono disabilitati per impostazione predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7598">Online revocation checks don't provide a significant security benefit and are disabled by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7599">Se si abilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge eseguirà controlli online OCSP/CRL "soft-fail".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7599">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge will perform soft-fail, online OCSP/CRL checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7600">"Soft fail" significa che, se il server di revoca non può essere raggiunto, il certificato verrà considerato valido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7600">"Soft fail" means that if the revocation server can't be reached, the certificate will be considered valid.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7601">Se si disabilita o non si configura il criterio, Microsoft Edge non eseguirà i controlli di revoca online.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7601">If you disable the policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge won't perform online revocation checks.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7602">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7602">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7603">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7603">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7604">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7604">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7605">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7605">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7606">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7606">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7607">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7607">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7608">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7608">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7609">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7609">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7610">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7610">GP unique name: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7611">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita i controlli OCSP/CRL online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7611">GP name: Enable online OCSP/CRL checks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7612">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7612">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7613">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7613">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7614">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7614">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7615">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7615">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  ### <a name="enablesha1forlocalanchors"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7625">EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7625">EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-certificates-signed-using-sha-1-when-issued-by-local-trust-anchors-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7626">Consente certificati firmati SHA-1 quando sono emessi da trust anchor locali (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7626">Allow certificates signed using SHA-1 when issued by local trust anchors (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7627">DEPRECATO: questo criterio è deprecato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7627">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7628">È attualmente supportato, ma diventerà obsoleto in una versione futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7628">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7629">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7629">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7630">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 85 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7630">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7631">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7631">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7632">Se questa impostazione è abilitata, Microsoft Edge consente le connessioni protette da certificati firmati SHA-1, purché il certificato sia concatenato a un certificato radice installato localmente e sia altrimenti valido. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7632">When this setting is enabled, Microsoft Edge allows connections secured by SHA-1 signed certificates so long as the the certificate chains to a locally-installed root certificate and is otherwise valid.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7633">Si noti che questo criterio dipende dallo stack di verifica dei certificati del sistema operativo (OS) che consente le firme SHA-1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7633">Note that this policy depends on the operating system (OS) certificate verification stack allowing SHA-1 signatures.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7634">Se un aggiornamento del sistema operativo modifica la gestione dei certificati SHA-1 da parte del sistema operativo, questo criterio potrebbe non avere più effetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7634">If an OS update changes the OS handling of SHA-1 certificates, this policy might no longer have effect.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7635">Inoltre, questo criterio è inteso come soluzione alternativa temporanea per dare alle organizzazioni più tempo per allontanarsi da SHA-1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7635">Further, this policy is intended as a temporary workaround to give enterprises more time to move away from SHA-1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7636">Questo criterio verrà rimosso al rilascio di Microsoft Edge 92 a metà 2021.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7636">This policy will be removed in Microsoft Edge 92 releasing in mid 2021.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7637">Se non si imposta questo criterio o lo si imposta su falso, oppure se il certificato SHA-1 è concatenato a una radice del certificato pubblicamente attendibile, Microsoft Edge non consentirà i certificati firmati SHA-1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7637">If you don't set this policy or set it to false, or the SHA-1 certificate chains to a publicly trusted certificate root, then Microsoft Edge won't allow certificates signed by SHA-1.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7638">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7638">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7639">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7639">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7640">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7640">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7641">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7641">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7642">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7642">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7643">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7643">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7644">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7644">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7645">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7645">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7646">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7646">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7647">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7647">GP unique name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7648">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente certificati firmati SHA-1 quando sono emessi da trust anchor locali (deprecato) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7648">GP name: Allow certificates signed using SHA-1 when issued by local trust anchors (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7649">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7649">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7650">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7650">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7651">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7651">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7652">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7652">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7653">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7653">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7654">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7654">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7655">Nome valore: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7655">Value Name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7656">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7656">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7657">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7657">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7658">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7658">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7659">Nome chiave di preferenza: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7659">Preference Key Name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7660">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7660">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="enterprisehardwareplatformapienabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7662">EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7662">EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-managed-extensions-to-use-the-enterprise-hardware-platform-api"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7663">Consente alle estensioni gestite di usare l'API Enterprise Hardware Platform</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7663">Allow managed extensions to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7664">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7664">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7665">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 78 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7665">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7666">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7666">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7667">Quando questo criterio è abilitato, le estensioni installate dai criteri aziendali possono utilizzare l'API Enterprise Hardware Platform.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7667">When this policy is set to enabled, extensions installed by enterprise policy are allowed to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7668">Quando questo criterio è disabilitato o non impostato, nessuna estensione potrà usare l'API Enterprise Hardware Platform.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7668">When this policy is set to disabled or isn't set, no extensions are allowed to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7669">Questo criterio si applica anche alle estensioni del componente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7669">This policy also applies to component extensions.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7670">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7670">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7671">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7671">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7672">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7672">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7673">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7673">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7674">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7674">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7675">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7675">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7676">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7676">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7677">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7677">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7678">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7678">GP unique name: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7679">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente alle estensioni gestite di usare l'API Enterprise Hardware Platform</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7679">GP name: Allow managed extensions to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7680">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7680">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7681">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7681">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7682">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7682">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7683">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7683">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7684">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7684">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7685">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7685">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7686">Nome valore: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7686">Value Name: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7687">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7687">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7688">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7688">Example value:</span></span>


  ### <a name="enterprisemodesitelistmanagerallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7693">EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7693">EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-access-to-the-enterprise-mode-site-list-manager-tool"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7694">Consente l’accesso allo strumento Enterprise Mode Site List Manager</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7694">Allow access to the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager tool</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7695">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7695">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7696">In Windows dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7696">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7697">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7697">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7698">Consente di impostare se Enterprise Mode Site List Manager è disponibile per gli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7698">Allows you to set whether Enterprise Mode Site List Manager is available to users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7699">Se si abilita questo criterio, gli utenti possono visualizzare il pulsante di spostamento di Enterprise Mode Site List Manager sulla pagina edge://compat, passare allo strumento e usarlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7699">If you enable this policy, users can see the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager nav button on edge://compat page, navigate to the tool and use it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7700">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti non visualizzeranno il pulsante di spostamento di Enterprise Mode Site List Manager e non saranno in grado di usarlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7700">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users won't see the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager nav button and won't be able to use it.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7701">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7701">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7702">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7702">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7703">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7703">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7704">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7704">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7705">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7705">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7706">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7706">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7707">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7707">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7708">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7708">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7709">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7709">GP unique name: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7710">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente l’accesso allo strumento Enterprise Mode Site List Manager</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7710">GP name: Allow access to the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager tool</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7711">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7711">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7712">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7712">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7713">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7713">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7714">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7714">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7715">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7715">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7716">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7716">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7717">Nome valore: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7717">Value Name: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7718">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7718">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7719">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7719">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="exemptdomainfiletypepairsfromfiletypedownloadwarnings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7721">ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7721">ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-download-file-type-extension-based-warnings-for-specified-file-types-on-domains"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7722">Disabilita gli avvisi di download basati sull'estensione del tipo di file per i tipi di file specificati nei domini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7722">Disable download file type extension-based warnings for specified file types on domains</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7723">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7723">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7724">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 85 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7724">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7725">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7725">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7726">È possibile abilitare questo criterio per creare un dizionario di estensioni di file con un elenco di domini corrispondente che verrà escluso dagli avvisi di download basati sull'estensione del tipo di file.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7726">You can enable this policy to create a dictionary of file type extensions with a corresponding list of domains that will be exempted from file type extension-based download warnings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7727">In questo modo gli amministratori dell'organizzazione possono bloccare gli avvisi di download basati sulle estensioni dei file associati a un dominio elencato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7727">This lets enterprise administrators block file type extension-based download warnings for files that are associated with a listed domain.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7728">Ad esempio, se l'estensione “jnlp” è associata a "website1.com", gli utenti non vedranno un avviso durante il download di file “jnlp” da “website1.com”, ma l'avviso di download viene visualizzato quando si scaricano i file “jnlp” da “website2.com”.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7728">For example, if  the "jnlp" extension is associated with "website1.com", users would not see a warning when downloading "jnlp" files from "website1.com", but see a download warning when downloading "jnlp" files from "website2.com".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7729">I file con estensioni specificate per i domini identificati da questo criterio continueranno a essere soggetti agli avvisi di sicurezza basati sulle estensioni dei tipi di file, ad esempio avvisi per il download di contenuti misti e avvisi di Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7729">Files with file type extensions specified for domains identified by this policy will still be subject to non-file type extension-based security warnings such as mixed-content download warnings and Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7730">Se si disabilitano il criterio o non lo si configura, i tipi di file che generano avvisi per il download basato su estensione mostreranno avvisi all'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7730">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, file types that trigger extension-based download warnings will show warnings to the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7731">Se il criterio viene abilitato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7731">If you enable this policy:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7732">Il modello di URL deve essere formattato in base a [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7732">The URL pattern should be formatted according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>
* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7733">L'estensione del tipo di file immessa deve essere in formato ASCII in minuscolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7733">The file type extension entered must be in lower-cased ASCII.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7734">Quando si elenca il tipo di file, non è necessario includere il separatore iniziale, pertanto deve essere insertito “jnlp” invece di “.jnlp”.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7734">The leading separator should not be included when listing the file type extension, so list "jnlp" should be used instead of ".jnlp".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7735">Esempio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7735">Example:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7736">Il valore di esempio seguente impedirebbe il download di avvisi basati su estensioni di file in swf, exe e jnlp per i domini \*. contoso.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7736">The following example value would prevent file type extension-based download warnings on swf, exe, and jnlp extensions for \*.contoso.com domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7737">Mostrerà all'utente un avviso per il download basato su estensione di un tipo di file in qualsiasi altro dominio per i file exe e jnlp, ma non per i file swf.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7737">It will show the user a file type extension-based download warning on any other domain for exe and jnlp files, but not for swf files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7738">[ { "file_extension": "jnlp", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "exe", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "swf", "domains": ["\*"] } ]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7738">[ { "file_extension": "jnlp", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "exe", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "swf", "domains": ["\*"] } ]</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7739">Si noti che mentre nell'esempio precedente viene mostrata la soppressione degli avvisi di download basati sulle estensioni di file per i file "swf" per tutti i domini, l'applicazione della soppressione di tali avvisi per tutti i domini per qualsiasi estensione di file pericoloso non è consigliata a causa di problemi di sicurezza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7739">Note that while the preceding example shows the suppression of file type extension-based download warnings for "swf" files for all domains, applying suppression of such warnings for all domains for any dangerous file type extension is not recommended due to security concerns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7740">Nell'esempio è indicato solo per dimostrare la possibilità di eseguire questa operazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7740">It is shown in the example merely to demonstrate the ability to do so.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7741">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7741">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7742">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7742">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7743">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7743">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7744">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7744">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7745">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7745">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7746">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7746">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7747">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7747">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7748">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7748">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7749">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7749">GP unique name: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7750">Nome Criteri di gruppo: disabilita gli avvisi di download basati sull'estensione del tipo di file per i tipi di file specificati nei domini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7750">GP name: Disable download file type extension-based warnings for specified file types on domains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7751">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7751">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7752">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7752">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7753">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7753">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7754">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7754">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7755">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7755">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7756">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7756">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7757">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7757">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7758">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7758">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7759">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7759">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings\1 = {"domains": ["https://contoso.com", "contoso2.com"], "file_extension": "jnlp"}
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings\2 = {"domains": ["*"], "file_extension": "swf"}

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7760">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7760">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7761">Nome chiave preferenza: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7761">Preference Key Name: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7762">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7762">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>{'domains': ['https://contoso.com', 'contoso2.com'], 'file_extension': 'jnlp'}</string>
  <string>{'domains': ['*'], 'file_extension': 'swf'}</string>
</array>
```
