  ### <a name="experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7764">ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7764">ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-communication-with-the-experimentation-and-configuration-service"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7765">Controlla le comunicazioni con il servizio di sperimentazione e configurazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7765">Control communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7766">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7766">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7767">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7767">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7768">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7768">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7769">In Microsoft Edge, il servizio di sperimentazione e configurazione viene usato per distribuire il payload di sperimentazione e configurazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7769">In Microsoft Edge, the Experimentation and Configuration Service is used to deploy Experimentation and Configuration payload.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7770">Il payload di sperimentazione è costituito da un elenco di funzionalità di distribuzione che Microsoft sta sottoponendo a test e feedback.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7770">Experimentation payload consists of a list of early in development features that Microsoft is enabling for testing and feedback.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7771">Il payload di configurazione è costituito da un elenco di impostazioni che Microsoft desidera distribuire a Microsoft Edge per ottimizzare l'esperienza utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7771">Configuration payload consists of a list of settings that Microsoft wants to deploy to Microsoft Edge to optimize user experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7772">Ad esempio, il payload di configurazione può specificare la frequenza con cui Microsoft Edge invia richieste al servizio di sperimentazione e configurazione per recuperare il payload più recente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7772">For example, configuration payload may specify how often Microsoft Edge sends requests to the Experimentation and Configuration Service to retrieve the newest payload.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7773">Inoltre, il payload di configurazione contiene un elenco di azioni da eseguire in determinati domini per motivi di compatibilità.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7773">Additionaly, configuration payload may also contain a list of actions to take on certain domains for compatibility reasons.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7774">Ad esempio, il browser potrebbe ignorare la stringa agente utente in un sito Web se tale sito Web è interrotto a causa della nuova stringa agente utente in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7774">For example, the browser may override the User Agent string on a website if that website is broken due to the new User Agent string on Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7775">Ognuna di queste azioni deve essere temporanea mentre Microsoft tenta di risolvere il problema con il proprietario del sito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7775">Each of these actions is intended to be temporary while Microsoft tries to resolve the issue with the site owner.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7776">Se si imposta questo criterio su “FullMode”, viene scaricato il payload completo dal servizio di sperimentazione e configurazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7776">If you set this policy to 'FullMode', the full payload is downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7777">Sono inclusi i payload di sperimentazione e configurazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7777">This includes both the experimentation and configuration payloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7778">Se si imposta questo criterio su “ConfigurationsOnlyMode”, viene fornito solo il payload di configurazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7778">If you set this policy to 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode', only the configuration payload is delivered.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7779">Se si imposta questo criterio su "RestrictedMode", la comunicazione con il servizio di sperimentazione e configurazione viene bloccata completamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7779">If you set this policy to 'RestrictedMode', the communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service is stopped completely.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7780">Se non si configura questo criterio, in un dispositivo gestito in canali Stable e Beta il comportamento è uguale a quello della modalità “ConfigurationsOnlyMode”.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7780">If you don't configure this policy, on a managed device on Stable and Beta channels the behavior is the same as the 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7781">Se non si configura questo criterio, in un dispositivo non gestito il comportamento è uguale a quello della modalità “FullMode".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7781">If you don't configure this policy, on an unmanaged device the behavior is the same as the 'FullMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7782">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7782">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7783">FullMode (2) = Recuperare configurazioni ed esperimenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7783">FullMode (2) = Retrieve configurations and experiments</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7784">ConfigurationsOnlyMode (1) = Recuperare solo le configurazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7784">ConfigurationsOnlyMode (1) = Retrieve configurations only</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7785">RestrictedMode (0) = Disabilitare la comunicazione con il servizio di sperimentazione e configurazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7785">RestrictedMode (0) = Disable communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7786">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7786">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7787">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7787">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7788">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7788">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7789">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7789">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7790">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7790">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7791">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7791">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7792">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7792">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7793">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7793">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7794">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7794">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7795">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7795">GP unique name: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7796">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Controlla le comunicazioni con il servizio di sperimentazione e configurazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7796">GP name: Control communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7797">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7797">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7798">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7798">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7799">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7799">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7800">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7800">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7801">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7801">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7802">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7802">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7803">Nome valore: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7803">Value Name: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  ### <a name="externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7810">ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7810">ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-an-always-open-checkbox-in-external-protocol-dialog"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7811">Mostra una casella di controllo "Sempre aperto" nella casella di controllo del protocollo esterno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7811">Show an "Always open" checkbox in external protocol dialog</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7812">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7812">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7813">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 79 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7813">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7814">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7814">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7815">Questo criterio controlla se la casella di controllo "Consenti sempre a questo sito di aprire collegamenti di questo tipo" viene visualizzata nelle richieste di conferma per l'avvio del protocollo esterno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7815">This policy controls whether the "Always allow this site to open links of this type" checkbox is shown on external protocol launch confirmation prompts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7816">Questo criterio si applica solo ai collegamenti https://.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7816">This policy only applies to https:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7817">Se viene abilitato questo criterio, quando viene visualizzata una richiesta di conferma del protocollo esterno, l'utente può selezionare "Consenti sempre" per ignorare tutte le richieste di conferma future per il protocollo in tale sito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7817">If you enable this policy, when an external protocol confirmation prompt is shown, the user can select "Always allow" to skip all future confirmation prompts for the protocol on this site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7818">Se si disabilita questo criterio, la casella di controllo "Consenti sempre" non viene visualizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7818">If you disable this policy, the "Always allow" checkbox isn't displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7819">All'utente verrà richiesta una conferma ogni volta che viene richiamato un protocollo esterno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7819">The user will be prompted for confirmation every time an external protocol is invoked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7820">Nelle versioni di Microsoft Edge precedenti alla 83, se non si configura questo criterio la casella di controllo "Consenti sempre" non viene visualizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7820">Prior to Microsoft Edge 83, if you don't configure this policy, the "Always allow" checkbox isn't displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7821">All'utente verrà richiesta una conferma ogni volta che viene richiamato un protocollo esterno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7821">The user will be prompted for confirmation every time an external protocol is invoked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7822">In Microsoft Edge 83, se non si configura questo criterio la visibilità della casella di controllo è controllata dal contrassegno "Abilita la memorizzazione delle preferenze di richiesta per l'avvio del protocollo" in edge://flags</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7822">On Microsoft Edge 83, if you don't configure this policy, the checkbox visibility is controlled by the "Enable remembering protocol launch prompting preferences" flag in edge://flags</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7823">Da Microsoft Edge versione 84, se non si configura questo criterio, quando viene visualizzata una richiesta di conferma del protocollo esterno, l'utente può selezionare "Consenti sempre" per ignorare tutte le richieste di conferma future per il protocollo in tale sito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7823">As of Microsoft Edge 84, if you don't configure this policy, when an external protocol confirmation prompt is shown, the user can select "Always allow" to skip all future confirmation prompts for the protocol on this site.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7824">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7824">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7825">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7825">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7826">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7826">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7827">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7827">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7828">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7828">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7829">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7829">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7830">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7830">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7831">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7831">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7832">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7832">GP unique name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7833">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Mostra una casella di controllo "Sempre aperto" nella casella di controllo del protocollo esterno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7833">GP name: Show an "Always open" checkbox in external protocol dialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7834">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7834">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7835">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7835">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7836">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7836">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7837">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7837">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7838">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7838">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7839">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7839">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7840">Nome valore: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7840">Value Name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7841">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7841">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7842">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7842">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7843">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7843">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7844">Nome chiave di preferenza: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7844">Preference Key Name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7845">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7845">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="familysafetysettingsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7847">FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7847">FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-configure-family-safety-and-kids-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7848">Consentire agli utenti di configurare Family safety e la modalità bambini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7848">Allow users to configure Family safety and Kids Mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7849">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7849">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7850">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 83 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7850">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7851">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7851">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7852">Questo criterio disabilita due funzionalità correlate alla sicurezza della famiglia nel browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7852">This policy disables two family safety related features in the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7853">Questa operazione nasconderà la pagina Famiglia all'interno di Impostazioni e lo spostamento a edge://settings/family verrà bloccato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7853">This will hide the Family page inside Settings and navigation to edge://settings/family will be blocked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7854">La pagina delle impostazioni della famiglia descrive le funzionalità disponibili con i gruppi familiari con Microsoft Family Safety.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7854">The family settings page describes what features are available with family groups with Microsoft Family Safety.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7855">Per altre informazioni su Family Safety, vedere qui: ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432) ).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7855">Learn more about Family Safety here: ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432)).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7856">A partire da Microsoft Edge 90, questo criterio disabilita anche la modalità bambini, una modalità di esplorazione per bambini con temi personalizzati e la ricerca degli elenchi consentiti che richiede la password del dispositivo per uscire.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7856">Starting in Microsoft Edge 90, this policy also disables Kids Mode, a kid friendly browsing mode with custom themes and allow list browsing that requires the device password to exit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7857">Per altre informazioni sulla modalità Bambini vedere qui: ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2146910](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2146910) )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7857">Learn more about Kids Mode here: ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2146910](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2146910))</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7858">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, verrà visualizzata la pagina della famiglia in Impostazioni e sarà disponibile la modalità Bambini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7858">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the family page in Settings will be shown and Kids Mode will be available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7859">Se si disabilita questo criterio, la pagina della famiglia non verrà visualizzata e la modalità Bambini verrà nascosta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7859">If you disable this policy, the family page will not be shown, and Kids Mode will be hidden.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7860">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7860">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7862">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7862">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7863">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7863">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7867">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7867">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7872">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7872">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7875">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7875">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

  ### <a name="favoritesbarenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7883">FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7883">FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-favorites-bar"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7884">Abilita la barra Preferiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7884">Enable favorites bar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7885">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7885">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7886">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7886">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7887">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7887">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7888">Abilita o disabilita la barra dei Preferiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7888">Enables or disables the favorites bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7889">Se si abilita questo criterio, gli utenti vedranno la barra dei Preferiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7889">If you enable this policy, users will see the favorites bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7890">Se si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti non vedranno la barra dei Preferiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7890">If you disable this policy, users won't see the favorites bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7891">Se non si configura questo criterio, l'utente può decidere di usare o meno la barra dei Preferiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7891">If this policy is not configured, then the user can decide to use the favorites bar or not.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7892">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7892">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7893">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7893">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7894">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7894">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7895">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7895">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7896">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7896">Data Type:</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7898">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7898">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7907">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7907">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>

  ### <a name="forcebingsafesearch"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7915">ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7915">ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>

  #### <a name="enforce-bing-safesearch"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7916">Applica Ricerca sicura di Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7916">Enforce Bing SafeSearch</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7917">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7917">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7918">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7918">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7919">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7919">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7920">Garantisce che le query nella ricerca Web di Bing vengano effettuate con Ricerca sicura impostata sul valore specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7920">Ensure that queries in Bing web search are done with SafeSearch set to the value specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7921">Questa impostazione non può essere modificata dagli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7921">Users can't change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7922">Se si configura questo criterio su "BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode”, Ricerca sicura di Bing ritornerà al valore di bing.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7922">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode', SafeSearch in Bing search falls back to the bing.com value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7923">Se si configura questo criterio su "BingSafeSearchModerateMode", viene usata l'impostazione moderata in Ricerca sicura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7923">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchModerateMode', the moderate setting is used in SafeSearch.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7924">L'impostazione moderata filtra video e immagini per adulti, ma non il testo dei risultati della ricerca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7924">The moderate setting filters adult videos and images but not text from search results.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7925">Se si configura questo criterio su "BingSafeSearchStrictMode", viene usata l'impostazione con restrizioni in Ricerca sicura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7925">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchStrictMode', the strict setting in SafeSearch is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7926">L'impostazione con restrizioni filtra testo, immagini e video per adulti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7926">The strict setting filters adult text, images, and videos.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7927">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, Ricerca sicura di Bing non viene applicata e gli utenti possono impostare il valore che desiderano su bing.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7927">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, SafeSearch in Bing search isn't enforced, and users can set the value they want on bing.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7928">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7928">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7929">BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode (0) = Non configurare le restrizioni della ricerca in Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7929">BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode (0) = Don't configure search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7930">BingSafeSearchModerateMode (1) = Configurare restrizioni della ricerca moderate in Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7930">BingSafeSearchModerateMode (1) = Configure moderate search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7931">BingSafeSearchStrictMode (2) = Configurare restrizioni della ricerca rigide in Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7931">BingSafeSearchStrictMode (2) = Configure strict search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7932">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7932">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7933">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7933">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7934">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7934">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7935">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7935">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7936">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7936">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7937">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7937">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7938">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7938">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7939">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7939">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7940">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7940">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7941">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7941">GP unique name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7942">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Applica Ricerca sicura di Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7942">GP name: Enforce Bing SafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7943">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7943">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7944">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7944">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7945">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7945">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7946">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7946">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7947">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7947">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7948">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7948">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7949">Nome valore: ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7949">Value Name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7950">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7950">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7951">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7951">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7952">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7952">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7953">Nome chiave di preferenza: ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7953">Preference Key Name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7954">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7954">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```

  ### <a name="forcecertificatepromptsonmultiplematches"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7956">ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7956">ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-whether-microsoft-edge-should-automatically-select-a-certificate-when-there-are-multiple-certificate-matches-for-a-site-configured-with-autoselectcertificateforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7957">Configura se Microsoft Edge deve selezionare automaticamente un certificato quando sono presenti più corrispondenze di certificato per un sito configurato con "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7957">Configure whether Microsoft Edge should automatically select a certificate when there are multiple certificate matches for a site configured with "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7958">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7958">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7959">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 81 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7959">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7960">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7960">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7961">Determina se agli utenti viene richiesto di selezionare un certificato se sono presenti più certificati disponibili e un sito è configurato con [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7961">Toggles whether users are prompted to select a certificate if there are multiple certificates available and a site is configured with [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7962">Se non si configura [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) per un sito, all'utente verrà sempre chiesto di selezionare un certificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7962">If you don't configure [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) for a site, the user will always be prompted to select a certificate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7963">Se si imposta questo criterio su True, Microsoft Edge richiederà a un utente di selezionare un certificato per i siti nell'elenco definiti in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) solo e soltanto se sono presenti più certificati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7963">If you set this policy to True, Microsoft Edge will prompt a user to select a certificate for sites on the list defined in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) if and only if there is more than one certificate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7964">Se si imposta questo criterio su False o non lo si configura, Microsoft Edge selezionerà automaticamente un certificato anche se sono presenti più corrispondenze per un certificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7964">If you set this policy to False or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will automatically select a certificate even if there are multiple matches for a certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7965">All'utente non verrà richiesto di selezionare un certificato per i siti nell'elenco definito in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7965">The user will not be prompted to select a certificate for sites on the list defined in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7966">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7966">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7967">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7967">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7968">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7968">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7969">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7969">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7970">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7970">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7971">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7971">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7972">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7972">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7973">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7973">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7974">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7974">GP unique name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7975">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura se Microsoft Edge deve selezionare automaticamente un certificato quando sono presenti più corrispondenze di certificato per un sito configurato con "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7975">GP name: Configure whether Microsoft Edge should automatically select a certificate when there are multiple certificate matches for a site configured with "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7976">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7976">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7977">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7977">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7978">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7978">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7979">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7979">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7980">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7980">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7981">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7981">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7982">Nome valore: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7982">Value Name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7983">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7983">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7984">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7984">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7985">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7985">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7986">Nome chiave di preferenza: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7986">Preference Key Name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7987">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7987">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="forceephemeralprofiles"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7989">ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7989">ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-use-of-ephemeral-profiles"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7990">Abilita l'uso di profili temporanei</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7990">Enable use of ephemeral profiles</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7991">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7991">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7992">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7992">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-7993">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7993">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7994">Controlla se i profili utente vengono convertiti in modalità temporanea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7994">Controls whether user profiles are switched to ephemeral mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7995">Un profilo temporaneo viene creato all'avvio di una sessione, viene eliminato al termine della sessione e viene associato al profilo originale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7995">An ephemeral profile is created when a session begins, is deleted when the session ends, and is associated with the user's original profile.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7996">Se si abilita questo criterio, i profili vengono eseguiti in modalità temporanea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7996">If you enable this policy, profiles run in ephemeral mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7997">Questo consente agli utenti di lavorare dai propri dispositivi senza salvare i dati di esplorazione in tali dispositivi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7997">This lets users work from their own devices without saving browsing data to those devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-7998">Se si abilita questo criterio come criterio del sistema operativo (usando l'oggetto Criteri di gruppo in Windows, ad esempio), si applica a tutti i profili nel sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7998">If you enable this policy as an OS policy (by using GPO on Windows, for example), it applies to every profile on the system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-7999">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti ottengono i loro normali profili quando accedono al browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-7999">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, users get their regular profiles when they sign in to the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8000">In modalità temporanea, i dati dei profili vengono salvati nel disco solo per la durata della sessione utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8000">In ephemeral mode, profile data is saved on disk only for the length of the user session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8001">Le funzionalità come la cronologia del browser, le estensioni e i relativi dati, i dati Web come i cookie e i database Web non vengono salvati dopo la chiusura del browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8001">Features like browser history, extensions and their data, web data like cookies, and web databases aren't saved after the browser is closed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8002">Questo non impedisce a un utente di scaricare manualmente i dati nel disco, di salvare o stampare pagine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8002">This doesn't prevent a user from manually downloading any data to disk, or from saving pages or printing them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8003">Se l'utente ha abilitato la sincronizzazione, tutti i dati vengono conservati nei loro account di sincronizzazione, esattamente come con i profili normali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8003">If the user has enabled sync, all data is preserved in their sync accounts just like with regular profiles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8004">Gli utenti possono anche usare l'esplorazione InPrivate in modalità temporanea, a meno che non venga disabilitata esplicitamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8004">Users can also use InPrivate browsing in ephemeral mode unless you explicitly disable this.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8005">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8005">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8006">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8006">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8007">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8007">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8008">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8008">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8009">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8009">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8010">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8010">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8011">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8011">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8012">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8012">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8013">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8013">GP unique name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8014">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita l'uso di profili temporanei</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8014">GP name: Enable use of ephemeral profiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8015">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8015">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8016">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8016">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8017">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8017">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8018">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8018">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8019">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8019">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8020">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8020">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8021">Nome valore: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8021">Value Name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8022">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8022">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8023">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8023">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8024">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8024">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8025">Nome chiave di preferenza: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8025">Preference Key Name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8026">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8026">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="forcegooglesafesearch"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8028">ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8028">ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>

  #### <a name="enforce-google-safesearch"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8029">Applica Ricerca sicura di Google</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8029">Enforce Google SafeSearch</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8030">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8030">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8031">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8031">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8032">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8032">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8033">Impone l'esecuzione di query nella ricerca Web Google con Ricerca sicura attivata e impedisce agli utenti di modificare questa impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8033">Forces queries in Google Web Search to be performed with SafeSearch set to active, and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8034">Se si abilita questo criterio, Ricerca sicura in Google Search sarà sempre attiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8034">If you enable this policy, SafeSearch in Google Search is always active.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8035">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, Ricerca sicura in Google Search non viene applicata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8035">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, SafeSearch in Google Search isn't enforced.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8036">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8036">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8037">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8037">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8038">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8038">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8039">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8039">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8040">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8040">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8041">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8041">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8042">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8042">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8043">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8043">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8044">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8044">GP unique name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8045">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Applica Ricerca sicura di Google</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8045">GP name: Enforce Google SafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8046">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8046">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8047">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8047">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8048">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8048">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8049">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8049">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8050">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8050">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8051">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8051">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8052">Nome valore: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8052">Value Name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8053">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8053">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8054">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8054">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8055">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8055">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8056">Nome chiave di preferenza: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8056">Preference Key Name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>


  ### <a name="forcelegacydefaultreferrerpolicy"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8059">ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8059">ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>

  #### <a name="use-a-default-referrer-policy-of-no-referrer-when-downgrade-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8060">Usa un criterio di referrer predefinito di no-referrer-when-downgrade (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8060">Use a default referrer policy of no-referrer-when-downgrade (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8061">OBSOLETO: questo criterio è obsoleto e non funziona dopo Microsoft Edge 88.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8061">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8062">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8062">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8063">In Windows e macOS da 81 a 88</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8063">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 88</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8064">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8064">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8065">Questo criterio non funziona perché è solo un meccanismo a breve termine che offre alle aziende più tempo per aggiornare i contenuti Web se viene rilevata incompatibilità con il nuovo criterio di riferimento predefinito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8065">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if it was found to be incompatible with the new default referrer policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8066">Il criterio di riferimento predefinito di Microsoft Edge è stato rafforzato dal valore di no-referrer-when-downgrade a quello più sicuro strict-origin-when-cross-origin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8066">Microsoft Edge's default referrer policy was strengthened from the value of no-referrer-when-downgrade to the more secure strict-origin-when-cross-origin.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8067">Quando questo criterio aziendale viene abilitato, il criterio di riferimento predefinito di Microsoft Edge verrà impostato sul valore precedente di no-referrer-when-downgrade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8067">When this enterprise policy is enabled, Microsoft Edge's default referrer policy will be set to its old value of no-referrer-when-downgrade.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8068">Questo criterio aziendale è disabilitato per impostazione predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8068">This enterprise policy is disabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8069">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8069">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8070">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8070">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8071">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8071">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8072">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8072">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8073">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8073">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8074">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8074">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8075">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8075">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8076">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8076">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8077">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8077">GP unique name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8078">Nome Criteri di gruppo: usa un criterio di referrer predefinito di no-referrer-when-downgrade (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8078">GP name: Use a default referrer policy of no-referrer-when-downgrade (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8079">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8079">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8080">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8080">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8081">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8081">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8082">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8082">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8083">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8083">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8084">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8084">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8085">Nome valore: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8085">Value Name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8086">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8086">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8087">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8087">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8088">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8088">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8089">Nome chiave di preferenza: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8089">Preference Key Name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8090">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8090">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="forcenetworkinprocess"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8092">ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8092">ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-networking-code-to-run-in-the-browser-process-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8093">Forza l'esecuzione del codice di rete nel processo del browser (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8093">Force networking code to run in the browser process (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8094">OBSOLETO: questo criterio è obsoleto e non funziona dopo Microsoft Edge 83.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8094">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 83.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8095">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8095">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8096">In Windows dalla versione 78 a 83</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8096">On Windows since 78, until 83</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8097">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8097">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8098">Questo criterio non funziona perché era solo un meccanismo a breve termine che offre alle aziende più tempo per eseguire la migrazione a software di terze parti che non dipendono dalle API di rete collegate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8098">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to migrate to 3rd party software that doesn't depend on hooking networking APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8099">Sono consigliati server proxy con LSP e patch dell'API Win32.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8099">Proxy servers are recommended over LSPs and Win32 API patching.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8100">Questo criterio forza l'esecuzione del codice di rete nel processo del browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8100">This policy forces networking code to run in the browser process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8101">Questo criterio è disabilitato per impostazione predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8101">This policy is disabled by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8102">Se abilitato, gli utenti sono esposti a problemi di sicurezza quando il processo di rete è in modalità sandbox.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8102">If enabled, users are open to security issues when the networking process is sandboxed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8103">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8103">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8104">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8104">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8105">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8105">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8106">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8106">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8107">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8107">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8108">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8108">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8109">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8109">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8110">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8110">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8111">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8111">GP unique name: ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8112">Nome Criteri di gruppo: forza l'esecuzione del codice di rete nel processo del browser (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8112">GP name: Force networking code to run in the browser process (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8113">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8113">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8114">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8114">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8115">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8115">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8116">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8116">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8117">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8117">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8118">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8118">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8119">Nome valore: ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8119">Value Name: ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8120">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8120">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8121">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8121">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```
