  ### <a name="forcesync"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8123">ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8123">ForceSync</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-synchronization-of-browser-data-and-do-not-show-the-sync-consent-prompt"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8124">Forza la sincronizzazione dei dati del browser e non visualizzare la richiesta di autorizzazione di sincronizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8124">Force synchronization of browser data and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8125">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8125">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8126">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8126">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8127">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8127">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8128">Forza la sincronizzazione dei dati in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8128">Forces data synchronization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8129">Questo criterio impedisce anche all'utente di disattivare la sincronizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8129">This policy also prevents the user from turning sync off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8130">Se non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti potranno attivare o disattivare la sincronizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8130">If you don't configure this policy, users will be able to turn sync on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8131">Se si abilita questo criterio, gli utenti non potranno disattivare la sincronizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8131">If you enable this policy, users will not be able to turn sync off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8132">Affinché il criterio funzioni come previsto, il criterio [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) non deve essere configurato o deve essere impostati su abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8132">For this policy to work as intended, [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy must not be configured, or must be set to enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8133">Se [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) è disabilitato, [ForceSync](#forcesync) non avrà effetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8133">If [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) is set to disabled, then [ForceSync](#forcesync) will not take affect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8134">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) non deve essere configurato o deve essere impostato su False.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8134">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) must not be configured or must be set to False.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8135">Se è impostato su True, [ForceSync](#forcesync) non avrà effetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8135">If this is set to True, [ForceSync](#forcesync) will not take affect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8136">0 = non avviare automaticamente la sincronizzazione e visualizzare il consenso di sincronizzazione (impostazione predefinita) 1 = forza l'attivazione della sincronizzazione per il profilo utente di Azure AD/Azure AD - danneggiato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8136">0 = Do not automatically start sync and show the sync consent (default) 1 = Force sync to be turned on for Azure AD/Azure AD-Degraded user profile and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8137">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8137">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8138">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8138">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8139">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8139">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8140">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8140">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8141">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8141">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8142">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8142">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8143">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8143">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8144">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8144">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8145">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8145">GP unique name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8146">Nome Criteri di gruppo: forza la sincronizzazione dei dati del browser e non visualizzare la richiesta di autorizzazione di sincronizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8146">GP name: Force synchronization of browser data and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8147">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8147">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8148">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8148">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8149">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8149">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8150">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8150">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8151">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8151">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8152">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8152">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8153">Nome valore: ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8153">Value Name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8154">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8154">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8155">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8155">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8156">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8156">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8157">Nome chiave di preferenza: ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8157">Preference Key Name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8158">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8158">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="forceyoutuberestrict"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8160">ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8160">ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-minimum-youtube-restricted-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8161">Forza la modalità con restrizioni YouTube minima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8161">Force minimum YouTube Restricted Mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8162">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8162">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8163">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8163">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8164">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8164">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8165">Impone una modalità con restrizioni minime su YouTube e impedisce agli utenti di selezionare una modalità con restrizioni meno rigide.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8165">Enforces a minimum Restricted Mode on YouTube and prevents users from picking a less restricted mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8166">Si imposta su “Strict” per applicare la modalità con restrizioni rigide su YouTube.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8166">Set to 'Strict' to enforce Strict Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8167">Si imposta su “Moderate” per imporre all'utente di usare solo la modalità con restrizioni moderate e la modalità con restrizioni rigide su YouTube.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8167">Set to 'Moderate' to enforce the user to only use Moderate Restricted Mode and Strict Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8168">Non è possibile disabilitare la modalità con restrizioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8168">They can't disable Restricted Mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8169">Si imposta su “Off” o non si configura questo criterio per non imporre la modalità con restrizioni su YouTube.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8169">Set to 'Off' or don't configure this policy to not enforce Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8170">I criteri esterni, come quelli di YouTube, potrebbero applicare la modalità con restrizioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8170">External policies such as YouTube policies might still enforce Restricted Mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8171">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8171">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8172">Off (0) = Non applicare la modalità con restrizioni su YouTube</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8172">Off (0) = Do not enforce Restricted Mode on YouTube</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8173">Moderate (1) = Applicare almeno la modalità con restrizioni moderate su YouTube</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8173">Moderate (1) = Enforce at least Moderate Restricted Mode on YouTube</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8174">Strict (2) = Applicare la modalità con restrizioni rigide su YouTube</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8174">Strict (2) = Enforce Strict Restricted Mode for YouTube</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8175">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8175">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8176">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8176">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8177">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8177">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8178">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8178">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8179">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8179">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8180">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8180">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8181">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8181">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8182">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8182">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8183">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8183">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8184">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8184">GP unique name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8185">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Forza la modalità con restrizioni YouTube minima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8185">GP name: Force minimum YouTube Restricted Mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8186">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8186">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8187">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8187">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8188">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8188">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8189">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8189">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8190">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8190">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8191">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8191">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8192">Nome valore: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8192">Value Name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8193">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8193">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8194">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8194">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8195">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8195">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8196">Nome chiave di preferenza: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8196">Preference Key Name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8197">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8197">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```

  ### <a name="fullscreenallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8199">FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8199">FullscreenAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-full-screen-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8200">Consente la modalità a schermo intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8200">Allow full screen mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8201">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8201">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8202">In Windows dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8202">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8203">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8203">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8204">Imposta la disponibilità della modalità a schermo intero: tutta l'interfaccia utente di Microsoft Edge viene nascosta e sono visibili solo i contenuti Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8204">Set the availability of full screen mode - all Microsoft Edge UI is hidden and only web content is visible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8205">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, l'utente, le app e le estensioni con le autorizzazioni appropriate possono attivare la modalità a schermo intero.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8205">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the user, apps, and extensions with appropriate permissions can enter full screen mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8206">Se si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti, le app e le estensioni non potranno attivare la modalità a schermo intero.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8206">If you disable this policy, users, apps, and extensions can't enter full screen mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8207">L'apertura di Microsoft Edge in modalità tutto schermo con la riga di comando non è disponibile quando la modalità a schermo intero è disabilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8207">Opening Microsoft Edge in kiosk mode using the command line is unavailable when full screen mode is disabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8208">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8208">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8209">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8209">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8210">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8210">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8211">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8211">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8212">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8212">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8213">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8213">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8214">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8214">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8215">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8215">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8216">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8216">GP unique name: FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8217">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente la modalità a schermo intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8217">GP name: Allow full screen mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8218">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8218">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8219">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8219">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8220">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8220">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8221">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8221">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8222">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8222">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8223">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8223">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8224">Nome valore: FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8224">Value Name: FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8225">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8225">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8226">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8226">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="globallyscopehttpauthcacheenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8228">GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8228">GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-globally-scoped-http-auth-cache"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8229">Abilita la cache di autenticazione HTTP con ambito globale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8229">Enable globally scoped HTTP auth cache</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8230">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8230">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8231">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 81 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8231">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8232">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8232">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8233">Questo criterio configura una singola cache per profilo globale con le credenziali di autenticazione del server HTTP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8233">This policy configures a single global per profile cache with HTTP server authentication credentials.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8234">Se si disabilita o non si imposta questo criterio, il browser userà il comportamento predefinito dell'autenticazione cross-site che, a partire dalla versione 80, sarà quello di definire l'ambito delle credenziali di autenticazione del server HTTP per il sito principale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8234">If you disable or don't set this policy, the browser will use the default behavior of cross-site auth, which as of version 80, will be to scope HTTP server authentication credentials by top-level site.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8235">Quindi, se due siti usano risorse dello stesso dominio di autenticazione, le credenziali dovranno essere fornite in modo indipendente nel contesto di entrambi i siti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8235">So, if two sites use resources from the same authenticating domain, credentials will need to be provided independently in the context of both sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8236">Le credenziali del proxy memorizzato nella cache verranno riutilizzate in più siti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8236">Cached proxy credentials will be reused across sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8237">Se si abilita questo criterio, le credenziali di autenticazione HTTP inserite nel contesto di un sito verranno automaticamente usate nel contesto di un altro sito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8237">If you enable this policy HTTP auth credentials entered in the context of one site will automatically be used in the context of another site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8238">L'abilitazione di questo criterio lascia i siti esposti ad alcuni tipi di attacchi cross-site e consente agli utenti di essere rintracciati nei siti anche senza i cookie, aggiungendo voci alla cache di autenticazione HTTP con le credenziali incorporate negli URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8238">Enabling this policy leaves sites open to some types of cross-site attacks, and allows users to be tracked across sites even without cookies by adding entries to the HTTP auth cache using credentials embedded in URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8239">Questo criterio ha lo scopo di offrire alle aziende, a seconda del comportamento legacy, la possibilità di aggiornare le procedure di accesso e verrà rimosso in futuro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8239">This policy is intended to give enterprises depending on the legacy behavior a chance to update their login procedures and will be removed in the future.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8240">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8240">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8241">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8241">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8242">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8242">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8243">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8243">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8244">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8244">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8245">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8245">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8246">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8246">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8247">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8247">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8248">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8248">GP unique name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8249">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita la cache di autenticazione HTTP con ambito globale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8249">GP name: Enable globally scoped HTTP auth cache</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8250">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8250">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8251">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8251">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8252">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8252">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8253">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8253">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8254">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8254">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8255">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8255">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8256">Nome valore: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8256">Value Name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8257">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8257">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8258">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8258">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8259">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8259">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8260">Nome chiave di preferenza: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8260">Preference Key Name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8261">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8261">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8262">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8262">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="gotointranetsiteforsinglewordentryinaddressbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8263">GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8263">GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-direct-intranet-site-navigation-instead-of-searching-on-single-word-entries-in-the-address-bar"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8264">Forza l'esplorazione del sito Intranet diretta anziché tramite la ricerca di singole parole nella barra degli indirizzi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8264">Force direct intranet site navigation instead of searching on single word entries in the Address Bar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8265">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8265">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8266">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 78 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8266">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8267">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8267">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8268">Se si abilita questo criterio, il risultato di suggerimento automatico principale nell'elenco di suggerimenti della barra degli indirizzi reindirizza ai siti Intranet se il testo inserito nella barra degli indirizzi è una singola parola senza punteggiatura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8268">If you enable this policy, the top auto-suggest result in the address bar suggestion list will navigate to intranet sites if the text entered in the address bar is a single word without punctuation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8269">L'esplorazione predefinita quando si digita una singola parola senza punteggiatura reindirizzerà l'utente a un sito Intranet corrispondente al testo inserito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8269">Default navigation when typing a single word without punctuation will conduct a navigation to an intranet site matching the entered text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8270">Se si abilita questo criterio, il secondo risultato di suggerimento automatico nell'elenco di suggerimenti della barra degli indirizzi eseguirà una ricerca sul Web esattamente come è stato immesso il testo, purché tale testo sia una singola parola senza punteggiatura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8270">If you enable this policy, the second auto-suggest result in the address bar suggestion list will conduct a web search exactly as it was entered, provided that this text is a single word without punctuation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8271">Verrà usato il provider di ricerca predefinito se non è abilitato anche un criterio che impedisce la ricerca sul Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8271">The default search provider will be used unless a policy to prevent web search is also enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8272">Ecco due effetti derivanti dall'abilitazione di questo criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8272">Two effects of enabling this policy are:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8273">Lo spostamento nei siti in risposta a query formate da una singola parola che in genere vengono risolte in un elemento della cronologia non sarà più possibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8273">Navigation to sites in response to single word queries that would typically resolve to a history item will no longer happen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8274">Al contrario, il browser tenterà di passare a siti interni che potrebbero non esistere nell'Intranet di un'organizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8274">Instead, the browser will attempt navigate to internal sites that may not exist in an organization's intranet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8275">Il risultato sarà un errore 404.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8275">This will result in a 404 error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8276">Per i termini di ricerca più diffusi formati da una singola parola, è necessario selezionare manualmente i suggerimenti per eseguire la ricerca correttamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8276">Popular, single-word search terms will require manual selection of search suggestions to properly conduct a search.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8277">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8277">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8278">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8278">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8279">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8279">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8280">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8280">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8281">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8281">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8282">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8282">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8283">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8283">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8284">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8284">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8285">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8285">GP unique name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8286">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Forza l'esplorazione del sito Intranet diretta anziché tramite la ricerca di singole parole nella barra degli indirizzi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8286">GP name: Force direct intranet site navigation instead of searching on single word entries in the Address Bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8287">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8287">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8288">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8288">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8289">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8289">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8290">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8290">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8291">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8291">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8292">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8292">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8293">Nome valore: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8293">Value Name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8294">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8294">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8295">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8295">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="hstspolicybypasslist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8300">HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8300">HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-names-that-will-bypass-the-hsts-policy-check"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8301">Configura l'elenco di nomi che ignoreranno la verifica dei criteri HSTS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8301">Configure the list of names that will bypass the HSTS policy check</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8302">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8302">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8303">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 79 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8303">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8304">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8304">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8305">I nomi host specificati in questo elenco saranno esclusi dalla verifica dei criteri HSTS che potrebbe aggiornare le richieste da "http://" a "https://".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8305">Hostnames specified in this list will be exempt from the HSTS policy check that could potentially upgrade requests from "http://" to "https://".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8306">In questo criterio sono consentiti solo i nomi host con etichetta singola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8306">Only single-label hostnames are allowed in this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8307">I nomi host devono essere in forma canonica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8307">Hostnames must be canonicalized.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8308">Gli IDN devono essere convertiti nel formato con etichetta A e tutte le lettere devono essere minuscole.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8308">Any IDNs must be converted to their A-label format, and all ASCII letters must be lowercase.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8309">Questo criterio si applica solo ai nomi host specifici; non si applica ai sottodomini dei nomi nell'elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8309">This policy only applies to the specific hostnames specified; it doesn't apply to subdomains of the names in the list.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8310">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8310">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8311">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8311">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8312">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8312">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8313">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8313">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8314">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8314">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8315">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8315">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8316">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8316">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8317">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8317">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8318">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8318">GP unique name: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8319">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura l'elenco di nomi che ignoreranno la verifica dei criteri HSTS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8319">GP name: Configure the list of names that will bypass the HSTS policy check</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8320">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8320">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8321">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8321">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8322">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8322">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8323">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8323">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8324">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8324">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8325">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8325">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8326">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8326">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8327">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8327">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8328">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8328">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList\1 = "meet"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8329">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8329">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8330">Nome chiave di preferenza: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8330">Preference Key Name: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8331">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8331">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>meet</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8333">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8333">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="use-hardware-acceleration-when-available"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8334">Usa l'accelerazione hardware se disponibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8334">Use hardware acceleration when available</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8335">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8335">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8336">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8336">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8337">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8337">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8338">Specifica di usare l'accelerazione hardware, se disponibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8338">Specifies whether to use hardware acceleration if it's available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8339">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, l'accelerazione hardware è abilitata a meno che non venga esplicitamente bloccata una funzionalità della GPU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8339">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, hardware acceleration is enabled unless a GPU feature is explicitly blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8340">Se si disabilita questo criterio, l'accelerazione hardware è disabilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8340">If you disable this policy, hardware acceleration is disabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8341">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8341">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8342">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8342">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8343">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8343">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8344">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8344">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8345">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8345">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8346">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8346">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8347">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8347">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8348">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8348">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8349">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8349">GP unique name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8350">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Usa l'accelerazione hardware se disponibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8350">GP name: Use hardware acceleration when available</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8351">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8351">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8352">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8352">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8353">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8353">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8354">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8354">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8355">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8355">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8356">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8356">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8357">Nome valore: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8357">Value Name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8358">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8358">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8359">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8359">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8360">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8360">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8361">Nome chiave di preferenza: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8361">Preference Key Name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8362">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8362">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="hidefirstrunexperience"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8364">HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8364">HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>

  #### <a name="hide-the-first-run-experience-and-splash-screen"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8365">Nasconde l'esperienza della first-run experience e la schermata iniziale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8365">Hide the First-run experience and splash screen</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8366">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8366">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8367">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 80 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8367">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8368">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8368">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8369">Se si abilita questo criterio, la first-run experience e la schermata iniziale non verranno mostrate agli utenti quando eseguono Microsoft Edge per la prima volta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8369">If you enable this policy, the First-run experience and the splash screen will not be shown to users when they run Microsoft Edge for the first time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8370">Le opzioni di configurazione predefinite mostrate nella first-run experience del browser saranno le seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8370">For the configuration options shown in the First Run Experience, the browser will default to the following:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8371">- Nella pagina Nuova scheda, il tipo di feed sarà impostato su MSN Notizie e il layout su Ispirato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8371">-On the New Tab Page, the feed type will be set to MSN News and the layout to Inspirational.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8372">- L'utente continuerà ad accedere automaticamente a Microsoft Edge se l'account Windows è del tipo MSA o Azure AD.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8372">-The user will still be automatically signed into Microsoft Edge if the Windows account is of Azure AD or MSA type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8373">- La sincronizzazione non è abilitata per impostazione predefinita, e agli utenti viene chiesto di specificare se vogliono eseguire la sincronizzazione all'avvio del browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8373">-Sync will not be enabled by default and users will be prompted to choose whether they'd like to sync on browser startup.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8374">È possibile usare i criteri [ForceSync](#forcesync) o [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) per configurare la sincronizzazione e la richiesta di consenso per la sincronizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8374">You can use the [ForceSync](#forcesync) or the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy to configure sync and the sync consent prompt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8375">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, la first-run experience e la schermata iniziale verranno mostrate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8375">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the First-run experience and the Splash screen will be shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8376">Nota: le opzioni di configurazione specifiche mostrate all'utente nella first-run experience possono essere gestite anche usando altri criteri specifici.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8376">Note: The specific configuration options shown to the user in the First Run Experience, can also be managed by using other specific policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8377">È possibile usare il criterio HideFirstRunExperience in combinazione con questi criteri per configurare un'esperienza di browser specifica nei dispositivi gestiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8377">You can use the HideFirstRunExperience policy in combination with these policies to configure a specific browser experience on your managed devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8378">Ecco alcuni di questi altri criteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8378">Some of these other policies are:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8379">-[AutoImportAtFirstRun](#autoimportatfirstrun)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8379">-[AutoImportAtFirstRun](#autoimportatfirstrun)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8380">-[NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8380">-[NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8381">-[NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8381">-[NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8382">-[ForceSync](#forcesync)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8382">-[ForceSync](#forcesync)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8383">-[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8383">-[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8384">-[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8384">-[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8385">-[NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8385">-[NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8386">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8386">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8387">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8387">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8388">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8388">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8389">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8389">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8390">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8390">Data Type:</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8392">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8392">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8393">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8393">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8394">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8394">GP unique name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8395">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Nasconde l'esperienza della prima esecuzione e la schermata iniziale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8395">GP name: Hide the First-run experience and splash screen</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8396">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8396">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8397">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8397">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8398">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8398">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8399">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8399">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8400">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8400">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8401">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8401">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8402">Nome valore: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8402">Value Name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8403">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8403">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8404">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8404">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8405">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8405">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8406">Nome chiave di preferenza: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8406">Preference Key Name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>


  ### <a name="hideinternetexplorerredirectuxforincompatiblesitesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8409">HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8409">HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="hide-the-one-time-redirection-dialog-and-the-banner-on-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8410">Nascondi la finestra di dialogo Reindirizzamento occasionale e il banner su Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8410">Hide the one-time redirection dialog and the banner on Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8411">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8411">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8412">In Windows dalla versione 87 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8412">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8413">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8413">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8414">Questo criterio offre un'opzione per disabilitare la finestra di dialogo di reindirizzamento occasionale e il banner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8414">This policy gives an option to disable one-time redirection dialog and the banner.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8415">Quando questo criterio è abilitato, gli utenti non vedranno la finestra di dialogo di reindirizzamento occasionale e il banner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8415">When this policy is enabled, users will not see both the one-time dialog and the banner.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8416">Gli utenti continueranno a essere reindirizzati a Microsoft Edge quando incontreranno un sito Web incompatibile in Internet Explorer, ma i dati di esplorazione non verranno importati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8416">Users will continue to be redirected to Microsoft Edge when they encounter an incompatible website on Internet Explorer, but their browsing data will not be imported.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8417">Se si abilita questo criterio, la finestra di dialogo di reindirizzamento occasionale e il banner non verranno mai mostrati agli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8417">If you enable this policy the one-time redirection dialog and banner will never be shown to users.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8418">I dati di esplorazione degli utenti non vengono importati quando si verifica il reindirizzamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8418">Users' browsing data will not be imported when a redirection happens.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8419">Se il criterio è disabilitato o non viene configurato, verrà visualizzata la finestra di dialogo di reindirizzamento al primo tentativo di reindirizzamento e il banner di reindirizzamento permanente verrà visualizzato dagli utenti per le sessioni avviate con un reindirizzamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8419">If you disable or don't set this policy, the redirection dialog will be shown on the first redirection and the persistent redirection banner will be shown to users on sessions that begin with a redirection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8420">I dati di esplorazione degli utenti verranno importati ogni volta che un utente accede a tale reindirizzamento (SOLO SE si vuole che l'utente lo consideri nella finestra di dialogo occasionale).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8420">Users' browsing data will be imported every time user encounters such redirection (ONLY IF user consents to it on the one-time dialog).</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8421">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8421">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8422">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8422">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8423">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8423">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8424">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8424">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8425">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8425">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8426">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8426">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8427">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8427">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8428">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8428">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8429">Nome univoco GP: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8429">GP unique name: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8430">Nome GP: nascondi la finestra di dialogo Reindirizzamento occasionale e il banner su Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8430">GP name: Hide the one-time redirection dialog and the banner on Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8431">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8431">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8432">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8432">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8433">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8433">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8434">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8434">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8435">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8435">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8436">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8436">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8437">Nome valore: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8437">Value Name: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8438">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8438">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8439">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8439">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="importautofillformdata"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8441">ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8441">ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-autofill-form-data"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8442">Consente l'importazione dei dati di moduli con riempimento automatico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8442">Allow importing of autofill form data</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8443">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8443">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8444">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8444">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8445">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8445">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8446">Consente agli utenti di importare i dati di moduli con riempimento automatico da un altro browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8446">Allows users to import autofill form data from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8447">Se si abilita questo criterio, viene selezionata automaticamente l'opzione per l'importazione manuale dei dati di riempimento automatico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8447">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import autofill data is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8448">Se si disabilita questo criterio, i dati di moduli con riempimento automatico non vengono importati nella first-run experience e gli utenti non possono importarli manualmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8448">If you disable this policy, autofill form data isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8449">Se non si configura questo criterio, i dati di riempimento automatico vengono importati nella first-run experience e gli utenti possono scegliere se importare questi dati manualmente durante le sessioni di esplorazione successive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8449">If you don't configure this policy, autofill data is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8450">È possibile impostare questo criterio come suggerimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8450">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8451">Questo significa che Microsoft Edge importerà i dati di riempimento automatico nella first-run experience, ma gli utenti possono selezionare o deselezionare l'opzione relativa ai **dati di riempimento automatico** durante l'importazione manuale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8451">This means that Microsoft Edge will import autofill data on first run, but users can select or clear **autofill data** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8452">**Nota**: al momento questo criterio gestisce l'importazione dai browser Google Chrome (in Windows 7, 8 e 10 e in macOS) e Mozilla Firefox (in Windows 7, 8 e 10 e in macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8452">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) and Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8453">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8453">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8454">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8454">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8455">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8455">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8456">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8456">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8457">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8457">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8458">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8458">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8459">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8459">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8460">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8460">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8461">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8461">GP unique name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8462">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente l'importazione dei dati di moduli con riempimento automatico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8462">GP name: Allow importing of autofill form data</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8463">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8463">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8464">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8464">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8465">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8465">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8466">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8466">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8467">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8467">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8468">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8468">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8469">Nome valore: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8469">Value Name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8470">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8470">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8471">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8471">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8472">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8472">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8473">Nome chiave di preferenza: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8473">Preference Key Name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8474">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8474">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
