  ### <a name="importbrowsersettings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8476">ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8476">ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-browser-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8477">Consente l'importazione delle impostazioni del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8477">Allow importing of browser settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8478">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8478">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8479">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 78 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8479">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8480">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8480">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8481">Consente agli utenti di importare le impostazioni del browser da un altro browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8481">Allows users to import browser settings from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8482">Se si abilita questo criterio, la casella di controllo **Impostazioni browser** viene automaticamente selezionata nella finestra di dialogo **Importa dati del browser**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8482">If you enable this policy, the **Browser settings** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8483">Se si disabilita questo criterio, le impostazioni del browser non vengono importate alla prima esecuzione e gli utenti non possono importarle manualmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8483">If you disable this policy, browser settings aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8484">Se non si configura questo criterio, le impostazioni del browser vengono importate alla prima esecuzione e gli utenti possono scegliere se importarle manualmente durante le sessioni di esplorazione successive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8484">If you don't configure this policy, browser settings are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8485">È anche possibile impostare questo criterio come suggerimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8485">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8486">Questo significa che Microsoft Edge importerà le impostazioni nella first-run experience, ma gli utenti possono selezionare o deselezionare l'opzione relativa alle **impostazioni del browser** durante l'importazione manuale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8486">This means that Microsoft Edge imports the settings on first run, but users can select or clear the **browser settings** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8487">**Nota**: al momento questo criterio gestisce l'importazione da Google Chrome (in Windows 7, 8 e 10 e in macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8487">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8488">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8488">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8489">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8489">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8490">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8490">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8491">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8491">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8492">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8492">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8493">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8493">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8494">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8494">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8495">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8495">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8496">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8496">GP unique name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8497">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente l'importazione delle impostazioni del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8497">GP name: Allow importing of browser settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8498">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8498">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8499">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8499">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8500">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8500">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8501">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8501">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8502">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8502">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8503">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8503">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8504">Nome valore: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8504">Value Name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8505">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8505">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8506">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8506">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8507">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8507">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8508">Nome chiave di preferenza: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8508">Preference Key Name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8509">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8509">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importcookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8511">ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8511">ImportCookies</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-cookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8512">Consente l'importazione di cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8512">Allow importing of Cookies</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8513">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8513">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8514">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 81 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8514">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8515">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8515">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8516">Consente agli utenti di importare i cookie da un altro browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8516">Allows users to import Cookies from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8517">Se si disabilita questo criterio, i cookie non vengono importati nella first-run experience.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8517">If you disable this policy, Cookies aren't imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8518">Se non si configura questo criterio, i cookie vengono importati alla prima esecuzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8518">If you don't configure this policy, Cookies are imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8519">È anche possibile impostare questo criterio come suggerimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8519">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8520">Ciò significa che Microsoft Edge importa i cookie nella first-run experience.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8520">This means that Microsoft Edge imports Cookies on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8521">**Nota**: al momento questo criterio gestisce l'importazione da Google Chrome (in Windows 7, 8 e 10 e in macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8521">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8523">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8523">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8524">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8524">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8525">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8525">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8526">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8526">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8527">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8527">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8528">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8528">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8529">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8529">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8530">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8530">GP unique name: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8531">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente l'importazione di cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8531">GP name: Allow importing of Cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8532">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8532">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8533">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8533">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8534">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8534">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8535">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8535">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8536">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8536">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8537">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8537">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8538">Nome valore: ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8538">Value Name: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8539">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8539">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>


  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8541">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8541">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8542">Nome chiave di preferenza: ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8542">Preference Key Name: ImportCookies</span></span>

  ### <a name="importextensions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8545">ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8545">ImportExtensions</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-extensions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8546">Consente l'importazione di estensioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8546">Allow importing of extensions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8547">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8547">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8548">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 81 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8548">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8549">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8549">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8550">Consente agli utenti di importare le estensioni da un altro browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8550">Allows users to import extensions from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8551">Se si abilita questo criterio, la casella di controllo **Estensioni** viene automaticamente selezionata nella finestra di dialogo **Importa dati del browser**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8551">If you enable this policy, the **Extensions** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8552">Se si disabilita questo criterio, le estensioni non vengono importate nella first-run experience e gli utenti non possono importarle manualmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8552">If you disable this policy, extensions aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8553">Se non si configura questo criterio, le estensioni vengono importate nella first-run experience e gli utenti possono scegliere se importarle manualmente durante le sessioni di esplorazione successive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8553">If you don't configure this policy, extensions are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8554">È anche possibile impostare questo criterio come suggerimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8554">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8555">Questo significa che Microsoft Edge importerà le estensioni nella first-run experience, ma gli utenti possono selezionare o deselezionare l'opzione relativa ai **preferiti** durante l'importazione manuale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8555">This means that Microsoft Edge imports extensions on first run, but users can select or clear the **favorites** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8556">**Nota**: al momento questo criterio supporta solo l'importazione da Google Chrome (in Windows 7, 8 e 10 e in macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8556">**Note**: This policy currently only supports importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8557">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8557">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8558">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8558">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8559">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8559">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8560">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8560">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8561">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8561">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8562">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8562">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8563">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8563">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8564">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8564">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8565">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8565">GP unique name: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8566">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente l'importazione di estensioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8566">GP name: Allow importing of extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8567">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8567">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8568">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8568">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8569">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8569">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8570">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8570">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8571">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8571">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8572">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8572">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8573">Nome valore: ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8573">Value Name: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8574">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8574">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8575">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8575">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8576">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8576">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8577">Nome chiave di preferenza: ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8577">Preference Key Name: ImportExtensions</span></span>

  ### <a name="importfavorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8580">ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8580">ImportFavorites</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-favorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8581">Consente l'importazione di Preferiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8581">Allow importing of favorites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8582">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8582">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8583">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8583">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8584">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8584">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8585">Consente agli utenti di importare i preferiti da un altro browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8585">Allows users to import favorites from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8586">Se si abilita questo criterio, la casella di controllo **Preferiti** viene automaticamente selezionata nella finestra di dialogo **Importa dati del browser**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8586">If you enable this policy, the **Favorites** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8587">Se si disabilita questo criterio, i preferiti non vengono importati alla prima esecuzione e gli utenti non possono importarli manualmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8587">If you disable this policy, favorites aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8588">Se non si configura questo criterio, i preferiti vengono importati alla prima esecuzione e gli utenti possono scegliere se importarli manualmente durante le sessioni di esplorazione successive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8588">If you don't configure this policy, favorites are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8589">È anche possibile impostare questo criterio come suggerimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8589">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8590">Questo significa che Microsoft Edge importerà i preferiti nella first-run experience, ma gli utenti possono selezionare o deselezionare l'opzione relativa ai **preferiti** durante l'importazione manuale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8590">This means that Microsoft Edge imports favorites on first run, but users can select or clear the **favorites** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8591">**Nota**: al momento questo criterio gestisce l'importazione dai browser Internet Explorer (in Windows 7, 8 e 10), Google Chrome (in Windows 7, 8 e 10 e in macOS), Mozilla Firefox (in Windows 7, 8 e 10 e in macOS) e Apple Safari (in macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8591">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Apple Safari (on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8592">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8592">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8593">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8593">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8594">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8594">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8595">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8595">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8596">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8596">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8597">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8597">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8598">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8598">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8599">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8599">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8600">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8600">GP unique name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8601">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente l'importazione di Preferiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8601">GP name: Allow importing of favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8602">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8602">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8603">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8603">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8604">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8604">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8605">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8605">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8606">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8606">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8607">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8607">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8608">Nome valore: ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8608">Value Name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8609">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8609">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8610">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8610">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8611">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8611">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8612">Nome chiave di preferenza: ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8612">Preference Key Name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8613">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8613">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importhistory"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8615">ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8615">ImportHistory</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-browsing-history"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8616">Consente l'importazione della cronologia esplorazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8616">Allow importing of browsing history</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8617">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8617">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8618">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8618">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8619">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8619">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8620">Consente agli utenti di importare la cronologia esplorazioni da un altro browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8620">Allows users to import their browsing history from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8621">Se si abilita questo criterio, la casella di controllo **Cronologia esplorazioni** viene automaticamente selezionata nella finestra di dialogo **Importa dati del browser**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8621">If you enable this policy, the **Browsing history** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8622">Se si disabilita questo criterio, i dati della cronologia esplorazioni non vengono importati alla prima esecuzione e gli utenti non possono importare tali dati manualmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8622">If you disable this policy, browsing history data isn't imported at first run, and users can't import this data manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8623">Se non si configura questo criterio, i dati della cronologia esplorazioni vengono importati alla prima esecuzione e gli utenti possono scegliere se importarli manualmente durante le sessioni di esplorazione successive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8623">If you don't configure this policy, browsing history data is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import it manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8624">È anche possibile impostare questo criterio come suggerimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8624">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8625">Questo significa che Microsoft Edge importerà la cronologia esplorazioni nella first-run experience, ma gli utenti possono selezionare o deselezionare l'opzione relativa alla **cronologia** durante l'importazione manuale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8625">This means that Microsoft Edge imports browsing history on first run, but users can select or clear the **history** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8626">**Nota**: al momento questo criterio gestisce l'importazione dai browser Internet Explorer (in Windows 7, 8 e 10), Google Chrome (in Windows 7, 8 e 10 e in macOS), Mozilla Firefox (in Windows 7, 8 e 10 e in macOS) e Apple Safari (macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8626">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Apple Safari (macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8627">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8627">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8628">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8628">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8629">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8629">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8630">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8630">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8631">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8631">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8632">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8632">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8633">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8633">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8634">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8634">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8635">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8635">GP unique name: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8636">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente l'importazione della cronologia esplorazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8636">GP name: Allow importing of browsing history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8637">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8637">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8638">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8638">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8639">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8639">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8640">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8640">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8641">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8641">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8642">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8642">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8643">Nome valore: ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8643">Value Name: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8644">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8644">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8645">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8645">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8646">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8646">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8647">Nome chiave di preferenza: ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8647">Preference Key Name: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8648">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8648">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importhomepage"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8650">ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8650">ImportHomepage</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-home-page-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8651">Consente l'importazione delle impostazioni della home page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8651">Allow importing of home page settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8652">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8652">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8653">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8653">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8654">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8654">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8655">Consente agli utenti di importare l'impostazione della home page da un altro browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8655">Allows users to import their home page setting from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8656">Se si abilita questo criterio, viene selezionata automaticamente l'opzione per l'importazione manuale dell'impostazione della home page.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8656">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import the home page setting is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8657">Se si disabilita questo criterio, l'impostazione della home page non viene importata alla prima esecuzione e gli utenti non possono importarla manualmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8657">If you disable this policy, the home page setting isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8658">Se non si configura questo criterio, l'impostazione della home page viene importata alla prima esecuzione e gli utenti possono scegliere se importare questi dati manualmente durante le sessioni di esplorazione successive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8658">If you don't configure this policy, the home page setting is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8659">È possibile impostare questo criterio come suggerimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8659">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8660">Questo significa che Microsoft Edge importerà l'impostazione della home page nella first-run experience, ma gli utenti possono selezionare o deselezionare l'opzione relativa alla **home page** durante l'importazione manuale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8660">This means that Microsoft Edge imports the home page setting on first run, but users can select or clear the **home page** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8661">**Nota**: al momento questo criterio gestisce l'importazione da Internet Explorer (in Windows 7, 8 e 10).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8661">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8662">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8662">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8663">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8663">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8664">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8664">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8665">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8665">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8666">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8666">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8667">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8667">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8668">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8668">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8669">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8669">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8670">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8670">GP unique name: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8671">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente l'importazione delle impostazioni della home page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8671">GP name: Allow importing of home page settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8672">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8672">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8673">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8673">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8674">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8674">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8675">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8675">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8676">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8676">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8677">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8677">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8678">Nome valore: ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8678">Value Name: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8679">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8679">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8680">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8680">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="importopentabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8685">ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8685">ImportOpenTabs</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-open-tabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8686">Consente l'importazione di schede aperte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8686">Allow importing of open tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8687">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8687">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8688">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 79 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8688">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8689">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8689">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8690">Consente agli utenti di importare le schede aperte e aggiunte da un altro browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8690">Allows users to import open and pinned tabs from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8691">Se si abilita questo criterio, la casella di controllo **Schede aperte** viene automaticamente selezionata nella finestra di dialogo **Importa dati del browser**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8691">If you enable this policy, the **Open tabs** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8692">Se si disabilita questo criterio, le schede aperte non vengono importate nella first-run experience e gli utenti non possono importarle manualmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8692">If you disable this policy, open tabs aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8693">Se non si configura questo criterio, le schede aperte vengono importate nella first-run experience e gli utenti possono scegliere se importarle manualmente durante le sessioni di esplorazione successive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8693">If you don't configure this policy, open tabs are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8694">È anche possibile impostare questo criterio come suggerimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8694">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8695">Questo significa che Microsoft Edge importerà le schede aperte nella first-run experience, ma gli utenti possono selezionare o deselezionare l'opzione relativa alle **schede aperte** durante l'importazione manuale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8695">This means that Microsoft Edge imports open tabs on first run, but users can select or clear the **Open tabs** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8696">**Nota**: al momento questo criterio supporta solo l'importazione da Google Chrome (in Windows 7, 8 e 10 e in macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8696">**Note**: This policy currently only supports importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8697">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8697">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8698">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8698">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8699">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8699">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8700">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8700">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8701">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8701">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8702">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8702">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8703">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8703">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8704">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8704">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8705">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8705">GP unique name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8706">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente l'importazione di schede aperte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8706">GP name: Allow importing of open tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8707">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8707">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8708">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8708">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8709">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8709">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8710">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8710">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8711">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8711">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8712">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8712">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8713">Nome valore: ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8713">Value Name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8714">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8714">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8715">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8715">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8716">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8716">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8717">Nome chiave di preferenza: ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8717">Preference Key Name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8718">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8718">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importpaymentinfo"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8720">ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8720">ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8725">Consente agli utenti di importare le informazioni di pagamento da un altro browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8725">Allows users to import payment info from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8726">Se si abilita questo criterio, la casella di controllo **Informazioni di pagamento** viene automaticamente selezionata nella finestra di dialogo **Importa dati del browser**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8726">If you enable this policy, the **payment info** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8727">Se si disabilita questo criterio, le informazioni di pagamento non vengono importate alla prima esecuzione e gli utenti non possono importarle manualmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8727">If you disable this policy, payment info isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8728">Se non si configura questo criterio, le informazioni di pagamento vengono importate alla prima esecuzione e gli utenti possono scegliere se importarle manualmente durante le sessioni di esplorazione successive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8728">If you don't configure this policy, payment info is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import it manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8729">È anche possibile impostare questo criterio come suggerimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8729">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8730">Questo significa che Microsoft Edge importerà le informazioni di pagamento nella first-run experience, ma gli utenti possono selezionare o deselezionare l'opzione relativa alle **informazioni di pagamento** durante l'importazione manuale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8730">This means that Microsoft Edge imports payment info on first run, but users can select or clear the **payment info** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8731">**Nota**: al momento questo criterio gestisce l'importazione da Google Chrome (in Windows 7, 8 e 10 e in macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8731">**Note:** This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8747">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8747">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>

  ### <a name="importsavedpasswords"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8755">ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8755">ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8757">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8757">Supported versions:</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8760">Consente agli utenti di importare le password salvate da un altro browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8760">Allows users to import saved passwords from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8761">Se si abilita questo criterio, viene selezionata automaticamente l'opzione per l'importazione manuale delle password salvate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8761">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import saved passwords is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8762">Se si disabilita questo criterio, le password salvate non vengono importate nella first-run experience e gli utenti non possono importarle manualmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8762">If you disable this policy, saved passwords aren't imported on first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8763">Se non si configura questo criterio, le password salvate vengono importate nella first-run experience e gli utenti possono scegliere se importarle manualmente durante le sessioni di esplorazione successive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8763">If you don't configure this policy, passwords are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8764">È possibile impostare questo criterio come suggerimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8764">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8765">Questo significa che Microsoft Edge importerà le password salvate nella first-run experience, ma gli utenti possono selezionare o deselezionare l'opzione relativa alle **password** durante l'importazione manuale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8765">This means that Microsoft Edge imports passwords on first run, but users can select or clear the **passwords** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8766">**Nota**: al momento questo criterio gestisce l'importazione dai browser Internet Explorer (in Windows 7, 8 e 10), Google Chrome (in Windows 7, 8 e 10 e in macOS) e Mozilla Firefox (in Windows 7, 8 e 10 e in macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8766">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8769">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8769">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8776">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente l'importazione delle password salvate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8776">GP name: Allow importing of saved passwords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8777">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8777">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8778">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8778">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8779">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8779">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8780">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8780">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8781">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8781">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8782">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8782">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8783">Nome valore: ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8783">Value Name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8784">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8784">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8785">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8785">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8786">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8786">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8787">Nome chiave di preferenza: ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8787">Preference Key Name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>

  ### <a name="importsearchengine"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8790">ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8790">ImportSearchEngine</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-search-engine-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8791">Consente l'importazione delle impostazioni del motore di ricerca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8791">Allow importing of search engine settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8792">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8792">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8793">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8793">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8794">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8794">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8795">Consente agli utenti di importare le impostazioni del motore di ricerca da un altro browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8795">Allows users to import search engine settings from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8796">Se si abilita questo criterio, viene selezionata automaticamente l'opzione per l'importazione delle impostazioni del motore di ricerca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8796">If you enable, this policy, the option to import search engine settings is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8797">Se si disabilita questo criterio, le impostazioni del motore di ricerca non vengono importate alla prima esecuzione e gli utenti non possono importarle manualmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8797">If you disable this policy, search engine settings aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8798">Se non si configura questo criterio, le impostazioni del motore di ricerca vengono importate alla prima esecuzione e gli utenti possono scegliere se importare questi dati manualmente durante le sessioni di esplorazione successive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8798">If you don't configure this policy, search engine settings are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8799">È possibile impostare questo criterio come suggerimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8799">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8800">Questo significa che Microsoft Edge importerà le impostazioni del motore di ricerca nella first-run experience, ma gli utenti possono selezionare o deselezionare l'opzione relativa al **motore di ricerca** durante l'importazione manuale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8800">This means that Microsoft Edge imports search engine settings on first run, but users can select or clear the **search engine** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8801">**Nota**: al momento questo criterio gestisce l'importazione da Internet Explorer (in Windows 7, 8 e 10).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8801">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8802">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8802">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8803">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8803">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8804">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8804">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8805">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8805">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8806">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8806">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8807">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8807">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8808">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8808">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8809">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8809">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8810">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8810">GP unique name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8811">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente l'importazione delle impostazioni del motore di ricerca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8811">GP name: Allow importing of search engine settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8812">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8812">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8813">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8813">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8814">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8814">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8815">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8815">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8816">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8816">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8817">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8817">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8818">Nome valore: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8818">Value Name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8819">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8819">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8820">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8820">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8821">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8821">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8822">Nome chiave di preferenza: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8822">Preference Key Name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8823">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8823">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importshortcuts"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8825">ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8825">ImportShortcuts</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-shortcuts"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8826">Consente l'importazione di scelte rapide da tastiera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8826">Allow importing of shortcuts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8827">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8827">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8828">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 81 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8828">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8829">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8829">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8830">Consente agli utenti di importare i tasti di scelta rapida da un altro browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8830">Allows users to import Shortcuts from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8831">Se si disabilita questo criterio, le scelte rapide da tastiera non vengono importate nella first-run experience.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8831">If you disable this policy, Shortcuts aren't imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8832">Se non si configura questo criterio, i tasti di scelta rapida vengono importate alla prima esecuzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8832">If you don't configure this policy, Shortcuts are imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8833">È anche possibile impostare questo criterio come suggerimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8833">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8834">Ciò significa che Microsoft Edge importa le scelte rapide da tastiera nella first-run experience.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8834">This means that Microsoft Edge imports Shortcuts on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8835">**Nota**: al momento questo criterio gestisce l'importazione da Google Chrome (in Windows 7, 8 e 10 e in macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8835">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8836">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8836">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8837">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8837">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8838">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8838">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8839">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8839">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8840">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8840">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8841">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8841">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8842">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8842">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8843">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8843">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8844">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8844">GP unique name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8845">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente l'importazione di scelte rapide da tastiera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8845">GP name: Allow importing of shortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8846">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8846">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8847">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8847">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8848">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8848">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8849">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8849">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8850">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8850">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8851">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8851">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8852">Nome valore: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8852">Value Name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8853">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8853">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8854">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8854">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8855">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8855">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8856">Nome chiave di preferenza: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8856">Preference Key Name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8857">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8857">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<true/>
```
