  ### <a name="inprivatemodeavailability"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8859">InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8859">InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-inprivate-mode-availability"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8860">Configura la disponibilità della modalità InPrivate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8860">Configure InPrivate mode availability</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8861">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8861">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8862">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8862">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8863">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8863">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8864">Specifica se l'utente può aprire le pagine in modalità InPrivate in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8864">Specifies whether the user can open pages in InPrivate mode in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8865">Se questo criterio non viene configurato o viene impostato su "Abilitato", gli utenti possono aprire le pagine in modalità InPrivate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8865">If you don't configure this policy or set it to 'Enabled', users can open pages in InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8866">Impostare questo criterio su "Disabilitato" per impedire agli utenti di usare la modalità InPrivate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8866">Set this policy to 'Disabled' to stop users from using InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8867">Impostare questo criterio su "Forzato" per usare sempre la modalità InPrivate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8867">Set this policy to 'Forced' to always use InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8868">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8868">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8869">Abilitato (0) = Modalità InPrivate disponibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8869">Enabled (0) = InPrivate mode available</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8870">Disabilitato (1) = Modalità InPrivate disabilitata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8870">Disabled (1) = InPrivate mode disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8871">Forzato (2) = Modalità InPrivate forzata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8871">Forced (2) = InPrivate mode forced</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8872">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8872">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8873">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8873">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8874">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8874">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8875">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8875">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8876">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8876">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8877">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8877">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8878">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8878">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8879">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8879">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8880">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8880">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8881">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8881">GP unique name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8883">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8883">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8886">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8886">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8887">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8887">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8888">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8888">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8890">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8890">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8891">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8891">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="insecureformswarningsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8896">InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8896">InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-warnings-for-insecure-forms"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8897">Attiva gli avvisi per i moduli non sicuri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8897">Enable warnings for insecure forms</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8898">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8898">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8899">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8899">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8900">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8900">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8901">Questo criterio controlla la gestione di moduli non protetti (moduli inviati tramite HTTP) incorporati in siti di sicurezza (HTTPS) nel browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8901">This policy controls the handling of insecure forms (forms submitted over HTTP) embedded in secure (HTTPS) sites in the browser.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8902">Se si abilita questo criterio o non lo si imposta, viene visualizzato un avviso a pagina intera quando viene inviato un modulo non protetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8902">If you enable this policy or don't set it, a full page warning will be shown when an insecure form is submitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8903">Inoltre, viene visualizzata una bolla di avviso accanto ai campi del modulo quando sono evidenziati e la funzione riempimento automatico viene disabilitata per tali moduli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8903">Additionally, a warning bubble will be shown next to the form fields when they are focused, and autofill will be disabled for those forms.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8904">Se si disabilitano i criteri, gli avvisi non verranno visualizzati per i moduli non sicuri e il riempimento automatico funzionerà normalmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8904">If you disable this policy, warnings will not be shown for insecure forms, and autofill will work normally.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8905">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8905">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8906">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8906">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8907">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8907">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8908">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8908">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8909">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8909">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8910">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8910">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8911">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8911">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8912">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8912">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8913">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8913">GP unique name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8914">Nome Criteri di gruppo: attiva gli avvisi per i moduli non sicuri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8914">GP name: Enable warnings for insecure forms</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8915">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8915">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8916">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8916">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8917">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8917">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8918">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8918">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8919">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8919">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8920">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8920">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8921">Nome valore: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8921">Value Name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8922">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8922">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8923">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8923">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8924">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8924">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8925">Nome chiave di preferenza: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8925">Preference Key Name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8926">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8926">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="intensivewakeupthrottlingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8928">IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8928">IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-the-intensivewakeupthrottling-feature"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8929">Controlla la funzionalità IntensiveWakeUpThrottling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8929">Control the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8930">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8930">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8931">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 85 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8931">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8932">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8932">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8933">Quando la funzionalità IntensiveWakeUpThrottling è abilitata, questa fa sì che i timer JavaScript nelle schede di sfondo vengano aggressivamente limitati e uniti, funzionando non più di una volta al minuto dopo che una pagina è stata fatta passare in background per 5 minuti o più.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8933">When enabled the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature causes Javascript timers in background tabs to be aggressively throttled and coalesced, running no more than once per minute after a page has been backgrounded for 5 minutes or more.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8934">Si tratta di una caratteristica conforme agli standard Web, ma può infrangere le funzionalità di alcuni siti web causando il ritardo di determinate azioni per un massimo di un minuto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8934">This is a web standards compliant feature, but it may break functionality on some websites by causing certain actions to be delayed by up to a minute.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8935">Tuttavia, se abilitata, comporta un notevole risparmio di CPU e batteria. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8935">However, it results in significant CPU and battery savings when enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8936">Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere https://bit.ly/30b1XR4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8936">See https://bit.ly/30b1XR4 for more details.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8937">Se si abilita questo criterio, l’attivazione della funzione verrà forzata e gli utenti non saranno in grado di eseguire l'override di questa impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8937">If you enable this policy, the feature will be force enabled, and users will not be able to override this setting.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8938">Se si disabilita questo criterio, la disattivazione della funzione verrà forzata e gli utenti non saranno in grado di eseguire l'override di questa impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8938">If you disable this policy, the feature will be force disabled, and users will not be able to override this setting.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8939">Se non si configura questo criterio, la funzione sarà controllata dalla relativa logica interna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8939">If you don't configure this policy, the feature will be controlled by its own internal logic.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8940">Gli utenti possono configurare manualmente questa opzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8940">Users can manually configure this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8941">Il criterio viene applicato per processo di rendering, con il valore più recente dell'impostazione del criterio in vigore all'avvio di un processo di rendering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8941">Note that the policy is applied per renderer process, with the most recent value of the policy setting in force when a renderer process starts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8942">Per garantire che tutte le schede caricate ricevano un'impostazione coerente dei criteri, è necessario riavviare il sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8942">A full restart is required to ensure that all the loaded tabs receive a consistent policy setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8943">I processi in esecuzione con valori diversi da questo criterio non comportano alcun rischio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8943">It is harmless for processes to be running with different values of this policy.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8944">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8944">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8945">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8945">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8946">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8946">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8947">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8947">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8948">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8948">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8949">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8949">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8950">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8950">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8951">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8951">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8952">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8952">GP unique name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8953">Nome Criteri di gruppo: controlla la funzionalità IntensiveWakeUpThrottling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8953">GP name: Control the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8954">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8954">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8955">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8955">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8956">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8956">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8957">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8957">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8958">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8958">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8959">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8959">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8960">Nome valore: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8960">Value Name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8961">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8961">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8962">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8962">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8963">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8963">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8964">Nome chiave preferenza: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8964">Preference Key Name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8965">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8965">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationenhancedhangdetection"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8967">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8967">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-enhanced-hang-detection-for-internet-explorer-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8968">Configura il rilevamento di blocchi avanzati per la modalità di Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8968">Configure enhanced hang detection for Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8969">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8969">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8970">In Windows dalla versione 84 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8970">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8971">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8971">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8972">Il rilevamento di eventi di blocco avanzati offre un approccio più granulare per il rilevamento di pagine Web bloccate in modalità Internet Explorer, rispetto a quello che utilizza Internet Explorer in modo autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8972">Enhanced hang detection is a more granular approach to detecting hung webpages in Internet Explorer mode than what standalone Internet Explorer uses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8973">Quando viene rilevata una pagina web bloccata, il browser applica un’azione di prevenzione per evitare che il resto del browser si blocchi a sua volta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8973">When a hung webpage is detected, the browser will apply a mitigation to prevent the rest of the browser from hanging.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8974">Questa opzione consente di configurare l'uso del rilevamento di eventi di blocco avanzato nel caso in cui si verificano problemi incompatibili con qualsiasi sito web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8974">This setting allows you to configure the use of enhanced hang detection in case you run into incompatible issues with any of your websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8975">È consigliabile disabilitare questo criterio solo se vengono visualizzate notifiche come "(sito Web) non risponde" in modalità Internet Explorer, ma non in Internet Explorer in modo autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8975">We recommend disabling this policy only if you see notifications such as "(website) is not responding" in Internet Explorer mode but not in standalone Internet Explorer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8976">Questa impostazione funziona in combinazione con i criteri: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) impostato su "IEMode e [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist), in cui l'elenco ha almeno una voce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8976">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8977">Se si imposta questo criterio su "Abilitato" o non lo si configura, i siti Web in esecuzione in modalità Internet Explorer useranno il rilevamento di eventi di blocco avanzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8977">If you set this policy to 'Enabled' or don't configure it, websites running in Internet Explorer mode will use enhanced hang detection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8978">Se si imposta questo criterio su "Disabilitato", il rilevamento di eventi di blocco avanzato viene disabilitato e per gli utenti sarà disponibile il rilevamento di eventi di blocco di base di Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8978">If you set this policy to 'Disabled', enhanced hang detection is disabled, and users will get the basic Internet Explorer hang detection behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8979">Per altre informazioni sulla modalità Internet Explorer, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8979">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8980">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8980">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8981">Disabilitato (0) = Rilevamento di eventi di blocco avanzato disabilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8981">Disabled (0) = Enhanced hang detection disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8982">Abilitato (1) = Rilevamento di eventi di blocco avanzato abilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8982">Enabled (1) = Enhanced hang detection enabled</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-8983">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8983">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8984">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8984">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8985">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8985">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8986">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8986">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8987">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8987">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8988">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8988">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8989">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8989">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8990">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8990">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8991">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8991">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8992">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8992">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8993">Nome Criteri di gruppo: configura il rilevamento di blocchi avanzati per la modalità Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8993">GP name: Configure enhanced hang detection for Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8994">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8994">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8995">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8995">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8996">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8996">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-8997">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8997">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8998">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8998">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-8999">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-8999">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9000">Nome valore: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9000">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9001">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9001">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9002">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9002">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationlevel"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9004">InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9004">InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-internet-explorer-integration"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9005">Configurare l'integrazione Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9005">Configure Internet Explorer integration</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9006">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9006">Supported versions:</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9008">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9008">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9009">Per istruzioni sulla configurazione dell'esperienza ottimale per la modalità di Internet Explorer, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9009">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9010">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9010">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9011">None (0) = Nessuno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9011">None (0) = None</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9012">IEMode (1) = Modalità Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9012">IEMode (1) = Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9013">NeedIE (2) = Internet Explorer 11</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9013">NeedIE (2) = Internet Explorer 11</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9014">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9014">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9015">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9015">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9016">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9016">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9017">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9017">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9018">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9018">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9019">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9019">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9020">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9020">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9021">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9021">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9022">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9022">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9023">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9023">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9024">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configurare l'integrazione Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9024">GP name: Configure Internet Explorer integration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9025">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9025">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9026">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9026">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9027">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9027">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9028">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9028">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9029">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9029">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9030">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9030">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9031">Nome valore: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9031">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9032">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9032">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9033">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9033">Example value:</span></span>


  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationlocalfileallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9035">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9035">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-launching-of-local-files-in-internet-explorer-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9036">Consentire l'avvio di file locali in modalità Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9036">Allow launching of local files in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9037">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9037">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9038">In Windows dalla versione 88 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9038">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9039">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9039">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9040">Questo criterio Controlla la disponibilità dell'argomento della riga di comando--IE-mode-file-URL usato per avviare Microsoft Edge con un file locale specificato nella riga di comando in modalità Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9040">This policy controls the availability of the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument which is used to launch Microsoft Edge with a local file specified on the command line into Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9041">Questa impostazione funziona in combinazione con: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) è impostato su' IEMode '.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9041">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9042">Se si imposta questo criterio su true o non lo si configura, l'utente può usare l'argomento della riga di comando--IE-mode-file-URL per l'avvio di file locali in modalità Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9042">If you set this policy to true, or don't configure it, the user is allowed to use the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument for launching local files in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9043">Se si imposta questo criterio su false, l'utente non è autorizzato a usare l'argomento della riga di comando--IE-mode-file-URL per l'avvio di file locali in modalità Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9043">If you set this policy to false, the user isn't allowed to use the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument for launching local files in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9044">Per altre informazioni sulla modalità Internet Explorer, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9044">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9045">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9045">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9046">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9046">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9047">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9047">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9048">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9048">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9049">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9049">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9050">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9050">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9051">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9051">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9052">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9052">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9053">Nome univoco GP: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9053">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9054">Nome GP: consentire l'avvio di file locali in modalità Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9054">GP name: Allow launching of local files in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9055">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9055">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9056">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9056">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9057">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9057">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9058">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9058">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9059">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9059">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9060">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9060">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9061">Nome valore: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9061">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9062">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9062">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9063">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9063">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationlocalfileextensionallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9065">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9065">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>

  #### <a name="open-local-files-in-internet-explorer-mode-file-extension-allow-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9066">Aprire file locali nell'elenco Consenti estensione file in modalità Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9066">Open local files in Internet Explorer mode file extension allow list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9067">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9067">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9068">In Windows dalla versione 88 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9068">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9069">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9069">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9070">Questo criterio limita gli URL file://autorizzati a essere avviati in modalità Internet Explorer in base all'estensione di file.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9070">This policy limits which file:// URLs are allowed to be launched into Internet Explorer mode based on file extension.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9071">Questa impostazione funziona in combinazione con: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) è impostato su' IEMode '.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9071">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9072">Quando si richiede l'avvio di un URL file://in modalità Internet Explorer, l'estensione di file dell'URL deve essere presente in questo elenco in modo che l'URL possa essere consentito per l'avvio in modalità Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9072">When a file:// URL is requested to launch in Internet Explorer mode, the file extension of the URL must be present in this list in order for the URL to be allowed to launch in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9073">Un URL bloccato dall'apertura in modalità Internet Explorer verrà invece aperto in modalità Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9073">A URL which is blocked from opening in Internet Explorer mode will instead open in Edge mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9074">Se si imposta questo criterio sul valore speciale "\*" o non lo si configura, tutte le estensioni di file sono consentite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9074">If you set this policy to the special value "\*" or don't configure it, all file extensions are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9075">Per altre informazioni sulla modalità Internet Explorer, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9075">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9076">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9076">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9077">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9077">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9078">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9078">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9079">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9079">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9080">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9080">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9081">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9081">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9082">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9082">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9083">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9083">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9084">Nome univoco GP: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9084">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9085">Nome GP: aprire i file locali nell'elenco Consenti estensione file in modalità Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9085">GP name: Open local files in Internet Explorer mode file extension allow list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9086">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9086">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9087">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9087">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9088">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9088">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9089">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9089">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9090">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9090">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9091">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9091">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9092">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9092">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9093">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9093">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9094">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9094">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\1 = ".mht"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\2 = ".pdf"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\3 = ".vsdx"

```

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationlocalfileshowcontextmenu"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9096">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9096">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-context-menu-to-open-a-link-in-internet-explorer-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9097">Mostra il menu di scelta rapida per aprire un collegamento in modalità Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9097">Show context menu to open a link in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9098">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9098">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9099">In Windows dalla versione 88 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9099">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9100">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9100">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9101">Questo criterio Controlla la visibilità dell'opzione "Apri collegamento in nuova modalità Internet Explorer" nel menu di scelta rapida per i collegamenti a file://.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9101">This policy controls the visibility of the 'Open link in new Internet Explorer mode tab' option on the context menu for file:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9102">Questa impostazione funziona in combinazione con: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) è impostato su' IEMode '.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9102">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9103">Se si imposta questo criterio su true, la voce di menu di scelta rapida "Apri collegamento nella nuova modalità Internet Explorer" sarà disponibile per i collegamenti a file://.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9103">If you set this policy to true, the 'Open link in new Internet Explorer mode tab' context menu item will be available for file:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9104">Se si imposta questo criterio su false o non lo si configura, la voce di menu di scelta rapida non verrà aggiunta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9104">If you set this policy to false or don't configure it, the context menu item will not be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9105">Per altre informazioni sulla modalità Internet Explorer, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9105">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9106">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9106">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9107">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9107">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9108">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9108">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9109">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9109">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9114">Nome univoco GP: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9114">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9115">GP Name: Mostra il menu di scelta rapida per aprire un collegamento in modalità Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9115">GP name: Show context menu to open a link in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9116">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9116">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9117">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9117">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9118">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9118">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9119">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9119">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9120">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9120">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9121">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9121">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9122">Nome valore: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9122">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>

```

```

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationsiteredirect"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9152">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9152">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-how-in-page-navigations-to-unconfigured-sites-behave-when-started-from-internet-explorer-mode-pages"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9153">Specifica il comportamento degli spostamenti "nella pagina" verso i siti non configurati all'avvio dalle pagine in modalità Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9153">Specify how "in-page" navigations to unconfigured sites behave when started from Internet Explorer mode pages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9154">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9154">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9155">In Windows dalla versione 81 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9155">On Windows since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9156">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9156">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9157">Lo spostamento nella pagina viene avviato da un collegamento, uno script o una maschera nella pagina corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9157">An "in-page" navigation is started from a link, a script, or a form on the current page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9158">Può essere anche avviato da un reindirizzamento lato server di un precedente tentativo di spostamento nella pagina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9158">It can also be a server-side redirect of a previous "in-page" navigation attempt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9159">Al contrario un utente può avviare uno spostamento che non sia nella pagina, e indipendentemente dalla pagina corrente, in diversi modi usando i controlli del browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9159">Conversely, a user can start a navigation that isn't "in-page" that's independent of the current page in several ways by using the browser controls.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9160">Ad esempio, usando la barra degli indirizzi, il pulsante Indietro o un collegamento preferito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9160">For example, using the address bar, the back button, or a favorite link.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9161">Questa impostazione consente di specificare se gli spostamenti dalle pagine caricate in modalità Internet Explorer a siti non configurati (che non sono configurati nell'elenco di siti in modalità Enterprise) reindirizzano a Microsoft Edge o rimangono in modalità Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9161">This setting lets you specify whether navigations from pages loaded in Internet Explorer mode to unconfigured sites (that are not configured in the Enterprise Mode Site List) switch back to Microsoft Edge or remain in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9162">Questa impostazione funziona in combinazione con i criteri: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) impostato su "IEMode e [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist), in cui l'elenco ha almeno una voce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9162">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9163">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, solo i siti configurati per l'apertura in modalità Internet Explorer verranno aperti in questa modalità.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9163">If you disable or don't configure this policy, only sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will open in that mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9164">I siti non configurati per l'apertura in modalità Internet Explorer verranno reindirizzati a Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9164">Any site not configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will be redirected back to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9165">Se si imposta questo criterio su “Predefinito”, solo i siti configurati per l'apertura in modalità Internet Explorer verranno aperti in questa modalità.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9165">If you set this policy to 'Default', only sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will open in that mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9166">I siti non configurati per l'apertura in modalità Internet Explorer verranno reindirizzati a Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9166">Any site not configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will be redirected back to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9167">Se si imposta questo criterio su “AutomaticNavigationsOnly”, si ottiene l'esperienza predefinita tranne gli spostamenti automatici (ad esempio reindirizzamenti 302) ai siti non configurati in modalità Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9167">If you set this policy to 'AutomaticNavigationsOnly', you get the default experience except that all automatic navigations (such as 302 redirects) to unconfigured sites will be kept in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9168">Se si imposta questo criterio su “AllInPageNavigations”, tutti gli spostamenti dalle pagine caricate in modalità IE verso siti non configurati vengono mantenuti in modalità Internet Explorer (scelta meno consigliata).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9168">If you set this policy to 'AllInPageNavigations', all navigations from pages loaded in IE mode to unconfigured sites are kept in Internet Explorer mode (Least Recommended).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9169">Per altre informazioni sulla modalità Internet Explorer, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9169">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9170">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9170">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9171">Predefinito (0) = Predefinito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9171">Default (0) = Default</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9172">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1) = Mantenere gli spostamenti automatici in modalità Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9172">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1) = Keep only automatic navigations in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9173">AllInPageNavigations (2) = Mantenere tutti gli spostamenti nella pagina in modalità Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9173">AllInPageNavigations (2) = Keep all in-page navigations in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9174">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9174">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9175">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9175">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9176">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9176">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9177">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9177">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9178">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9178">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9179">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9179">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9180">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9180">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9181">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9181">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9182">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9182">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9183">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9183">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9184">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Specifica il comportamento degli spostamenti "nella pagina" verso i siti non configurati all'avvio dalle pagine in modalità Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9184">GP name: Specify how "in-page" navigations to unconfigured sites behave when started from Internet Explorer mode pages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9185">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9185">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9186">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9186">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9187">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9187">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9188">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9188">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9189">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9189">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9190">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9190">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9191">Nome valore: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9191">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9192">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9192">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9193">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9193">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```
