  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationtestingallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9195">InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9195">InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-internet-explorer-mode-testing"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9196">Consenti il test della modalità di Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9196">Allow Internet Explorer mode testing</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9197">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9197">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9198">In Windows dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9198">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9199">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9199">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9200">Questo criterio consente agli utenti di testare le applicazioni in modalità Internet Explorer aprendo una scheda in modalità Internet Explorer in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9200">This policy allows users to test applications in Internet Explorer mode by opening an Internet Explorer mode tab in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9201">Gli utenti possono farlo attraverso il menu "Altri strumenti" selezionando "Apri siti in modalità Internet Explorer".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9201">Users can do so from within the "More tools" menu by selecting 'Open sites in Internet Explorer mode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9202">Inoltre, gli utenti possono testare le loro applicazioni in un browser moderno senza rimuoverle dall'elenco di siti tramite l'opzione "Apri siti in modalità Edge".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9202">Additionally, users can test their applications in a modern browser without removing applications from the site list using the option 'Open sites in Edge mode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9203">Questa impostazione funziona in combinazione con i criteri: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) impostato su "IEMode e [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist), in cui l'elenco ha almeno una voce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9203">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9204">Se si abilita questo criterio, l'opzione per aprire i siti in modalità Internet Explorer sarà visibile in "Altri strumenti".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9204">If you enable this policy, the option to 'Open sites in Internet Explorer mode' will be visible under "More tools".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9205">Gli utenti possono visualizzare i propri siti in modalità Internet Explorer in questa scheda. Un'altra opzione per "Apri siti in modalità Edge" sarà visibile anche in "Altri strumenti" per consentire di testare i siti in un browser moderno senza rimuoverli dall'elenco dei siti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9205">Users can view their sites in Internet Explorer mode on this tab. Another option to 'Open sites in Edge mode' will also be visible under "More tools" to help testing sites in a modern browser without removing them from the site list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9206">Se si disabilitano o non si configurano i criteri, gli utenti non potranno vedere le opzioni "Apri in modalità Internet Explorer" e "Apri in modalità Edge" nel menu "Altri strumenti".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9206">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can't see the options 'Open in Internet Explorer mode' and 'Open in Edge mode' under "More tools" menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9207">Tuttavia, gli utenti possono configurare queste opzioni con il contrassegno --ie-mode-test.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9207">However, users can configure these options with the --ie-mode-test flag.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9208">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9208">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9209">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9209">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9210">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9210">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9211">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9211">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9212">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9212">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9213">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9213">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9214">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9214">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9215">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9215">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9216">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9216">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9217">Nome Criteri di gruppo: consenti test della modalità Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9217">GP name: Allow Internet Explorer mode testing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9218">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9218">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9219">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9219">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9220">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9220">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9221">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9221">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9222">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9222">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9223">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9223">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9224">Nome valore: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9224">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9225">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9225">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9226">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9226">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9227">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9227">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="intranetredirectbehavior"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9228">IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9228">IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>

  #### <a name="intranet-redirection-behavior"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9229">Comportamento del reindirizzamento delle Intranet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9229">Intranet Redirection Behavior</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9230">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9230">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9231">su Windows e macOS da 88 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9231">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9232">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9232">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9233">Questo criterio configura il comportamento per il reindirizzamento della Intranet tramite controlli di intercettazione DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9233">This policy configures behavior for intranet redirection via DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9234">I controlli provano a scoprire se il browser è dietro un proxy che reindirizza i nomi host sconosciuti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9234">The checks attempt to discover whether the browser is behind a proxy that redirects unknown host names.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9235">Se questo criterio non è configurato, il browser utilizzerà il comportamento predefinito dei controlli di intercettazione DNS e suggerimenti per il reindirizzamento dell'Intranet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9235">If this policy isn't configured, the browser will use the default behavior of DNS interception checks and intranet redirect suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9236">In M88 sono abilitati per impostazione predefinita, ma verranno disabilitati per impostazione predefinita nella versione futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9236">In M88, they are enabled by default but will be disabled by default in the future release.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9237">[DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) è un criterio correlato che potrebbe anche disabilitare i controlli di intercettazione DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9237">[DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) is a related policy that might also disable DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9238">Tuttavia, questo criterio è una versione più flessibile che potrebbe controllare separatamente il reindirizzamento infobars della rete Intranet e potrebbe essere espansa in futuro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9238">However, this policy is a more flexible version which might separately control intranet redirection infobars and might be expanded in the future.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9239">Se [DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) o questo criterio effettuano una richiesta di disabilitazione dei controlli di intercettazione, i controlli verranno disabilitati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9239">If either [DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) or this policy make a request to disable interception checks, the checks will be disabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9240">Se i controlli di intercettazione DNS sono disabilitati da questo criterio, ma [GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar](#gotointranetsiteforsinglewordentryinaddressbar) è abilitato, le singole query di Word continueranno a essere eseguite per gli spostamenti Intranet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9240">If DNS interception checks are disabled by this policy but [GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar](#gotointranetsiteforsinglewordentryinaddressbar) is enabled, single word queries will still result in intranet navigations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9241">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9241">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9242">Default (0) = usa il comportamento predefinito del browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9242">Default (0) = Use default browser behavior.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9243">DisableInterceptionChecksDisableInfobar (1) = disattiva i controlli di intercettazione DNS e l'opzione forse intendevi " http://intranetsite/ ".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9243">DisableInterceptionChecksDisableInfobar (1) = Disable DNS interception checks and did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9244">DisableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (2) = Disabilita i controlli di intercettazione DNS; Consenti l’opzione forse intendevi " http://intranetsite/ ".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9244">DisableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (2) = Disable DNS interception checks; allow did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9245">EnableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (3) = Consenti controlli di intercettazione DNS e l’opzione forse intendevi" http://intranetsite/ ".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9245">EnableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (3) = Allow DNS interception checks and did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9246">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9246">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9247">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9247">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9248">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9248">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9249">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9249">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9250">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9250">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9251">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9251">Data Type:</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9253">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9253">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9254">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9254">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9255">Nome univoco GP: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9255">GP unique name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9256">Nome GP: comportamento di reindirizzamento Intranet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9256">GP name: Intranet Redirection Behavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9257">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9257">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9258">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9258">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9259">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9259">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9260">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9260">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9261">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9261">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9262">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9262">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9263">Nome valore: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9263">Value Name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9264">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9264">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="isolateorigins"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9270">IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9270">IsolateOrigins</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-site-isolation-for-specific-origins"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9271">Abilita l'isolamento del sito per origini specifiche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9271">Enable site isolation for specific origins</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9272">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9272">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9273">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9273">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9274">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9274">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9275">Specifica le origini da eseguire in isolamento, nel relativo processo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9275">Specify origins to run in isolation, in their own process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9276">Inoltre, questo processo isola le origini denominate dai sottodomini (ad esempio, specificando https://contoso.com/, https://foo.contoso.com/ verrà isolato come parte del sito https://contoso.com/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9276">This policy also isolates origins named by subdomains - for example, specifying https://contoso.com/ will cause https://foo.contoso.com/ to be isolated as part of the https://contoso.com/ site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9277">Se il criterio è abilitato, ognuna delle origini denominate in un elenco con valori separati da virgole verrà eseguita in un processo specifico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9277">If the policy is enabled, each of the named origins in a comma-separated list will run in its own process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9278">Se si disabilita questo criterio, vengono disabilitate entrambe le funzionalità "IsolateOrigins" e "SitePerProcess".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9278">If you disable this policy, then both the 'IsolateOrigins' and 'SitePerProcess' features are disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9279">Gli utenti possono comunque abilitare il criterio "IsolateOrigins" manualmente, tramite i contrassegni della riga di comando.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9279">Users can still enable 'IsolateOrigins' policy manually, via command line flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9280">Se non si configura il criterio, l'utente può modificare tale impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9280">If you don't configure the policy, the user can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9281">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9281">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9282">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9282">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9283">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9283">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9284">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9284">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9285">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9285">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9286">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9286">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9287">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9287">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9288">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9288">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9289">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9289">GP unique name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9290">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita l'isolamento del sito per origini specifiche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9290">GP name: Enable site isolation for specific origins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9291">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9291">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9292">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9292">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9293">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9293">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9294">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9294">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9295">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9295">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9296">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9296">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9297">Nome valore: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9297">Value Name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9298">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9298">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9299">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9299">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://contoso.com/,https://fabrikam.com/"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9300">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9300">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9301">Nome chiave di preferenza: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9301">Preference Key Name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9302">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9302">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://contoso.com/,https://fabrikam.com/</string>
```

  ### <a name="localprovidersenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9304">LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9304">LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-suggestions-from-local-providers"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9305">Consente suggerimenti dai provider locali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9305">Allow suggestions from local providers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9306">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9306">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9307">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 83 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9307">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9308">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9308">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9309">Consente i suggerimenti dai provider di suggerimenti nel dispositivo (provider locali), ad esempio, Preferiti e Cronologia esplorazioni, nell'elenco dei suggerimenti automatici e nella barra degli indirizzi di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9309">Allow suggestions from suggestion providers on the device (local providers), for example, Favorites and Browsing History, in Microsoft Edge's Address Bar and Auto-Suggest List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9310">Se si abilita questo criterio, vengono usati i suggerimenti dei provider locali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9310">If you enable this policy, suggestions from local providers are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9311">Se si disabilita questo criterio, i suggerimenti dei provider locali non vengono mai usati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9311">If you disable this policy, suggestions from local providers are never used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9312">I suggerimenti relativi a cronologia e preferiti locali non verranno visualizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9312">Local history and local favorites suggestions will not appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9313">Se non si configura questo criterio, i suggerimenti dei provider locali sono consentiti, ma l'utente può modificarli con l'interruttore delle impostazioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9313">If you do not configure this policy, suggestions from local providers are allowed but the user can change that using the settings toggle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9314">Alcune funzionalità potrebbero non essere disponibili se è stato applicato un criterio per disabilitare questa caratteristica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9314">Note that some features may not be available if a policy to disable this feature has been applied.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9315">Ad esempio, i suggerimenti della cronologia esplorazioni non sono disponibili se si abilita il criterio [SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled](#savingbrowserhistorydisabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9315">For example, Browsing History suggestions will not be available if you enable the [SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled](#savingbrowserhistorydisabled) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9316">Questo criterio richiede il riavvio del browser per completare l'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9316">This policy requires a browser restart to finish applying.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9317">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9317">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9318">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9318">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9319">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9319">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9320">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9320">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9321">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9321">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9322">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9322">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9323">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9323">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9324">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9324">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9325">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9325">GP unique name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9326">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente suggerimenti dai provider locali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9326">GP name: Allow suggestions from local providers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9327">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9327">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9328">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9328">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9329">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9329">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9330">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9330">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9331">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9331">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9332">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9332">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9333">Nome valore: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9333">Value Name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9334">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9334">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9335">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9335">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9336">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9336">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9337">Nome chiave di preferenza: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9337">Preference Key Name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9338">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9338">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="managedconfigurationperorigin"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9340">ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9340">ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>

  #### <a name="sets-managed-configuration-values-for-websites-to-specific-origins"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9341">Imposta su origini specifiche i valori della configurazione gestita per i siti Web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9341">Sets managed configuration values for websites to specific origins</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9342">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9342">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9343">In Windows e macOS da 90 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9343">On Windows and macOS since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9344">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9344">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9345">L'impostazione di questo criterio definisce il valore restituito dell'API di configurazione gestita per l'origine data.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9345">Setting this policy defines the return value of Managed Configuration API for given origin.</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9346">L'API di configurazione gestita è una configurazione chiave-valore a cui è possibile accedere tramite una chiamata javascript navigator.device.getManagedConfiguration().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9346">Managed Configuration API is a key-value configuration that can be accessed via navigator.device.getManagedConfiguration() javascript call.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9347">Questa API è disponibile solo per le origini che corrispondono ad applicazioni Web con installazione forzata tramite [WebAppInstallForceList](#webappinstallforcelist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9347">This API is only available to origins which correspond to force-installed web applications via [WebAppInstallForceList](#webappinstallforcelist).</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9348">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9348">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9349">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9349">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9350">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9350">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9351">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9351">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9352">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9352">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9353">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9353">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9354">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9354">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9355">Informazioni sui Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9355">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9356">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9356">GP unique name: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9357">Nome Criteri di gruppo: imposta su origini specifiche i valori della configurazione gestita per i siti Web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9357">GP name: Sets managed configuration values for websites to specific origins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9358">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9358">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9359">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9359">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9360">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9360">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9361">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9361">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9362">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9362">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9363">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9363">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9364">Nome valore: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9364">Value Name: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9365">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9365">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9366">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9366">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin = [
  {
    "managed_configuration_hash": "asd891jedasd12ue9h", 
    "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration.json", 
    "origin": "https://www.contoso.com"
  }, 
  {
    "managed_configuration_hash": "djio12easd89u12aws", 
    "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration2.json", 
    "origin": "https://www.example.com"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9367">Valore di esempio compatto:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9367">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin = [{"managed_configuration_hash": "asd891jedasd12ue9h", "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration.json", "origin": "https://www.contoso.com"}, {"managed_configuration_hash": "djio12easd89u12aws", "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration2.json", "origin": "https://www.example.com"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9368">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9368">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9369">Nome chiave preferenza: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9369">Preference Key Name: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>

``` xml
<key>ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</key>

    <key>managed_configuration_hash</key>

    <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
```

  ### <a name="managedfavorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9372">ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9372">ManagedFavorites</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-favorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9373">Configura i Preferiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9373">Configure favorites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9374">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9374">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9375">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9375">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9376">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9376">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9377">Configura un elenco di preferiti gestiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9377">Configures a list of managed favorites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9378">Il criterio crea un elenco di preferiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9378">The policy creates a list of favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9379">Ogni preferito contiene le chiavi "name" e "url", che includono il nome e la destinazione del preferito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9379">Each favorite contains the keys "name" and "url," which hold the favorite's name and its target.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9380">È possibile configurare una sottocartella definendo un preferito senza una chiave "url" ma con una chiave "children" aggiuntiva che contiene un elenco di preferiti come descritto in precedenza (alcuni dei quali potrebbero essere delle cartelle).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9380">You can configure a subfolder by defining a favorites without an "url" key but with an additional "children" key that contains a list of favorites as defined above (some of which may be folders again).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9381">Microsoft Edge modifica gli URL incompleti come se fossero stati immessi tramite la barra degli indirizzi, ad esempio "microsoft.com" diventa "https://microsoft.com/".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9381">Microsoft Edge amends incomplete URLs as if they were submitted via the Address Bar, for example "microsoft.com" becomes "https://microsoft.com/".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9382">Questi preferiti vengono inseriti in una cartella che non può essere modificata dall'utente (ma l'utente può scegliere di nasconderla dalla barra dei preferiti).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9382">These favorites are placed in a folder that can't be modified by the user (but the user can choose to hide it from the favorites bar).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9383">Per impostazione predefinita, il nome della cartella è "Preferiti gestiti" ma è possibile modificarla aggiungendo all'elenco dei preferiti un dizionario contenente la chiave "toplevel_name" con il nome della cartella desiderato come valore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9383">By default the folder name is "Managed favorites" but you can change it by adding to the list of favorites a dictionary containing the key "toplevel_name" with the desired folder name as the value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9384">I preferiti gestiti non vengono sincronizzati con l'account utente e non possono essere modificati dalle estensioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9384">Managed favorites are not synced to the user account and can't be modified by extensions.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9385">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9385">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9386">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9386">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9387">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9387">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9388">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9388">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9389">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9389">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9390">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9390">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9391">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9391">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9392">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9392">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9393">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9393">GP unique name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9394">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura i Preferiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9394">GP name: Configure favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9395">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9395">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9396">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9396">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9397">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9397">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9398">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9398">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9399">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9399">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9400">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9400">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9401">Nome valore: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9401">Value Name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9402">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9402">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9403">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9403">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedFavorites = [
  {
    "toplevel_name": "My managed favorites folder"
  }, 
  {
    "name": "Microsoft", 
    "url": "microsoft.com"
  }, 
  {
    "name": "Bing", 
    "url": "bing.com"
  }, 
  {
    "children": [
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge Insiders", 
        "url": "www.microsoftedgeinsider.com"
      }, 
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge", 
        "url": "www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge"
      }
    ], 
    "name": "Microsoft Edge links"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9404">Valore di esempio compatto:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9404">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedFavorites = [{"toplevel_name": "My managed favorites folder"}, {"name": "Microsoft", "url": "microsoft.com"}, {"name": "Bing", "url": "bing.com"}, {"children": [{"name": "Microsoft Edge Insiders", "url": "www.microsoftedgeinsider.com"}, {"name": "Microsoft Edge", "url": "www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge"}], "name": "Microsoft Edge links"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9405">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9405">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9406">Nome chiave di preferenza: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9406">Preference Key Name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9407">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9407">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ManagedFavorites</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>toplevel_name</key>
    <string>My managed favorites folder</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Microsoft</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>microsoft.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Bing</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>bing.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>children</key>
    <array>
      <dict>
        <key>name</key>
        <string>Microsoft Edge Insiders</string>
        <key>url</key>
        <string>www.microsoftedgeinsider.com</string>
      </dict>
      <dict>
        <key>name</key>
        <string>Microsoft Edge</string>
        <key>url</key>
        <string>www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge</string>
      </dict>
    </array>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Microsoft Edge links</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="managedsearchengines"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9409">ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9409">ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>

  #### <a name="manage-search-engines"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9410">Gestisce i motori di ricerca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9410">Manage Search Engines</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9411">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9411">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9412">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9412">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9413">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9413">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9414">Consente di configurare un elenco di massimo 10 motori di ricerca, uno dei quali deve essere contrassegnato come predefinito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9414">Lets you configure a list of up to 10 search engines, one of which must be marked as the default search engine.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9415">Non è necessario specificare la codifica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9415">You do not need to specify the encoding.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9416">A partire da Microsoft Edge 80, i parametri suggest_url e image_search_url sono facoltativi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9416">Starting in Microsoft Edge 80, the suggest_url and image_search_url parameters are optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9417">Il parametro facoltativo image_search_post_params (costituito da coppie nome/valore separate da virgole) è disponibile a partire da Microsoft Edge 80.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9417">The optional parameter, image_search_post_params (consists of comma-separated name/value pairs), is available starting in Microsoft Edge 80.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9418">A partire da Microsoft Edge 83, è possibile abilitare l'individuazione del motore di ricerca con il parametro facoltativo allow_search_engine_discovery.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9418">Starting in Microsoft Edge 83, you can enable search engine discovery with the allow_search_engine_discovery optional parameter.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9419">Questo parametro deve essere il primo elemento nell'elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9419">This parameter must be the first item in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9420">Se allow_search_engine_discovery non è specificato, l'individuazione del motore di ricerca verrà disabilitata per impostazione predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9420">If allow_search_engine_discovery is not specified, search engine discovery will be disabled by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9421">A partire dalla versione 84 di Microsoft Edge, è possibile impostare questo criterio come consigliato per consentire l'individuazione dei provider di ricerca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9421">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy to allow search provider discovery.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9422">Non è necessario aggiungere il parametro facoltativo allow_search_engine_discovery.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9422">You do not need to add the allow_search_engine_discovery optional parameter.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9423">Se si abilita questo criterio, gli utenti non possono aggiungere, rimuovere o modificare i motori di ricerca nell'elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9423">If you enable this policy, users can't add, remove, or change any search engine in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9424">Gli utenti possono impostare il motore di ricerca predefinito su qualsiasi motore di ricerca nell'elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9424">Users can set their default search engine to any search engine in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9425">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono modificare l'elenco dei motori di ricerca nel modo desiderato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9425">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can modify the search engines list as desired.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9426">Se il criterio [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) è impostato, questo criterio (ManagedSearchEngines) viene ignorato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9426">If the [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policy is set, this policy (ManagedSearchEngines) is ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9427">Per terminare l'applicazione del criterio, l'utente deve riavviare il browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9427">The user must restart their browser to finish applying this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9428">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9428">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9429">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9429">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9430">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9430">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9431">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9431">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9432">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9432">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9433">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9433">Dictionary</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9435">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9435">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9436">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9436">GP unique name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9437">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Gestisce i motori di ricerca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9437">GP name: Manage Search Engines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9438">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9438">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9439">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9439">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9440">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9440">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9441">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9441">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9442">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9442">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9443">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9443">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9444">Nome valore: ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9444">Value Name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9445">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9445">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9446">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9446">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedSearchEngines = [
  {
    "allow_search_engine_discovery": true
  }, 
  {
    "is_default": true, 
    "keyword": "example1.com", 
    "name": "Example1", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example1.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example1.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "image_search_post_params": "content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}", 
    "image_search_url": "https://www.example2.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", 
    "keyword": "example2.com", 
    "name": "Example2", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example2.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example2.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "encoding": "UTF-8", 
    "image_search_url": "https://www.example3.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", 
    "keyword": "example3.com", 
    "name": "Example3", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example3.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example3.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "keyword": "example4.com", 
    "name": "Example4", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example4.com/search?q={searchTerms}"
  }
]
```


  ### <a name="maxconnectionsperproxy"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9452">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9452">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>

  #### <a name="maximum-number-of-concurrent-connections-to-the-proxy-server"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9453">Numero massimo di connessioni simultanee al server proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9453">Maximum number of concurrent connections to the proxy server</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9454">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9454">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9455">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9455">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9456">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9456">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9457">Specifica il numero massimo di connessioni simultanee al server proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9457">Specifies the maximum number of simultaneous connections to the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9458">Alcuni server proxy non possono gestire un numero elevato di connessioni simultanee per client; è possibile risolvere questo problema impostando questo criterio su un valore più basso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9458">Some proxy servers can't handle a high number of concurrent connections per client - you can solve this by setting this policy to a lower value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9459">Il valore di questo criterio deve essere inferiore a 100 e superiore a 6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9459">The value of this policy should be lower than 100 and higher than 6.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9460">Il valore predefinito è 32.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9460">The default value is 32.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9461">Alcune app Web sono note per l'utilizzo di molte connessioni con GET: ridurre le connessioni massime sotto 32 potrebbe provocare interruzioni della rete del browser se è aperto un numero eccessivo di questo tipo di app Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9461">Some web apps are known to consume many connections with hanging GETs - lowering the maximum connections below 32 may lead to browser networking hangs if too many of these kind of web apps are open.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9462">Se non si configura questo criterio, viene utilizzato il valore predefinito (32).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9462">If you don't configure this policy, the default value (32) is used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9463">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9463">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9464">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9464">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9465">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9465">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9466">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9466">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9467">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9467">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9468">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9468">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9469">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9469">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9470">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9470">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9471">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9471">GP unique name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9472">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Numero massimo di connessioni simultanee al server proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9472">GP name: Maximum number of concurrent connections to the proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9473">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9473">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9474">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9474">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9475">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9475">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9476">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9476">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9477">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9477">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9478">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9478">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9479">Nome valore: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9479">Value Name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9480">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9480">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9481">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9481">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000020
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9482">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9482">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9483">Nome chiave di preferenza: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9483">Preference Key Name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9484">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9484">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>32</integer>
```

  ### <a name="mediaroutercastallowallips"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9486">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9486">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-google-cast-to-connect-to-cast-devices-on-all-ip-addresses"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9487">Consente a Google Cast di connettersi ai dispositivi Cast su tutti gli indirizzi IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9487">Allow Google Cast to connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9488">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9488">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9489">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9489">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9490">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9490">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9491">Abilitare questo criterio per consentire a Google Cast di connettersi a dispositivi Cast su tutti gli indirizzi IP, non solo sugli indirizzi privati RFC1918/RFC4193.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9491">Enable this policy to let Google Cast connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses, not just RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9492">Disabilitare questo criterio per limitare Google Cast ai dispositivi Cast negli indirizzi privati RFC1918/RFC4193.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9492">Disable this policy to restrict Google Cast to Cast devices on RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9493">Se non si configura questo criterio, Google Cast si connette solo ai dispositivi Cast negli indirizzi privati RFC1918/RFC4193, a meno che non si abiliti la funzionalità CastAllowAllIPs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9493">If you don't configure this policy, Google Cast connects to Cast devices on RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses only, unless you enable the CastAllowAllIPs feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9494">Se il criterio [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) è disabilitato, questo criterio non ha alcun effetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9494">If the [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) policy is disabled, then this policy has no effect.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9495">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9495">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9496">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9496">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9497">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9497">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9498">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9498">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9499">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9499">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9500">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9500">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9501">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9501">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9502">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9502">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9503">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9503">GP unique name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9504">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente a Google Cast di connettersi ai dispositivi Cast su tutti gli indirizzi IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9504">GP name: Allow Google Cast to connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9505">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9505">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9506">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9506">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9507">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9507">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9508">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9508">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9509">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9509">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9510">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9510">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9511">Nome valore: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9511">Value Name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9512">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9512">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9513">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9513">Example value:</span></span>

```

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9514">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9514">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9515">Nome chiave di preferenza: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9515">Preference Key Name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9516">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9516">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
