  ### <a name="metricsreportingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9518">MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9518">MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-usage-and-crash-related-data-reporting-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9519">Abilita l'utilizzo e la creazione di report sui dati correlati all'arresto anomalo (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9519">Enable usage and crash-related data reporting (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9520">OBSOLETO: questo criterio è obsoleto e non funziona dopo Microsoft Edge 88.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9520">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9521">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9521">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9522">In Windows e macOS da 77 a 88</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9522">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 88</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9523">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9523">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9524">I criteri non sono più supportati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9524">This policy is no longer supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9525">Sono stati sostituiti da [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (per Windows 7, Windows 8 e macOS) e Consenti telemetria in Windows 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9525">It is replaced by [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (for Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS) and Allow Telemetry on Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9526">Questi criteri abilitano l'invio di report a Microsoft sui dati sull'uso e sull'arresto anomalo di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9526">This policy enables reporting of usage and crash-related data about Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9527">Abilita questo criterio per inviare a Microsoft report di dati sull'uso e sull'arresto anomalo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9527">Enable this policy to send reporting of usage and crash-related data to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9528">Disabilita questi criteri se non vuoi inviare questi dati a Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9528">Disable this policy to not send the data to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9529">In entrambi i casi, gli utenti non possono modificare né sovrascrivere l'impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9529">In both cases, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9530">In Windows 10, se non si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge per impostazione predefinita userà i dati di diagnostica Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9530">On Windows 10, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the Windows diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9531">Se si abilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge invierà solo i dati sull'utilizzo se l'impostazione dati di diagnostica Windows è impostata su Avanzato o Completo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9531">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge will only send usage data if the Windows Diagnostic data setting is set to Enhanced or Full.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9532">Se si disabilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge non invierà i dati sull'utilizzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9532">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will not send usage data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9533">I dati relativi agli arresti anomali vengono inviati in base all'impostazione dei dati di diagnostica Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9533">Crash-related data is sent based on the Windows Diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9534">Per altre informazioni sulle impostazioni dei dati di diagnostica Windows, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9534">Learn more about Windows Diagnostic data settings at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9535">In Windows 7, Windows 8 e macOS questo criterio controlla l'invio di dati relativi all'utilizzo e all'arresto anomalo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9535">On Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS, this policy controls sending usage and crash-related data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9536">Se non si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge applicherà l'impostazione predefinita per le preferenze degli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9536">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9537">Per abilitare questo criterio,[ SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) deve essere impostato su abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9537">To enable this policy,[SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) must be set to Enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9538">Se [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) o [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) non è configurato o disabilitato, i dati non verranno inviati a Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9538">If [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) or [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) is Not Configured or Disabled, this data will not be sent to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9539">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft o alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi, o istanze macOS gestite via MDM o collegate a un dominio via MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9539">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9540">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9540">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9541">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9541">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9542">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9542">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9543">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9543">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9544">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9544">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9545">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9545">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9546">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9546">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9547">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9547">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9548">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9548">GP unique name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9549">Nome Criteri di gruppo: abilita l'invio di report sui dati sull'uso e gli arresti anomali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9549">GP name: Enable usage and crash-related data reporting (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9550">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9550">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9551">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9551">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9552">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9552">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9553">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9553">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9554">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9554">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9555">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9555">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9556">Nome valore: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9556">Value Name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9557">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9557">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9558">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9558">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9559">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9559">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9560">Nome chiave di preferenza: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9560">Preference Key Name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9561">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9561">Example value:</span></span>

  ### <a name="nativewindowocclusionenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9563">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9563">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-native-window-occlusion-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9564">Abilita l'occlusione della finestra nativa (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9564">Enable Native Window Occlusion (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9565">DEPRECATO: questo criterio è deprecato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9565">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9566">È attualmente supportato, ma diventerà obsoleto in una versione futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9566">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9567">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9567">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9568">In Windows dalla versione 84 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9568">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9569">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9569">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9570">Questo criterio è deprecato, usa invece il criterio '[WindowOcclusionEnabled'.](#windowocclusionenabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9570">This policy is deprecated, use the '[WindowOcclusionEnabled](#windowocclusionenabled)' policy instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9571">Non funzionerà in Microsoft Edge versione 92.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9571">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 92.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9572">Abilita l'occlusione della finestra nativa in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9572">Enables native window occlusion in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9573">Se si abilita questa impostazione, per ridurre il consumo di energia e CPU, Microsoft Edge rileverà quando una finestra è coperta da altre finestre e sospenderà i pixel di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9573">If you enable this setting, to reduce CPU and power consumption Microsoft Edge will detect when a window is covered by other windows, and will suspend work painting pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9574">Se si disabilita questa impostazione, Microsoft Edge non rileverà quando una finestra è coperta da altre finestre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9574">If you disable this setting Microsoft Edge will not detect when a window is covered by other windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9575">Se non viene impostato questo criterio, il rilevamento dell'occlusione sarà abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9575">If this policy is left not set, occlusion detection will be enabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9576">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9576">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9577">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9577">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9578">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9578">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9579">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9579">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9580">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9580">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9581">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9581">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9582">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9582">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9583">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9583">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9584">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9584">GP unique name: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9585">Nome criteri di gruppo: Abilita l'occlusione della finestra nativa (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9585">GP name: Enable Native Window Occlusion (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9586">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9586">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9587">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9587">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9588">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9588">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9589">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9589">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9590">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9590">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9591">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9591">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9592">Nome valore: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9592">Value Name: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9593">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9593">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9594">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9594">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9595">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9595">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9596">NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9596">NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-a-timeout-for-delay-of-tab-navigation-for-the-enterprise-mode-site-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9597">Imposta un timeout per i ritardi nello spostamento tramite schede per l'elenco siti in modalità Enterprise</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9597">Set a timeout for delay of tab navigation for the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9598">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9598">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9599">In Windows dalla versione 84 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9599">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9600">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9600">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9601">Consente di impostare un timeout, in secondi, se le schede Microsoft Edge attendono lo spostamento finché il browser non avrà scaricato l'elenco iniziale dei siti in modalità Enterprise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9601">Allows you to set a timeout, in seconds, for Microsoft Edge tabs waiting to navigate until the browser has downloaded the initial Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9602">Questa impostazione funziona in combinazione con i criteri: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) impostato su “IEMode” e [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist), in cui l'elenco ha almeno una voce, e [DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload](#delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload) impostato su “Tutti gli spostamenti idonei” (1).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9602">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry and [DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload](#delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload) is set to "All eligible navigations" (1).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9603">Le schede non attenderanno più tempo del timeout per il download dell'elenco dei siti in modalità Enterprise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9603">Tabs will not wait longer than this timeout for the Enterprise Mode Site List to download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9604">Se il browser non ha ancora terminato il download dell'elenco di siti in modalità Enterprise al termine del timeout, le schede Microsoft Edge continueranno comunque a navigare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9604">If the browser has not finished downloading the Enterprise Mode Site List when the timeout expires, Microsoft Edge tabs will continue navigating anyway.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9605">Il valore del timeout non deve essere superiore a 20 secondi e non meno di un secondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9605">The value of the timeout should be no greater than 20 seconds and no fewer than 1 second.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9606">Se si imposta il timeout in questo criterio su un valore maggiore del valore predefinito di 2 secondi, dopo 2 secondi viene visualizzata una barra informazioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9606">If you set the timeout in this policy to a value greater than the default of 2 seconds, an information bar is shown to the user after 2 seconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9607">Nella barra delle informazioni è presente un pulsante che consente all'utente di interrompere il completamento del download dell'elenco dei siti in modalità Enterprise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9607">The information bar contains a button that allows the user to quit waiting for the Enterprise Mode Site List download to complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9608">Se non si configura questo criterio, viene usato il timeout predefinito di 2 secondi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9608">If you don't configure this policy, the default timeout of 2 seconds is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9609">Questa impostazione predefinita è soggetta a modifiche in futuro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9609">This default is subject to change in the future.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9610">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9610">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9611">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9611">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9612">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9612">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9613">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9613">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9614">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9614">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9615">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9615">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9616">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9616">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9617">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9617">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9618">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9618">GP unique name: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9619">Nome Criteri di gruppo: imposta un timeout per i ritardi nello spostamento tramite schede per l'elenco siti in modalità Enterprise</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9619">GP name: Set a timeout for delay of tab navigation for the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9620">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9620">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9621">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9621">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9622">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9622">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9623">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9623">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9624">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9624">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9625">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9625">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9626">Nome valore: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9626">Value Name: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9627">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9627">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9628">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9628">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x0000000a
```

  ### <a name="networkpredictionoptions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9630">NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9630">NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-network-prediction"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9631">Abilita la previsione di rete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9631">Enable network prediction</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9632">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9632">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9633">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9633">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9634">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9634">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9635">Consente la previsione di rete e impedisce agli utenti di modificare questa impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9635">Enables network prediction and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9636">Questo criterio controlla la prelettura DNS, la preconnessione TCP e SSL e il prerendering delle pagine Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9636">This controls DNS prefetching, TCP and SSL preconnection, and prerendering of web pages.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9637">Se non si configura questo criterio, la previsione di rete è abilitata ma l'utente può modificarla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9637">If you don't configure this policy, network prediction is enabled but the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9638">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9638">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9639">NetworkPredictionAlways (0) = Prevedere le azioni di rete in qualsiasi connessione di rete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9639">NetworkPredictionAlways (0) = Predict network actions on any network connection</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9640">NetworkPredictionWifiOnly (1) = Non supportato, se si usa questo valore, verrà considerato come se fosse impostato “Prevedi le azioni di rete su qualsiasi connessione di rete” (0).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9640">NetworkPredictionWifiOnly (1) = Not supported, if this value is used it will be treated as if 'Predict network actions on any network connection' (0) was set</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9641">NetworkPredictionNever (2) = Non prevedere le azioni di rete in qualsiasi connessione di rete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9641">NetworkPredictionNever (2) = Don't predict network actions on any network connection</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9642">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9642">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9643">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9643">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9644">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9644">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9645">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9645">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9646">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9646">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9647">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9647">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9648">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9648">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9649">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9649">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9650">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9650">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9651">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9651">GP unique name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9652">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita la previsione di rete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9652">GP name: Enable network prediction</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9653">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9653">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9654">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9654">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9655">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9655">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9656">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9656">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9657">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9657">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9658">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9658">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9659">Nome valore: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9659">Value Name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9660">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9660">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9661">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9661">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9662">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9662">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9663">Nome chiave di preferenza: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9663">Preference Key Name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9664">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9664">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="nonremovableprofileenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9666">NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9666">NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-whether-a-user-always-has-a-default-profile-automatically-signed-in-with-their-work-or-school-account"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9667">Configura l'accesso automatico di un utente con un profilo predefinito al proprio account aziendale o dell'istituto di istruzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9667">Configure whether a user always has a default profile automatically signed in with their work or school account</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9668">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9668">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9669">In Windows dalla versione 78 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9669">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9670">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9670">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9671">Questo criterio determina se un utente può rimuovere il profilo di Microsoft Edge con accesso automatico con un account aziendale o dell'istituto di istruzione di un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9671">This policy determines if a user can remove the Microsoft Edge profile automatically signed in with a user's work or school account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9672">Se si abilita questo criterio, verrà creato un profilo non rimovibile con l'account aziendale o dell'istituto di istruzione dell'utente in Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9672">If you enable this policy, a non-removable profile will be created with the user's work or school account on Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9673">Questo profilo non può essere disconnesso o rimosso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9673">This profile can't be signed out or removed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9674">Il profilo sarà non rimovibile solo se è connesso con un account locale o un account di Azure Active Directory che corrisponde all'account di accesso del sistema operativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9674">The profile will be non-removable only if profile is signed-in with either on-premises account or Azure AD account that matches OS sign-in account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9675">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, il profilo con accesso automatico con un account aziendale o dell'istituto di istruzione di un utente in Windows può essere disconnesso o rimosso dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9675">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the profile automatically signed in with a user's work or school account on Windows can be signed out or removed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9676">Se si desidera configurare l'accesso al browser, usare il criterio [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9676">If you want to configure browser sign in, use the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9677">Questo criterio è disponibile solo nelle istanze Windows aggiunte a un dominio di Active Directory di Microsoft, alle istanze di Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise registrate per la gestione dei dispositivi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9677">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9678">Da Microsoft Edge 89, se è presente un profilo locale con sincronizzazione disabilitata e il computer è connesso in modalità ibrida, eseguirà automaticamente l'aggiornamento del profilo locale al profilo di Azure AD non rimovibile anziché creare un nuovo profilo di Azure AD non rimovibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9678">From Microsoft Edge 89 onwards, if there is an existing on-premises profile with sync disabled and machine is hybrid joined, it will auto-upgrade the on-premises profile to Azure AD profile and make it non-removable instead of creating a new non-removable Azure AD profile.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9679">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9679">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9680">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9680">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9681">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9681">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9682">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9682">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9683">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9683">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9684">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9684">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9685">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9685">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9686">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9686">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9687">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9687">GP unique name: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9688">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura l'accesso automatico di un utente con un profilo predefinito al proprio account aziendale o dell'istituto di istruzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9688">GP name: Configure whether a user always has a default profile automatically signed in with their work or school account</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9689">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9689">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9690">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9690">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9691">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9691">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9692">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9692">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9693">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9693">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9694">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9694">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9695">Nome valore: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9695">Value Name: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9696">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9696">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9697">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9697">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="overridesecurityrestrictionsoninsecureorigin"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9699">OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9699">OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-where-security-restrictions-on-insecure-origins-apply"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9700">Controlla dove si applicano le restrizioni di sicurezza per origini non sicure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9700">Control where security restrictions on insecure origins apply</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9701">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9701">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9702">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9702">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9703">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9703">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9704">Specifica un elenco di origini (URL) o modelli di nomi host (come "\*.contoso.com") per cui non si applicano restrizioni di sicurezza per le origini non sicure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9704">Specifies a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns (like "\*.contoso.com") for which security restrictions on insecure origins don't apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9705">Questo criterio consente di specificare le origini consentite per le applicazioni legacy che non possono distribuire TLS o configurare un server di gestione temporanea per lo sviluppo Web interno, in modo che gli sviluppatori possano testare le funzionalità che richiedono contesti sicuri senza dover distribuire TLS nel server di gestione temporanea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9705">This policy lets you specify allowed origins for legacy applications that can't deploy TLS or set up a staging server for internal web development so that developers can test out features requiring secure contexts without having to deploy TLS on the staging server.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9706">Questo criterio impedisce anche che l'origine venga etichettata come "non sicura" in omnibox.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9706">This policy also prevents the origin from being labeled "Not Secure" in the omnibox.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9707">L'impostazione di un elenco di URL in questo criterio ha lo stesso effetto dell'impostazione del contrassegno della riga di comando "--unsafely-treat-insecure-origin-as-secure" su un elenco degli stessi URL separati da virgole.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9707">Setting a list of URLs in this policy has the same effect as setting the command-line flag '--unsafely-treat-insecure-origin-as-secure' to a comma-separated list of the same URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9708">Se si abilita questo criterio, sostituisce il contrassegno della riga di comando.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9708">If you enable this policy, it overrides the command-line flag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9709">Per altre informazioni sui contesti sicuri, vedere https://www.w3.org/TR/secure-contexts/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9709">For more information on secure contexts, see https://www.w3.org/TR/secure-contexts/.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9710">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9710">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9711">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9711">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9712">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9712">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9713">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9713">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9714">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9714">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9715">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9715">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9716">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9716">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9717">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9717">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9718">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9718">GP unique name: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9719">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Controlla dove si applicano le restrizioni di sicurezza per origini non sicure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9719">GP name: Control where security restrictions on insecure origins apply</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9720">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9720">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9721">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9721">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9722">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9722">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9723">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9723">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9724">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9724">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9725">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9725">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9726">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9726">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9727">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9727">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9728">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9728">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin\1 = "http://testserver.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin\2 = "*.contoso.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9729">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9729">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9730">Nome chiave di preferenza: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9730">Preference Key Name: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9731">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9731">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>http://testserver.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>*.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="paymentmethodqueryenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9733">PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9733">PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-websites-to-query-for-available-payment-methods"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9734">Consente ai siti Web di eseguire query per i metodi di pagamento disponibili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9734">Allow websites to query for available payment methods</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9735">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9735">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9736">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 80 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9736">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9737">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9737">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9738">Consente di specificare se i siti Web possono verificare che l'utente disponga di metodi di pagamento salvati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9738">Allows you to set whether websites can check if the user has payment methods saved.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9739">Se si disabilita questo criterio, i siti Web che usano l'API PaymentRequest.canMakePayment o PaymentRequest.hasEnrolledInstrument verranno informati che non sono disponibili metodi di pagamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9739">If you disable this policy, websites that use PaymentRequest.canMakePayment or PaymentRequest.hasEnrolledInstrument API will be informed that no payment methods are available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9740">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, i siti Web possono verificare se l'utente ha metodi di pagamento salvati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9740">If you enable this policy or don't set this policy, websites can check if the user has payment methods saved.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9741">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9741">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9742">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9742">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9743">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9743">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9744">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9744">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9745">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9745">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9746">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9746">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9747">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9747">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9748">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9748">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9749">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9749">GP unique name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9750">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente ai siti Web di eseguire query per i metodi di pagamento disponibili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9750">GP name: Allow websites to query for available payment methods</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9751">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9751">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9752">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9752">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9753">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9753">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9754">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9754">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9755">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9755">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9756">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9756">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9757">Nome valore: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9757">Value Name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9758">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9758">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9759">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9759">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9760">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9760">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9761">Nome chiave di preferenza: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9761">Preference Key Name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9762">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9762">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="personalizationreportingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9764">PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9764">PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-personalization-of-ads-search-and-news-by-sending-browsing-history-to-microsoft"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9765">Consente la personalizzazione degli annunci, della ricerca e delle notizie con l'invio della cronologia esplorazioni a Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9765">Allow personalization of ads, search and news by sending browsing history to Microsoft</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9766">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9766">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9767">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 80 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9767">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9768">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9768">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9769">Questo criterio impedisce a Microsoft di raccogliere la cronologia esplorazioni di Microsoft Edge di un utente per personalizzare pubblicità, ricerca, notizie e altri servizi Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9769">This policy prevents Microsoft from collecting a user's Microsoft Edge browsing history to be used for personalizing advertising, search, news and other Microsoft services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9770">Questa impostazione è disponibile solo per gli utenti con un account Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9770">This setting is only available for users with a Microsoft account.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9771">Questa impostazione non è disponibile per gli account per bambini o gli account aziendali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9771">This setting is not available for child accounts or enterprise accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9772">Se si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti non possono modificare o sostituire l'impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9772">If you disable this policy, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9773">Se questo criterio è abilitato o non viene configurato, Microsoft Edge applicherà l'impostazione predefinita per le preferenze degli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9773">If this policy is enabled or not configured, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9774">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9774">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9775">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9775">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9776">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9776">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9777">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9777">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9778">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9778">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9779">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9779">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9780">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9780">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9781">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9781">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9782">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9782">GP unique name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9783">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente la personalizzazione degli annunci, della ricerca e delle notizie con l'invio della cronologia esplorazioni a Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9783">GP name: Allow personalization of ads, search and news by sending browsing history to Microsoft</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9784">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9784">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9785">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9785">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9786">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9786">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9787">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9787">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9788">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9788">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9789">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9789">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9790">Nome valore: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9790">Value Name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9791">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9791">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9792">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9792">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9793">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9793">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9794">Nome chiave di preferenza: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9794">Preference Key Name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9795">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9795">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="pinningwizardallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9797">PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9797">PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-pin-to-taskbar-wizard"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9798">Consente la procedura guidata per Aggiungi alla barra delle applicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9798">Allow Pin to taskbar wizard</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9799">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9799">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9800">In Windows dalla versione 80 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9800">On Windows since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9801">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9801">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9802">Microsoft Edge usa la procedura guidata Aggiungi alla barra delle applicazioni per aiutare gli utenti ad aggiungere i siti suggeriti alla barra delle applicazioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9802">Microsoft Edge uses the Pin to taskbar wizard to help users pin suggested sites to the taskbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9803">La funzionalità della procedura guidata Aggiungi alla barra delle applicazioni è abilitata per impostazione predefinita e gli utenti possono accedervi tramite Impostazioni e il menu Altro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9803">The Pin to taskbar wizard feature is enabled by default and accessible to the user through the Settings and more menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9804">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono accedere alla procedura guidata Aggiungi alla barra delle applicazioni da Impostazioni o dal menu Altro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9804">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can call the Pin to taskbar wizard from the Settings and More menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9805">La procedura guidata può anche essere attivata tramite l'avvio di un protocollo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9805">The wizard can also be called via a protocol launch.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9806">Se si disabilita questo criterio, la procedura guidata Aggiungi alla barra delle applicazioni viene disabilitata nel menu e non può essere attivata tramite l'avvio di un protocollo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9806">If you disable this policy, the Pin to taskbar wizard is disabled in the menu and cannot be called via a protocol launch.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9807">Le impostazioni utente per abilitare o disabilitare la procedura guidata Aggiungi alla barra delle applicazioni non sono disponibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9807">User settings to enable or disable the Pin to taskbar wizard aren't available.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9808">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9808">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9809">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9809">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9810">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9810">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9811">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9811">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9812">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9812">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9813">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9813">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9814">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9814">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9815">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9815">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9816">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9816">GP unique name: PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9817">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente la procedura guidata per Aggiungi alla barra delle applicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9817">GP name: Allow Pin to taskbar wizard</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9818">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9818">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9819">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9819">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9820">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9820">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9821">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9821">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9822">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9822">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9823">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9823">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9824">Nome valore: PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9824">Value Name: PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9825">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9825">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9826">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9826">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```
