  ### <a name="proactiveauthenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9828">ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9828">ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-proactive-authentication-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9829">Abilitare l'autenticazione proattiva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9829">Enable Proactive Authentication (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9830">DEPRECATO: questo criterio è deprecato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9830">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9831">È attualmente supportato, ma diventerà obsoleto in una versione futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9831">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9832">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9832">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9833">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9833">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9834">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9834">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9835">Questo criterio è deprecato perché non funziona indipendentemente dall'accesso del browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9835">This policy is deprecated because it does not work independently of browser sign in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9836">Non funzionerà in Microsoft Edge versione 91.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9836">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9837">Se si desidera configurare l'accesso al browser, usare il criterio [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9837">If you want to configure browser sign in, use the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9838">Consente di configurare se attivare l'autenticazione proattiva in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9838">Lets you configure whether to turn on Proactive Authentication in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9839">Se si abilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge tenta di autenticarsi a siti Web e servizi utilizzando l'account con il quale si è eseguito l'accesso al browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9839">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge tries to seamlessly authenticate to websites and services using the account which is signed-in to the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9840">Se si disabilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge non tenta di eseguire l'autenticazione con siti Web o servizi usando Single Sign-on (SSO).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9840">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge does not try to authenticate with websites or services using single sign-on (SSO).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9841">Le esperienze autenticate come la pagina nuova scheda Enterprise non funzioneranno (ad esempio, i documenti di Office recenti e consigliati non saranno disponibili).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9841">Authenticated experiences like the Enterprise New Tab Page will not work (e.g. recent and recommended Office documents will not be available).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9842">Se non si configura questo criterio, l'autenticazione proattiva è attivata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9842">If you don't configure this policy, Proactive Authentication is turned on.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9843">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9843">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9844">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9844">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9845">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9845">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9846">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9846">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9847">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9847">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9848">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9848">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9849">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9849">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9850">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9850">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9851">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9851">GP unique name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9852">Nome Criteri di gruppo: abilita l'autenticazione proattiva (deprecata)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9852">GP name: Enable Proactive Authentication (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9853">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9853">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9854">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9854">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9855">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9855">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9856">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9856">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9857">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9857">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9858">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9858">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9859">Nome valore: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9859">Value Name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9860">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9860">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9861">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9861">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9862">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9862">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9863">Nome chiave di preferenza: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9863">Preference Key Name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9864">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9864">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="promotionaltabsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9866">PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9866">PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-full-tab-promotional-content"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9867">Abilita il contenuto promozionale di una scheda completa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9867">Enable full-tab promotional content</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9868">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9868">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9869">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9869">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9870">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9870">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9871">Controlla la presentazione di contenuti promozionali o didattici di schede complete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9871">Control the presentation of full-tab promotional or educational content.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9872">Questa impostazione controlla la presentazione di pagine di benvenuto che consentono agli utenti di accedere a Microsoft Edge, scegliere il browser predefinito o scoprire di più sulle funzionalità dei prodotti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9872">This setting controls the presentation of welcome pages that help users sign into Microsoft Edge, choose their default browser, or learn about product features.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9873">Se si abilita (impostato su true) o non si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge può mostrare contenuti di schede complete agli utenti per fornire informazioni sui prodotti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9873">If you enable this policy (set it true) or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge can show full-tab content to users to provide product information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9874">Se si disabilita (impostato su false) questo criterio, Microsoft Edge non può mostrare contenuti di schede complete agli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9874">If you disable (set to false) this policy, Microsoft Edge can't show full-tab content to users.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9875">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9875">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9876">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9876">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9877">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9877">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9878">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9878">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9879">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9879">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9880">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9880">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9881">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9881">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9882">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9882">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9883">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9883">GP unique name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9884">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita il contenuto promozionale di una scheda completa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9884">GP name: Enable full-tab promotional content</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9885">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9885">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9886">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9886">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9887">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9887">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9888">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9888">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9889">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9889">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9890">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9890">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9891">Nome valore: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9891">Value Name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9892">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9892">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9893">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9893">Example value:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9895">Nome chiave di preferenza: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9895">Preference Key Name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>


  ### <a name="promptfordownloadlocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9898">PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9898">PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>

  #### <a name="ask-where-to-save-downloaded-files"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9899">Chiede dove salvare i file scaricati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9899">Ask where to save downloaded files</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9900">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9900">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9901">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9901">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9902">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9902">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9903">Specifica se chiedere dove salvare un file prima di scaricarlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9903">Set whether to ask where to save a file before downloading it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9904">Se si abilita questo criterio, all'utente viene chiesto dove salvare ogni file prima di scaricarlo. Se non si configura questo criterio, i file vengono salvati automaticamente nella posizione predefinita, senza chiedere conferma all'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9904">If you enable this policy, the user is asked where to save each file before downloading; if you don't configure it, files are saved automatically to the default location, without asking the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9905">Se non si configura questo criterio, l'utente può modificare tale impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9905">If you don't configure this policy, the user will be able to change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9906">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9906">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9907">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9907">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9908">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9908">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9909">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9909">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9910">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9910">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9911">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9911">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9912">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9912">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9913">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9913">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9914">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9914">GP unique name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9915">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Chiede dove salvare i file scaricati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9915">GP name: Ask where to save downloaded files</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9916">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9916">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9917">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9917">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9918">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9918">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9919">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9919">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9920">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9920">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9921">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9921">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9922">Nome valore: PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9922">Value Name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9923">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9923">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9924">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9924">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9925">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9925">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9926">Nome chiave di preferenza: PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9926">Preference Key Name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9927">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9927">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="quicallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9929">QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9929">QuicAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-quic-protocol"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9930">Consente il protocollo QUIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9930">Allow QUIC protocol</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9931">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9931">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9932">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9932">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9933">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9933">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9934">Consente di utilizzare il protocollo QUIC in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9934">Allows use of the QUIC protocol in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9935">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, il protocollo QUIC è consentito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9935">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the QUIC protocol is allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9936">Se si disabilita questo criterio, il protocollo QUIC viene bloccato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9936">If you disable this policy, the QUIC protocol is blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9937">QUIC è un protocollo di rete a livello trasporto che può migliorare le prestazioni delle applicazioni Web che attualmente usano TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9937">QUIC is a transport layer network protocol that can improve performance of web applications that currently use TCP.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9938">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9938">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9939">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9939">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9940">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9940">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9941">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9941">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9942">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9942">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9943">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9943">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9944">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9944">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9945">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9945">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9946">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9946">GP unique name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9947">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente il protocollo QUIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9947">GP name: Allow QUIC protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9948">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9948">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9949">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9949">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9950">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9950">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9951">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9951">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9952">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9952">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9953">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9953">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9954">Nome valore: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9954">Value Name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9955">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9955">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9956">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9956">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9957">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9957">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9958">Nome chiave di preferenza: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9958">Preference Key Name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9959">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9959">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="quickviewofficefilesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9961">QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9961">QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="manage-quickview-office-files-capability-in-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9962">Gestisci la funzionalità QuickView dei file di Office su Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9962">Manage QuickView Office files capability in Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9963">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9963">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9964">In Windows e macOS da 90 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9964">On Windows and macOS since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9965">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9965">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9966">Consente di specificare se gli utenti possono visualizzare sul Web i file di Office non disponibili su OneDrive o SharePoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9966">Allows you to set whether users can view Office files on the web that aren't on OneDrive or SharePoint.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9967">(Ad esempio: documenti di Word, presentazioni di PowerPoint e fogli di calcolo di Excel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9967">(For example: Word documents, PowerPoint presentations, and Excel spreadsheets)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9968">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, questi file possono essere visualizzati in Microsoft Edge usando il visualizzatore di Office invece di scaricare i file.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9968">If you enable or don't configure this policy, these files can be viewed in Microsoft Edge using Office Viewer instead of downloading the files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9969">Se si disabilita questo criterio, questi file verranno scaricati per la visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9969">If you disable this policy, these files will be downloaded to be viewed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9970">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9970">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9971">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9971">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9972">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9972">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9973">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9973">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9974">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9974">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9975">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9975">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9976">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9976">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9977">Informazioni sui Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9977">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9978">Nome unico dei Criteri di gruppo: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9978">GP unique name: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9979">Nome dei Criteri di gruppo: Gestire la funzionalità QuickView dei file di Office su Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9979">GP name: Manage QuickView Office files capability in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9980">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9980">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9981">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9981">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9982">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9982">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9983">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9983">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9984">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9984">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9985">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9985">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9986">Nome valore: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9986">Value Name: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9987">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9987">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9988">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9988">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9989">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9989">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9990">Nome chiave preferenza: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9990">Preference Key Name: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9991">Valore di esempio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9991">Example value:</span></span>


  ### <a name="redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerpreventbhoinstall"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9993">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9993">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span></span>

  #### <a name="prevent-install-of-the-bho-to-redirect-incompatible-sites-from-internet-explorer-to-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9994">Impedisci l’installazione di BHO per reindirizzare automaticamente i siti incompatibili da Internet Explorer a Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9994">Prevent install of the BHO to redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9995">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9995">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9996">In Windows dalla versione 87 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9996">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-9997">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9997">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-9998">Questa impostazione consente di specificare se bloccare l'installazione dell'oggetto browser helper (BHO), che consente di reindirizzare i siti incompatibili da Internet Explorer a Microsoft Edge per siti che richiedono un browser moderno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9998">This setting lets you specify whether to block the install of the Browser Helper Object (BHO) that enables redirecting incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge for sites that require a modern browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-9999">Se questo criterio viene abilitato, il BHO non verrà installato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-9999">If you enable this policy, the BHO will not be installed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10000">Se è già installato, verrà disinstallato nel prossimo aggiornamento Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10000">If it is already installed it will be uninstalled on the next Microsoft Edge update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10001">Se i criteri non sono configurati o sono disabilitati, il BHO verrà installato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10001">If this policy is not configured or is disabled, the BHO will be installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10002">Il BHO è necessario per il reindirizzamento del sito incompatibile, tuttavia il reindirizzamento o il non reindirizzamento viene controllato anche da [RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode](#redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerredirectmode).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10002">The BHO is required for incompatible site redirection to occur, however whether redirection occurs or not is also controlled by [RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode](#redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerredirectmode).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10003">Per altre informazioni su questo criterio, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10003">For more information about this policy see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10004">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10004">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10005">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10005">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10006">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10006">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10007">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10007">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10008">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10008">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10009">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10009">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10010">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10010">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10011">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10011">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10012">Nome univoco GP: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10012">GP unique name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10013">Nome GP: impedisci l’installazione di BHO per reindirizzare automaticamente i siti incompatibili da Internet Explorer a Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10013">GP name: Prevent install of the BHO to redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10014">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10014">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10015">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10015">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10016">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10016">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10017">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10017">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10018">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10018">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10019">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10019">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10020">Nome valore; RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10020">Value Name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10021">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10021">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10022">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10022">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerredirectmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10024">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10024">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="redirect-incompatible-sites-from-internet-explorer-to-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10025">Reindirizzar i siti incompatibili da Internet Explorer a Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10025">Redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10026">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10026">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10027">In Windows dalla versione 87 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10027">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10028">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10028">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10029">Questa impostazione consente di specificare se Internet Explorer reindirizza le esplorazioni ai siti che richiedono un browser moderno a Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10029">This setting lets you specify whether Internet Explorer will redirect navigations to sites that require a modern browser to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10030">Se il criterio non viene configurato o viene impostato su "Sitelist" che comincia con M87,, Internet Explorer reindirizza i siti Web che richiedono un browser moderno a Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10030">If you don't configure this policy or set it to 'Sitelist', beginning in M87, Internet Explorer will redirect sites that require a modern browser to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10031">Quando un sito viene reindirizzato da Internet Explorer a Microsoft Edge, la scheda di Internet Explorer che aveva iniziato a caricare il sito Web viene chiusa se non ne aveva precedentemente caricato i contenuti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10031">When a site is redirected from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge, the Internet Explorer tab that began loading that site is closed if it had no prior content.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10032">In caso contrario, si accede a una pagina della Guida Microsoft che spiega perché il sito è stato reindirizzato a Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10032">Otherwise, it is navigated to a Microsoft help page explaining why the site was redirected to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10033">Quando viene avviato Microsoft Edge per caricare un sito da IE, viene visualizzata una barra delle informazioni che spiega che il sito funziona al meglio in un browser moderno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10033">When Microsoft Edge is launched to load a site from IE, an information bar is shown to the user explaining that the site works best in a modern browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10034">Se si imposta questo criterio su "Disabilita", Internet Explorer non reindirizza il traffico a Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10034">If you set this policy to 'Disable', Internet Explorer will not redirect any traffic to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10035">Per altre informazioni su questo criterio, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10035">For more information about this policy see  [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10036">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10036">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10037">Disable (0) = disabilita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10037">Disable (0) = Disable</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10038">Sitelist (1) = ridirige i siti in base all'elenco dei siti incompatibili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10038">Sitelist (1) = Redirect sites based on the incompatible sites sitelist</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10039">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10039">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10040">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10040">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10041">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10041">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10042">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10042">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10043">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10043">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10044">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10044">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10045">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10045">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10046">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10046">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10047">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10047">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10048">Nome univoco GP: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10048">GP unique name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10049">Nome GP: reindirizza i siti incompatibili da Internet Explorer a Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10049">GP name: Redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10050">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10050">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10051">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10051">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10052">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10052">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10053">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10053">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10054">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10054">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10055">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10055">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10056">Nome valore: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10056">Value Name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10057">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10057">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10058">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10058">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10059">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10059">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="relaunchnotification"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10060">RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10060">RelaunchNotification</span></span>

  #### <a name="notify-a-user-that-a-browser-restart-is-recommended-or-required-for-pending-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10061">Inviare una notifica a un utente in merito al riavvio del browser consigliato o necessario per gli aggiornamenti in sospeso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10061">Notify a user that a browser restart is recommended or required for pending updates</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10062">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10062">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10063">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10063">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10064">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10064">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10065">Comunica agli utenti che è necessario riavviare Microsoft Edge per applicare un aggiornamento in sospeso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10065">Notify users that they need to restart Microsoft Edge to apply a pending update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10066">Se non si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge aggiunge un'icona del cestino a destra della barra dei menu superiore per chiedere agli utenti di riavviare il browser per applicare l'aggiornamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10066">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge adds a recycle icon at the far right of the top menu bar to prompt users to restart the browser to apply the update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10067">Se si abilita questo criterio e lo si imposta su "Consigliato”, un avviso ricorrente informa gli utenti che è consigliato un riavvio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10067">If you enable this policy and set it to 'Recommended', a recurring warning prompts users that a restart is recommended.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10068">Gli utenti possono ignorare l'avviso e rinviare il riavvio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10068">Users can dismiss this warning and defer the restart.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10069">Se si imposta il criterio su "Obbligatorio", un avviso ricorrente informa gli utenti che il browser verrà riavviato automaticamente al termine del periodo di notifica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10069">If you set the policy to 'Required', a recurring warning prompts users that the browser will be restarted automatically as soon as a notification period passes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10070">Il periodo predefinito è sette giorni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10070">The default period is seven days.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10071">È possibile configurare questo periodo con il criterio [RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10071">You can configure this period with the [RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10072">La sessione dell'utente viene ripristinata al riavvio del browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10072">The user's session is restored when the browser restarts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10073">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10073">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10074">Consigliato (1) = Consigliato: mostra un avviso ricorrente all'utente che indica che è consigliato un riavvio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10074">Recommended (1) = Recommended - Show a recurring prompt to the user indicating that a restart is recommended</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10075">Obbligatorio (2) = Obbligatorio: mostra un avviso ricorrente all'utente che indica che è necessario un riavvio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10075">Required (2) = Required - Show a recurring prompt to the user indicating that a restart is required</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10076">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10076">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10077">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10077">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10078">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10078">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10079">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10079">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10080">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10080">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10081">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10081">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10082">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10082">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10083">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10083">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10084">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10084">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10085">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10085">GP unique name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10086">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Invia una notifica a un utente in merito al riavvio del browser consigliato o necessario per gli aggiornamenti in sospeso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10086">GP name: Notify a user that a browser restart is recommended or required for pending updates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10087">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10087">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10088">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10088">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10089">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10089">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10090">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10090">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10091">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10091">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10092">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10092">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10093">Nome valore: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10093">Value Name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10094">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10094">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10095">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10095">Example value:</span></span>


  ### <a name="relaunchnotificationperiod"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10100">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10100">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-time-period-for-update-notifications"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10101">Imposta il periodo di tempo per le notifiche sugli aggiornamenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10101">Set the time period for update notifications</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10102">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10102">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10103">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10103">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10104">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10104">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10105">Consente di impostare il periodo di tempo, in millisecondi, in cui gli utenti vengono informati che Microsoft Edge deve essere riavviato per applicare un aggiornamento in sospeso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10105">Allows you to set the time period, in milliseconds, over which users are notified that Microsoft Edge must be relaunched to apply a pending update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10106">Durante questo periodo di tempo, l'utente verrà ripetutamente informato della necessità di un aggiornamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10106">Over this time period, the user will be repeatedly informed of the need for an update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10107">In Microsoft Edge, il menu dell'app cambia per indicare che è necessario un riavvio una volta trascorso un terzo del periodo di notifica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10107">In Microsoft Edge the app menu changes to indicate that a relaunch is needed once one third of the notification period passes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10108">Questa notifica cambia colore una volta trascorsi due terzi del periodo di notifica e cambierà ancora una volta al termine dell'intero periodo di notifica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10108">This notification changes color once two thirds of the notification period passes, and again once the full notification period has passed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10109">Le notifiche aggiuntive abilitate dal criterio [RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) seguono questa stessa pianificazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10109">The additional notifications enabled by the [RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) policy follow this same schedule.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10110">Se non impostato, viene usato il periodo predefinito di 604800000 millisecondi (una settimana).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10110">If not set, the default period of 604800000 milliseconds (one week) is used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10111">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10111">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10112">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10112">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10113">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10113">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10114">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10114">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10115">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10115">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10116">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10116">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10117">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10117">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10118">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10118">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10119">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10119">GP unique name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10120">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Imposta il periodo di tempo per le notifiche sugli aggiornamenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10120">GP name: Set the time period for update notifications</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10121">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10121">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10122">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10122">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10123">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10123">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10124">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10124">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10125">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10125">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10126">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10126">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10127">Nome valore: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10127">Value Name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10128">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10128">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10129">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10129">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x240c8400
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10130">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10130">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10131">Nome chiave di preferenza: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10131">Preference Key Name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10132">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10132">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>604800000</integer>
```

  ### <a name="renderercodeintegrityenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10134">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10134">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-renderer-code-integrity"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10135">Abilita l'integrità del codice del renderer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10135">Enable renderer code integrity</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10136">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10136">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10137">In Windows dalla versione 78 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10137">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10138">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10138">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10139">Impostando il criterio su Abilitato o lasciandolo disattivato si attiva l'integrità del codice del rendering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10139">Setting the policy to Enabled or leaving it unset turns Renderer Code Integrity on.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10140">L'impostazione del criterio su Disattivatoha un effetto negativo sulla sicurezza e la stabilità di Microsoft Edge, poiché il codice sconosciuto e potenzialmente ostile può essere caricato all'interno dei processi di rendering di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10140">Setting the policy to Disabled has a detrimental effect on Microsoft Edge's security and stability as unknown and potentially hostile code can load inside Microsoft Edge's renderer processes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10141">Disattivare i criteri solo se sono presenti problemi di compatibilità con il software di terze parti che deve essere eseguito all'interno dei processi di rendering di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10141">Only turn off the policy if there are compatibility issues with third-party software that must run inside Microsoft Edge's renderer processes.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10142">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10142">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10143">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10143">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10144">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10144">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10145">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10145">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10146">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10146">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10147">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10147">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10148">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10148">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10149">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10149">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10150">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10150">GP unique name: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10151">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita l'integrità del codice del renderer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10151">GP name: Enable renderer code integrity</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10152">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10152">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10153">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10153">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10154">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10154">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10155">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10155">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10156">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10156">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10157">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10157">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10158">Nome valore: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10158">Value Name: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10159">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10159">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10160">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10160">Example value:</span></span>

```

```

  ### <a name="requireonlinerevocationchecksforlocalanchors"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10162">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10162">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-if-online-ocspcrl-checks-are-required-for-local-trust-anchors"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10163">Specifica se i controlli OCSP/CRL online sono necessari per i trust anchor locali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10163">Specify if online OCSP/CRL checks are required for local trust anchors</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10164">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10164">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10165">In Windows dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10165">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10166">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10166">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10167">Controlla se sono necessari controlli di revoca online (controlli OCSP/CRL).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10167">Control whether online revocation checks (OCSP/CRL checks) are required.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10168">Se Microsoft Edge non è in grado di ottenere informazioni sullo stato di revoca, questi certificati vengono considerati come revocati ("hard-fail").</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10168">If Microsoft Edge can't get revocation status information, these certificates are treated as revoked ("hard-fail").</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10169">Se si abilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge esegue sempre il controllo della revoca di certificati del server che sono stati convalidati e sono firmati da certificati di firma installati in locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10169">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge always performs revocation checking for server certificates that successfully validate and are signed by locally-installed CA certificates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10170">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge usa le impostazioni di controllo della revoca online esistenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10170">If you don't configure or disable this policy, then Microsoft Edge uses the existing online revocation checking settings.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10171">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10171">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10172">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10172">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10173">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10173">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10174">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10174">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10175">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10175">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10176">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10176">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10177">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10177">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10178">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10178">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10179">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10179">GP unique name: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10180">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Specifica se i controlli OCSP/CRL online sono necessari per i trust anchor locali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10180">GP name: Specify if online OCSP/CRL checks are required for local trust anchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10181">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10181">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10182">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10182">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10183">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10183">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10184">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10184">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10185">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10185">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10186">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10186">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10187">Nome valore: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10187">Value Name: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10188">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10188">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10189">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10189">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```
