  ### <a name="resolvenavigationerrorsusewebservice"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10191">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10191">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-resolution-of-navigation-errors-using-a-web-service"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10192">Abilita la risoluzione degli errori di spostamento con un servizio Web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10192">Enable resolution of navigation errors using a web service</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10193">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10193">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10194">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10194">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10195">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10195">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10196">Consente a Microsoft Edge di rilasciare una connessione senza dati per un servizio Web per testare le reti per la connettività in casi come i Wi-Fi di alberghi e aeroporti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10196">Allow Microsoft Edge to issue a dataless connection to a web service to probe networks for connectivity in cases like hotel and airport Wi-Fi.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10197">Se si abilita questo criterio, viene usato un servizio Web per i test di connettività di rete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10197">If you enable this policy, a web service is used for network connectivity tests.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10198">Se si disabilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge usa le API native per provare a risolvere i problemi di connettività di rete e di spostamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10198">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses native APIs to try to resolve network connectivity and navigation issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10199">**Nota**: ad eccezione di Windows 8 e versioni successive di Windows, Microsoft Edge usa *sempre* API native per risolvere i problemi di connettività.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10199">**Note**: Except on Windows 8 and later versions of Windows, Microsoft Edge *always* uses native APIs to resolve connectivity issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10200">Se non si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge rispetta le preferenze degli utenti impostate in Servizi in edge://settings/privacy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10200">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge respects the user preference that's set under Services at edge://settings/privacy.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10201">In particolare, è presente un'opzione **Usare un servizio Web per consentire di risolvere errori di spostamento**, che può essere attivata o disattivata dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10201">Specifically, there's a **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** toggle, which the user can switch on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10202">Tenere presente che se è stato abilitato questo criterio (ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService), l'impostazione **Usare un servizio Web per consentire di risolvere errori di spostamento** è attivata, ma l'utente non può modificare tale impostazione usando il relativo interruttore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10202">Be aware that if you have enabled this policy (ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService), the **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** setting is turned on, but the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10203">Se questo criterio è stato disabilitato, l'impostazione **Usare un servizio Web per consentire di risolvere errori di spostamento** è disattivata e l'utente non può modificarla usando il relativo interruttore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10203">If you have disabled this policy, the **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** setting is turned off, and the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10204">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10204">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10205">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10205">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10206">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10206">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10207">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10207">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10208">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10208">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10209">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10209">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10210">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10210">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10211">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10211">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10212">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10212">GP unique name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10213">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita la risoluzione degli errori di spostamento con un servizio Web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10213">GP name: Enable resolution of navigation errors using a web service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10214">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10214">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10215">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10215">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10216">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10216">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10217">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10217">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10218">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10218">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10219">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10219">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10220">Nome valore: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10220">Value Name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10221">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10221">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10222">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10222">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10223">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10223">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10224">Nome chiave di preferenza: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10224">Preference Key Name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10225">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10225">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10226">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10226">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="restrictsignintopattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10227">RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10227">RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>

  #### <a name="restrict-which-accounts-can-be-used-as-microsoft-edge-primary-accounts"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10228">Limita gli account che è possibile utilizzare come account principali di Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10228">Restrict which accounts can be used as Microsoft Edge primary accounts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10229">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10229">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10230">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10230">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10231">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10231">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10232">Determina quali account possono essere impostati come account principali del browser in Microsoft Edge (l'account che viene scelto durante la procedura di consenso esplicito per la sincronizzazione).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10232">Determines which accounts can be set as browser primary accounts in Microsoft Edge (the account that is chosen during the Sync opt-in flow).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10233">Se un utente prova a configurare un account principale del browser con un nome utente che non corrisponde a questo modello, tale utente viene bloccato e visualizza un messaggio di errore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10233">If a user tries to configure a browser primary account with a username that doesn't match this pattern, they are blocked and will get the appropriate error message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10234">È possibile configurare questo criterio in modo che corrisponda a più account usando un'espressione regolare Perl per il modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10234">You can configure this policy to match multiple accounts using a Perl style regular expression for the pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10235">Si noti che le corrispondenze con il modello supportano la distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10235">Note that pattern matches are case sensitive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10236">Per altre informazioni sulle regole delle espressioni regolari usate, fare riferimento ahttps://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10236">For more information about the regular expression rules that are used, refer to https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10237">Se non si configura o si lascia vuoto questo criterio, gli utenti possono impostare qualsiasi account come account principale del browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10237">If you don't configure this policy or leave it blank, users can set any account as a browser primary account in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10238">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10238">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10239">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10239">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10240">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10240">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10241">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10241">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10242">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10242">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10243">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10243">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10244">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10244">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10245">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10245">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10246">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10246">GP unique name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10247">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Limita gli account che è possibile utilizzare come account principali di Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10247">GP name: Restrict which accounts can be used as Microsoft Edge primary accounts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10248">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10248">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10249">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10249">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10250">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10250">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10251">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10251">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10252">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10252">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10253">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10253">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10254">Nome valore: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10254">Value Name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10255">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10255">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10256">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10256">Example value:</span></span>

```
".*@contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10257">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10257">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10258">Nome chiave di preferenza: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10258">Preference Key Name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10259">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10259">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>.*@contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10260">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10260">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="roamingprofilelocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10261">RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10261">RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-roaming-profile-directory"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10262">Imposta la directory del profilo mobile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10262">Set the roaming profile directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10263">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10263">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10264">In Windows dalla versione 85 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10264">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10265">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10265">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10266">Configura la directory da usare per archiviare la copia dei profili mobile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10266">Configures the directory to use to store the roaming copy of profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10267">Se si abilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge usa la directory specificata per archiviare una copia dei profili mobile, purché sia stato abilitato anche il criterio [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10267">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory to store a roaming copy of the profiles, as long as you've also enabled the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10268">Se si disabilita il criterio [ o non lo si configura, il valore archiviato in questo criterio non verrà usato.](#roamingprofilesupportenabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10268">If you disable the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy or don't configure it, the value stored in this policy isn't used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10269">Per un elenco delle variabili che è possibile usare, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10269">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables you can use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10270">Se non si configura questo criterio, verrà usato il percorso predefinito del profilo mobile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10270">If you don't configure this policy, the default roaming profile path is used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10271">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10271">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10272">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10272">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10273">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10273">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10274">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10274">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10275">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10275">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10276">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10276">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10277">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10277">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10278">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10278">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10279">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10279">GP unique name: RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10280">Nome Criteri di gruppo: imposta la directory del profilo mobile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10280">GP name: Set the roaming profile directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10281">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10281">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10282">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10282">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10283">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10283">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10284">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10284">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10285">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10285">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10286">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10286">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10287">Nome valore: RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10287">Value Name: RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10288">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10288">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10289">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10289">Example value:</span></span>

```
"${roaming_app_data}\\edge-profile"
```

  ### <a name="roamingprofilesupportenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10291">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10291">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-using-roaming-copies-for-microsoft-edge-profile-data"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10292">Abilita l'uso di copie di roaming per i dati dei profili Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10292">Enable using roaming copies for Microsoft Edge profile data</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10293">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10293">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10294">In Windows dalla versione 85 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10294">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10295">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10295">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10296">Abilita questo criterio per usare i profili mobile in Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10296">Enable this policy to use roaming profiles on Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10297">Le impostazioni archiviate nei profili Microsoft Edge (preferite e preferenze) vengono salvate anche in un file archiviato nella cartella del profilo utente mobile (o nel percorso specificato dall'amministratore tramite il criterio [RoamingProfileLocation](#roamingprofilelocation)).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10297">The settings stored in Microsoft Edge profiles (favorites and preferences) are also saved to a file stored in the Roaming user profile folder (or the location specified by the administrator through the [RoamingProfileLocation](#roamingprofilelocation) policy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10298">Se si disabilita questo criterio o non lo si configura, verranno usati solo i normali profili locali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10298">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, only the regular local profiles are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10299">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) disabilita solo la sincronizzazione nel cloud e non ha alcun impatto su questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10299">The [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) only disables cloud synchronization and has no impact on this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10300">Vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058) per altre informazioni sull'uso dei profili utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10300">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058) for more information on using roaming user profiles.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10301">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10301">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10302">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10302">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10303">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10303">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10304">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10304">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10305">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10305">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10306">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10306">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10307">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10307">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10308">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10308">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10309">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10309">GP unique name: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10310">Nome Criteri di gruppo: abilita l'uso di copie di roaming per i dati dei profili Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10310">GP name: Enable using roaming copies for Microsoft Edge profile data</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10311">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10311">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10312">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10312">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10313">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10313">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10314">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10314">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10315">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10315">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10316">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10316">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10317">Nome valore: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10317">Value Name: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10318">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10318">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10319">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10319">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="runallflashinallowmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10321">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10321">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="extend-adobe-flash-content-setting-to-all-content-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10322">Estendere l'impostazione del contenuto Adobe Flash a tutto il contenuto (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10322">Extend Adobe Flash content setting to all content (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10323">OBSOLETO: questo criterio è obsoleto e non funziona dopo Microsoft Edge 87.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10323">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10324">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10324">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10325">In Windows e macOS da 77 a 87</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10325">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10326">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10326">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10327">Questo criterio non funziona perché Flash non è più supportato da Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10327">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10328">Se si abilita questo criterio, tutti i contenuti di Adobe Flash incorporati nei siti Web che sono impostati per consentire Adobe Flash nelle impostazioni relative ai contenuti (configurate dall'utente o da criteri aziendali) verranno eseguiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10328">If you enable this policy, all Adobe Flash content embedded in websites that are set to allow Adobe Flash in the content settings -- either by the user or by enterprise policy -- will run.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10329">Sono inclusi i contenuti provenienti da origini e/o contenuti di piccole dimensioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10329">This includes content from other origins and/or small content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10330">Per controllare quali siti Web possono eseguire Adobe Flash, vedere le specifiche nei criteri [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting), [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) e [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10330">To control which websites are allowed to run Adobe Flash, see the specifications in the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting), [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls), and [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10331">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, i contenuti di Adobe Flash provenienti da altre origini (da siti che non sono specificati nei tre criteri sopra indicati) o i contenuti di piccole dimensioni potrebbero essere bloccati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10331">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, Adobe Flash content from other origins (from sites that aren't specified in the three policies mentioned immediately above) or small content might be blocked.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10332">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10332">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10333">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10333">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10334">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10334">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10335">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10335">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10336">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10336">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10337">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10337">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10338">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10338">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10339">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10339">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10340">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10340">GP unique name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10341">Nome GP: estendere l'impostazione del contenuto Adobe Flash a tutto il contenuto (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10341">GP name: Extend Adobe Flash content setting to all content (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10342">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10342">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10343">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10343">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10344">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10344">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10345">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10345">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10346">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10346">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10347">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10347">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10348">Nome valore: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10348">Value Name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10349">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10349">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10350">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10350">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10351">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10351">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10352">Nome chiave di preferenza: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10352">Preference Key Name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>

  ### <a name="sslerroroverrideallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10355">SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10355">SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-proceed-from-the-https-warning-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10356">Consente agli utenti di procedere nella pagina di avviso HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10356">Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10357">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10357">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10358">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10358">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10359">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10359">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10360">Microsoft Edge mostra una pagina di avviso quando gli utenti visitano siti con errori SSL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10360">Microsoft Edge shows a warning page when users visit sites that have SSL errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10361">Se si abilita o non si configura (impostazione predefinita) questo criterio, gli utenti possono fare clic su tali pagine di avviso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10361">If you enable or don't configure (default) this policy, users can click through these warning pages.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10362">Se si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti non potranno fare clic su una qualsiasi pagina di avviso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10362">If you disable this policy, users are blocked from clicking through any warning page.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10364">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10364">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10365">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10365">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10366">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10366">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10368">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10368">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10369">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10369">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10370">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10370">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10371">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10371">GP unique name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10372">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente agli utenti di procedere nella pagina di avviso HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10372">GP name: Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10373">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10373">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10375">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10375">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10376">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10376">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10377">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10377">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10378">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10378">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10379">Nome valore: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10379">Value Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10380">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10380">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ### <a name="sslerroroverrideallowedfororigins"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10386">SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10386">SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-proceed-from-the-https-warning-page-for-specific-origins"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10387">Consente agli utenti di procedere nella pagina di avviso HTTPS per origini specifiche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10387">Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page for specific origins</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10388">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10388">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10389">In Windows e macOS da 90 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10389">On Windows and macOS since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10390">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10390">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10391">Microsoft Edge mostra una pagina di avviso quando gli utenti visitano siti con errori SSL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10391">Microsoft Edge shows a warning page when users visit sites that have SSL errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10392">Se si abilita o non si configura il [criterio SSLErrorOverrideAllowed,](#sslerroroverrideallowed) questo criterio non esegue alcuna operazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10392">If you enable or don't configure the [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) policy, this policy does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10393">Se si disabilita il [criterio SSLErrorOverrideAllowed,](#sslerroroverrideallowed) la configurazione di questo criterio consente di impostare un elenco di modelli di origine per i siti in cui gli utenti possono continuare a fare clic sulle pagine di errore SSL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10393">If you disable the [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) policy, configuring this policy lets you configure a list of origin patterns for sites where users can continue to click through SSL error pages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10394">Gli utenti non possono fare clic tra le pagine di errore SSL nelle origini non presenti in questo elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10394">Users can't click through SSL error pages on origins that are not on this list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10395">Se non si configura questo criterio, il [criterio SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) si applica a tutti i siti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10395">If you don't configure this policy, the [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) policy applies for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10396">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di origine validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10396">For detailed information about valid origin patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10397">\* non è un valore accettato per questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10397">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10398">Questo criterio corrisponde solo in base all'origine, quindi qualsiasi percorso o query presente nel modello di URL viene ignorato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10398">This policy only matches based on origin, so any path or query in the URL pattern is ignored.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10399">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10399">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10400">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10400">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10401">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10401">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10402">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10402">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10403">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10403">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10404">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10404">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10405">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10405">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10406">Informazioni sui Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10406">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10407">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10407">GP unique name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10408">Nome criteri di gruppo: Consente agli utenti di procedere nella pagina di avviso HTTPS per origini specifiche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10408">GP name: Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page for specific origins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10409">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10409">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10410">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10410">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10411">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10411">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10412">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10412">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10413">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10413">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10414">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10414">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10415">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10415">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10416">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10416">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10417">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10417">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10418">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10418">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10419">Nome chiave di preferenza: SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10419">Preference Key Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10420">Valore di esempio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10420">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="sslversionmin"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10422">SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10422">SSLVersionMin</span></span>

  #### <a name="minimum-tls-version-enabled-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10423">Versione TLS minima abilitata (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10423">Minimum TLS version enabled (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10424">DEPRECATO: questo criterio è deprecato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10424">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10425">È attualmente supportato, ma diventerà obsoleto in una versione futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10425">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10426">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10426">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10427">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10427">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10428">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10428">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10429">Il supporto per l'eliminazione dell'avviso TLS 1.0/1.1 verrà eliminato da Microsoft Edge a partire dalla versione 91 (intorno a maggio 2021) e il criterio non funzionerà più.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10429">Support for suppressing the TLS 1.0/1.1 warning will be removed from Microsoft Edge starting in version 91 (around May 2021) and this policy will stop working then.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10430">Imposta la versione minima supportata di TLS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10430">Sets the minimum supported version of TLS.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10431">Se non si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge mostrerà un errore per TLS 1.0 e TLS 1.1, ma l'utente potrà ignorarlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10431">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will show an error for TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1, but the user will be able to bypass it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10432">Se il criterio viene abilitato, Microsoft Edge non userà alcuna versione di SSL/TLS più vecchia di quella specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10432">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge won't use any version of SSL/TLS lower than the specified version.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10433">Qualsiasi valore non riconosciuto viene ignorato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10433">Any unrecognized value is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10434">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10434">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10435">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10435">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10436">TLSv1.1 (tls1.1) = TLS 1.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10436">TLSv1.1 (tls1.1) = TLS 1.1</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10437">TLSv1.2 (tls1.2) = TLS 1.2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10437">TLSv1.2 (tls1.2) = TLS 1.2</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10438">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10438">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10439">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10439">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10440">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10440">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10441">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10441">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10442">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10442">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10443">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10443">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10444">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10444">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10445">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10445">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10446">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10446">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10447">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10447">GP unique name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10448">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Versione TLS minima abilitata (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10448">GP name: Minimum TLS version enabled (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10449">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10449">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10450">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10450">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10451">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10451">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10452">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10452">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10453">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10453">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10454">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10454">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10455">Nome valore: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10455">Value Name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10456">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10456">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10457">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10457">Example value:</span></span>

```
"tls1"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10458">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10458">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10459">Nome chiave di preferenza: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10459">Preference Key Name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10460">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10460">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>tls1</string>
```

  ### <a name="savecookiesonexit"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10462">SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10462">SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>

  #### <a name="save-cookies-when-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10463">Salva i cookie quando Microsoft Edge si chiude</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10463">Save cookies when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10464">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10464">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10465">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10465">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10466">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10466">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10467">Quando questo criterio è abilitato, quando il browser viene chiuso, il set specificato di cookie è esente dall'eliminazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10467">When this policy is enabled, the specified set of cookies is exempt from deletion when the browser closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10468">Questo criterio è efficace solo quando:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10468">This policy is only effective when:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10469">L’interruttore "cookie e altri dati del sito" sono configurati in impostazioni/privacy e servizi/cancellazione dei dati per la navigazione in chiusura o</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10469">The 'Cookies and other site data' toggle is configured in Settings/Privacy and services/Clear browsing data on close or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10470">Il criterio [ ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) è abilitato o</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10470">The policy [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) is enabled or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10471">Il criterio [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) è impostato su “Mantieni cookie per la durata della sessione”.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10471">The policy [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) is set to 'Keep cookies for the duration of the session'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10472">È possibile definire un elenco dei siti, in base ai modelli di URL, che consentiranno di mantenere i cookie nelle varie sessioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10472">You can define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that will have their cookies preserved across sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10473">Nota: gli utenti possono continuare a modificare l'elenco dei siti dei cookie aggiungendo o rimuovendo URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10473">Note: Users can still edit the cookie site list to add or remove URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10474">Tuttavia, gli URL aggiunti da un amministratore non possono essere rimossi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10474">However, they can't remove URLs that have been added by an Admin.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10475">Se abiliti questo criterio, l'elenco dei cookie non sarà deselezionato quando il browser viene chiuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10475">If you enable this policy, the list of cookies won't be cleared when the browser closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10476">Se non disabiliti o configuri questo criterio, verrà usata la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10476">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the user's personal configuration is used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10477">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10477">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10478">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10478">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10479">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10479">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10480">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10480">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10481">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10481">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10482">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10482">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10483">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10483">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10484">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10484">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10485">Nome univoco GP: SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10485">GP unique name: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10486">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Salva i cookie quando Microsoft Edge viene chiude</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10486">GP name: Save cookies when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10487">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10487">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10488">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10488">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10489">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10489">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10490">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10490">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10491">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10491">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10492">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10492">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10493">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10493">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10494">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10494">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10495">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10495">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10496">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10496">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10497">Nome chiave preferenza: SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10497">Preference Key Name: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10498">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10498">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="savingbrowserhistorydisabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10500">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10500">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-saving-browser-history"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10501">Disattiva il salvataggio della cronologia del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10501">Disable saving browser history</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10502">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10502">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10503">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10503">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10504">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10504">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10505">Disabilita il salvataggio della cronologia del browser e impedisce agli utenti di modificare questa impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10505">Disables saving browser history and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10506">Se si abilita questo criterio, la cronologia esplorazioni non viene salvata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10506">If you enable this policy, browsing history isn't saved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10507">Viene disabilitata anche la sincronizzazione delle schede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10507">This also disables tab syncing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10508">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, la cronologia esplorazioni viene salvata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10508">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, browsing history is saved.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10509">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10509">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10510">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10510">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10511">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10511">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10512">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10512">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10513">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10513">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10514">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10514">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10515">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10515">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10516">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10516">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10517">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10517">GP unique name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10518">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Disattiva il salvataggio della cronologia del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10518">GP name: Disable saving browser history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10519">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10519">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10520">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10520">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10521">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10521">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10522">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10522">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10523">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10523">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10524">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10524">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10525">Nome valore: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10525">Value Name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10526">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10526">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10527">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10527">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10528">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10528">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10529">Nome chiave di preferenza: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10529">Preference Key Name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10530">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10530">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
