  ### <a name="screencaptureallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10532">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10532">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-or-deny-screen-capture"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10533">Consente o rifiuta l'acquisizione dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10533">Allow or deny screen capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10534">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10534">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10535">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 83 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10535">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10536">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10536">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10537">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, una pagina Web può usare le API di condivisione dello schermo (ad esempio, getDisplayMedia() o l'API Desktop Capture extension) per acquisire lo schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10537">If you enable this policy, or don't configure this policy, a web page can use screen-share APIs (for example, getDisplayMedia() or the Desktop Capture extension API) for a screen capture.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10538">Se si disabilita questo criterio, le chiamate alle API di condivisione dello schermo avranno esito negativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10538">If you disable this policy, calls to screen-share APIs will fail.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10539">Ad esempio, se si usa una riunione online basata sul Web, la condivisione di video o schermate non funzionerà.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10539">For example, if you're using a web-based online meeting, video or screen sharing will not work.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10540">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10540">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10541">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10541">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10542">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10542">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10543">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10543">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10544">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10544">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10545">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10545">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10546">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10546">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10547">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10547">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10548">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10548">GP unique name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10549">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente o rifiuta l'acquisizione dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10549">GP name: Allow or deny screen capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10550">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10550">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10551">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10551">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10552">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10552">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10553">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10553">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10554">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10554">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10555">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10555">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10556">Nome valore: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10556">Value Name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10557">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10557">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10558">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10558">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10559">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10559">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10560">Nome chiave di preferenza: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10560">Preference Key Name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10561">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10561">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="scrolltotextfragmentenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10563">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10563">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-scrolling-to-text-specified-in-url-fragments"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10564">Consente lo scorrimento al testo specificato nei frammenti di URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10564">Enable scrolling to text specified in URL fragments</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10565">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10565">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10566">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 83 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10566">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10567">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10567">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10568">Questa funzionalità consente a collegamenti ipertestuali e URL della barra degli indirizzi di reindirizzare a testo specifico in una pagina Web, che verrà visualizzato al termine del caricamento della pagina Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10568">This feature lets hyperlink and address bar URL navigations target specific text on a web page, which will be scrolled to after the web page finishes loading.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10569">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, verranno visualizzati specifici frammenti di testo nella pagina Web tramite un URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10569">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web page scrolling to specific text fragments via a URL will be enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10570">Se si disabilita questo criterio, non verranno visualizzati specifici frammenti di testo nella pagina Web tramite un URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10570">If you disable this policy, web page scrolling to specific text fragments via a URL will be disabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10571">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10571">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10572">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10572">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10573">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10573">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10574">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10574">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10575">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10575">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10576">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10576">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10577">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10577">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10578">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10578">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10579">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10579">GP unique name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10580">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente lo scorrimento al testo specificato nei frammenti di URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10580">GP name: Enable scrolling to text specified in URL fragments</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10581">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10581">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10582">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10582">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10583">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10583">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10584">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10584">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10585">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10585">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10586">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10586">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10587">Nome valore: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10587">Value Name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10588">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10588">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10589">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10589">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10590">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10590">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10591">Nome chiave di preferenza: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10591">Preference Key Name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>

<false/>

  ### <a name="searchsuggestenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10594">SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10594">SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-search-suggestions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10595">Abilita i suggerimenti per la ricerca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10595">Enable search suggestions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10596">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10596">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10597">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10597">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10598">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10598">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10599">Abilita i suggerimenti per la ricerca sul Web nell'elenco dei suggerimenti automatici e nella barra degli indirizzi di Microsoft Edge e impedisce agli utenti di modificare questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10599">Enables web search suggestions in Microsoft Edge's Address Bar and Auto-Suggest List and prevents users from changing this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10600">Se si abilita questo criterio, vengono usati i suggerimenti per la ricerca sul Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10600">If you enable this policy, web search suggestions are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10601">Se si disabilita questo criterio, i suggerimenti per la ricerca sul Web non vengono mai usati, ma vengono visualizzati i suggerimenti relativi alla cronologia e ai preferiti locali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10601">If you disable this policy, web search suggestions are never used, however local history and local favorites suggestions still appear.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10602">Se si disabilita questo criterio, i caratteri digitati e gli URL visitati non verranno inclusi nella telemetria di Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10602">If you disable this policy, neither the typed characters, nor the URLs visited will be included in telemetry to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10603">Se il criterio non è impostato, i suggerimenti per la ricerca sono abilitati, ma l'utente può modificare tale impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10603">If this policy is left not set, search suggestions are enabled but the user can change that.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10604">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10604">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10605">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10605">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10606">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10606">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10607">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10607">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10608">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10608">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10609">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10609">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10610">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10610">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10611">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10611">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10612">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10612">GP unique name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10613">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita i suggerimenti per la ricerca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10613">GP name: Enable search suggestions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10614">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10614">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10615">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10615">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10616">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10616">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10617">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10617">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10618">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10618">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10619">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10619">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10620">Nome valore: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10620">Value Name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10621">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10621">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10622">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10622">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10623">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10623">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10624">Nome chiave di preferenza: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10624">Preference Key Name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10625">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10625">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="securitykeypermitattestation"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10627">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10627">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>

  #### <a name="websites-or-domains-that-dont-need-permission-to-use-direct-security-key-attestation"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10628">Siti Web o domini che non necessitano dell'autorizzazione per usare l'attestazione della chiave di sicurezza diretta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10628">Websites or domains that don't need permission to use direct Security Key attestation</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10629">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10629">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10630">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10630">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10631">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10631">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10632">Specifica i siti Web e i domini che non necessitano dell'autorizzazione esplicita dell'utente quando sono richiesti certificati di attestazione dalle chiavi di sicurezza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10632">Specifies websites and domains that don't need explicit user permission when attestation certificates from security keys are requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10633">Inoltre, alla chiave di sicurezza viene inviato un segnale che indica che è possibile usare un'attestazione specifica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10633">Additionally, a signal is sent to the security key indicating that it can use individual attestation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10634">Se non si esegue questa operazione, gli utenti vengono informati ogni volta che un sito richiede l'attestazione di chiavi di sicurezza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10634">Without this, users are prompted each time a site requests attestation of security keys.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10635">I siti (come https://contoso.com/some/path)) corrispondono solo come U2F appIDs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10635">Sites (like https://contoso.com/some/path) only match as U2F appIDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10636">I domini (come contoso.com) corrispondono solo come webauthn RP IDs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10636">Domains (like contoso.com) only match as webauthn RP IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10637">Per includere sia le API U2F sia le API webauthn per un determinato sito, è necessario elencare il dominio e l'URL dell'appID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10637">To cover both U2F and webauthn APIs for a given site, you need to list both the appID URL and domain.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10638">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10638">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10639">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10639">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10640">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10640">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10641">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10641">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10642">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10642">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10643">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10643">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10644">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10644">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10645">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10645">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10646">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10646">GP unique name: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10647">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Siti Web o domini che non necessitano dell'autorizzazione per usare l'attestazione della chiave di sicurezza diretta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10647">GP name: Websites or domains that don't need permission to use direct Security Key attestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10648">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10648">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10649">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10649">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10650">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10650">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10651">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10651">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10652">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10652">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10653">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10653">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10654">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10654">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10655">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10655">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10656">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10656">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation\1 = "https://contoso.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10657">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10657">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10658">Nome chiave di preferenza: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10658">Preference Key Name: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10659">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10659">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com</string>
</array>
```

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10674">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10674">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10675">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10675">GP unique name: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10682">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10682">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10683">Nome valore: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10683">Value Name: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>

  ### <a name="sendsiteinfotoimproveservices"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10687">SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10687">SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>

  #### <a name="send-site-information-to-improve-microsoft-services-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10688">Invia informazioni sul sito per migliorare i servizi Microsoft (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10688">Send site information to improve Microsoft services (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10689">OBSOLETO: questo criterio è obsoleto e non funziona dopo Microsoft Edge 88.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10689">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10690">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10690">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10691">In Windows e macOS da 77 a 88</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10691">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 88</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10692">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10692">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10693">I criteri non sono più supportati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10693">This policy is no longer supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10694">Sono stati sostituiti da [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (per Windows 7, Windows 8 e macOS) e Consenti telemetria in Windows 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10694">It is replaced by [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (for Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS) and Allow Telemetry on Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10695">Questo criterio consente di inviare informazioni sui siti Web visitati in Microsoft Edge a Microsoft per migliorare i servizi, ad esempio la ricerca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10695">This policy enables sending info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft to improve services like search.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10696">Abilitare questo criterio per inviare a Microsoft le informazioni sui siti Web visitati in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10696">Enable this policy to send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10697">Disabilitare questo criterio per non inviare a Microsoft le informazioni sui siti Web visitati in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10697">Disable this policy to not send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10698">In entrambi i casi, gli utenti non possono modificare né sovrascrivere l'impostazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10698">In both cases, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10699">In Windows 10, se non si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge per impostazione predefinita userà i dati di diagnostica Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10699">On Windows 10, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the Windows diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10700">Se questi criteri sono abilitati, Microsoft Edge invierà solo le informazioni sui siti Web visitati in MIcrosoft Edge se l'impostazione dei dati di diagnostica Windows è impostata su Completo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10700">If this policy is enabled Microsoft Edge will only send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge if the Windows Diagnostic data setting is set to Full.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10701">Se questi criteri sono disabilitati, Microsoft Edge non invierà le informazioni sui siti Web visitati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10701">If this policy is disabled Microsoft Edge will not send info about websites visited.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10702">Per altre informazioni sulle impostazioni dei dati di diagnostica Windows, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10702">Learn more about Windows Diagnostic data settings: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10703">In Windows 7, Windows 8 e Mac, questo criterio controlla l'invio di informazioni sui siti Web visitati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10703">On Windows 7, windows 8, and macOS this policy controls sending info about websites visited.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10704">Se non si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge applicherà l'impostazione predefinita per le preferenze degli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10704">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10705">Per abilitare questo criterio, [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) deve essere impostato su Abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10705">To enable this policy, [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) must be set to Enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10706">Se [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) o [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) non è configurato o disabilitato, i dati non verranno inviati a Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10706">If [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) or [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) is Not Configured or Disabled, this data will not be sent to Microsoft.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10707">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10707">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10708">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10708">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10709">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10709">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10710">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10710">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10711">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10711">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10712">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10712">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10713">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10713">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10714">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10714">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10715">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10715">GP unique name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10716">Nome Criteri di gruppo: invia informazioni sul sito per migliorare i servizi Microsoft (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10716">GP name: Send site information to improve Microsoft services (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10717">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10717">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10718">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10718">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10719">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10719">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10720">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10720">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10721">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10721">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10722">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10722">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10723">Nome valore: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10723">Value Name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10724">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10724">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10725">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10725">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10726">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10726">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10727">Nome chiave di preferenza: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10727">Preference Key Name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10728">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10728">Example value:</span></span>

  ### <a name="sensorsallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10730">SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10730">SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-access-to-sensors-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10731">Consenti l'accesso ai sensori in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10731">Allow access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10732">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10732">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10733">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10733">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10734">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10734">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10735">Definisci un elenco di siti in base ai modelli di URL, che possono accedere a e usare sensori come il sensore di movimento di luce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10735">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can access and use sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10736">Se non si configura questo criterio, per tutti i siti si usa il valore predefinito globale del criterio [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) (se impostato) o la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10736">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10737">Per i modelli di URL che non corrispondono a questo criterio, viene usato l'ordine di precedenza seguente: il criterio [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) (se è presente una corrispondenza), il criterio [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) (se impostato) oppure le impostazioni personali dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10737">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10738">I modelli di URL definiti in questo criterio non possono essere in conflitto con quelli configurati nel criterio [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10738">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10739">Non è possibile consentire e bloccare un URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10739">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10740">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10740">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10741">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10741">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10742">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10742">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10743">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10743">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10744">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10744">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10745">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10745">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10746">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10746">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10747">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10747">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10748">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10748">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10749">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10749">GP unique name: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10750">Nome Criteri di gruppo: consenti l'accesso ai sensori in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10750">GP name: Allow access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10751">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10751">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10752">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10752">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10753">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10753">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10754">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10754">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10755">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10755">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10756">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10756">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10757">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10757">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10758">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10758">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10759">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10759">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10760">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10760">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10761">Nome chiave di preferenza: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10761">Preference Key Name: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10762">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10762">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="sensorsblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10764">SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10764">SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-access-to-sensors-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10765">Blocca l'accesso ai sensori in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10765">Block access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10766">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10766">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10767">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10767">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10768">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10768">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10769">Definisci un elenco di siti in base ai modelli di URL, che possono accedere a sensori come il sensore di movimento di luce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10769">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't access sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10770">Se non si configura questo criterio, per tutti i siti si usa il valore predefinito globale del criterio [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) (se impostato) o la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10770">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10771">Per i modelli di URL che non corrispondono a questo criterio, viene usato l'ordine di precedenza seguente: il criterio [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) (se è presente una corrispondenza), il criterio [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) (se impostato) oppure le impostazioni personali dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10771">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10772">I modelli di URL definiti in questo criterio non possono essere in conflitto con quelli configurati nel criterio [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10772">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10773">Non è possibile consentire e bloccare un URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10773">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10774">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10774">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10775">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10775">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10776">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10776">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>

  ### <a name="serialaskforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10798">SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10798">SerialAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-the-serial-api-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10799">Consenti API Serial in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10799">Allow the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10800">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10800">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10801">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10801">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10802">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10802">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10803">Definisce un elenco di siti, in base ai modelli URL, che possono chiedere all'utente di accedere a una porta seriale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10803">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can ask the user for access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10804">Se non si configura questo criterio, per tutti i siti si usa il valore predefinito globale del criterio [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) (se impostato) o la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10804">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10805">Per i modelli di URL che non corrispondono a questo criterio, viene usato l'ordine di precedenza seguente: il criterio [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) (se è presente una corrispondenza), il criterio [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) (se impostato) oppure le impostazioni personali dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10805">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10806">I modelli di URL definiti in questo criterio non possono essere in conflitto con quelli configurati nel criterio [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10806">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10807">Non è possibile consentire e bloccare un URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10807">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10808">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10808">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10809">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10809">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10810">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10810">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10811">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10811">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10812">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10812">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10817">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10817">GP unique name: SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10818">Nome Criteri di gruppo: consenti Serial API in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10818">GP name: Allow the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10819">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10819">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10820">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10820">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10821">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10821">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10823">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10823">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10824">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10824">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10825">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10825">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10826">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10826">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10827">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10827">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10829">Nome chiave di preferenza: SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10829">Preference Key Name: SerialAskForUrls</span></span>

  ### <a name="serialblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10832">SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10832">SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-the-serial-api-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10833">Blocca Serial API in siti specifici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10833">Block the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10837">Definisce un elenco di siti, in base ai modelli URL, che non possono chiedere all'utente di autorizzarli ad accedere a una porta seriale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10837">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't ask the user to grant them access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10838">Se non si configura questo criterio, per tutti i siti si usa il valore predefinito globale del criterio [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) (se impostato) o la configurazione personale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10838">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10839">Per i modelli di URL che non corrispondono a questo criterio, viene usato l'ordine di precedenza seguente: il criterio [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) (se è presente una corrispondenza), il criterio [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) (se impostato) oppure le impostazioni personali dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10839">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10840">I modelli di URL in questo criterio non possono essere in conflitto con quelli configurati nel criterio [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10840">The URL patterns in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10841">Non è possibile consentire e bloccare un URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10841">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10842">Per informazioni dettagliate sui modelli di URL validi, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10842">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10845">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10845">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10846">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10846">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10869">su Windows e macOS da 88 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10869">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10870">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10870">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10871">Mostra l'esperienza e le notifiche di Microsoft Rewards.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10871">Show Microsoft Rewards experience and notifications.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10872">Se il criterio viene abilitato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10872">If you enable this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10873">Gli utenti degli account Microsoft (esclusi gli account di Azure AD) in mercati con ricompense per ricerca vedranno l'esperienza Microsoft Rewards nel profilo utente Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10873">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10874">L'impostazione per abilitare Microsoft Rewards nelle impostazioni Microsoft Edge verrà abilitata e attivata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10874">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be enabled and toggled on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10875">Se disabiliti questo criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10875">If you disable this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10876">Gli utenti degli account Microsoft (esclusi gli account di Azure AD) in mercati con ricompense per ricerca non vedranno l'esperienza Microsoft Rewards nel profilo utente Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10876">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will not see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10877">L'impostazione per abilitare Microsoft Rewards nelle impostazioni Microsoft Edge verrà disabilitata e disattivata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10877">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be disabled and toggled off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10878">Se non si configurano i criteri seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10878">If you don't configure this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10879">Gli utenti degli account Microsoft (esclusi gli account di Azure AD) in mercati con ricompense per ricerca vedranno l'esperienza Microsoft Rewards nel profilo utente Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10879">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10880">L'impostazione per abilitare Microsoft Rewards nelle impostazioni Microsoft Edge verrà abilitata e attivata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10880">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be enabled and toggled on.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10881">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10881">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10882">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10882">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10883">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10883">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10884">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10884">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10888">Informazioni sui Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10888">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10889">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10889">GP unique name: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10890">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Mostra le esperienze di Microsoft Rewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10890">GP name: Show Microsoft Rewards experiences</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10891">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10891">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10892">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10892">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10893">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10893">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10895">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10895">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10896">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Consigliati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10896">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10897">Nome valore: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10897">Value Name: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10898">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10898">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10901">Nome chiave di preferenza: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10901">Preference Key Name: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-microsoft-office-shortcut-in-favorites-bar-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10905">Mostra la scelta rapida da tastiera di Microsoft Office nella barra dei Preferiti (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10905">Show Microsoft Office shortcut in favorites bar (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10906">DEPRECATO: questo criterio è deprecato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10906">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10907">È attualmente supportato, ma diventerà obsoleto in una versione futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10907">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10909">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10909">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10910">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10910">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10911">Questa politica non ha funzionato come previsto a causa di cambiamenti nei requisiti operativi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10911">This policy didn't work as expected due to changes in operational requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10912">Therefore it's deprecated and should not be used.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10912">Therefore it's deprecated and should not be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10913">Specifica se includere un collegamento a Office.com nella barra Preferiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10913">Specifies whether to include a shortcut to Office.com in the favorites bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10914">Per gli utenti che hanno eseguito l'accesso a Microsoft Edge, il collegamento reindirizza gli utenti alle app e ai documenti di Microsoft Office. Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono scegliere se visualizzare o meno il collegamento modificando l'interruttore nel menu a comparsa della barra Preferiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10914">For users signed into Microsoft Edge the shortcut takes users to their Microsoft Office apps and docs. If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can choose whether to see the shortcut by changing the toggle in the favorites bar context menu.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10915">Se si disabilita questo criterio, il collegamento non viene mostrato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10915">If you disable this policy, the shortcut isn't shown.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10916">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10916">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10917">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10917">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10918">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10918">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10919">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10919">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10925">Nome Criteri di gruppo: mostra il collegamento a Microsoft Office nella barra dei Preferiti (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10925">GP name: Show Microsoft Office shortcut in favorites bar (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10926">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10926">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10928">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10928">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10929">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10929">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  ### <a name="showrecommendationsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10939">MostraRaccomandazioniAbilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10939">ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10941">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10941">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10942">In Windows e macOS da 89 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10942">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10944">Questa impostazione dei criteri consente di decidere se i dipendenti devono ricevere suggerimenti e notifiche di assistenza all'interno del prodotto da Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10944">This policy setting lets you decide whether employees should receive recommendations and in-product assistance notifications from Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10945">Se si abilita o non si configura questa impostazione, i dipendenti ricevono suggerimenti e notifiche da Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10945">If you enable or don't configure this setting, employees receive recommendations / notifications from Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10946">Se si disabilita questa impostazione, i dipendenti non riceveranno consigli e notifiche da Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10946">If you disable this setting, employees will not receive any recommendations / notifications from Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10949">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10949">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10950">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10950">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10952">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10952">Boolean</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10958">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10958">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10959">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10959">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10961">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10961">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
