  ### <a name="signedhttpexchangeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10970">SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10970">SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-signed-http-exchange-sxg-support"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10971">Abilita il supporto di Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10971">Enable Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) support</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10972">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10972">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10973">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 78 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10973">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10974">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10974">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10975">Abilita il supporto per Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10975">Enable support for Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10976">Se questo criterio non è impostato o abilitato, Microsoft Edge accetta i contenuti Web serviti come Signed HTTP Exchange.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10976">If this policy isn't set or enabled, Microsoft Edge will accept web contents served as Signed HTTP Exchanges.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-10977">Se questo criterio è disabilitato, non è possibile caricare Signed HTTP Exchange.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10977">If this policy is set to disabled, Signed HTTP Exchanges can't be loaded.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10978">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10978">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10979">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10979">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10980">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10980">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10981">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10981">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10982">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10982">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10983">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10983">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10984">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10984">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10985">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10985">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10986">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10986">GP unique name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10987">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita il supporto di Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10987">GP name: Enable Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) support</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10988">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10988">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10989">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10989">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10990">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10990">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10991">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10991">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10992">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10992">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10993">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10993">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10994">Nome valore: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10994">Value Name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10995">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10995">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10996">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10996">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-10997">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10997">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10998">Nome chiave di preferenza: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10998">Preference Key Name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-10999">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-10999">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="siteperprocess"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11001">SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11001">SitePerProcess</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-site-isolation-for-every-site"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11002">Abilita l'isolamento del sito per tutte le origini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11002">Enable site isolation for every site</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11003">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11003">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11004">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11004">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11005">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11005">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11006">Il criterio "SitePerProcess" può essere usato per impedire agli utenti di rifiutare esplicitamente il comportamento predefinito dell'isolamento di tutti i siti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11006">The 'SitePerProcess' policy can be used to prevent users from opting out of the default behavior of isolating all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11007">È anche possibile usare il criterio [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) per isolare altre origini più specifiche.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11007">Note that you can also use the [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) policy to isolate additional, finer-grained origins.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11008">Se si abilita questo criterio, gli utenti non possono rifiutare esplicitamente il comportamento predefinito in cui ogni sito viene eseguito nel relativo processo specifico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11008">If you enable this policy, users can't opt out of the default behavior where each site runs in its own process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11009">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, un utente può rifiutare esplicitamente l'isolamento del sito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11009">If you disable or don't configure this policy, a user can opt out of site isolation.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11010">Ad esempio, usando la voce "Disabilitare l'isolamento del sito" entry in edge://flags. Se si disabilita o non si configura il criterio, l'isolamento del sito non viene disattivato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11010">(For example, by using "Disable site isolation" entry in edge://flags.)  Disabling the policy or not configuring the policy doesn't turn off Site Isolation.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11011">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11011">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11012">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11012">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11013">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11013">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11014">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11014">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11015">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11015">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11016">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11016">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11017">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11017">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11018">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11018">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11019">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11019">GP unique name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11020">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita l'isolamento del sito per tutte le origini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11020">GP name: Enable site isolation for every site</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11021">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11021">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11022">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11022">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11023">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11023">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11024">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11024">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11025">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11025">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11026">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11026">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11027">Nome valore: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11027">Value Name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11028">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11028">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11029">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11029">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11030">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11030">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11031">Nome chiave di preferenza: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11031">Preference Key Name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11032">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11032">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11033">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11033">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="smartactionsblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11034">SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11034">SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-smart-actions-for-a-list-of-services"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11035">Blocca le azioni intelligenti per un elenco di servizi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11035">Block smart actions for a list of services</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11036">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11036">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11037">In Windows e macOS da 89 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11037">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11038">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11038">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11039">Elenca servizi specifici, ad esempio i file PDF, che non mostrano azioni intelligenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11039">List specific services, such as PDFs, that don't show smart actions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11040">Le azioni intelligenti sono azioni come "Definisci" disponibili nei menu di scelta rapida completi e ridotti in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11040">(Smart actions are actions like "define" which are available in full and mini context menus in Microsoft Edge.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11041">Se si abilita il criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11041">If you enable the policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11042">L'azione intelligente nei menu di scelta rapida completo e ridotto verrà disabilitata in tutti i profili per i servizi corrispondenti all'elenco specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11042">The smart action in the mini and full context menu will be disabled for all profiles for services that match the given list.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11043">Gli utenti non visualizzeranno l'azione intelligente nel menu di scelta rapida completo e nel menu ridotto nella selezione di testo per i servizi corrispondenti all'elenco specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11043">Users will not see the smart action in the mini and full context menu on text selection for services that match the given list.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11044">Nelle impostazioni di Microsoft Edge, l'azione intelligente nel menu di scelta rapida completo e nel menu ridotto verrà disabilitata per i servizi corrispondenti all'elenco specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11044">In Microsoft Edge settings, the smart action in the mini and full context menu will be disabled for services that match the given list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11045">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11045">If you disable or don't configure this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11046">L'azione intelligente nel menu di scelta rapida completo e nel menu ridotto verrà abilitata per tutti i profili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11046">The smart action in the mini and full context menu will be enabled for all profiles.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11047">Gli utenti visualizzano l'azione intelligente nei menu di scelta rapida completo e ridotto nella selezione di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11047">Users will see the smart action in the mini and full context menu on text selection.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11048">Nelle impostazioni di Microsoft Edge, l'azione intelligente nel menu di scelta rapida completo e nel menu ridotto verrà abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11048">In Microsoft Edge settings, the smart action in the mini and full context menu will be enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11049">Mappatura delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11049">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11050">smart_actions_pdf (smart_actions_pdf) = Azioni intelligenti nei file PDF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11050">smart_actions_pdf (smart_actions_pdf) = Smart actions in PDF</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11051">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11051">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11052">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11052">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11053">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11053">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11054">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11054">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11055">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11055">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11056">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11056">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11057">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11057">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11058">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11058">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11059">Informazioni sui Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11059">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11060">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11060">GP unique name: SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11061">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Blocca le azioni intelligenti per un elenco di servizi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11061">GP name: Block smart actions for a list of services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11062">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11062">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11063">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11063">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11064">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11064">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11065">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11065">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11066">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11066">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11067">Percorso (scelta consigliata): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11067">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11068">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11068">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11069">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11069">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11070">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11070">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartActionsBlockList\1 = "smart_actions_pdf"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11071">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11071">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11072">Nome chiave preferenza: SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11072">Preference Key Name: SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>

``` xml
<array>
  <string>smart_actions_pdf</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="speechrecognitionenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11075">SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11075">SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-speech-recognition"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11076">Configure Speech Recognition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11076">Configure Speech Recognition</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11077">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11077">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11078">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11078">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11079">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11079">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11080">Specificare se i siti Web possono usare l'API per la sintesi vocale W3C per riconoscere il discorso dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11080">Set whether websites can use the W3C Web Speech API to recognize speech from the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11081">L'implementazione Microsoft Edge dell'API per la sintesi vocale usa i servizi conoscitivi di Azure, in modo che data Voice lascerà il computer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11081">The Microsoft Edge implementation of the Web Speech API uses Azure Cognitive Services, so voice data will leave the machine.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11082">Se si Abilita o non si configura questo criterio, le applicazioni basate sul Web che usano l'API per la sintesi vocale possono usare il riconoscimento vocale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11082">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web-based applications that use the Web Speech API can use Speech Recognition.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11083">Se si disabilita questa impostazione, il riconoscimento vocale non sarà disponibile con l'API per la sintesi vocale Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11083">If you disable this policy, Speech Recognition is not available through the Web Speech API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11084">Read more about this feature here: SpeechRecognition API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11084">Read more about this feature here: SpeechRecognition API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11085">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11085">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11086">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11086">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11087">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11087">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11088">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11088">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11089">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11089">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11090">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11090">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11091">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11091">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11092">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11092">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11093">GP unique name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11093">GP unique name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11094">GP name: Configure Speech Recognition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11094">GP name: Configure Speech Recognition</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11095">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11095">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11096">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11096">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11097">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11097">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11098">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11098">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11099">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11099">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11100">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11100">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11101">Value Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11101">Value Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11102">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11102">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11103">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11103">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11104">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11104">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11105">Preference Key Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11105">Preference Key Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11106">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11106">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="spellcheckenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11108">SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11108">SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-spellcheck"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11109">Abilita il controllo ortografico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11109">Enable spellcheck</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11110">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11110">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11111">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11111">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11112">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11112">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11113">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, l'utente può usare il controllo ortografico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11113">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the user can use spellcheck.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11114">Se si disabilita questo criterio, l'utente non può usare il controllo ortografico e i criteri [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) e [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) sono disabilitati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11114">If you disable this policy, the user can't use spellcheck and the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) and [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) policies are also disabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11115">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11115">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11116">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11116">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11117">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11117">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11118">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11118">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11119">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11119">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11120">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11120">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11121">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11121">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11122">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11122">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11123">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11123">GP unique name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11124">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita il controllo ortografico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11124">GP name: Enable spellcheck</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11125">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11125">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11126">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11126">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11127">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11127">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11128">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11128">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11129">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11129">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11130">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11130">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11131">Nome valore: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11131">Value Name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11132">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11132">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11133">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11133">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11134">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11134">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11135">Nome chiave di preferenza: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11135">Preference Key Name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11136">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11136">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="spellchecklanguage"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11138">SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11138">SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-specific-spellcheck-languages"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11139">Abilita lingue specifiche del controllo ortografico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11139">Enable specific spellcheck languages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11140">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11140">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11141">In Windows dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11141">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11142">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11142">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11143">Abilita lingue diverse per il controllo ortografico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11143">Enables different languages for spellcheck.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11144">Tutte le lingue specificate dall'utente che non sono riconosciute verranno ignorate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11144">Any language that you specify that isn't recognized is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11145">Se si abilita questo criterio, il controllo ortografico è abilitato per le lingue specificate, oltre che per tutte le lingue abilitate dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11145">If you enable this policy, spellcheck is enabled for the languages specified, as well as any languages the user has enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11146">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, non viene apportata alcuna modifica alle preferenze del controllo ortografico dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11146">If you don't configure or disable this policy, there's no change to the user's spellcheck preferences.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11147">Se il criterio [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) è disabilitato, questo criterio non avrà alcun effetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11147">If the [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) policy is disabled, this policy will have no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11148">Se una lingua è inclusa nel criterio "SpellcheckLanguage" e nel criterio [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist), la lingua del controllo ortografico è abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11148">If a language is included in both the 'SpellcheckLanguage' and the [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) policy, the spellcheck language is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11149">Le lingue supportate sono: af, bg, ca, cs, cy, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11149">The supported languages are: af, bg, ca, cs, cy, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11150">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11150">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11151">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11151">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11152">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11152">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11153">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11153">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11154">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11154">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11155">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11155">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11156">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11156">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11157">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11157">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11158">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11158">GP unique name: SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11159">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita lingue specifiche del controllo ortografico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11159">GP name: Enable specific spellcheck languages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11160">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11160">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11161">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11161">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11162">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11162">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11163">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11163">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11164">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11164">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11165">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11165">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11166">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11166">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11167">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11167">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11168">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11168">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\1 = "fr"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\2 = "es"

```

  ### <a name="spellchecklanguageblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11170">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11170">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-disable-spellcheck-languages"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11171">Forza la disabilitazione delle lingue del controllo ortografico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11171">Force disable spellcheck languages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11172">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11172">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11173">In Windows dalla versione 78 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11173">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11174">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11174">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11175">Forza la disabilitazione delle lingue del controllo ortografico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11175">Force-disables spellcheck languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11176">Le lingue non riconosciute nell'elenco verranno ignorate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11176">Unrecognized languages in that list will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11177">Se si abilita questo criterio, il controllo ortografico verrà disabilitato per le lingue specificate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11177">If you enable this policy, spellcheck will be disabled for the languages specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11178">L'utente può comunque abilitare o disabilitare il controllo ortografico per le lingue non presenti nell'elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11178">The user can still enable or disable spellcheck for languages not in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11179">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, non viene apportata alcuna modifica alle preferenze del controllo ortografico dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11179">If you do not set this policy, or disable it, there will be no change to the user's spellcheck preferences.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11180">Se il criterio [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) è disabilitato, questo criterio non avrà alcun effetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11180">If the [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) policy is set to disabled, this policy will have no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11181">Se una lingua è inclusa nel criterio [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) e nel criterio "SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist", la lingua del controllo ortografico è abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11181">If a language is included in both the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) and the 'SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist' policy, the spellcheck language is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11182">Le lingue attualmente supportate sono: af, bg, ca, cs, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11182">The currently supported languages are: af, bg, ca, cs, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11183">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11183">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11184">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11184">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11185">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11185">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11186">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11186">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11187">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11187">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11188">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11188">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11189">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11189">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11190">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11190">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11191">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11191">GP unique name: SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11192">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Forza la disabilitazione delle lingue del controllo ortografico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11192">GP name: Force disable spellcheck languages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11193">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11193">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11194">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11194">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11195">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11195">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11196">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11196">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11197">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11197">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11198">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11198">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11199">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11199">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11200">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11200">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11201">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11201">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\1 = "fr"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\2 = "es"

```

  ### <a name="strictermixedcontenttreatmentenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11203">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11203">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-stricter-treatment-for-mixed-content-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11204">Abilita un trattamento più rigoroso per contenuti misti (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11204">Enable stricter treatment for mixed content (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11205">OBSOLETO: questo criterio è obsoleto e non funziona dopo Microsoft Edge 84.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11205">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11206">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11206">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11207">In Windows e macOS da 81 a 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11207">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 84</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11208">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11208">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11209">Questo criterio non funziona perché è solo un meccanismo a breve termine che offre alle aziende più tempo per aggiornare i contenuti Web se viene rilevata incompatibilità con il trattamento più rigoroso per contenuti misti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11209">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if it was found to be incompatible with stricter mixed content treatment.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11210">Questo criterio controlla il trattamento per i contenuti misti (contenuti HTTP in siti HTTPS) nel browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11210">This policy controls the treatment for mixed content (HTTP content in HTTPS sites) in the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11211">Se si imposta questo criterio su true o non si configura, i contenuti audio e video misti verranno automaticamente aggiornati a HTTPS (ovvero, l'URL verrà riscritto come HTTPS, senza un fallback se la risorsa non è disponibile su HTTPS) e verrà visualizzato l'avviso "Non sicuro" nella barra degli URL per i contenuti misti di immagini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11211">If you set this policy to true or not set, audio and video mixed content will be automatically upgraded to HTTPS (that is, the URL will be rewritten as HTTPS, without a fallback if the resource isn't available over HTTPS) and a 'Not Secure' warning will be shown in the URL bar for image mixed content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11212">Se si imposta il criterio su false, gli aggiornamenti automatici verranno disabilitati per i contenuti audio e video e non verranno visualizzati avvisi per le immagini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11212">If you set the policy to false, auto upgrades will be disabled for audio and video, and no warning will be shown for images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11213">Questo criterio non influisce su altri tipi di contenuti misti diversi da audio, video e immagini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11213">This policy does not affect other types of mixed content other than audio, video, and images.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11214">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11214">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11215">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11215">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11216">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11216">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11217">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11217">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11218">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11218">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11219">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11219">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11220">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11220">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11221">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11221">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11222">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11222">GP unique name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11223">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita un trattamento più rigoroso per contenuti misti (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11223">GP name: Enable stricter treatment for mixed content (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11224">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11224">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11225">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11225">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11226">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11226">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11227">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11227">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11228">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11228">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11229">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11229">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11230">Nome valore: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11230">Value Name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11231">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11231">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11232">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11232">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11233">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11233">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11234">Nome chiave di preferenza: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11234">Preference Key Name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11235">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11235">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="suppressunsupportedoswarning"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11237">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11237">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>

  #### <a name="suppress-the-unsupported-os-warning"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11238">Elimina l'avviso del sistema operativo non supportato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11238">Suppress the unsupported OS warning</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11239">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11239">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11240">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11240">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11241">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11241">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11242">Disattiva l'avviso che viene visualizzato quando Microsoft Edge è in esecuzione in un computer o un sistema operativo non più supportato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11242">Suppresses the warning that appears when Microsoft Edge is running on a computer or operating system that is no longer supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11243">Se il criterio è impostato su false o non è configurato, verranno visualizzati degli avvisi in tali computer o sistemi operativi non supportati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11243">If this policy is false or unset, the warnings will appear on such unsupported computers or operating systems.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11244">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11244">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11245">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11245">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11246">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11246">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11247">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11247">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11248">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11248">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11249">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11249">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11250">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11250">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11251">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11251">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11252">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11252">GP unique name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11253">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Elimina l'avviso del sistema operativo non supportato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11253">GP name: Suppress the unsupported OS warning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11254">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11254">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11255">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11255">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11256">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11256">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11257">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11257">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11258">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11258">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11259">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11259">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11260">Nome valore: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11260">Value Name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11261">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11261">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11263">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11263">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11264">Nome chiave di preferenza: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11264">Preference Key Name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>

``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="syncdisabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11267">SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11267">SyncDisabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-synchronization-of-data-using-microsoft-sync-services"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11268">Disabilita la sincronizzazione dei dati con i servizi di sincronizzazione di Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11268">Disable synchronization of data using Microsoft sync services</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11269">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11269">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11270">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11270">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11271">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11271">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11272">Disabilita la sincronizzazione dei dati in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11272">Disables data synchronization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11273">Questo criterio impedisce anche la visualizzazione della richiesta di consenso per la sincronizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11273">This policy also prevents the sync consent prompt from appearing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11274">Questo criterio disabilita solo la sincronizzazione nel cloud e non ha alcun impatto sul criterio [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11274">This policy disables cloud synchronization only and has no impact on the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11275">Se il criterio non viene impostato o lo si applica come consigliato, gli utenti potranno attivare o disattivare la sincronizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11275">If you don't set this policy or apply it as recommended, users will be able to turn sync on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11276">Se si applica questo criterio come obbligatorio, gli utenti non potranno attivare la sincronizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11276">If you apply this policy as mandatory, users will not be able to turn sync on.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11277">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11277">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11278">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11278">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11279">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11279">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11280">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11280">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11281">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11281">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11282">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11282">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11283">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11283">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11284">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11284">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11285">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11285">GP unique name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11286">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Disabilita la sincronizzazione dei dati con i servizi di sincronizzazione di Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11286">GP name: Disable synchronization of data using Microsoft sync services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11287">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11287">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11288">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11288">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11289">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11289">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11290">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11290">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11291">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11291">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11292">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11292">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11293">Nome valore: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11293">Value Name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11294">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11294">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11295">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11295">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11296">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11296">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11297">Nome chiave di preferenza: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11297">Preference Key Name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11298">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11298">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="synctypeslistdisabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11300">SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11300">SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-types-that-are-excluded-from-synchronization"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11301">Configura l'elenco dei tipi esclusi dalla sincronizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11301">Configure the list of types that are excluded from synchronization</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11302">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11302">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11303">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 83 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11303">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11304">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11304">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11305">Se si abilita questo criterio, tutti i tipi di dati specificati verranno esclusi dalla sincronizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11305">If you enable this policy all the specified data types will be excluded from synchronization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11306">Questo criterio può essere usato per limitare il tipo di dati caricati nel servizio di sincronizzazione di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11306">This policy can be used to limit the type of data uploaded to the Microsoft Edge synchronization service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11307">È possibile specificare uno dei tipi di dati seguenti per questo criterio: “preferiti”, “impostazioni”, “password", “addressesAndMore”, “estensioni”, “cronologia”, “openTabs” e “raccolte”.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11307">You can provide one of the following data types for this policy: "favorites", "settings", "passwords", "addressesAndMore", "extensions", "history", "openTabs", and "collections".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11308">Si noti che i nomi dei tipi di dati fanno distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11308">Note that these data type names are case sensitive.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11309">Gli utenti non potranno eseguire l'override dei tipi di dati disabilitati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11309">Users will not be able to override the disabled data types.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11310">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11310">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11311">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11311">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11312">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11312">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11313">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11313">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11314">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11314">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11315">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11315">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11316">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11316">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11317">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11317">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11318">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11318">GP unique name: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11319">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura l'elenco dei tipi esclusi dalla sincronizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11319">GP name: Configure the list of types that are excluded from synchronization</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11320">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11320">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11321">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11321">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11322">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11322">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11323">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11323">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11324">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11324">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11325">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11325">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11326">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11326">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11327">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11327">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11328">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11328">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled\1 = "favorites"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11329">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11329">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11330">Nome chiave di preferenza: SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11330">Preference Key Name: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11331">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11331">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>favorites</string>
</array>
```
