  ### <a name="tls13hardeningforlocalanchorsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11333">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11333">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-a-tls-13-security-feature-for-local-trust-anchors-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11334">Abilita una funzionalità di sicurezza TLS 1.3 per i trust anchor locali (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11334">Enable a TLS 1.3 security feature for local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11335">OBSOLETO: questo criterio è obsoleto e non funziona dopo Microsoft Edge 85.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11335">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 85.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11336">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11336">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11337">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 81, fino alla versione 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11337">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 85</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11338">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11338">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11339">Questo criterio non funziona perché doveva essere solo un meccanismo a breve termine per dare alle aziende più tempo per aggiornare i proxy interessati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11339">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to upgrade affected proxies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11340">Questo criterio controlla una funzionalità di sicurezza in TLS 1.3 che protegge le connessioni dagli attacchi di downgrade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11340">This policy controls a security feature in TLS 1.3 that protects connections against downgrade attacks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11341">È compatibile con le versioni precedenti e non influisce sulle connessioni ai server o ai proxy conformi a TLS 1.2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11341">It is backwards-compatible and will not affect connections to compliant TLS 1.2 servers or proxies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11342">Tuttavia, nelle versioni meno recenti di alcuni proxy di intercettazione TLS sono presenti difetti di implementazione che le rendono non compatibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11342">However, older versions of some TLS-intercepting proxies have an implementation flaw which causes them to be incompatible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11343">Se si abilita o non si imposta questo criterio, Microsoft Edge consentirà tali protezioni per tutte le connessioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11343">If you enable this policy or don't set it, Microsoft Edge will enable these security protections for all connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11344">Se si disabilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge disabiliterà queste protezioni per le connessioni autenticate con certificati di firma installati in locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11344">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will disable these security protections for connections authenticated with locally-installed CA certificates.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11345">Queste protezioni sono sempre abilitate per le connessioni autenticate con certificati di firma pubblicamente attendibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11345">These protections are always enabled for connections authenticated with publicly-trusted CA certificates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11346">Questo criterio può essere usato per testare l'eventuale presenza di proxy interessati e aggiornarli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11346">This policy can be used to test for any affected proxies and upgrade them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11347">I proxy interessati causeranno un esito negativo per le connessioni con un codice errore di ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11347">Affected proxies are expected to fail connections with an error code of ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11348">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11348">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11349">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11349">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11350">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11350">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11351">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11351">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11352">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11352">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11353">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11353">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11354">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11354">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11355">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11355">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11356">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11356">GP unique name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11357">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita una funzionalità di sicurezza TLS 1.3 per i trust anchor locali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11357">GP name: Enable a TLS 1.3 security feature for local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11358">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11358">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11359">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11359">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11360">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11360">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11361">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11361">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11362">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11362">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11363">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11363">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11364">Nome valore: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11364">Value Name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11365">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11365">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11366">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11366">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11367">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11367">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11368">Nome chiave di preferenza: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11368">Preference Key Name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11369">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11369">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="tlsciphersuitedenylist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11371">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11371">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-the-tls-cipher-suites-to-disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11372">Specifica i pacchetti di crittografia TLS da disabilitare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11372">Specify the TLS cipher suites to disable</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11373">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11373">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11374">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 85 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11374">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11375">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11375">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11376">Configura l'elenco dei pacchetti di crittografia disabilitati per connessioni TLS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11376">Configure the list of cipher suites that are disabled for TLS connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11377">Se si configura questo criterio, l'elenco dei pacchetti di crittografia configurati non verranno usati per stabilire connessioni TLS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11377">If you configure this policy, the list of configured cipher suites will not be used when establishing TLS connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11378">Se non si configura questo criterio, il browser sceglierà i pacchetti crittografici TLS da usare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11378">If you don't configure this policy, the browser will choose which TLS cipher suites to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11379">I valori dei pacchetti di crittografia da disabilitare sono specificati come valori esadecimali a 16 bit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11379">Cipher suite values to be disabled are specified as 16-bit hexadecimal values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11380">I valori sono assegnati dal registro di sistema IANA (Internet Assigned Numbers Authority).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11380">The values are assigned by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) registry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11381">Il pacchetto di crittografia 1.3 TLS TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 (0x1301) è obbligatorio per TLS 1,3 e non può essere disabilitato con questo criterio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11381">The TLS 1.3 cipher suite TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 (0x1301) is required for TLS 1.3 and can't be disabled by this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11382">Questo criterio non influisce sulle connessioni basate su QUIC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11382">This policy does not affect QUIC-based connections.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11383">QUIC può essere disattivato tramite il criterio [QuicAllowed](#quicallowed).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11383">QUIC can be turned off via the [QuicAllowed](#quicallowed) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11384">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11384">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11385">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11385">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11386">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11386">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11387">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11387">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11388">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11388">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11389">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11389">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11390">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11390">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11391">Informazioni sui Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11391">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11392">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11392">GP unique name: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11393">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Specifica i pacchetti di crittografia TLS da disabilitare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11393">GP name: Specify the TLS cipher suites to disable</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11394">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11394">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11395">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11395">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11396">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11396">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11397">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11397">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11398">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11398">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11399">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11399">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11400">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11400">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11401">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11401">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11402">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11402">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\1 = "0x1303"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\2 = "0xcca8"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\3 = "0xcca9"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11403">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11403">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11404">Nome chiave preferenza: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11404">Preference Key Name: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11405">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11405">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>0x1303</string>
  <string>0xcca8</string>
  <string>0xcca9</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="tabfreezingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11407">TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11407">TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-freezing-of-background-tabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11408">Consente il blocco delle schede di sfondo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11408">Allow freezing of background tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11409">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11409">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11410">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 79 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11410">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11411">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11411">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11412">Controlla se Microsoft Edge può bloccare le schede in background per almeno 5 minuti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11412">Controls whether Microsoft Edge can freeze tabs that are in the background for at least 5 minutes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11413">Il blocco delle schede riduce l'utilizzo della CPU, della batteria e della memoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11413">Tab freezing reduces CPU, battery, and memory usage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11414">Microsoft Edge usa funzionalità euristiche per evitare il blocco delle schede utili in background, come la visualizzazione delle notifiche, la riproduzione di contenuti audio e lo streaming di contenuti video.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11414">Microsoft Edge uses heuristics to avoid freezing tabs that do useful work in the background, such as display notifications, play sound, and stream video.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11415">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, le schede che sono state in background per almeno 5 minuti potrebbero essere bloccate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11415">If you enable or don't configure this policy, tabs that have been in the background for at least 5 minutes might be frozen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11416">Se si disabilita questo criterio, non verrà bloccata nessuna scheda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11416">If you disable this policy, no tabs will be frozen.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11417">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11417">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11418">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11418">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11419">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11419">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11420">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11420">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11421">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11421">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11422">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11422">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11423">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11423">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11424">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11424">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11425">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11425">GP unique name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11426">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente il blocco delle schede di sfondo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11426">GP name: Allow freezing of background tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11427">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11427">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11428">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11428">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11429">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11429">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11430">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11430">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11431">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11431">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11432">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11432">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11433">Nome valore: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11433">Value Name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11434">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11434">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11435">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11435">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11436">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11436">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11437">Nome chiave di preferenza: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11437">Preference Key Name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11438">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11438">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="targetblankimpliesnoopener"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11440">TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11440">TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>

  #### <a name="do-not-set-windowopener-for-links-targeting-_blank"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11441">Non impostare window.opener per i collegamenti con destinazione _blank</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11441">Do not set window.opener for links targeting _blank</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11442">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11442">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11443">su Windows e macOS da 88 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11443">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11444">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11444">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11445">Se abiliti questo criterio o non lo configuri, la proprietà window.opener è impostata su NULL, a meno che l’ancora non specifichi rel="opener".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11445">If you enable this policy or leave it unset, the window.opener property is set to null unless the anchor specifies rel="opener".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11446">Se disabiliti i criteri, i popup con destinazione _blank sono autorizzati ad accedere, tramite JavaScript, alla pagina che ha richiesto di aprire il popup.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11446">If you disable this policy, popups that target _blank are permitted to access (via JavaScript) the page that requested to open the popup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11447">Questo criterio diventerà obsoleto nella versione 95 di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11447">This policy will be obsoleted in Microsoft Edge version 95.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11448">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11448">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11449">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11449">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11450">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11450">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11451">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11451">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11452">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11452">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11453">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11453">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11454">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11454">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11455">Informazioni sui Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11455">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11456">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11456">GP unique name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11457">Nome Criteri di gruppo: non impostare window.opener per i collegamenti con destinazione _blank</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11457">GP name: Do not set window.opener for links targeting _blank</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11458">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11458">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11459">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11459">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11460">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11460">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11461">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11461">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11462">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11462">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11463">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11463">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11464">Nome valore: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11464">Value Name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11465">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11465">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11466">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11466">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11468">Nome chiave di preferenza: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11468">Preference Key Name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>

  ### <a name="taskmanagerendprocessenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11471">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11471">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-ending-processes-in-the-browser-task-manager"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11472">Abilita i processi finali nel servizio di gestione attività del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11472">Enable ending processes in the Browser task manager</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11473">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11473">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11474">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11474">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11475">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11475">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11476">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono terminare i processi nella gestione attività del browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11476">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can end processes in the Browser task manager.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11477">Se viene disabilitato, gli utenti non possono terminare i processi e il pulsante Termina processo viene disabilitato nella gestione attività del browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11477">If you disable it, users can't end processes, and the End process button is disabled in the Browser task manager.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11478">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11478">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11480">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11480">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11481">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11481">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11483">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11483">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11484">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11484">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11485">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11485">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11486">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11486">GP unique name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11487">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita i processi finali nel servizio di gestione attività del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11487">GP name: Enable ending processes in the Browser task manager</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11488">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11488">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11489">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11489">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11490">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11490">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11491">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11491">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11492">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11492">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11493">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11493">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11494">Nome valore: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11494">Value Name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11495">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11495">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11496">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11496">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11497">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11497">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11498">Nome chiave di preferenza: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11498">Preference Key Name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>

  ### <a name="totalmemorylimitmb"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11501">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11501">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-limit-on-megabytes-of-memory-a-single-microsoft-edge-instance-can-use"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11502">Imposta un limite per i megabyte di memoria che possono essere usati in un'unica istanza di Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11502">Set limit on megabytes of memory a single Microsoft Edge instance can use</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11503">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11503">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11504">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 80 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11504">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11505">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11505">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11506">Configura la quantità di memoria che una singola istanza di Microsoft Edge può usare prima che le schede vengano eliminate per risparmiare memoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11506">Configures the amount of memory that a single Microsoft Edge instance can use before tabs start getting discarded to save memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11507">La memoria usata dalla scheda verrà liberata e sarà necessario ricaricare la scheda quando verrà aperta di nuovo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11507">The memory used by the tab will be freed and the tab will have to be reloaded when switched to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11508">Se si abilita questo criterio, il browser inizierà a rimuovere le schede per risparmiare memoria dopo il superamento del limite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11508">If you enable this policy, the browser will start to discard tabs to save memory once the limitation is exceeded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11509">Tuttavia, non ci sono garanzie che il browser sia in esecuzione sempre sotto il limite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11509">However, there is no guarantee that the browser is always running under the limit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11510">Qualsiasi valore inferiore a 1024 verrà arrotondato per eccesso a 1024.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11510">Any value under 1024 will be rounded up to 1024.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11511">Se non si imposta questo criterio, il browser tenterà di risparmiare memoria solo dopo che viene rilevata una quantità di memoria fisica del computer in uso insufficiente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11511">If you don't set this policy, the browser will only attempt to save memory when it has detected that the amount of physical memory on its machine is low.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11512">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11512">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11513">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11513">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11514">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11514">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11515">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11515">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11516">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11516">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11517">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11517">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11518">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11518">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11519">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11519">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11520">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11520">GP unique name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11521">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Imposta un limite per i megabyte di memoria che possono essere usati in un'unica istanza di Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11521">GP name: Set limit on megabytes of memory a single Microsoft Edge instance can use</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11522">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11522">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11523">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11523">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11524">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11524">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11525">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11525">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11526">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11526">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11527">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11527">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11528">Nome valore: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11528">Value Name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11529">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11529">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11530">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11530">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000800
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11531">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11531">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11532">Nome chiave di preferenza: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11532">Preference Key Name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11533">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11533">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2048</integer>
```

  ### <a name="trackingprevention"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11535">TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11535">TrackingPrevention</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-tracking-of-users-web-browsing-activity"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11536">Blocca il monitoraggio dell'attività di esplorazione sul Web degli utenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11536">Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11537">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11537">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11538">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 78 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11538">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11539">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11539">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11540">Consente di decidere se impedire ai siti Web di tenere traccia delle attività di esplorazione del Web degli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11540">Lets you decide whether to block websites from tracking users' web-browsing activity.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11541">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono impostare il proprio livello di prevenzione del rilevamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11541">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, users can set their own level of tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11542">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11542">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11543">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = Disattivato (nessuna prevenzione del rilevamento)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11543">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = Off (no tracking prevention)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11544">TrackingPreventionBasic (1) = Di base (blocca i tracker dannosi, contenuti e annunci verranno personalizzati)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11544">TrackingPreventionBasic (1) = Basic (blocks harmful trackers, content and ads will be personalized)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11545">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2) = Bilanciato (blocca i tracker dannosi e i tracker di siti non visitati dall'utente; contenuti e annunci saranno meno personalizzati)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11545">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2) = Balanced (blocks harmful trackers and trackers from sites user has not visited; content and ads will be less personalized)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11546">TrackingPreventionStrict (3) = Con restrizioni (blocca i tracker dannosi e la maggior parte dei tracker di tutti i siti; contenuti e annunci avranno una personalizzazione minima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11546">TrackingPreventionStrict (3) = Strict (blocks harmful trackers and majority of trackers from all sites; content and ads will have minimal personalization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11547">alcune parti dei siti potrebbero non funzionare)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11547">Some parts of sites might not work)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11548">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11548">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11549">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11549">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11550">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11550">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11551">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11551">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11552">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11552">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11553">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11553">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11554">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11554">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11555">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11555">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11556">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11556">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11557">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11557">GP unique name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11558">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Blocca il monitoraggio dell'attività di esplorazione sul Web degli utenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11558">GP name: Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11559">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11559">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11560">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11560">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11561">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11561">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11562">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11562">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11563">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11563">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11564">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11564">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11565">Nome valore: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11565">Value Name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11566">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11566">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11567">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11567">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11568">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11568">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11569">Nome chiave di preferenza: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11569">Preference Key Name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11570">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11570">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="translateenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11572">TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11572">TranslateEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-translate"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11573">Abilita Traduci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11573">Enable Translate</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11574">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11574">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11575">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11575">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11576">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11576">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11577">Abilita il servizio di traduzione Microsoft integrato in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11577">Enables the integrated Microsoft translation service on Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11578">Se si abilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge offre funzionalità di traduzione all'utente mostrando un riquadro a comparsa di traduzione integrato, se necessario, e un'opzione di traduzione nel menu di scelta rapida selezionabile con il pulsante destro del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11578">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge offers translation functionality to the user by showing an integrated translate flyout when appropriate, and a translate option on the right-click context menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11579">Disabilitare questo criterio per disabilitare tutte le funzionalità di traduzione integrate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11579">Disable this policy to disable all built-in translate features.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11580">Se non si configura il criterio, gli utenti possono scegliere se usare o meno la funzionalità di traduzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11580">If you don't configure the policy, users can choose whether to use the translation functionality or not.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11581">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11581">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11582">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11582">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11583">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11583">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11584">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11584">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11585">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11585">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11586">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11586">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11587">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11587">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11588">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11588">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11589">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11589">GP unique name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11590">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita Traduci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11590">GP name: Enable Translate</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11591">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11591">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11592">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge - Impostazioni predefinite (gli utenti possono eseguire l'override)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11592">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11593">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11593">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11594">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11594">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11595">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11595">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11596">Percorso (consigliato): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11596">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11597">Nome valore: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11597">Value Name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11598">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11598">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11599">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11599">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11600">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11600">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11601">Nome chiave di preferenza: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11601">Preference Key Name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11602">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11602">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11603">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11603">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="urlallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11604">URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11604">URLAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="define-a-list-of-allowed-urls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11605">Definisce un elenco di URL consentiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11605">Define a list of allowed URLs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11606">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11606">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11607">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11607">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11608">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11608">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11609">L'impostazione dei criteri consente l'accesso agli URL elencati, come eccezioni a [di URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11609">Setting the policy provides access to the listed URLs, as exceptions to [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11610">Formattare il modello URL in base a [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11610">Format the URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11611">È possibile usare questo criterio per aprire eccezioni degli elenchi di indirizzi bloccati restrittivi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11611">You can use this policy to open exceptions to restrictive block lists.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11612">Ad esempio, è possibile includere "\*" nell'elenco di indirizzi bloccati per bloccare tutte le richieste e quindi usare questo criterio per consentire l'accesso a un elenco limitato di URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11612">For example, you can include '\*' in the block list to block all requests, and then use this policy to allow access to a limited list of URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11613">È possibile usare questo criterio per aprire eccezioni a determinati schemi, sottodomini di altri domini, porte o percorsi specifici.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11613">You can use this policy to open exceptions to certain schemes, subdomains of other domains, ports, or specific paths.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11614">Il filtro più specifico determina se un URL è bloccato o consentito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11614">The most specific filter determines if a URL is blocked or allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11615">L'elenco di indirizzi consentiti avrà la precedenza sull'elenco di quelli bloccati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11615">The allowed list takes precedence over the block list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11616">Questo criterio è limitato a 1.000 voci; le voci successive vengono ignorate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11616">This policy is limited to 1000 entries; subsequent entries are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11617">Questo criterio consente anche al browser di richiamare automaticamente applicazioni esterne registrate come gestori protocollo per protocolli come “tel:” o “ssh:”.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11617">This policy also allows the browser to automatically invoke external applications registered as protocol handlers for protocols like "tel:" or "ssh:".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11618">Se non si configura questo criterio, non sono presenti eccezioni rispetto all'elenco di indirizzi bloccati nel criterio [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11618">If you don't configure this policy, there are no exceptions to the block list in the [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11619">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11619">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11620">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11620">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11621">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11621">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11622">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11622">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11623">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11623">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11624">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11624">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11625">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11625">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11626">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11626">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11627">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11627">GP unique name: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11628">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Definisce un elenco di URL consentiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11628">GP name: Define a list of allowed URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11629">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11629">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11630">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11630">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11631">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11631">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11632">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11632">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11633">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11633">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11634">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11634">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11635">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11635">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11636">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11636">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11637">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11637">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\3 = "hosting.com/good_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11638">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11638">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11639">Nome chiave di preferenza: URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11639">Preference Key Name: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11640">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11640">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/good_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11641">Torna all'inizio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11641">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="urlblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11642">URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11642">URLBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-access-to-a-list-of-urls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11643">Blocca l'accesso a un elenco di URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11643">Block access to a list of URLs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11644">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11644">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11645">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11645">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11646">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11646">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11647">Definisce un elenco di siti, in base ai modelli URL, che sono bloccati (gli utenti non possono caricarli).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11647">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked (your users can't load them).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11648">Formattare il modello URL in base a [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11648">Format the URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11649">È possibile definire eccezioni nel criterio [URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11649">You can define exceptions in the [URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11650">Questi criteri sono limitati a 1.000 voci; le voci successive vengono ignorate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11650">These policies are limited to 1000 entries; subsequent entries are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11651">Tenere presente che non è consigliabile bloccare gli URL "edge://\*" interni: ciò potrebbe comportare errori imprevisti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11651">Note that blocking internal 'edge://\*' URLs isn't recommended - this may lead to unexpected errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11652">Questo criterio non impedisce l'aggiornamento dinamico della pagina con JavaScript.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11652">This policy doesn't prevent the page from updating dynamically through JavaScript.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11653">Ad esempio, se si blocca "contoso.com/abc", gli utenti potrebbero comunque visitare "contoso.com" e fare clic su un collegamento per accedere a "contoso.com/abc", a condizione che la pagina non venga aggiornata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11653">For example, if you block 'contoso.com/abc', users might still be able to visit 'contoso.com' and click on a link to visit 'contoso.com/abc', as long as the page doesn't refresh.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11654">Se non si configura questo criterio, non viene bloccato nessun URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11654">If you don't configure this policy, no URLs are blocked.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11655">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11655">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11656">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11656">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11657">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11657">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11658">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11658">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11659">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11659">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11660">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11660">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11661">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11661">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11662">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11662">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11663">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11663">GP unique name: URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11664">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Blocca l'accesso a un elenco di URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11664">GP name: Block access to a list of URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11665">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11665">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11666">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11666">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11667">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11667">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11668">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11668">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11669">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11669">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11670">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11670">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11671">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11671">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11672">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11672">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11673">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11673">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\3 = "hosting.com/bad_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\6 = "file://*"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\7 = "custom_scheme:*"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\8 = "*"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11674">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11674">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11675">Nome chiave di preferenza: URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11675">Preference Key Name: URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11676">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11676">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/bad_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
  <string>file://*</string>
  <string>custom_scheme:*</string>
  <string>*</string>
</array>
```
