  ### <a name="updatepolicyoverride"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11678">UpdatePolicyOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11678">UpdatePolicyOverride</span></span>

  #### <a name="specifies-how-microsoft-edge-update-handles-available-updates-from-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11679">Specifica in che modo Microsoft Edge Update gestisce gli aggiornamenti disponibili da Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11679">Specifies how Microsoft Edge Update handles available updates from Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11680">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11680">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11681">In macOS da 89 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11681">On macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11682">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11682">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11683">Se abiliti questo criterio, Microsoft Edge Update gestisce gli aggiornamenti Microsoft Edge in base alla configurazione delle opzioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11683">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Update handles Microsoft Edge updates according to how you configure the following options:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11684">Solo aggiornamenti automatici: gli aggiornamenti vengono applicati solo quando vengono rilevati in seguito al controllo periodico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11684">Automatic silent updates only: Updates are applied only when they're found by the periodic update check.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11685">Solo aggiornamenti manuali: gli aggiornamenti vengono applicati solo quando gli utenti eseguono un controllo manuale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11685">Manual updates only: Updates are applied only when the user runs a manual update check.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11686">Non tutte le app forniscono un'interfaccia per questa opzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11686">(Not all apps provide an interface for this option.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11687">Se si selezionano gli aggiornamenti manuali, verificare periodicamente la disponibilità di aggiornamenti tramite Microsoft AutoUpdate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11687">If you select manual updates, make sure you periodically check for updates by using Microsoft Autoupdate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11688">Se non si abilita e si configura questo criterio, Microsoft Edge Update verifica automaticamente la disponibilità di aggiornamenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11688">If you don't enable and configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Update automatically checks for updates.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11689">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11689">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11690">automatic-Silent-Only (automatic-Silent-only) = gli aggiornamenti vengono applicati solo quando vengono trovati tramite il controllo di aggiornamento periodico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11690">automatic-silent-only (automatic-silent-only) = Updates are applied only when they're found by the periodic update check.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11691">solo manuale (solo manuale) = gli aggiornamenti vengono applicati solo quando l'utente esegue un controllo di aggiornamento manuale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11691">manual-only (manual-only) = Updates are applied only when the user runs a manual update check.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11692">Non tutte le app forniscono un'interfaccia per questa opzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11692">(Not all apps provide an interface for this option.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11693">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11693">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11694">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11694">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11695">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11695">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11696">Può essere consigliato: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11696">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11697">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11697">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11698">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11698">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11699">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11699">String</span></span>

  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11700">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11700">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11701">Nome chiave di preferenza: UpdatePolicyOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11701">Preference Key Name: UpdatePolicyOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11702">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11702">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>automatic-silent-only</string>
```

  ### <a name="useragentclienthintsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11704">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11704">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-the-user-agent-client-hints-feature-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11705">Abilita la funzionalità User-Agent Client Hints (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11705">Enable the User-Agent Client Hints feature (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11706">DEPRECATO: questo criterio è deprecato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11706">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11707">È attualmente supportato, ma diventerà obsoleto in una versione futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11707">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11708">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11708">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11709">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11709">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11710">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11710">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11711">Questo criterio è deprecato perché è solo un meccanismo a breve termine che offre alle aziende più tempo per aggiornare i contenuti Web se e quando viene rilevata incompatibilità con la funzione suggerimenti client agente utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11711">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the User-Agent Client Hints feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11712">Non funzionerà in Microsoft Edge versione 93.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11712">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 93.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11713">Quando viene abilitata, la funzionalità User-Agent Client Hints invia intestazioni della richiesta granulari che forniscono informazioni sul browser utente (ad esempio, la versione dl browser) e sull’ambiente (ad esempio, l’architettura del sistema).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11713">When enabled the User-Agent Client Hints feature sends granular request headers that provide information about the user browser (for example, the browser version) and environment (for example, the system architecture).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11714">Si tratta di una funzionalità aggiuntiva, ma le nuove intestazioni potrebbero interrompere alcuni siti Web che limitano i caratteri che le richieste potrebbero contenere. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11714">This is an additive feature, but the new headers may break some websites that restrict the characters that requests may contain.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11715">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, la funzionalità User-Agent Client Hints viene abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11715">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the User-Agent Client Hints feature is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11716">Se si disabilita questo criterio, questa funzionalità non è disponibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11716">If you disable this policy, this feature is unavailable.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11717">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11717">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11718">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11718">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11719">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11719">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11720">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11720">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11721">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11721">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11722">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11722">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11723">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11723">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11724">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11724">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11725">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11725">GP unique name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11726">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita la funzionalità User-Agent Client Hints (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11726">GP name: Enable the User-Agent Client Hints feature (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11727">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11727">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11728">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11728">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11729">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11729">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11730">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11730">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11731">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11731">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11732">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11732">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11733">Nome valore: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11733">Value Name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11734">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11734">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11735">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11735">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11736">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11736">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11737">Nome chiave di preferenza: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11737">Preference Key Name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11738">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11738">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="userdatadir"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11740">UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11740">UserDataDir</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-user-data-directory"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11741">Imposta la directory dei dati dell'utente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11741">Set the user data directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11742">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11742">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11743">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11743">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11744">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11744">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11745">Imposta la directory da usare per archiviare i dati degli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11745">Set the directory to use for storing user data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11746">Se si abilita questo criterio, Microsoft Edge usa la directory specificata indipendentemente dal fatto che l'utente abbia impostato il contrassegno della riga di comando "--user-data-dir".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11746">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the specified directory regardless of whether the user has set the '--user-data-dir' command-line flag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11747">Se non si abilita questo criterio, viene usato il percorso del profilo predefinito, ma l'utente può sostituirlo usando il contrassegno "--user-data-dir".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11747">If you don't enable this policy, the default profile path is used, but the user can override it by using the '--user-data-dir' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11748">Gli utenti possono trovare la directory del profilo in edge://version/ nel percorso del profilo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11748">Users can find the directory for the profile at edge://version/ under profile path.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11749">Per evitare perdite di dati o altri errori, non configurare questo criterio su una directory radice di un volume o su una directory utilizzata per altri scopi, perché Microsoft Edge ne gestisce il contenuto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11749">To avoid data loss or other errors, don't configure this policy to a volume's root directory or to a directory that's used for other purposes, because Microsoft Edge manages its contents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11750">Per un elenco delle variabili che è possibile usare, vedere [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11750">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables that can be used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11751">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11751">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11752">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11752">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11753">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11753">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11754">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11754">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11757">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11757">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11758">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11758">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11759">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11759">GP unique name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11760">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Imposta la directory dei dati dell'utente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11760">GP name: Set the user data directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11761">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11761">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11762">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11762">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11765">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11765">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11766">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11766">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11768">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11768">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ### <a name="userdatasnapshotretentionlimit"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11774">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11774">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>

  #### <a name="limits-the-number-of-user-data-snapshots-retained-for-use-in-case-of-emergency-rollback"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11775">Limita il numero di snapshot dei dati utente conservati per l'uso in caso di ripristino di emergenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11775">Limits the number of user data snapshots retained for use in case of emergency rollback</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11776">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11776">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11777">In Windows dalla versione 86 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11777">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11778">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11778">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11779">Dopo ogni aggiornamento della versione principale, Microsoft Edge creerà uno snapshot delle parti dei dati di esplorazione dell'utente da usare in caso di emergenza successiva che richieda un ripristino dello stato precedente temporaneo della versione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11779">Following each major version update, Microsoft Edge will create a snapshot of parts of the user's browsing data to use in case of a later emergency that requires a temporary version rollback.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11780">Se è stato eseguito un ripristino dello stato precedente temporaneo a una versione per cui un utente dispone di uno snapshot corrispondente, i dati dello snapshot vengono ripristinati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11780">If a temporary rollback is performed to a version for which a user has a corresponding snapshot, the data in the snapshot is restored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11781">Questo consente agli utenti di mantenere impostazioni quali segnalibri e dati di riempimento automatico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11781">This lets users keep settings such as bookmarks and autofill data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11782">Se non si imposta questo criterio, verrà usato il valore predefinito di 3 snapshot.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11782">If you don't set this policy, the default value of 3 snapshots is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11783">Se si imposta questo criterio, i vecchi snapshot vengono eliminati in base alle esigenze per rispettare il limite impostato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11783">If you set this policy, old snapshots are deleted as needed to respect the limit you set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11784">Se si imposta questo criterio su 0, non viene eseguita alcuno snapshot.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11784">If you set this policy to 0, no snapshots are taken.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11785">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11785">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11786">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11786">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11787">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11787">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11788">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11788">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11789">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11789">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11790">Numero intero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11790">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11791">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11791">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11792">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11792">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11793">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11793">GP unique name: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11794">Nome Criteri di gruppo: limita il numero di snapshot dei dati utente conservati per l'uso in caso di ripristino dello stato precedente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11794">GP name: Limits the number of user data snapshots retained for use in case of emergency rollback</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11795">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11795">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11796">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11796">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11797">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11797">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11798">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11798">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11799">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11799">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11800">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11800">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11801">Nome valore: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11801">Value Name: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11802">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11802">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11803">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11803">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000003
```

  ### <a name="userfeedbackallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11805">UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11805">UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-user-feedback"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11806">Consente il feedback degli utenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11806">Allow user feedback</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11807">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11807">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11808">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11808">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11809">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11809">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11810">Microsoft Edge usa la funzionalità di feedback (abilitata per impostazione predefinita) per consentire agli utenti di inviare feedback, suggerimenti o questionari dei clienti e di segnalare eventuali problemi riscontrati con il browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11810">Microsoft Edge uses the Edge Feedback feature (enabled by default) to allow users to send feedback, suggestions or customer surveys and to report any issues with the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11811">Inoltre, per impostazione predefinita, gli utenti non possono disabilitare (disattivare) la funzionalità di feedback di Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11811">Also, by default, users can't disable (turn off) the Edge Feedback feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11812">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, gli utenti possono richiamare la funzionalità di feedback di Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11812">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can invoke Edge Feedback.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11813">Se si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti non possono richiamare la funzionalità di feedback di Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11813">If you disable this policy, users can't invoke Edge Feedback.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11814">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11814">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11815">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11815">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11816">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11816">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11817">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11817">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11818">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11818">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11819">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11819">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11820">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11820">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11821">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11821">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11822">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11822">GP unique name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11823">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente il feedback degli utenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11823">GP name: Allow user feedback</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11824">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11824">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11825">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11825">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11826">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11826">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11827">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11827">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11828">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11828">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11829">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11829">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11830">Nome valore: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11830">Value Name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11831">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11831">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11832">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11832">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11833">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11833">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11834">Nome chiave di preferenza: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11834">Preference Key Name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11835">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11835">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="verticaltabsallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11837">VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11837">VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="configures-availability-of-a-vertical-layout-for-tabs-on-the-side-of-the-browser"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11838">Configura la disponibilità di un layout verticale per le schede sul lato del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11838">Configures availability of a vertical layout for tabs on the side of the browser</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11839">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11839">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11840">su Windows e macOS da 88 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11840">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11841">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11841">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11842">Configura se un utente può accedere a un layout alternativo in cui le schede sono allineate verticalmente sul lato del browser anziché nella parte superiore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11842">Configures whether a user can access an alternative layout where tabs are vertically aligned on the side of the browser instead of at the top.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11843">Quando sono aperte diverse schede, questo layout offre una migliore visualizzazione e gestione della scheda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11843">When there are several tabs open, this layout provides better tab viewing and management.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11844">C'è una migliore visibilità dei titoli del sito, è più facile analizzare le icone allineate e c'è più spazio per gestire e chiudere le schede.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11844">There's better visibility of the site titles, it's easier to scan aligned icons, and there's more space to manage and close tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11845">Se si disabilita questo criterio, il layout di tabulazione verticale non sarà disponibile come opzione per gli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11845">If you disable this policy, then the vertical tab layout will not be available as an option for users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11846">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio, il layout di tabulazione sarà ancora in alto, ma un utente ha la possibilità di attivare le schede verticali sul lato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11846">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the tab layout will still be at the top, but a user has the option to turn on vertical tabs on the side.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11847">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11847">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11848">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11848">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11849">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11849">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11850">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11850">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11851">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11851">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11852">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11852">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11853">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11853">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11854">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11854">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11855">Nome univoco GP: VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11855">GP unique name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11856">Nome GP: configura la disponibilità di un layout verticale per le schede sul lato del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11856">GP name: Configures availability of a vertical layout for tabs on the side of the browser</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11857">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11857">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11858">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11858">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11859">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11859">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11860">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11860">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11861">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11861">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11862">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11862">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11863">Nome valore: VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11863">Value Name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11864">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11864">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11865">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11865">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11866">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11866">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11867">Nome chiave di preferenza: VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11867">Preference Key Name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>

  ### <a name="videocaptureallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11870">VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11870">VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-or-block-video-capture"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11871">Consente o blocca l'acquisizione video</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11871">Allow or block video capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11872">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11872">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11873">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11873">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11874">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11874">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11875">Controlla se i siti possono acquisire video.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11875">Control whether sites can capture video.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11876">Se abilitato o non configurato (impostazione predefinita), all'utente verrà chiesto se accedere all'acquisizione video per tutti i siti tranne quelli con gli URL configurati nell'elenco del criterio [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls), ai quali verrà fornito l'accesso senza richiedere conferma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11876">If enabled or not configured (default), the user will be asked about video capture access for all sites except those with URLs configured in the [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) policy list, which will be granted access without prompting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11877">Se si disabilita questo criterio, all'utente non viene inviata alcuna richiesta e l'acquisizione video è disponibile solo per gli URL configurati nel criterio [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11877">If you disable this policy, the user isn't prompted, and video capture is only available to URLs configured in [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11878">Questo criterio influisce su tutti i tipi di input video, non solo sulla fotocamera predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11878">This policy affects all types of video inputs, not only the built-in camera.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11879">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11879">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11880">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11880">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11881">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11881">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11882">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11882">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11883">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11883">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11884">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11884">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11885">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11885">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11886">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11886">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11887">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11887">GP unique name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11888">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente o blocca l'acquisizione video</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11888">GP name: Allow or block video capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11889">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11889">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11890">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11890">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11891">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11891">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11892">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11892">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11893">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11893">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11894">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11894">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11895">Nome valore: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11895">Value Name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11896">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11896">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11897">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11897">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11898">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11898">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11899">Nome chiave di preferenza: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11899">Preference Key Name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11900">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11900">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="videocaptureallowedurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11902">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11902">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="sites-that-can-access-video-capture-devices-without-requesting-permission"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11903">Siti che possono accedere ai dispositivi di acquisizione video senza richiedere l'autorizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11903">Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11904">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11904">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11905">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11905">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11906">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11906">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11907">Specifica i siti Web, in base ai modelli URL, che possono usare i dispositivi di acquisizione video senza chiedere l'autorizzazione all'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11907">Specify websites, based on URL patterns, that can use video capture devices without asking the user for permission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11908">I modelli in questo elenco vengono confrontati con l'origine di sicurezza dell'URL di richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11908">Patterns in this list are matched against the security origin of the requesting URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11909">In caso di corrispondenza, al sito viene automaticamente concesso l'accesso ai dispositivi di acquisizione video.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11909">If they match, the site is automatically granted access to video capture devices.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11910">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11910">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11911">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11911">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11912">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11912">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11913">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11913">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11914">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11914">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11915">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11915">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11916">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11916">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11917">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11917">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11918">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11918">GP unique name: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11919">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Siti che possono accedere ai dispositivi di acquisizione video senza richiedere l'autorizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11919">GP name: Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11920">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11920">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11921">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11921">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11922">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11922">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11923">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11923">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11924">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11924">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11925">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11925">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11926">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11926">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11927">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11927">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11928">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11928">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\2 = "https://[*.]contoso.edu/"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11929">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11929">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11930">Nome chiave di preferenza: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11930">Preference Key Name: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11931">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11931">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>https://[*.]contoso.edu/</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="wpadquickcheckenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11933">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11933">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-wpad-optimization"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11934">Imposta l'ottimizzazione WPAD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11934">Set WPAD optimization</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11935">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11935">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11936">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11936">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11937">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11937">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11938">Consente di disattivare l'ottimizzazione WPAD (Web Proxy AutoDiscovery) in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11938">Allows you to turn off WPAD (Web Proxy Auto-Discovery) optimization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11939">Se si disabilita questo criterio, l'ottimizzazione WPAD è disabilitata, cosa che farà attendere il browser più a lungo per i server WPAD basati su DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11939">If you disable this policy, WPAD optimization is disabled, which makes the browser wait longer for DNS-based WPAD servers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11940">Se si abilita o non si configura il criterio, l'ottimizzazione WPAD è abilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11940">If you enable or don't configure the policy, WPAD optimization is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11941">Indipendentemente dall'abilitazione di questo criterio, l'impostazione di ottimizzazione WPAD non può essere modificata dagli utenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11941">Independent of whether or how this policy is enabled, the WPAD optimization setting cannot be changed by users.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11942">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11942">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11943">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11943">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11944">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11944">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11945">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11945">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11946">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11946">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11947">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11947">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11948">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11948">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11949">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11949">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11950">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11950">GP unique name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11951">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Imposta l'ottimizzazione WPAD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11951">GP name: Set WPAD optimization</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11952">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11952">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11953">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11953">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11954">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11954">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11955">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11955">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11956">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11956">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11957">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11957">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11958">Nome valore: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11958">Value Name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11959">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11959">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11960">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11960">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11962">Nome chiave di preferenza: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11962">Preference Key Name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>

  ### <a name="webappinstallforcelist"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11965">WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11965">WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-list-of-force-installed-web-apps"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11966">Configura l'elenco delle app Web installate forzatamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11966">Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11967">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11967">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11968">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 80 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11968">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11969">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11969">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11970">Configurare il criterio per specificare un elenco di app web che si installano silenziosamente, senza l'intervento dell'utente, e gli utenti che possono disinstallarle o disattivarle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11970">Configure this policy to specify a list of web apps that install silently, without user interaction, and which users can't uninstall or turn off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11971">Ogni voce di elenco dei criteri è un oggetto con un membro obbligatorio: URL (l'URL dell'app Web da installare)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11971">Each list item of the policy is an object with a mandatory member: url (the URL of the web app to install)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-11972">e 3 membri facoltativi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11972">and 3 optional members:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11973">default_launch_container (specifica la modalità della finestra aperta dall'app Web - una nuova scheda è l'impostazione predefinita).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11973">default_launch_container (specifies the window mode that the web app opens with-a new tab is the default.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11974">create_desktop_shortcut (True se si desidera creare collegamenti desktop Linux e Microsoft Windows).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11974">create_desktop_shortcut (True if you want to create Linux and Microsoft Windows desktop shortcuts.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11975">fallback_app_name (a partire da Microsoft Edge 90, consente di eseguire l'override del nome dell'app se non si tratta di un'app Web progressiva (PWA) o del nome dell'app che viene installato temporaneamente se si tratta di una PWA, ma è necessaria l'autenticazione prima che l'installazione possa essere completata).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11975">fallback_app_name (Starting with Microsoft Edge 90, allows you to override the app name if it is not a Progressive Web App (PWA), or the app name that is temporarily installed if it is a PWA but authentication is required before the installation can be completed.)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11976">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11976">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11977">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11977">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11978">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11978">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11979">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11979">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11980">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11980">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11981">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11981">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11982">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11982">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11983">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11983">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11984">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11984">GP unique name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11985">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Configura l'elenco delle app Web installate forzatamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11985">GP name: Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11986">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11986">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11987">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11987">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11988">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11988">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11989">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11989">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11990">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11990">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11991">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11991">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11992">Nome valore: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11992">Value Name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11993">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11993">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11994">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11994">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebAppInstallForceList = [
  {
    "create_desktop_shortcut": true, 
    "default_launch_container": "window", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/maps"
  }, 
  {
    "default_launch_container": "tab", 
    "url": "https://app.contoso.edu"
  }, 
  {
    "default_launch_container": "window", 
    "fallback_app_name": "Editor", 
    "url": "https://app.contoso.com/editor"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11995">Valore di esempio compatto:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11995">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebAppInstallForceList = [{"create_desktop_shortcut": true, "default_launch_container": "window", "url": "https://www.contoso.com/maps"}, {"default_launch_container": "tab", "url": "https://app.contoso.edu"}, {"default_launch_container": "window", "fallback_app_name": "Editor", "url": "https://app.contoso.com/editor"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-11996">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11996">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11997">Nome chiave di preferenza: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11997">Preference Key Name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-11998">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-11998">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebAppInstallForceList</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>create_desktop_shortcut</key>
    <true/>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>window</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com/maps</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>tab</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://app.contoso.edu</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>window</string>
    <key>fallback_app_name</key>
    <string>Editor</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://app.contoso.com/editor</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="webcaptureenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12000">WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12000">WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-web-capture-feature-in-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12001">Abilita la funzionalità di acquisizione web in Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12001">Enable web capture feature in Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12002">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12002">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12003">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12003">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12004">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12004">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12005">Abilita la caratteristica di acquisizione Web in Microsoft Edge, che consente agli utenti di acquisire contenuto Web e di annotare l'acquisizione con strumenti di input penna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12005">Enables the web capture feature in Microsoft Edge that allows users to capture web content and annotate the capture using inking tools.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12006">Se questo criterio viene abilitato o non viene configurato, l'opzione di acquisizione Web viene visualizzata nel menu di scelta rapida, nel menu impostazioni e altro ancora e usando la scelta rapida da tastiera CTRL + MAIUSC + S.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12006">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the Web capture option shows up in the context menu, Settings and more menu, and by using the keyboard shortcut, CTRL+SHIFT+S.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12007">Se si disabilita questo criterio, gli utenti non possono accedere alla funzione Acquisizione Web in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12007">If you disable this policy, users can't access the web capture feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12008">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12008">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12009">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12009">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12010">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12010">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12011">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12011">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12012">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12012">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12013">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12013">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12014">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12014">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12015">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12015">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12016">Nome univoco GP: WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12016">GP unique name: WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12017">Nome GP: abilita la funzionalità di acquisizione web in Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12017">GP name: Enable web capture feature in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12018">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12018">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12019">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12019">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12020">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12020">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12021">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12021">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12022">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12022">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12023">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12023">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12024">Nome valore: WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12024">Value Name: WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12025">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12025">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12026">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12026">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12027">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12027">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12028">Nome chiave preferenza: WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12028">Preference Key Name: WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12029">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12029">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
