  ### <a name="webcomponentsv0enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12031">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12031">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="re-enable-web-components-v0-api-until-m84-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12032">Riattiva l'API v0 dei componenti Web fino a M84 (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12032">Re-enable Web Components v0 API until M84 (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12033">OBSOLETO: questo criterio è obsoleto e non funziona dopo Microsoft Edge 84.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12033">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12034">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12034">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12035">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 80, fino alla versione 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12035">On Windows and macOS since 80, until 84</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12036">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12036">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12037">Questo criterio non funziona perché queste funzionalità sono consentite per la riabilitazione selettiva di Microsoft Edge versione 85.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12037">This policy doesn't work because this policy allowed these features to be selectively re-enabled until Microsoft Edge version 85.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12038">Le API dei componenti Web v0 (Shadow DOM v0, Custom Elements v0 e HTML Imports) sono state deprecate nel 2018 e sono state disabilitate per impostazione predefinita a partire da Microsoft Edge versione 80.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12038">The Web Components v0 APIs (Shadow DOM v0, Custom Elements v0, and HTML Imports) were deprecated in 2018, and have been disabled by default starting in Microsoft Edge version 80.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12039">Se si imposta questo criterio su True, le funzionalità dei componenti Web v0 verranno abilitate per tutti i siti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12039">If you set this policy is set to True, the Web Components v0 features will be enabled for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12040">Se si imposta questo criterio su False o non si imposta questo criterio, le funzionalità dei componenti Web v0 saranno disabilitate per impostazione predefinita, a partire da Microsoft Edge versione 80.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12040">If you set this policy to False or don't set this policy, the Web Components v0 features will be disabled by default, starting in Microsoft Edge version 80.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12041">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12041">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12042">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12042">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12043">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12043">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12044">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12044">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12045">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12045">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12046">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12046">Boolean</span></span>

  ### <a name="webdriveroverridesincompatiblepolicies"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12064">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12064">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-webdriver-to-override-incompatible-policies-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12065">Consente a WebDriver di ignorare i criteri non compatibili (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12065">Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12066">DEPRECATO: questo criterio è deprecato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12066">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12067">È attualmente supportato, ma diventerà obsoleto in una versione futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12067">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12068">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12068">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12069">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77, fino alla versione 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12069">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 84</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12070">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12070">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12071">Questo criterio non funziona perché WebDriver ora è compatibile con tutti i criteri esistenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12071">This policy doesn't work because WebDriver is now compatible with all existing policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12072">Questo criterio consente agli utenti della funzionalità WebDriver di ignorare i criteri che possono interferire con il suo funzionamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12072">This policy allows users of the WebDriver feature to override policies which can interfere with its operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12073">Al momento, questo criterio disabilita i criteri [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) e [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12073">Currently this policy disables [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) and [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12074">Se il criteri è abilitato, WebDriver sarà in grado di ignorare i criteri non compatibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12074">If the policy is enabled, WebDriver will be able to override incomaptible policies.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12075">Se il criterio è disabilitato o non configurato, WebDriver non sarà in grado di ignorare i criteri non compatibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12075">If the policy is disabled or not configured, WebDriver will not be allowed to override incompatible policies.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12076">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12076">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12077">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12077">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12078">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12078">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12079">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12079">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12080">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12080">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12081">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12081">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12082">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12082">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12083">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12083">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12084">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12084">GP unique name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12085">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Consente a WebDriver di ignorare i criteri non compatibili (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12085">GP name: Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12086">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12086">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12087">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12087">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12088">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12088">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12089">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12089">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12090">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12090">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12091">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12091">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12092">Nome valore: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12092">Value Name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12093">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12093">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12094">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12094">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12095">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12095">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12096">Nome chiave di preferenza: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12096">Preference Key Name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12097">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12097">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="webrtcallowlegacytlsprotocols"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12099">WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12099">WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-legacy-tlsdtls-downgrade-in-webrtc-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12100">Consenti downgrade TLS/DTLS legacy in WebRTC (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12100">Allow legacy TLS/DTLS downgrade in WebRTC (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12101">DEPRECATO: questo criterio è deprecato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12101">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12102">È attualmente supportato, ma diventerà obsoleto in una versione futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12102">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12103">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12103">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12104">su Windows e macOS da 88 o versioni successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12104">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12105">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12105">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12106">Se si abilita questo criterio, le connessioni peer di WebRTC possono eseguire il downgrade alle versioni obsolete dei protocolli TLS/DTLS (DTLS 1,0, TLS 1,0 e TLS 1,1).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12106">If you enable this policy, WebRTC peer connections can downgrade to obsolete versions of the TLS/DTLS (DTLS 1.0, TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1) protocols.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12107">Se si disabilita o non si imposta questo criterio, queste versioni di TLS/DTLS sono disabilitate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12107">If you disable or don't set this policy, these TLS/DTLS versions are disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12108">Questo criterio è temporaneo e verrà rimosso in una versione futura di Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12108">This policy is temporary and will be removed in a future version of Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12109">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12109">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12110">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12110">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12111">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12111">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12112">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12112">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12113">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12113">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12114">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12114">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12115">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12115">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12116">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12116">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12117">Nome univoco GP: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12117">GP unique name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12118">Nome GP: Consenti downgrade TLS/DTLS legacy in WebRTC (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12118">GP name: Allow legacy TLS/DTLS downgrade in WebRTC (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12119">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12119">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12120">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12120">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12121">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12121">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12122">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12122">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12123">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12123">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12124">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12124">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12125">Nome valore: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12125">Value Name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12126">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12126">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12127">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12127">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12128">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12128">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12129">Nome chiave di preferenza: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12129">Preference Key Name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>

``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="webrtclocalipsallowedurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12132">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12132">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="manage-exposure-of-local-ip-addressess-by-webrtc"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12133">Gestisce l'esposizione degli indirizzi IP locali tramite WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12133">Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12134">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12134">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12135">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 80 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12135">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12136">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12136">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12137">Specifica un elenco di origini (URL) o modelli di nomi host (come "*contoso.com*") per cui l'indirizzo IP locale deve essere esposto da WebRTC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12137">Specifies a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns (like "*contoso.com*") for which local IP address should be exposed by WebRTC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12138">Se si abilita questo criterio e si imposta un elenco di origini (URL) o modelli di nomi host, quando edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns è abilitato, WebRTC espone l'indirizzo IP locale per i casi che corrispondono ai modelli nell'elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12138">If you enable this policy and set a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns, when edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Enabled, WebRTC will expose the local IP address for cases that match patterns in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12139">Se si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio e edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns è abilitato, WebRTC non espone gli indirizzi IP locali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12139">If you disable or don't configure this policy, and edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Enabled, WebRTC will not expose local IP addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12140">L'indirizzo IP locale è nascosto con un nome host mDNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12140">The local IP address is concealed with an mDNS hostname.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12141">Se si abilita, si disabilita o non si configura questo criterio e edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns è disabilitato, WebRTC espone gli indirizzi IP locali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12141">If you enable, disable, or don't configure this policy, and edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Disabled, WebRTC will expose local IP addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12142">Tenere presente che questo criterio indebolisce la protezione degli indirizzi IP locali che potrebbero essere necessari agli amministratori.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12142">Please note that this policy weakens the protection of local IP addresses that might be needed by administrators.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12143">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12143">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12144">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12144">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12145">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12145">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12146">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12146">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12147">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12147">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12148">Elenco di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12148">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12149">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12149">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12150">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12150">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12151">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12151">GP unique name: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12152">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Gestisce l'esposizione degli indirizzi IP locali tramite WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12152">GP name: Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12153">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12153">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12154">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12154">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12155">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12155">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12156">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12156">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12157">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12157">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12158">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12158">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12159">Nome valore: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12159">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12160">Tipo valore: elenco di REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12160">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12161">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12161">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\2 = "*contoso.com*"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12162">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12162">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12163">Nome chiave di preferenza: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12163">Preference Key Name: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12164">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12164">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>*contoso.com*</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="webrtclocalhostiphandling"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12166">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12166">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>

  #### <a name="restrict-exposure-of-local-ip-address-by-webrtc"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12167">Limita l'esposizione dell'indirizzo IP locale tramite WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12167">Restrict exposure of local IP address by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12168">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12168">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12169">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12169">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12170">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12170">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12171">Consente di specificare se WebRTC espone o meno l'indirizzo IP locale dell'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12171">Allows you to set whether or not WebRTC exposes the user's local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12172">Se si imposta questo criterio su "AllowAllInterfaces" o su "AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces", WebRTC espone l'indirizzo IP locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12172">If you set this policy to "AllowAllInterfaces" or "AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces", WebRTC exposes the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12173">Se si imposta questo criterio su "AllowPublicInterfaceOnly" o su "DisableNonProxiedUdp", WebRTC non espone l'indirizzo IP locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12173">If you set this policy to "AllowPublicInterfaceOnly" or "DisableNonProxiedUdp", WebRTC doesn't expose the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12174">Se si disabilita o non si imposta questo criterio, WebRTC espone l'indirizzo IP locale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12174">If you don't set this policy, or if you disable it, WebRTC exposes the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12175">Mapping delle opzioni del criterio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12175">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12176">AllowAllInterfaces (impostazione predefinita) = Consentire tutte le interfacce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12176">AllowAllInterfaces (default) = Allow all interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12177">Espone l'indirizzo IP locale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12177">This exposes the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12178">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces) = Sono consentite le interfacce pubbliche e private sulla route predefinita http.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12178">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces) = Allow public and private interfaces over http default route.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12179">Espone l'indirizzo IP locale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12179">This exposes the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12180">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (default_public_interface_only) = È consentita l'interfaccia pubblica sulla route predefinita http.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12180">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (default_public_interface_only) = Allow public interface over http default route.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12181">Non espone l'indirizzo IP locale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12181">This doesn't expose the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12182">DisableNonProxiedUdp (disable_non_proxied_udp) = Usare TCP a meno che il server proxy non supporti UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12182">DisableNonProxiedUdp (disable_non_proxied_udp) = Use TCP unless proxy server supports UDP.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12183">Non espone l'indirizzo IP locale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12183">This doesn't expose the local IP address</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12184">Durante la configurazione di questo criterio, utilizzare le informazioni precedenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12184">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12185">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12185">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12186">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12186">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12187">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12187">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12188">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12188">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12189">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12189">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12190">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12190">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12191">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12191">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12192">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12192">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12193">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12193">GP unique name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12194">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Limita l'esposizione dell'indirizzo IP locale tramite WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12194">GP name: Restrict exposure of local IP address by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12195">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12195">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12196">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12196">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12197">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12197">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12198">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12198">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12199">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12199">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12200">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12200">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12201">Nome valore: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12201">Value Name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12202">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12202">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12203">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12203">Example value:</span></span>

```
"default"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12204">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12204">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12205">Nome chiave di preferenza: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12205">Preference Key Name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12206">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12206">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>default</string>
```

  ### <a name="webrtcudpportrange"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12208">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12208">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>

  #### <a name="restrict-the-range-of-local-udp-ports-used-by-webrtc"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12209">Limita l'intervallo di porte UDP locali usate da WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12209">Restrict the range of local UDP ports used by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12210">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12210">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12211">In Windows e macOS dalla versione 77 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12211">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12212">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12212">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12213">Restringe l'intervallo di porte UDP utilizzato da WebRTC a un intervallo di porte specifico (endpoint inclusi).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12213">Restricts the UDP port range used by WebRTC to a specified port interval (endpoints included).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12214">Configurando questo criterio, si specifica l'intervallo di porte UDP locali che può essere usato da WebRTC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12214">By configuring this policy, you specify the range of local UDP ports that WebRTC can use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12215">Se non si configura questo criterio o se lo si imposta su una stringa vuota o un intervallo di porte non valido, WebRTC potrà usare qualsiasi porta UDP locale disponibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12215">If you don't configure this policy, or if you set it to an empty string or invalid port range, WebRTC can use any available local UDP port.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12216">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12216">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12217">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12217">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12218">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12218">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12219">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12219">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12220">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12220">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12221">Stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12221">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12222">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12222">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12223">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12223">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12224">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12224">GP unique name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12225">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Limita l'intervallo di porte UDP locali usate da WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12225">GP name: Restrict the range of local UDP ports used by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12226">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12226">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12227">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12227">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12228">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12228">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12229">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12229">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12230">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12230">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12231">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12231">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12232">Nome valore: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12232">Value Name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12233">Tipo valore: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12233">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12234">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12234">Example value:</span></span>

```
"10000-11999"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12235">Informazioni e impostazioni Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12235">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12236">Nome chiave di preferenza: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12236">Preference Key Name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12237">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12237">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>10000-11999</string>
```

  ### <a name="webwidgetallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12239">WebWidgetAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12239">WebWidgetAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-the-web-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12240">Abilita il widget Web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12240">Enable the Web widget</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12241">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12241">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12242">In Windows dalla versione 88 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12242">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12243">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12243">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12244">Abilita il widget Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12244">Enables the Web widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12245">Se abilitato, gli utenti possono utilizzare il widget per eseguire ricerche sul Web dal proprio desktop o da un'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12245">When enabled, users can use the widget to search the web from their desktop or from an application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12246">Il widget fornisce una casella di ricerca che mostra i suggerimenti Web e apre tutte le ricerche Web in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12246">The widget provides a search box that shows web suggestions and opens all web searches in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12247">La casella di ricerca fornisce suggerimenti di ricerca (forniti da Bing) e URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12247">The search box provides search (powered by Bing) and URL suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12248">Il widget include anche riquadri di feed su cui gli utenti possono fare clic per visualizzare ulteriori informazioni su msn.com in una nuova scheda o finestra del browser Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12248">The widget also includes feed tiles that users can click to see more information on msn.com in a new Microsoft Edge browser tab or window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12249">I riquadri di feed possono includere annunci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12249">The feed tiles may include ads.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12250">Il widget può essere avviato dalle impostazioni Microsoft Edge o dal menu "Altri strumenti" in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12250">The widget can be launched from the Microsoft Edge settings or from the "More tools" menu in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12251">Se si abilita o non si configura questo criterio: il widget Web sarà abilitato automaticamente per tutti i profili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12251">If you enable or don't configure this policy: The Web widget will be automatically enabled for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12252">Nelle impostazioni Microsoft Edge, gli utenti vedranno l'opzione per avviare il widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12252">In the Microsoft Edge settings, users will see option to launch the widget.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12253">Nelle impostazioni di Microsoft Edge, gli utenti vedranno la voce di menu per eseguire il widget all'avvio di Windows (avvio automatico).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12253">In the Microsoft Edge settings, users will see the menu item to run the widget at Windows startup (auto-start).</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12254">L'opzione per abilitare il widget all'avvio viene attivata se il criterio[WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) è abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12254">The option to enable the widget at startup will be toggled on if the [WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) policy is enabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12255">Se [WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) è disabilitato o non è configurato, l'opzione per abilitare il widget all'avvio sarà disattivata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12255">If the [WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) is disabled or not configured, the option to enable the widget at startup will be toggled off.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12256">Gli utenti vedranno la voce di menu per avviare il widget dal menu Microsoft Edge "Altri strumenti".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12256">Users will see the menu item to launch the widget from the Microsoft Edge "More tools" menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12257">Gli utenti possono avviare il widget da "Altri strumenti".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12257">Users can launch the widget from "More tools".</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12258">Il widget può essere disattivato dall'opzione "Esci" nella barra delle applicazioni o chiudendo il widget dalla barra delle applicazioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12258">The widget can be turned off by the "Quit" option in the System tray or by closing the widget from the taskbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12259">Il widget verrà riavviato al riavvio del sistema se l'avvio automatico è abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12259">The widget will be restarted on system reboot if auto-start is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12260">Se si disabilita questo criterio: il widget Web verrà disabilitato per tutti i profili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12260">If you disable this policy: The Web widget will be disabled for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12261">L'opzione per avviare il widget dalle impostazioni Microsoft Edge verrà disabilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12261">The option to launch the widget from Microsoft Edge Settings will be disabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12262">L'opzione per avviare l'avvio del widget all'avvio di Windows (avvio automatico) verrà disabilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12262">The option to launch start the widget at Windows startup (auto-start) will be disabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12263">L'opzione per avviare il widget dal menu "Altri strumenti" di Microsoft Edge verrà disabilitata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12263">The option to launch the widget from Microsoft Edge "More tools" menu will be disabled.</span></span>

  ### <a name="webwidgetisenabledonstartup"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12284">WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12284">WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-the-web-widget-at-windows-startup"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12285">Consenti il widget Web all'avvio di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12285">Allow the Web widget at Windows startup</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12286">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12286">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12287">In Windows dalla versione 88 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12287">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12288">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12288">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12289">Consente l'esecuzione del widget Web all'avvio di Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12289">Allows the Web widget to start running at Windows startup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12290">Se si abilita: il widget Web verrà eseguito all'avvio di Windows per impostazione predefinita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12290">If you enable: The Web widget will start running at Windows startup by default.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12291">Se il widget è disabilitato tramite il criterio [WebWidgetAllowed](#webwidgetallowed), questo criterio non avvierà il widget all'avvio di Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12291">If the widget is disabled via [WebWidgetAllowed](#webwidgetallowed) policy, this policy will not start the widget on Windows startup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12292">Se si disabilita questo criterio: il widget Web non verrà avviato all'avvio di Windows per tutti i profili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12292">If you disable this policy: The Web widget will not start at Windows startup for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12293">L'opzione per avviare il widget all'avvio di Windows verrà disabilitata e disattivata nelle impostazioni Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12293">The option to start the widget at Windows startup will be disabled and toggled off in Microsoft Edge settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12294">Se si configura il criterio: il widget Web non verrà avviato all'avvio di Windows per tutti i profili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12294">If you don't configure the policy: The Web widget will not start at Windows startup for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12295">L'opzione per avviare il widget all'avvio di Windows verrà disattivata nelle impostazioni Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12295">The option to start the widget at Windows startup will be toggled off in Microsoft Edge settings.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12296">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12296">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12297">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12297">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12298">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12298">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12299">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12299">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12301">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12301">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12302">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12302">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12303">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12303">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12304">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12304">GP unique name: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12305">Nome Criteri di gruppo: consenti il widget Web all'avvio di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12305">GP name: Allow the Web widget at Windows startup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12306">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12306">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12307">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12307">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12308">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12308">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12309">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12309">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12310">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12310">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12311">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12311">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12312">Nome valore: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12312">Value Name: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12313">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12313">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12314">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12314">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="winhttpproxyresolverenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12316">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12316">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="use-windows-proxy-resolver-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12317">Usa il resolver proxy di Windows (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12317">Use Windows proxy resolver (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12318">DEPRECATO: questo criterio è deprecato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12318">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12319">È attualmente supportato, ma diventerà obsoleto in una versione futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12319">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12320">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12320">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12321">In Windows dalla versione 84 o successive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12321">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12322">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12322">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12323">Questo criterio è deprecato perché verrà sostituito da una funzione simile in una versione futura, vedere https://crbug.com/1032820.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12323">This policy is deprecated because it will be superseded by a similar feature in a future release, see https://crbug.com/1032820.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12324">Usa Windows per risolvere i proxy per tutta la rete di browser anziché il resolver proxy incorporato in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12324">Use Windows to resolve proxies for all browser networking instead of the proxy resolver built into Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12325">Il resolver proxy di Windows abilita le funzionalità di proxy di Windows, ad esempio DirectAccess/NRPT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12325">The Windows proxy resolver enables Windows proxy features such as DirectAccess/NRPT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12326">Questo criterio include i problemi descritti da https://crbug.com/644030.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12326">This policy comes with the problems described by https://crbug.com/644030.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12327">Questo comporta il recupero e l’esecuzione dei file PAC dal codice di Windows, inclusi i file PAC impostati tramite il criterio [.](#proxypacurl)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12327">It causes PAC files to be fetched and executed by Windows code, including PAC files set via the [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12328">Poiché i recuperi di rete per il file PAC avvengono tramite Windows anziché tramite il codice di Microsoft Edge, i criteri di rete come [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) non si applicano ai recuperi di rete per un file PAC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12328">Since Network Fetches for the PAC file happen via Windows instead of Microsoft Edge code, network policies such as [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) will not apply to network fetches for a PAC file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12329">Se questo criterio viene abilitato, verrà usato il resolver proxy di Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12329">If you enable this policy, the Windows proxy resolver will be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12330">Se si disabilitano o non si configura questo criterio, verrà usato il resolver proxy Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12330">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the Microsoft Edge proxy resolver will be used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12331">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12331">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12332">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12332">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12333">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12333">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12334">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: no - Richiede il riavvio del browser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12334">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12335">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12335">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12336">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12336">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12337">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12337">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12338">Info su Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12338">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12339">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12339">GP unique name: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12340">Nome Criteri di gruppo: usa il resolver proxy di Windows (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12340">GP name: Use Windows proxy resolver (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12341">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12341">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12342">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12342">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12344">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12344">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12345">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12345">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>

  ### <a name="windowocclusionenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12351">WindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12351">WindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-window-occlusion"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12352">Abilita l'occlusione della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12352">Enable Window Occlusion</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12353">Versioni supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12353">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12354">In Windows dalla versione 89 o successiva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12354">On Windows since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12355">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12355">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12356">Abilita l'occlusione della finestra in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12356">Enables window occlusion in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12357">Se si abilita questa impostazione, per ridurre il consumo di energia e CPU, Microsoft Edge rileverà quando una finestra è coperta da altre finestre e sospenderà i pixel di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12357">If you enable this setting, to reduce CPU and power consumption Microsoft Edge will detect when a window is covered by other windows, and will suspend work painting pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12358">Se si disabilita questa impostazione, Microsoft Edge non rileverà quando una finestra è coperta da altre finestre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12358">If you disable this setting Microsoft Edge will not detect when a window is covered by other windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="161f9-12359">Se non viene impostato questo criterio, il rilevamento delle finestre nascoste sarà abilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12359">If this policy is left not set, window hiding detection will be enabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12360">Funzionalità supportate:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12360">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12361">Può essere obbligatorio: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12361">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12362">Può essere consigliato: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12362">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12363">Aggiornamento dei criteri dinamici: sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12363">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12364">Tipo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12364">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12365">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12365">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12366">Informazioni e impostazioni di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12366">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12367">Informazioni sui Criteri di gruppo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12367">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12368">Nome univoco Criteri di gruppo: WindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12368">GP unique name: WindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12369">Nome Criteri di gruppo: Abilita occlusione finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12369">GP name: Enable Window Occlusion</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12370">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (obbligatorio): Modelli amministrativi/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12370">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12371">Percorso Criteri di gruppo (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12371">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12372">Nome file ADMX Criteri di gruppo: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12372">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12373">Impostazioni del Registro di sistema di Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12373">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12374">Percorso (obbligatorio): SOFTWARE\Criteri\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12374">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12375">Percorso (consigliato): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12375">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12376">Nome valore: WindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12376">Value Name: WindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="161f9-12377">Tipo valore: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12377">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="161f9-12378">Valore di esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="161f9-12378">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```
